## <a name="gx_accordion_menu_create"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-1070">gx_accordion_menu_create</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-1070">gx_accordion_menu_create</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-1071">Creare un menu di Accordion</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-1071">Create an accordion menu</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-1072">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-1072">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_accordion_menu_create(
    GX_ACCORDION_MENU *accordion,
    GX_CONST GX_CHAR *name,
    GX_WIDGET *parent,
    ULONG style ,
    USHORT accordion_menu_id,
    GX_CONST GX_RECTANGLE *size);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-1073">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-1073">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-1074">Questo servizio crea un menu di Accordion come specificato e connette il menu Accordion al widget padre fornito.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-1074">This service creates an accordion menu as specified and attaches the accordion menu to the supplied parent widget.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-1075">Un menu di Accordion è il widget per la visualizzazione del menu di espansione/compressione.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-1075">An accordion menu is anexpanding/collapsing menu display widget.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-1076">Accetta tutti i tipi di widget come voci di menu figlio.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-1076">It accepts all types of widget as its child menu items.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-1077">I menu di Accordion possono essere annidati, vale a dire che è possibile creare diversi livelli di profondità dei menu.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-1077">Accordion menus can be nested, meaning several levels of menu depth can be created.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-1078">Per inserire un elemento figlio in un widget della voce di menu, è consigliabile usare il widget GX_MENU tipo come voce di menu padre.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-1078">To insert a child item into a menu item widget, it’s recommended touse GX_MENU type widget as a parent menu item.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-1079">Suggerimenti per la creazione di un menu di Accordion a un solo livello:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-1079">Tips for creating a single level accordion menu:</span></span>

1.  <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-1080">Creare un menu di Accordion.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-1080">Create an accordion menu.</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-1105">Esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-1105">Example</span></span>

```C
GX_ACCORDION_MENU my_accordion;
GX_MENU menu_1;
GX_MENU item_1;
GX_RECTANGLE size;

gx_utility_rectangle_define(&size, 100, 100, 300, 150);

status = gx_accordion_menu_create(&my_accordion, “my_accordion”,
                                  parent, GX_STYLE_ENABLED,
                                  MY_ACCORDION_ID, &size);

gx_menu_create(&menu_1, “menu_1”, &my_accordion,
               GX_STRING_ID_MENU_1, GX_ID_NONE,
               GX_STYLE_ENABLED | GX_TYLE_BORDER_THIN, 0, &size);

gx_menu_create(&item_1, “item_1”, &my_accordion,
               GX_STRING_ID_ITEM_1, GX_ID_NONE,
               GX_STYLE_ENABLED | GX_STYLE_BORDER_THIN, 0, &size);

gx_text_offset_set(&item_1, 30, 0);

gx_menu_insert(&menu_1, &item_1);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the accordion menu was successfully created. */

```

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-1119">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-1119">Prototype</span></span>

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-1120">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-1120">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-1121">Questo servizio disegna il menu di Accordion specificato.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-1121">This service draws the specified accordion menu.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-1122">Questo servizio in genere viene chiamato internamente dal meccanismo di aggiornamento Canvas di GUIX, ma viene esposto all'applicazione per facilitare l'implementazione di funzioni di disegno personalizzate per i widget menu di Accordion personalizzato.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-1122">This service is normally called internally by the GUIX canvas refresh mechanism, but is exposed to the application to assist with implementing custom drawing functions for custom accordion menu widgets.</span></span>

## <a name="gx_accordion_menu_event_process"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-1140">gx_accordion_menu_event_process</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-1140">gx_accordion_menu_event_process</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-1141">Evento del menu di Accordion di elaborazione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-1141">Process accordion menu event</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-1142">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-1142">Prototype</span></span>

```C

    GX_ACCORDION_MENU *accordion, 
    GX_EVENT *event_ptr);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-1143">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-1143">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-1144">Questo servizio elabora un evento per il menu di Accordion specificato.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-1144">This service processes an event for the specified accordion menu.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-1145">Questo servizio deve essere chiamato come gestore eventi predefinito da qualsiasi funzione di elaborazione di eventi del menu di Accordion personalizzato.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-1145">This service should be called as the default event handler by any custom accordion menu event processing functions.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-1146">Questo servizio gestisce gli eventi GX_EVENT_PEN_DOWN e GX_EVENT_PEN_UP per espandere o comprimere una voce di menu.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-1146">This service handles GX_EVENT_PEN_DOWN and GX_EVENT_PEN_UP events to expand/collaps a menu item.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-1147">Parametri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-1147">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-1148">**Accordion** Puntatore al blocco di controllo del menu di Accordion</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-1148">**accordion** Pointer to accordion menu control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-1149">**event_ptr** Puntatore all'evento da elaborare</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-1149">**event_ptr** Pointer to the event to process</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-1150">Valori restituiti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-1150">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-1151">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) processo dell'evento del menu di Accordion riuscito</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-1151">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful accordion menu event process</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-1152">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) chiamante non valido di questa funzione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-1152">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-1153">Puntatore a **GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) non valido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-1153">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-1154">Consentito da</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-1154">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-1155">Thread</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-1155">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-1156">Esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-1156">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Call generic accordion menu event processing as part of custom event processing function. */

UINT custom_accordion_event_process( 
    GX_ACCORDION_MENU *accordion,
    GX_EVENT *event)
{
    UINT status = GX_SUCCESS;

    switch(event->gx_event_type)
    {
    case xyz:
        /* Insert custom event handling here */
        break;

    default:
        /* Pass all other events to the default accordion menu
            event processing */
        status =
        gx_accordion_menu_event_process(accordion, event);
        break;
    }
    return status;
}

```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-1170">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-1170">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-1171">Questo servizio posiziona le voci di menu per il menu Accordion.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-1171">This service positions the menu items for the accordion menu.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-1172">Questa funzione viene in genere chiamata internamente quando il menu di Accordion diventa visibile.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-1172">This function is normally called internally when the accordion menu is becoming visible.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-1173">Se si desidera inserire/rimuovere elementi da e verso un menu di Accordion oppure modificare gli stili di espansione dell'elemento figlio, è necessario chiamare questa funzione per riposizionare gli elementi figlio.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-1173">If you want to insert/remove items to/from an accordion menu, or change the expand styles of the child item, this function should be called to reposition the child items.</span></span>

## <a name="gx_animation_canvas_define"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-1193">gx_animation_canvas_define</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-1193">gx_animation_canvas_define</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-1194">Fornire memoria Canvas a un controller di animazione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-1194">Provide canvas memory to an animation controller</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-1195">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-1195">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_animation_canvas_define(
    GX_ANIMATION *animation, 
    GX_CANVAS *canvas);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-1196">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-1196">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-1197">Questo servizio fornisce un'area di disegno della memoria a un controller di animazione usato per implementare la sequenza di animazione.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-1197">This service provides a memory canvas to an animation controller used to implement the animation sequence.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-1198">Questa area di disegno specificata deve essere sufficientemente grande da contenere il widget di destinazione dell'animazione.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-1198">This provided canvas should be large enough to hold the animation target widget.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-1199">Quando viene definita un'area di disegno dell'animazione, il widget di destinazione viene disegnato una volta nell'area di disegno dell'animazione e l'effetto di scorrimento o dissolvenza dello schermo viene eseguito modificando l'offset dell'area di disegno e/o il valore alfa di Canvas.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-1199">When an animation canvas is defined, the target widget is drawn once to this animation canvas, and the screen slide or fade effect is accomplished by modifying the canvas offset and/or canvas alpha value.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-1200">Quando viene fornito il supporto hardware per più livelli grafici, la definizione di un'area di disegno dell'animazione associata a un livello di sovrapposizione grafica hardware può migliorare ***significativamente*** le prestazioni delle animazioni di scorrimento e dissolvenza.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-1200">When hardware support for multiple graphics layers is provided, defining an animation canvas that is bound to a hardware graphics overlay layer can ***greatly*** improve the performance of slide and fade animations.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-1201">Gestione animazioni richiede un'area di disegno dell'animazione per l'esecuzione di tipi di animazione di dissolvenza e dissolvenza in uscita se eseguita con una profondità di colore inferiore a 16 BPP.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-1201">The animation manager does require an animation canvas to execute fade-in and fade-out animation types if running at color depth less than 16 bpp.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-1202">Parametri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-1202">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-1203">**animazione** di Puntatore al blocco di controllo dell'animazione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-1203">**animation** Pointer to animation control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-1204">**area di disegno** Area di disegno della memoria usata per implementare l'animazione di traduzione.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-1204">**canvas** Memory canvas used to implement the translation animation.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-1205">Valori restituiti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-1205">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-1206">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) ha definito l'area di disegno dell'animazione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-1206">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successfully defined animation canvas</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-1207">Stato di animazione **GX_INVALID_STATUS** (0x10) non valido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-1207">**GX_INVALID_STATUS** (0x10) Invalid animation status</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-1208">**GX_INVALID_MEMORY_SIZE** (0x29) il blocco di memoria specificato non è sufficientemente grande per la creazione dell'area di disegno</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-1208">**GX_INVALID_MEMORY_SIZE** (0x29) The provided memory block is not large enough to create the canvas</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-1209">Puntatore a **GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) non valido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-1209">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-1210">Consentito da</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-1210">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-1211">Inizializzazione e thread</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-1211">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-1212">Esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-1212">Example</span></span>

```C
GX_ANIMATION animation;
GX_CANVAS animation_canvas;
GX_ROOT_WINDOW animation_root;
/* Create animation canvas. */
status = gx_canvas_create(
        &animation_canvas, /* Canvas control block. */
        “animation_canvas”, /* Name of canvas. */
        display, /* Display control block. */
        GX_ANIMATION_MANAGED, /* Type of canvas. */
        width, /* Width of canvas. */
        height, /* Height of canvas. */
        memory_area, /* Memory area of canvas. */
        memory_size /* Size of canvas memory. */
        );
if (status == GX_SUCCESS)
{
    /* Create the root window for the canvas. */
    status = gx_window_root_create(
        &animation_root, /* Root window control block. */
        “animation_root”, /* Name of root window. */
        &animation_canvas, /* Canvas of the root window. */ GX_STYLE_NONE, /* Style of the window. */
        GX_ID_NONE, /* Root window ID. */
        &root_size /* Window size. */
        );
}
if (status == GX_SUCCESS)
{
    /* Define canvas for the animation. */
    status = gx_animation_canvas_define(&animation,
                &animation_canvas);
}
/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the new canvas was successfully set to the animation manager. */

```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-1224">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-1224">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-1225">Questo servizio crea un controller di animazione.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-1225">This service creates an animation controller.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-1226">Il controller viene inizializzato allo stato inattivo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-1226">The controller is initialized to the idle state.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-1227">Uno non può avviare un'animazione a meno che non si trovi nello stato inattivo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-1227">One cannot start an animation unless it is in the IDLE state.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-1228">Il puntatore del blocco di controllo GX_ANIMATION può essere ottenuto utilizzando gx_system_animation_get () o un blocco di controllo definito in modo statico.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-1228">The GX_ANIMATION control block pointer may be obtained using gx_system_animation_get(), or it may be a statically defined control block.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-1231">Valori restituiti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-1231">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-1233">Blocco di controllo **GX_ALREADY_CREATED** (0x13) già inizializzato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-1233">**GX_ALREADY_CREATED** (0x13) Control block already initialized</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-1234">Puntatore a **GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) non valido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-1234">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-1237">Esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-1237">Example</span></span>

```C
GX_ANIMATION *animation;

/* Allocate an animaton control from system pool */
gx_system_animation_get(&animation);

/* Initialize the control block */

if (animation)
{
    status = gx_animation_create(&animation);
}

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the new animation controller was successfully created and initialized. */

```

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-1250">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-1250">Prototype</span></span>

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-1251">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-1251">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-1252">Questo servizio rimuove la routine di hook dell'animazione per il trascinamento della schermata dalla funzione predefinita del processo di evento del widget e interrompe la sequenza di animazione.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-1252">This service removes the screen drag animation hook procedure from the widget’s default event process function and stops the animation sequence.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-1253">La routine di hook di animazione di trascinamento della schermata gestisce gli eventi per un'animazione di trascinamento</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-1253">The screen drag animation hook procedure handles events for a screen drag animation.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-1254">Parametri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-1254">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-1256">**widget** di Puntatore al blocco di controllo widget</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-1256">**widget** Pointer to widget control block</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-1257">Valori restituiti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-1257">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-1259">Puntatore a **GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) non valido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-1259">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-1260">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) chiamante non valido di questa funzione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-1260">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>

```C
GX_ANIMATION animation;
GX_WIDGET *animation_parent;

/* Disable screen drag animation of “animation_parent”. */
status = gx_animation_drag_disable(&animation, animation_parent);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the screen drag hook has been removed
    from the event process of “animation_parent”. */

```

## <a name="gx_animation_drag_enable"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-1273">gx_animation_drag_enable</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-1273">gx_animation_drag_enable</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-1274">Abilita Hook animazione per il trascinamento della schermata</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-1274">Enable screen drag animation hook</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-1275">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-1275">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_animation_drag_enable(
    GX_ANIMATION *animation,
    GX_WIDGET *widget, 
    GX_ANIMATION_INFO *info);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-1276">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-1276">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-1277">Questo servizio imposta la funzione di elaborazione eventi di animazione del trascinamento della schermata definita internamente come procedura di hook della funzione di processo di evento predefinita di un widget.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-1277">This service sets the internally defined screen drag animation event process function as a hook procedure of a widget’s default event process function.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-1278">La funzione di elaborazione eventi di trascinamento dello schermo gestisce gli eventi per un'animazione con trascinamento della schermata</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-1278">The screen drag animation event process function handles events for a screen drag animation.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-1279">La procedura per l'hook di trascinamento della schermata diventa il gestore predefinito per gli eventi di input penna inviati al widget di destinazione.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-1279">The screen drag hook procedure becomes the default handler for pen input events sent to the target widget.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-1280">La funzione di elaborazione degli eventi del widget originale viene chiamata in un modo a catena di margherite dopo aver verificato i tipi di evento di input per il trascinamento dello schermo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-1280">The original widget event processing function is called in a daisy-chain fashion after checking for screen drag input event types.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-1281">Parametri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-1281">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-1282">**animazione** di Puntatore al blocco di controllo dell'animazione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-1282">**animation** Pointer to animation control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-1283">**widget** di Puntatore al blocco di controllo widget</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-1283">**widget** Pointer to widget control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-1284">**informazioni** su Informazioni sull'animazione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-1284">**info** Animation information</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-1285">Valori restituiti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-1285">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-1286">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) riuscita</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-1286">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-1287">Stato di animazione **GX_INVALID_STATUS** (0X26) non valido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-1287">**GX_INVALID_STATUS** (0x26) Invalid animation status</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-1288">Puntatore a **GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) non valido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-1288">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-1289">Valore di **GX_INVALID_VALUE** (0X22) non valido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-1289">**GX_INVALID_VALUE** (0x22) Invalid value</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-1290">Elenco della schermata della diapositiva **GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) non specificato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-1290">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Slide screen list is not provided</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-1291">Consentito da</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-1291">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-1292">Inizializzazione e thread</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-1292">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-1293">Esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-1293">Example</span></span>

```C
GX_ANIMATION animation;
GX_ANIMATION_INFO info;
GX_WIDGET *animation_parent;
GX_WIDGET *screen_list[] = {
    screen_1,
    screen_2,
    screen_3,
    GX_NULL
}

memset(&info, 0, sizeof(GX_ANIMATION_INFO);
info.gx_animation_parent = animation_parent;

/* If GX_STYLE_ANIMATION_WRAP is set, the screen list will wrap itself. */
info.gx_animation_style = GX_ANIMATION_SCREEN_DRAG |
                          GX_ANIMATION_HORIZONTAL |
                          GX_STYLE_ANIMATION_WRAP;
info.gx_animation_frame_interval = 1;
info.gx_animation_slide_screen_list = screen_list;

status = gx_animation_drag_enable(&animation, animation_parent,
                                  info);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the screen slide animinatin event
    process function has been set as a hook procedure of
    “animation_parent”. */
```

## <a name="gx_animation_start"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-1326">gx_animation_start</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-1326">gx_animation_start</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-1327">Avviare un'animazione basata sul timer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-1327">Start a timer-driven animation</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-1328">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-1328">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_animation_start(
    GX_ANIMATION *animation, 
    GX_ANIMATION_INFO *params);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-1329">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-1329">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-1330">Questo servizio avvia una sequenza di animazione utilizzando un'istanza di animazione creata in precedenza e un nuovo set di parametri di animazione.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-1330">This service initiates an animation sequence using a previously created animation instance and a new set of animation parameters.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-1331">Questa funzione crea una copia locale dei parametri, ovvero non è necessario che la struttura del parametro sia definita in modo statico.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-1331">This function makes a local copy of the parameters, meaning the parameter structure does not need to be statically defined.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-1332">La struttura di controllo GX_ANIMATION può essere definita in modo statico dall'applicazione oppure può essere ottenuta tramite l'API gx_system_animation_get ().</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-1332">The GX_ANIMATION control structure can be statically defined by the application, or it can be obtained using the gx_system_animation_get() API.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-1333">La struttura GX_ANIMATION_INFO definisce i parametri dell'animazione da eseguire.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-1333">The GX_ANIMATION_INFO structure defines the parameters of the animation to be executed.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-1334">Per una descrizione completa di questa struttura e del significato di ogni campo, vedere la sezione componente animazione GUIX nel capitolo 3 di questo manuale.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-1334">For a complete description of this structure and the meaning of each field, refer to the GUIX Animation Component section in Chapter 3 of this manual.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-1335">Parametri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-1335">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-1336">**animazione** di Puntatore al blocco di controllo dell'animazione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-1336">**animation** Pointer to animation control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-1337">**parametri** Puntatore alla struttura del parametro</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-1337">**params** Pointer to parameter structure</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-1338">Valori restituiti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-1338">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-1339">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) riuscita</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-1339">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-1340">Parametro **GX_INVALID_VALUE** (0X22) non valido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-1340">**GX_INVALID_VALUE** (0x22) Invalid parameter</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-1341">Puntatore a **GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) non valido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-1341">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-1342">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) destinazione di animazione non valida</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-1342">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Invalid animation target</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-1343">Stato di animazione **GX_INVALID_STATUS** (0X26) non valido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-1343">**GX_INVALID_STATUS** (0x26) Invalid animation status</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-1344">**GX_INVALID_CANVAS** (0x20) area di disegno animazione non valida</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-1344">**GX_INVALID_CANVAS** (0x20) Invalid animation canvas</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-1345">Consentito da</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-1345">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-1346">Inizializzazione e thread</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-1346">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-1347">Esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-1347">Example</span></span>

```C
GX_ANIMATION_INFO params;
GX_ANIMATION *animation;

/* obtain an animation control block pointer */
gx_system_animation_get(&animation);
if (animation)
{
    /* define a slide down and to the right */
    params.gx_animation_start_position.gx_point_x = 0;
    params.gx_animation_start_position.gx_point_y = 0;
    params.gx_animation_end_position.gx_point_x = 100;
    params.gx_animation_end_position.gx_point_y = 200;
    params.gx_animation_style= GX_ANIMATION_TRANSLATE;
    params.gx_animation_target = &my_window;
    params.gx_animation_parent = root_window;
    params.gx_animation_start_alpha = 255;
    params.gx_animation_end_alpha = 255;

    params.gx_animation_delay_before = 0;
    params.gx_animation_steps = 10;
    params.gx_animation_tick_rate = 2;

    status = gx_animation_start(&animation, &params);
}

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the animation is initiated. */
```

- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-1353">gx_animation_landing_speed_set,</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-1353">gx_animation_landing_speed_set,</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-1354">gx__animation_stop</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-1354">gx__animation_stop</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-1355">gx_system_animation_get,</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-1355">gx_system_animation_get,</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-1356">gx__system_animation_free</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-1356">gx__system_animation_free</span></span>

## <a name="gx_animation_stop"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-1357">gx_animation_stop</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-1357">gx_animation_stop</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-1358">Arrestare un'animazione attiva basata sul timer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-1358">Stop an active timer-driven animation</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-1359">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-1359">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_animation_stop(GX_ANIMATION *animation);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-1360">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-1360">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-1361">Arrestare un'animazione avviata in precedenza.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-1361">Stop a previously started animation.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-1362">Se il puntatore del blocco di controllo Animation è stato allocato con gx_system_animation_get, l'applicazione può riutilizzare il blocco di controllo o restituirlo al pool di sistema utilizzando gx_system_animation_free ().</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-1362">If the animation control block pointer was allocated using gx_system_animation_get, the application can re-use the control block or return it to the system pool using gx_system_animation_free().</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-1363">Parametri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-1363">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-1364">**animazione** di Puntatore al blocco di controllo dell'animazione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-1364">**animation** Pointer to animation control block</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-1365">Valori restituiti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-1365">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-1366">Puntatore a **GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) riuscito GX_PTR_ERROR (0x07) non valido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-1366">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful GX_PTR_ERROR (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-1367">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) chiamante non valido di questa funzione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-1367">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-1368">Stato del controller **GX_INVALID_STATUS** (0X26) non valido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-1368">**GX_INVALID_STATUS** (0x26) Invalid controller status</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-1369">Consentito da</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-1369">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-1370">Inizializzazione e thread</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-1370">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-1371">Esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-1371">Example</span></span>

```C
GX_ANIMATION animation;

status = gx_animation_stop(&animation);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the animation is stopped */

```

- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-1376">gx__animation_drag_enable</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-1376">gx__animation_drag_enable</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-1379">gx_system_animation_free</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-1379">gx_system_animation_free</span></span>

## <a name="gx_binres_language_count_get"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-1380">gx_binres_language_count_get</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-1380">gx_binres_language_count_get</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-1381">Restituisce il numero di lingue presenti nei dati delle risorse binarie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-1381">Return the number of languages present in binary resource data</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-1382">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-1382">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_binres_language_count_get(
    GX_UBYTE *root_address, 
    GX_VALUE *returned_count);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-1383">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-1383">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-1384">Questo servizio analizza un'intestazione di dati della risorsa binaria per restituire il numero di lingue contenute nei dati binari.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-1384">This service parses a binary resource data header to return the number of languages contained within the binary data.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-1385">Questa operazione è utile per le applicazioni che devono visualizzare un elenco di selezione all'utente che consente all'utente di effettuare la selezione da una scelta di lingue.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-1385">This is useful for applications that must display a selection list to the user allowing the user to select from a choice of languages.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-1386">Parametri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-1386">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-1387">**root_address** Indirizzo dei dati della risorsa binaria in memoria</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-1387">**root_address** Address of binary resource data in memory</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-1388">**return_count** Percorso in cui archiviare il conteggio delle lingue restituite</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-1388">**return_count** Location to store returned language count</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-1389">Valori restituiti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-1389">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-1390">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) riuscita</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-1390">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-1391">Risorsa binaria **GX_INVALID_FORMAT** (0X24) non valida</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-1391">**GX_INVALID_FORMAT** (0x24) Invalid binary resource</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-1392">Puntatore a **GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) non valido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-1392">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-1393">Consentito da</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-1393">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-1394">Inizializzazione e thread</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-1394">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-1395">Esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-1395">Example</span></span>

```C
GX_VALUE language_count = 0;

/* Specify address that binary resource data is located. */
GX_UBYTE    *root_address = 0x60000000;

status = gx_binres_language_count_get(root_address,
    &language_count);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS, the language table was successfully loaded. */

```

### <a name="see-also"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-1396">Vedere anche</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-1396">See Also</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-1397">gx_binres_language_info_load</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-1397">gx_binres_language_info_load</span></span>

## <a name="gx_binres_language_info_load"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-1398">gx_binres_language_info_load</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-1398">gx_binres_language_info_load</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-1399">Caricare le informazioni sulla tabella della lingua</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-1399">Load language table information</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-1400">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-1400">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_binres_language_info_load(
    GX_UBYTE *root_address, 
    GX_LANGUAGE_HEDAER *put_info);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-1401">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-1401">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-1402">Questo servizio analizza un BLOB di dati di risorse binarie per popolare una matrice di strutture di GX_LANGUAGE_HEADER, informando l'applicazione dei nomi di lingua e della dimensione della tabella di stringhe di ogni lingua contenuta nei dati binari.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-1402">This service parses a binary resource data blob to populate an array of GX_LANGUAGE_HEADER structures, informing the application of the language names and string table size of each language contained within the binary data.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-1403">L'applicazione deve prima chiamare gx_binres_language_count_get () per determinare il numero di lingue nei dati binari e verificare che il puntatore put_info passato a questa funzione punti a una matrice di language_count strutture GX_LANGUAGE_HEADER.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-1403">The application should first call gx_binres_language_count_get() to determine the number of languages within the binary data, and insure that the put_info pointer passed to this function points to an array of language_count GX_LANGUAGE_HEADER structures.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-1404">Questo servizio viene usato dall'applicazione per determinare in fase di esecuzione il contenuto di un blocco di dati delle risorse binarie.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-1404">This service is used by application to determine at runtime the content of a binary resource data chunk.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-1405">La struttura GX_LANGUAGE_HEADER è definita come segue:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-1405">The GX_LANGUAGE_HEADER structure is defined as:</span></span>

```c
typedef struct GX_LANGUAGE_HEADER_STRUCT{
    USHORT gx_language_header_magic_number;
    USHORT gx_language_header_index;
    UCHAR gx_language_header_name[GX_LANGUAGE_HEADER_NAME_SIZE];
    ULONG  gx_language_header_data_size;
} GX_LANGUAGE_HEADER;
```

- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-1406">Il campo *Magic_number* viene usato per la convalida interna del formato dati della risorsa binaria.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-1406">The *magic_number* field is used for internal validation of the binary resource data format.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-1407">Il campo *header_index* indica l'ordine in cui le lingue sono definite nei dati binari.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-1407">The *header_index* field indicates the order in which the languages are defined in the binary data.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-1408">Il campo *header_name* contiene il nome della lingua.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-1408">The *header_name* field contains the language name.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-1409">Il campo *header_data_size* contiene le dimensioni dei dati della tabella delle stringhe della lingua.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-1409">The *header_data_size* field contains the data size of the language string table.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-1410">Parametri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-1410">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-1411">**root_address** Indirizzo dei dati della risorsa binaria in memoria</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-1411">**root_address** Address of binary resource data in memory</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-1412">**put_info** Puntatore alla matrice di strutture di GX_LANGUAGE_HEADER</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-1412">**put_info** Pointer to array of GX_LANGUAGE_HEADER structures</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-1413">Valori restituiti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-1413">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-1414">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) riuscita</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-1414">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-1415">Risorsa binaria **GX_INVALID_FORMAT** (0X24) non valida</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-1415">**GX_INVALID_FORMAT** (0x24) Invalid binary resource</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-1416">Puntatore a **GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) non valido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-1416">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-1417">Consentito da</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-1417">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-1418">Inizializzazione e thread</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-1418">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-1419">Esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-1419">Example</span></span>

```C
GX_LANGUAGE_HEADER language_info[4];

/* Specify address that binary resource data is located. */
GX_UBYTE    *root_address = 0x60000000;

status = gx_binres_language_info_load(root_address,
    language_info);
/* If status is GX_SUCCESS, the language table was successfully loaded. */

```

### <a name="see-also"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-1420">Vedere anche</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-1420">See Also</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-1421">gx_binres_language_count_get</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-1421">gx_binres_language_count_get</span></span>

## <a name="gx_binres_language_table_load"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-1422">gx_binres_language_table_load</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-1422">gx_binres_language_table_load</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-1423">Carica la risorsa della tabella della lingua (deprecata)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-1423">Load language table resource (deprecated)</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-1424">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-1424">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_binres_language_table_load(
    GX_UBYTE *root_address, 
    GX_UBYTE **returned_language_table);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-1425">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-1425">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-1426">Questa API deprecata consente alle applicazioni di caricare i dati della tabella di stringhe dai file di dati delle risorse binari precedenti (precedenti alla versione 5,6).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-1426">This deprecated API allows applications to load string table data from older (prior to release 5.6) binary resource data files.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-1427">Le nuove applicazioni devono usare gx_binres_language_table_load_ext ().</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-1427">New applications should use gx_binres_language_table_load_ext().</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-1428">Questo servizio compila una struttura di tabella del linguaggio contenente i puntatori alle risorse della tabella, le strutture di dati generate puntano ai dati delle risorse "sul posto", non copia i dati della risorsa.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-1428">This service builds up a language table structure containing pointers to table resources, the generated data structures point to the resource data “in place”, it does not copy the resource data.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-1429">I dati della risorsa devono essere posizionati in un percorso di memoria di accesso generale e l'indirizzo di base di questa posizione di memoria viene passato a questa API.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-1429">The resource data must be placed in a general access memory location, and the base address of this memory location is passed to this API.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-1430">Questo servizio richiede un blocco di memoria allocato in fase di esecuzione sufficiente a contenere la struttura della tabella della lingua e pertanto l'API gx_system_memory_allocator_set deve essere richiamata una volta prima che questo servizio venga richiesto.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-1430">This service requires a runtime allocated memory block sufficient in size to hold the language table structure, and therefore the gx_system_memory_allocator_set API must be invoked once before this service is requested.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-1431">La tabella di linguaggio restituita definisce una o più tabelle di stringhe, ciascuna delle quali contiene i puntatori alle risorse di stringa nella memoria dati della risorsa.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-1431">The returned language table defines one or more string table(s), each string table containing pointers to string resources in resource data memory.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-1432">Parametri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-1432">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-1433">**root_address** Indirizzo dei dati della risorsa binaria in memoria</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-1433">**root_address** Address of binary resource data in memory</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-1434">**_language_table restituito** Puntatore alla tabella del linguaggio caricato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-1434">**returned _language_table** Pointer to loaded language table</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-1435">Valori restituiti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-1435">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-1436">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) riuscita</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-1436">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-1437">Risorsa binaria **GX_INVALID_FORMAT** (0X24) non valida</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-1437">**GX_INVALID_FORMAT** (0x24) Invalid binary resource</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-1438">Puntatore a **GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) non valido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-1438">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-1439">Impossibile definire l'allocatore di memoria **GX_SYSTEM_MEMPRY_ERROR** (0x30) o la funzione Free</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-1439">**GX_SYSTEM_MEMPRY_ERROR** (0x30) Memory allocator or free function is not defined</span></span>

## <a name="gx_binres_language_table_load_ext"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-1445">gx_binres_language_table_load_ext</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-1445">gx_binres_language_table_load_ext</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-1446">Carica la risorsa della tabella della lingua</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-1446">Load language table resource</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-1447">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-1447">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_binres_language_table_load_ext(
    GX_UBYTE *root_address, 
    GX_STRING **returned_language_table);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-1448">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-1448">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-1449">Questo servizio compila una struttura di tabella del linguaggio contenente i puntatori alle risorse della tabella, le strutture di dati generate puntano ai dati delle risorse "sul posto", non copia i dati della risorsa.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-1449">This service builds up a language table structure containing pointers to table resources, the generated data structures point to the resource data “in place”, it does not copy the resource data.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-1450">I dati della risorsa devono essere posizionati in un percorso di memoria di accesso generale e l'indirizzo di base di questa posizione di memoria viene passato a questa API.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-1450">The resource data must be placed in a general access memory location, and the base address of this memory location is passed to this API.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-1451">Questo servizio richiede un blocco di memoria allocato in fase di esecuzione sufficiente a contenere la struttura della tabella della lingua e pertanto l'API gx_system_memory_allocator_set deve essere richiamata una volta prima che questo servizio venga richiesto.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-1451">This service requires a runtime allocated memory block sufficient in size to hold the language table structure, and therefore the gx_system_memory_allocator_set API must be invoked once before this service is requested.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-1452">La tabella di linguaggio restituita definisce una o più tabelle di stringhe, ciascuna delle quali contiene i puntatori alle risorse di stringa nella memoria dati della risorsa.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-1452">The returned language table defines one or more string table(s), each string table containing pointers to string resources in resource data memory.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-1453">Parametri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-1453">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-1454">**root_address** Indirizzo dei dati della risorsa binaria in memoria</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-1454">**root_address** Address of binary resource data in memory</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-1455">**_language_table restituito** Puntatore alla tabella del linguaggio caricato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-1455">**returned _language_table** Pointer to loaded language table</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-1456">Valori restituiti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-1456">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-1457">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) riuscita</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-1457">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-1458">Risorsa binaria **GX_INVALID_FORMAT** (0X24) non valida</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-1458">**GX_INVALID_FORMAT** (0x24) Invalid binary resource</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-1459">Puntatore a **GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) non valido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-1459">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-1460">Impossibile definire l'allocatore di memoria **GX_SYSTEM_MEMPRY_ERROR** (0x30) o la funzione Free</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-1460">**GX_SYSTEM_MEMPRY_ERROR** (0x30) Memory allocator or free function is not defined</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-1461">Consentito da</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-1461">Allowed From</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-1463">Esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-1463">Example</span></span>

```C
GX_STRING **language_table = GX_NULL;

/* Specify address that binary resource data is located. */

status = gx_binres_language_table_load_ext(root_address,

```

## <a name="gx_binres_theme_load"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-1466">gx_binres_theme_load</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-1466">gx_binres_theme_load</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-1467">Carica risorsa tema</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-1467">Load theme resource</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-1468">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-1468">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_binres_theme_load(
    GX_UBYTE *root_address, 
    INT theme_id, GX_THEME **returned_theme);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-1469">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-1469">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-1470">Questo servizio compila una struttura GX_THEME contenente i puntatori alle tabelle delle risorse per il tema richiesto.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-1470">This service builds up a GX_THEME structure containing pointers to the resource tables for the requested theme.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-1471">Le strutture di dati generate puntano ai dati delle risorse "sul posto", non copia i dati della risorsa.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-1471">The generated data structures point to the resource data “in place”, it does not copy the resource data.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-1472">Quindi, i dati della risorsa devono essere posizionati in un percorso di memoria di accesso generale e l'indirizzo di base di questa posizione di memoria viene passato a questa API.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-1472">So the resource data must be placed in a general access memory location, and the base address of this memory location is passed to this API.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-1473">Questo servizio richiede un blocco di memoria allocato in fase di esecuzione sufficiente per contenere la struttura della tabella del tema e pertanto l'API gx_system_memory_allocator_set deve essere richiamata una volta prima che questo servizio venga richiesto.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-1473">This service requires a runtime allocated memory block sufficient in size to hold the theme table structure, and therefore the gx_system_memory_allocator_set API must be invoked once before this service is requested.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-1474">Parametri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-1474">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-1475">**root_address** Indirizzo dei dati della risorsa binaria in memoria</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-1475">**root_address** Address of binary resource data in memory</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-1476">**theme_id** Identificatore del tema</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-1476">**theme_id** The identifier of the theme</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-1477">**returned_theme** Puntatore al tema caricato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-1477">**returned_theme** Pointer to loaded theme</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-1478">Valori restituiti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-1478">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-1479">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) riuscita</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-1479">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-1480">Risorsa binaria **GX_INVALID_FORMAT** (0X24) non valida</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-1480">**GX_INVALID_FORMAT** (0x24) Invalid binary resource</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-1481">Puntatore a **GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) non valido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-1481">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-1482">ID tema non valido **GX_INVALID_VALUE** (0x22)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-1482">**GX_INVALID_VALUE** (0x22) Invalid theme ID</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-1483">Impossibile definire l'allocatore di memoria **GX_SYSTEM_MEMORY_ERROR** (0x30) o la funzione Free</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-1483">**GX_SYSTEM_MEMORY_ERROR** (0x30) Memory allocator or free function is not defined</span></span>

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-1507">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-1507">Description</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-1509">Parametri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-1509">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-1510">**pennello** Puntatore al blocco di controllo pennello</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-1510">**brush** Pointer to brush control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-1511">**line_color** Colore della linea del pennello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-1511">**line_color** Color of brush line.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-1512">**L'Appendice A** contiene colori predefiniti.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-1512">**Appendix A** contains pre-defined colors.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-1513">Si noti che l'applicazione può anche aggiungere colori personalizzati.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-1513">Note that the application may add custom colors as well.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-1514">**fill_color** Colore del riempimento del pennello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-1514">**fill_color** Color of brush fill.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-1515">**L'Appendice A** contiene colori predefiniti.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-1515">**Appendix A** contains pre-defined colors.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-1516">Si noti che l'applicazione può anche aggiungere colori personalizzati.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-1516">Note that the application may add custom colors as well.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-1517">**stile** Stile pennello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-1517">**style** Brush style.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-1518">L' **Appendice D** descrive gli stili dei pennelli supportati.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-1518">**Appendix D** describes the supported brush styles.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-1519">Gli stili dei pennelli possono essere combinati in un'unica variabile utilizzando l'operazione OR bit per bit.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-1519">Brush styles can be combined into one variable using bitwise OR operation.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-1520">Valori restituiti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-1520">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-1521">Definizione del pennello **GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) riuscita</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-1521">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful brush definition</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-1522">Puntatore a pennello **GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) non valido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-1522">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid brush pointer</span></span>

```C
VOID gx_button_background_draw(GX_BUTTON *button);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-1531">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-1531">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-1532">Questo servizio disegna lo sfondo del pulsante.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-1532">This service draws the button background.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-1533">Questa funzione viene in genere chiamata internamente dalla funzione gx_button_draw, ma viene esposta all'applicazione per facilitare la scrittura di funzioni di disegno personalizzate.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-1533">This function is normally called internally by the gx_button_draw function, but is exposed to the application to assist in writing custom drawing functions.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-1534">Parametri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-1534">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-1535">**pulsante** Puntatore al blocco di controllo Button</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-1535">**button** Pointer to button control block</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-1536">Valori restituiti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-1536">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-1537">**Nessuno**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-1537">**None**</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-1538">Consentito da</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-1538">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-1539">Thread</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-1539">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-1540">Esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-1540">Example</span></span>

```C
VOID custom_button_draw(GX_BUTTON *button)
{
    /* Draw button background. */
    gx_button_background_draw(button);

    /* Add custom drawing here. */

    /* Draw child widgets. */
    gx_widget_children_draw((GX_WIDGET *)button);
}
```

## <a name="gx_button_create"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-1555">gx_button_create</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-1555">gx_button_create</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-1556">Pulsante Crea</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-1556">Create button</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-1557">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-1557">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_button_create(
    GX_BUTTON *button, 
    GX_CONST GX_CHAR *name,
    GX_WIDGET *parent, 
    ULONG style, 
    USHORT button_id, 
    GX_CONST GX_RECTANGLE *size);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-1558">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-1558">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-1559">Questo servizio crea un pulsante come specificato e associa il pulsante al widget padre fornito.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-1559">This service creates a button as specified and associates the button with the supplied parent widget.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-1560">Parametri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-1560">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-1561">**pulsante** Puntatore al blocco di controllo Button</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-1561">**button** Pointer to button control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-1562">**nome** Nome logico del pulsante</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-1562">**name** Logical name of button</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-1563">**elemento padre** Puntatore al widget padre del pulsante</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-1563">**parent** Pointer to parent widget of the button</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-1564">**stile** Stile del pulsante.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-1564">**style** Button style.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-1565">L' **Appendice D** contiene stili generali predefiniti per tutti i widget e per gli stili specifici dei widget.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-1565">**Appendix D** contains pre-defined general styles for all widgets as well as widget specific styles.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-1566">**button_id** ID del pulsante definito dall'applicazione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-1566">**button_id** Application-defined ID of the button</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-1567">**dimensioni** Dimensioni del pulsante</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-1567">**size** Size of the button</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-1568">Valori restituiti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-1568">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-1569">Creazione di un pulsante **GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) riuscita</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-1569">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful button creation</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-1570">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) chiamante non valido di questa funzione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-1570">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-1571">Puntatore a **GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) non valido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-1571">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-1572">Widget **GX_ALREADY_CREATED** (0x13) già creato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-1572">**GX_ALREADY_CREATED** (0x13) Widget already created</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-1573">**GX_INVALID_SIZE** (0x19) dimensioni del blocco di controllo widget non valide</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-1573">**GX_INVALID_SIZE** (0x19) Invalid widget control block size</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-1575">Inizializzazione e thread</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-1575">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-1576">Esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-1576">Example</span></span>

```C
GX_BUTTON my_top_button;

/* Create a stop button. */
status = gx_button_create(&my_stop_button, "my stop button",
                            &my_parent_window,
                            GX_STYLE_BUTTON_TOGGLE,
                            MY_STOP_BUTTON_ID, &size);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the stop button was successfully created. */
```

## <a name="gx_button_deselect"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-1591">gx_button_deselect</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-1591">gx_button_deselect</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-1592">Pulsante Deseleziona</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-1592">Deselect button</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-1593">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-1593">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_button_deselect(
    GX_BUTTON *button, 
    GX_BOOL gen_event);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-1594">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-1594">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-1595">Questo servizio deseleziona il pulsante specificato e genera un evento Signal a seconda degli stili dei pulsanti.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-1595">This service deselects the specified button and generate a signal event depending on button styles.</span></span>


| <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-1596">Stile pulsante</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-1596">Button Style</span></span>              | <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-1597">Segnale</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-1597">Signal</span></span>                     |
|---------------------------|----------------------------|
| <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-1598">nessuno</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-1598">None</span></span>                      | <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-1599">GX_EVENT_CLICKED</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-1599">GX_EVENT_CLICKED</span></span>         |
| <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-1600">GX_STYLE_BUTTON_RADIO</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-1600">GX_STYLE_BUTTON_RADIO</span></span>  | <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-1601">GX_EVENT_RADIO_DESELECT</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-1601">GX_EVENT_RADIO_DESELECT</span></span> |
| <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-1602">GX_STYLE_BUTTON_TOGGLE</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-1602">GX_STYLE_BUTTON_TOGGLE</span></span> | <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-1603">GX_EVENT_TOGGLE_OFF</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-1603">GX_EVENT_TOGGLE_OFF</span></span>     |



### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-1604">Parametri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-1604">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-1605">**pulsante** Puntatore al blocco di controllo Button</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-1605">**button** Pointer to button control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-1606">**gen_event** Se GX_TRUE, il pulsante genererà un evento GX_EVENT_CLICKED, GX_EVENT_DESELECT o GX_EVENT_TOGGLE_OFFSET a seconda dello stile del pulsante.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-1606">**gen_event** If GX_TRUE, the button will generate a GX_EVENT_CLICKED, GX_EVENT_DESELECT, or GX_EVENT_TOGGLE_OFFSET event depending on the button style.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-1607">Se GX_FALSE, il pulsante non genererà un evento di livello superiore anche se normalmente lo farebbe.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-1607">If GX_FALSE, the button will not generate any higher level event even if it would normally do so.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-1608">Valori restituiti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-1608">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-1609">Deselezione del pulsante **GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) riuscita</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-1609">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful button deselect</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-1610">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) chiamante non valido di questa funzione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-1610">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-1611">Puntatore a **GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) non valido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-1611">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-1612">Widget **GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) non valido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-1612">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-1613">Consentito da</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-1613">Allowed From</span></span>


### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-1633">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-1633">Description</span></span>
