## <a name="gx_button_event_process"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-1657">gx_button_event_process</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-1657">gx_button_event_process</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-1658">Evento pulsante elabora</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-1658">Process button event</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-1659">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-1659">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_button_event_process(
    GX_BUTTON *button, 
    GX_EVENT *event);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-1660">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-1660">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-1661">Questo servizio elabora un evento per il pulsante specificato.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-1661">This service processes an event for the specified button.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-1662">Parametri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-1662">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-1663">**pulsante** Puntatore al blocco di controllo Button</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-1663">**button** Pointer to button control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-1664">**event_ptr** Puntatore a evento da elaborare</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-1664">**event_ptr** Pointer to event to process</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-1665">Valori restituiti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-1665">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-1666">Processo di evento pulsante **GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) riuscito</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-1666">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful button event process</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-1667">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) chiamante non valido di questa funzione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-1667">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-1668">Puntatore a **GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) non valido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-1668">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-1669">Consentito da</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-1669">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-1670">Thread</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-1670">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-1671">Esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-1671">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Call generic button event processing as part of custom event processing function. */

UINT custom_button_event_process(GX_BUTTON *button,
                                 GX_EVENT *event)
{
    UINT status = GX_SUCCESS;

    switch(event->gx_event_type)
    {
    case xyz:
        /* Insert custom event handling here */
        break;
    default:
        /* Pass all other events to the default button
            event processing */
        status = gx_button_event_process(button, event);
        break;
    }
    return status;
}
```

## <a name="gx_canvas_alpha_set"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-1723">gx_canvas_alpha_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-1723">gx_canvas_alpha_set</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-1724">Imposta il valore alfa-Blend per Canvas</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-1724">Set alpha-blend value for canvas</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-1725">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-1725">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_canvas_alpha_set(
    GX_CANVAS *canvas, 
    GX_UBYTE alpha);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-1726">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-1726">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-1727">Questo servizio imposta il valore alfa-Blend per l'area di disegno specificata.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-1727">This service sets the alpha-blend value for the specified canvas.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-1728">I valori alfa dell'area di disegno possono variare da 0 (trasparente) a 255 (completamente opaco).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-1728">Canvas alpha values can range from 0 (transparent) to 255 (fully opaque).</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-1729">Per la fusione di Canvas di sovrapposizione è necessario il supporto per i livelli grafici hardware o il supporto software tramite la creazione di un'area di disegno composita.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-1729">Blending overlay canvases requires either hardware graphics layer support, or software support via the creation of a composite canvas.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-1730">Il supporto hardware per la fusione di Canvas è abilitato richiamando l'API gx_canvas_hardware_layer_bind () prima di impostare il valore alfa dell'area di disegno.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-1730">Hardware support for canvas blending is enabled by invoking the gx_canvas_hardware_layer_bind() API prior to setting the canvas alpha value.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-1731">Quando un'area di disegno è associata a un livello grafico hardware, la chiamata dell'API gx_canvas_alpha_set () richiama direttamente i servizi di fusione dei livelli di grafica hardware.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-1731">When a canvas is bound to a hardware graphics layer, calling the gx_canvas_alpha_set() API directly invokes the hardware graphics layer blending services.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-1732">Per usare il supporto software per la fusione dell'area di disegno, l'applicazione deve creare un'area di disegno con GX_CANVAS_COMPOSITE stile, in cui tutte le altre Canvas gestite sono composte prima della visualizzazione finale.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-1732">To utilize software support for canvas blending, the application must create a canvas with GX_CANVAS_COMPOSITE style, into which all other managed canvases are composited prior to final display.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-1733">Il supporto software per la fusione dell'area di disegno viene fornito solo quando si esegue con un driver di visualizzazione con una profondità di colore di 16 BPP o superiore.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-1733">Software support for canvas blending is only provided when running with a display driver of 16-bpp or higher color depth.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-1734">Parametri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-1734">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-1735">**area di disegno** Puntatore al blocco di controllo Canvas</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-1735">**canvas** Pointer to canvas control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-1736">**alfa** Valore Alpha-Blend, compreso tra 0 (trasparente) e 255 (opaco).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-1736">**alpha** Alpha-blend value, range from 0 (transparent) to 255 (opaque).</span></span>

### <a name="return--values"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-1737">Valori restituiti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-1737">Return  Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-1738">Set di valori alfa-Blend riusciti **GX_SUCCESS** (0x00)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-1738">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful alpha-blend value set</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-1739">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) chiamante non valido di questa funzione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-1739">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-1740">Puntatore a **GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) non valido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-1740">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-1741">Area di disegno **GX_INVALID_ERROR** (0x20) non valida</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-1741">**GX_INVALID_ERROR** (0x20) Invalid canvas</span></span>

```C
/* Set the alpha-blend value of “my_canvas”. */
status = gx_canvas_alpha_set(&my_canvas, GX_ALPHA_VALUE_OPAQUE);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the alpha-blend value was successfully set. */
```

## <a name="gx_canvas_arc_draw"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-1754">gx_canvas_arc_draw</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-1754">gx_canvas_arc_draw</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-1755">Arco di estrazione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-1755">Draw arc</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-1756">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-1756">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_canvas_arc_draw(
    INT xcenter, 
    INT ycenter, 
    UINT r,
    INT start_angle, 
    INT end_angle);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-1757">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-1757">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-1758">Questo servizio disegna un arco di cerchio sull'area di disegno utilizzando il pennello corrente.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-1758">This service draws a circle arc on the canvas using the current brush.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-1759">L'arco del cerchio viene ritagliato nell'area di disegno non valida.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-1759">The circle arc is clipped to the canvas invalid region.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-1760">Questo servizio richiede la definizione di GX_ARC_DRAWING_SUPPORT.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-1760">This service requires GX_ARC_DRAWING_SUPPORT to be defined.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-1761">Parametri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-1761">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-1762">**XCENTER** x-posizione del centro dell'arco cerchio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-1762">**xcenter** x-position of center of the circle arc</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-1763">**ycenter** y-posizione del centro dell'arco del cerchio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-1763">**ycenter** y-position of center of the circle arc</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-1764">raggio **r** dell'arco cerchio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-1764">**r** Radius of the circle arc</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-1765">**start_angle** Angolo iniziale dell'arco cerchio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-1765">**start_angle** Starting angle of the circle arc</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-1766">**END_ANGLE** Angolo finale dell'arco cerchio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-1766">**end_angle** Ending angle of the circle arc</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-1767">Valori restituiti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-1767">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-1768">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) riuscite di Arc</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-1768">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful arc draw</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-1769">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) chiamante non valido di questa funzione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-1769">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-1770">Valore di **GX_INVALID_VALUE** (0X22) non valido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-1770">**GX_INVALID_VALUE** (0x22) Invalid value</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-1771">**GX_INVALID_CONTEXT** (0x06) nessun contesto di disegno aperto</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-1771">**GX_INVALID_CONTEXT** (0x06) No open drawing context</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-1772">Consentito da</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-1772">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-1773">Thread</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-1773">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-1774">Esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-1774">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Draw a circle arc from 0 degree to 90 degree in clockwise. */
status = gx_canvas_arc_draw(100, 100, 50, 0, 90);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the arc has been drawn on “my_canvas”. */
```

## <a name="gx_canvas_block_move"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-1787">gx_canvas_block_move</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-1787">gx_canvas_block_move</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-1788">Spostare un blocco di pixel Canvas</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-1788">Move block of canvas pixels</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-1789">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-1789">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_canvas_block_move(GX_RECTANGLE *block,
    GX_VALUE x_shift, GX_VALUE y_shift, GX_RECTANGLE *dirty);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-1790">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-1790">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-1791">Questo servizio sposta un blocco di dati pixel di Canvas nella direzione specificata.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-1791">This service moves a block of canvas pixel data in the direction specified.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-1792">Questo servizio viene utilizzato internamente da GUIX per eseguire lo scorrimento rapido, ma può essere utilizzato anche dal software dell'applicazione.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-1792">This service is used internally by GUIX to accomplish fast scrolling, but may also be used by the application software.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-1793">Parametri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-1793">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-1794">**blocca** Coordinate dell'area da spostare</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-1794">**block** Coordinates of area to move</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-1795">**x_shift** Numero di pixel da spostare sull'asse x</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-1795">**x_shift** Number of pixels to shift on the x-axis</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-1796">**y_shift** Numero di pixel da spostare sull'asse y</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-1796">**y_shift** Number of pixels to shift on the y-axis</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-1797">**Dirty** Se lo spostamento del blocco ha esito positivo, questa funzione restituisce la parte del rettangolo di origine che è ancora sporca per il chiamante in questo parametro.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-1797">**dirty** If the block move is successful, this function returns the portion of the source rectangle that is still dirty to the caller in this parameter.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-1798">Valori restituiti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-1798">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-1799">Spostamento del blocco **GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) riuscito</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-1799">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful block move</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-1800">Spostamento blocchi **GX_FAILURE** (0x10) non riuscito</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-1800">**GX_FAILURE** (0x10) Failed block move</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-1801">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) chiamante non valido di questa funzione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-1801">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-1802">Puntatore a **GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) non valido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-1802">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-1803">Consentito da</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-1803">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-1804">Thread</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-1804">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-1805">Esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-1805">Example</span></span>

```C
GX_RECTANGLE invalid;
GX_RECTANGLE move;

/* define 100 x 100 pixel rectangle */
gx_utility_rectangle_define(&move, 0, 0, 99, 99);

/* Move this rectangle 10 pixels to the right”. */
status = gx_canvas_block_move(&move, 10, 0, &invalid);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS, then ‘invalid’ marks the area that needs to be redrawn after the block move. */

```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-1821">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-1821">Description</span></span>

## <a name="gx_canvas_create"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-1849">gx_canvas_create</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-1849">gx_canvas_create</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-1850">Crea area di disegno</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-1850">Create canvas</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-1851">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-1851">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_canvas_create(
    GX_CANVAS *canvas, 
    GX_CONST GX_CHAR *name,
    GX_DISPLAY *display, 
    UINT type, 
    UINT width, 
    UINT height,
    GX_COLOR *memory_area, 
    ULONG memory_size);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-1852">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-1852">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-1853">Questo servizio crea l'area di disegno con le proprietà specificate e la memoria associata.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-1853">This service creates the canvas with the specified properties and associated memory.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-1854">Parametri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-1854">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-1855">**area di disegno** Puntatore al blocco di controllo Canvas</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-1855">**canvas** Pointer to canvas control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-1856">**nome** Nome logico per l'area di disegno</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-1856">**name** Logical name for the canvas</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-1857">**Visualizza** Puntatore alla visualizzazione creata in precedenza</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-1857">**display** Pointer to previously created display</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-1858">**tipo** di Il tipo dei tipi di Canvas canvasThe include:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-1858">**type** Type of canvasThe canvas types include:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-1859">**GX_CANVAS_SIMPLE:** Un'area di disegno della memoria che viene utilizzata per disegnare fuori schermo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-1859">**GX_CANVAS_SIMPLE:** A memory canvas which is used to off-screen drawing.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-1860">**GX_CANVAS_MANAGED:** Area di disegno scaricata automaticamente sullo schermo attivo, come parte del processo di compilazione composito o come parte dell'operazione di attivazione/disattivazione del buffer per le architetture con singolo Canvas.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-1860">**GX_CANVAS_MANAGED:** A canvas which automatically flushed to the active display, either as part of the composite building process or as part of the buffer toggle operation for single-canvas architectures.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-1861">**GX_CANVAS_VISIBLE:** Questo flag può essere usato per attivare e disattivare un'area di disegno, senza perdere il contenuto del disegno dell'area di disegno.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-1861">**GX_CANVAS_VISIBLE:** This flag can be used to turn on and off a canvas, without losing the canvas drawing contents.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-1862">**GX_CANVAS_MODIFIED:** Riservato per usi futuri.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-1862">**GX_CANVAS_MODIFIED:** Reserved for future use.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-1863">**GX_CANVAS_COMPOSITE:** Questo flag viene usato dall'applicazione quando si configura un sistema con più Canvas che comporterà più Canvas gestite nell'area di disegno composita e il composito è il driven del buffer del frame hardware.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-1863">**GX_CANVAS_COMPOSITE:** This flag is used by the application when configuring a multiple-canvas system which will composite multiple managed canvases into the composite canvas, and the composite is the driven to the hardware frame buffer.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-1864">**larghezza** Larghezza in pixel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-1864">**width** Width in pixels</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-1865">**altezza** Altezza in pixel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-1865">**height** Height in pixels</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-1866">**memory_area** Area di memoria per l'area di disegno.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-1866">**memory_area** Memory area for canvas.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-1867">Questo valore può</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-1867">This value can</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-1868">**GX_NULL** al momento della creazione dell'area di disegno</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-1868">**GX_NULL** at the time of canvas creation</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-1869">**e** successivamente inizializzato con gx_canvas_memory_define</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-1869">**and** later initialized using gx_canvas_memory_define</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-1870">**memory_size** Dimensioni dell'area di memoria in byte, oppure 0 se la memoria canvas verrà definita dopo la creazione dell'area di disegno.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-1870">**memory_size** Size of memory area in bytes, or 0 if the canvas memory will be defined after the canvas is created.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-1871">Valori restituiti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-1871">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-1872">Creazione Canvas riuscita **GX_SUCCESS** (0x00)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-1872">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful canvas create</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-1873">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) chiamante non valido di questa funzione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-1873">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-1874">Puntatore a **GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) non valido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-1874">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-1875">Widget **GX_ALREADY_CREATED** (0x13) già creato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-1875">**GX_ALREADY_CREATED** (0x13) Widget already created</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-1876">**GX_INVALID_CANVAS_SIZE** (0x1C) dimensioni del blocco di controllo Canvas non valide</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-1876">**GX_INVALID_CANVAS_SIZE** (0x1C) Invalid canvas control block size</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-1877">Tipo di area di disegno **GX_INVALID_TYPE** (0X1B) non valido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-1877">**GX_INVALID_TYPE** (0x1B) Invalid canvas type</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-1878">Consentito da</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-1878">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-1879">Inizializzazione e thread</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-1879">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-1880">Esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-1880">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Define global canvas memory area. */
GX_COLOR my_canvas_memory[272*480];

…

/* Create “my_canvas”. */
status = gx_canvas_create(&my_canvas, "my canvas", &my_display,
                    (GX_CANVAS_MANAGED | GX_CANVAS_VISIBLE),
                    272, 480,
                    my_canvas_memory,
                    sizeof(default_canvas_memory));

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the 272 x 480 canvas was successfully created. */
```

## <a name="gx_canvas_delete"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-1885">gx_canvas_delete</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-1885">gx_canvas_delete</span></span>

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-1888">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-1888">Description</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-1896">Puntatore a **GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) non valido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-1896">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>

## <a name="gx_canvas_drawing_complete"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-1908">gx_canvas_drawing_complete</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-1908">gx_canvas_drawing_complete</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-1909">Disegno Canvas completo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-1909">Complete canvas drawing</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-1910">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-1910">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_canvas_drawing_complete(
    GX_CANVAS *canvas, 
    GX_BOOL flush);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-1911">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-1911">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-1912">Questo servizio consente a GUIX di verificare che il disegno dell'applicazione nell'area di disegno specificata sia completato.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-1912">This service lets GUIX know the application’s drawing on the specified canvas is complete.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-1913">L'applicazione può utilizzare questo servizio per forzare il disegno immediato su un'area di disegno.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-1913">The application can use this service to force immediate drawing to a canvas.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-1914">In questo modo l'area di disegno viene scaricata nel buffer di frame visibile e/o viene attivata un'operazione di attivazione/disattivazione, a seconda dell'architettura della memoria di sistema.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-1914">This flushes the canvas to the visible frame buffer and/or triggers a bugger toggle operation, depending on system memory architecture.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-1915">Questo servizio deve essere chiamato solo dall'applicazione per chiudere una sequenza di disegno iniziata con gx_canvas_drawing_initiate ().</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-1915">This service should only be called by the application to close a drawing sequence begun with gx_canvas_drawing_initiate().</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-1916">Parametri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-1916">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-1917">**area di disegno** Puntatore al blocco di controllo Canvas</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-1917">**canvas** Pointer to canvas control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-1918">**Scarica** Se **_GX_TRUE_**, le modifiche all'area di disegno vengono scaricate sullo schermo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-1918">**flush** If **_GX_TRUE_**, canvas changes are flushed to the display</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-1919">Valori restituiti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-1919">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-1920">Completamento del disegno **GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) completato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-1920">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful drawing completion</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-1921">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) chiamante non valido di questa funzione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-1921">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-1922">Puntatore a **GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) non valido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-1922">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-1923">Consentito da</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-1923">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-1924">Inizializzazione e thread</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-1924">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-1925">Esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-1925">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Complete drawing on “my_canvas” and flush to display. */
status = gx_canvas_drawing_complete(&my_canvas, GX_TRUE);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the canvas drawing was successfully completed. */
```

## <a name="gx_canvas_drawing_initiate"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-1932">gx_canvas_drawing_initiate</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-1932">gx_canvas_drawing_initiate</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-1933">Avvia disegno Canvas</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-1933">Initiate canvas drawing</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-1934">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-1934">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_canvas_drawing_initiate(
    GX_CANVAS *canvas,
    GX_WIDGET *who, 
    GX_RECTANGLE *dirty_area);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-1935">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-1935">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-1936">Questo servizio avvia il disegno sull'area di disegno specificata.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-1936">This service initiates drawing on the specified canvas.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-1937">Questo servizio viene chiamato internamente come parte dell'operazione di disegno posticipata eseguita automaticamente da GUIX quando è necessario aggiornare un'area di disegno.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-1937">This service is called internally as part of the deferred drawing operation performed automatically by GUIX when a canvas needs to be update.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-1938">Tuttavia, l'applicazione è consentita ignorare l'algoritmo di disegno posticipato GUIX ed eseguire il disegno immediato e diretto su un'area di disegno chiamando prima gx_canvas_drawing_inititate, quindi chiamando le funzioni di disegno desiderate, quindi chiamando gx_canvas_drawing_complete ().</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-1938">However, the application is allowed bypass the GUIX deferred drawing algorithm and perform immediate and direct drawing on a canvas by first calling gx_canvas_drawing_inititate, then calling the desired drawing functions, then calling gx_canvas_drawing_complete().</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-1939">Parametri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-1939">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-1940">**area di disegno** Puntatore al blocco di controllo Canvas</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-1940">**canvas** Pointer to canvas control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-1941">**chi** Puntatore al blocco di controllo widget del chiamante.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-1941">**who** Pointer to widget control block of the caller.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-1942">Questo parametro viene usato per inizializzare il ritaglio e i parametri di visualizzazione del disegno per le successive operazioni di disegno.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-1942">This parameter is used to initialize the drawing clipping and view parameters for subsequent drawing operations.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-1943">**dirty_area** Area in cui eseguire il progetto.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-1943">**dirty_area** Area to draw within.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-1944">Questo parametro viene passato dal chiamante per indicare l'area in cui il chiamante desidera ritagliare tutte le operazioni di disegno.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-1944">This parameter is passed by the caller to indicate the area to which the caller wants all drawing operations clipped.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-1945">Si tratta in genere dell'area precedentemente contrassegnata come Dirty, ma il chiamante è libero di espandere o comprimere l'area di ritaglio.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-1945">This is usually the area previously marked as dirty, but the caller is free to expand or contract the clipping area.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-1946">Valori restituiti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-1946">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-1947">Inizializzazione del disegno **GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) riuscita</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-1947">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful drawing initiation</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-1948">**GX_DRAW_NESTING_EXCEEDED** (0x05) supera il numero massimo di annidamenti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-1948">**GX_DRAW_NESTING_EXCEEDED** (0x05) Exceed maximum nesting count</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-1949">**GX_NO_VIEW** (0X03) non sono presenti viewport per il chiamante</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-1949">**GX_NO_VIEW** (0x03) No viewports for the caller</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-1950">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) chiamante non valido di questa funzione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-1950">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-1951">Puntatore a **GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) non valido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-1951">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-1952">Area di disegno **GX_INVALID_CANVAS** (0x20) non valida</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-1952">**GX_INVALID_CANVAS** (0x20) Invalid canvas</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-1953">Consentito da</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-1953">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-1954">Inizializzazione e thread</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-1954">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-1955">Esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-1955">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Initiate drawing on “my_canvas”, my_widget.gx_widget_size
specify the area the application wants GUIX to redraw. */
status = gx_canvas_drawing_initiate(&my_canvas, &my_widget,
    &my_widget.gx_widget_size);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the canvas drawing was successfully initiated. */
```

## <a name="gx_canvas_ellipse_draw"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-1962">gx_canvas_ellipse_draw</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-1962">gx_canvas_ellipse_draw</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-1963">Ellisse</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-1963">Draw ellipse</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-1964">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-1964">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_canvas_ellipse_draw(
    INT xcenter, 
    INT ycenter, 
    INT a, 
    dINT b);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-1965">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-1965">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-1966">Questo servizio disegna un'ellisse sull'area di disegno utilizzando il pennello corrente.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-1966">This service draws an ellipse on the canvas using the current brush.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-1967">L'ellisse viene ritagliata nell'area Canvas non valida.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-1967">The ellipse is clipped to the canvas invalid region.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-1968">Questo servizio richiede la definizione di GX_ARC_DRAWING_SUPPORT.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-1968">This service requires GX_ARC_DRAWING_SUPPORT to be defined.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-1969">Parametri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-1969">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-1970">**XCENTER** x-Coord del centro dell'ellisse</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-1970">**xcenter** x-coord of center of the ellipse</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-1971">**ycenter** y-Coord del centro dell'ellisse</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-1971">**ycenter** y-coord of center of the ellipse</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-1972">**lunghezza dell'** asse semi-principale</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-1972">**a** Length of the semi-major axis</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-1973">**b** lunghezza dell'asse semi-secondario</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-1973">**b** Length of the semi-minor axis</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-1974">Valori restituiti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-1974">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-1975">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) con successo del cerchio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-1975">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful circle draw</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-1976">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) chiamante non valido di questa funzione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-1976">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-1977">Valore di **GX_INVALID_VALUE** (0X22) non valido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-1977">**GX_INVALID_VALUE** (0x22) Invalid value</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-1978">**GX_INVALID_CONTEXT** (0x06) nessun contesto di disegno aperto</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-1978">**GX_INVALID_CONTEXT** (0x06) No open drawing context</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-1979">Consentito da</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-1979">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-1980">Thread</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-1980">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-1981">Esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-1981">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Draw an ellipse of semi-major radius 100, semi-minor radius 50
    and centered at (200, 200). */
status = gx_canvas_ellipse_draw(200, 200, 100, 50);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the ellipse has been drawn on
    “my_canvas”. */
```

## <a name="gx_canvas_hardware_layer_bind"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-1994">gx_canvas_hardware_layer_bind</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-1994">gx_canvas_hardware_layer_bind</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-1995">Associa Canvas a livello grafico hardware</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-1995">Bind canvas to hardware graphics layer</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-1996">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-1996">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_canvas_hardware_layer_bind(
    GX_CANVAS *canvas, 
    INT layer);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-1997">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-1997">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-1998">Questo servizio associa un'area di disegno GUIX a un livello di grafica hardware.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-1998">This service binds a GUIX drawing canvas to a hardware graphics layer.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-1999">Questo servizio è necessario solo per i dispositivi hardware che supportano più livelli di grafica hardware.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-1999">This service is only required for hardware devices supporting multiple hardware graphics layers.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-2000">Il binding di un'area di disegno a un livello grafico hardware genera le API gx_canvas_show (), gx_canvas_hide (), gx_canvas_alpha_set () e gx_canvas_offset_set () implementate direttamente da servizi driver di visualizzazione hardware.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-2000">Binding a canvas to a hardware graphics layer results in the gx_canvas_show(), gx_canvas_hide(), gx_canvas_alpha_set(), and gx_canvas_offset_set() APIs being implemented directly by hardware display driver services.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-2001">Se il driver di visualizzazione hardware non supporta più livelli grafici, il servizio non restituirà GX_INVALID_DISPLAY.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-2001">If the hardware display driver does not support multiple graphics layers, this service will fail returning GX_INVALID_DISPLAY.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-2002">Parametri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-2002">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-2003">**Canvas Canvas** da implementare nell'hardware</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-2003">**canvas** canvas to be implement in hardware</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-2004">livello grafico hardware **livello**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-2004">**layer** hardware graphics layer</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-2005">Valori restituiti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-2005">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-2006">Associazione **GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) riuscita</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-2006">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful binding</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-2007">Il servizio del livello di visualizzazione **GX_INVALID_DISPLAY** (0x1d) non è definito</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-2007">**GX_INVALID_DISPLAY** (0x1D) Display layer service is not defined</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-2008">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x17) puntatori non validi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-2008">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x17) Invalid pointers</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-2009">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) chiamante non valido di questa funzione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-2009">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-2010">Area di disegno **GX_INVALID_CANVAS** (0x20) non valida</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-2010">**GX_INVALID_CANVAS** (0x20) Invalid canvas</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-2011">**GX_NOT_SUPPORTED** (0X28) non supportato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-2011">**GX_NOT_SUPPORTED** (0x28) Not supported</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-2012">Consentito da</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-2012">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-2013">Inizializzazione e thread</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-2013">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-2014">Esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-2014">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Binds the canvas to the hardware graphics layer 1. */
status = gx_canvas_hardware_layer_bind(&my_canvas, 1);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS, the drawing canvas is bound to the
    hardware graphics. */
```

## <a name="gx_canvas_hide"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-2018">gx_canvas_hide</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-2018">gx_canvas_hide</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-2022">Questo servizio nasconde un'area di disegno GUIX.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-2022">This service hides a GUIX canvas.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-2023">Se l'area di disegno è stata associata a un livello grafico hardware utilizzando gx_canvas_hardware_layer_bind (), questo servizio viene implementato utilizzando il supporto hardware.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-2023">If the canvas has been bound to a hardware graphics layer using gx_canvas_hardware_layer_bind(), this service is implemented using hardware support.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-2029">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x17) puntatori non validi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-2029">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x17) Invalid pointers</span></span>

## <a name="gx_canvas_line_draw"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-2043">gx_canvas_line_draw</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-2043">gx_canvas_line_draw</span></span>

```C
    GX_VALUE y_start,
    GX_VALUE x_end, 
    GX_VALUE y_end);
```

<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-2047">Questo servizio disegna una linea nell'area di disegno utilizzando il pennello corrente.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-2047">This service draws a line on the canvas using the current brush.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-2048">La riga viene ritagliata nell'area Canvas non valida.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-2048">The line is clipped to the canvas invalid region.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-2050">**x_start** Posizione x iniziale della riga</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-2050">**x_start** Starting x-position of the line</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-2051">**y_end** Posizione y iniziale della riga</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-2051">**y_end** Starting y-position of the line</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-2052">**x_start** Posizione x finale della riga</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-2052">**x_start** Ending x-position of the line</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-2053">**y_end** Posizione y finale della riga</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-2053">**y_end** Ending y-position of the line</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-2055">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) operazione di estrazione righe riuscita</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-2055">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful line draw</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-2056">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) chiamante non valido di questa funzione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-2056">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-2057">Puntatore a **GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) non valido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-2057">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-2058">**GX_INVALID_CONTEXT** (0x06) nessun contesto di disegno aperto</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-2058">**GX_INVALID_CONTEXT** (0x06) No open drawing context</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-2059">Larghezza del pennello **GX_INVALID_WIDTH** (0x1E) non valida</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-2059">**GX_INVALID_WIDTH** (0x1E) Invalid brush width</span></span>

## <a name="gx_canvas_memory_define"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-2075">gx_canvas_memory_define</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-2075">gx_canvas_memory_define</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-2076">Definisci memoria Canvas</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-2076">Define canvas memory</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-2077">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-2077">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_canvas_memory_define(
    GX_CANVAS *canvas, 
    GX_COLOR *memory,
    ULONG memsize);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-2078">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-2078">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-2079">Questo servizio può essere usato per assegnare l'indirizzo di memoria Canvas dopo la creazione dell'area di disegno.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-2079">This service can be used to assign the canvas memory address after the canvas has been created.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-2080">Parametri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-2080">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-2081">**area di disegno** Puntatore a Canvas creato in precedenza</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-2081">**canvas** Pointer to previously created canvas</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-2082">**memoria** di Indirizzo di memoria Canvas</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-2082">**memory** Canvas memory address</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-2083">**memsize** Dimensioni in byte del blocco di memoria Canvas</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-2083">**memsize** Size of the canvas memory block in bytes</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-2084">Valori restituiti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-2084">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-2085">Assegnazione **GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) riuscita</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-2085">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful assignment</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-2086">**GX_INVALID_CANVAS** (0x20) blocco di controllo non valido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-2086">**GX_INVALID_CANVAS** (0x20) Invalid control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-2087">Puntatore a **GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) non valido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-2087">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-2088">Consentito da</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-2088">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-2089">Thread</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-2089">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-2090">Esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-2090">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Assign canvas memory block. */
status = gx_canvas_memory_define(canvas,
    (GX_COLOR *) DRAM_MEMORY,
    (640 * 480 * 2));

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS, the canvas memory pointer has be
reassigned. */

```

## <a name="gx_canvas_mouse_define"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-2094">gx_canvas_mouse_define</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-2094">gx_canvas_mouse_define</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-2095">Definire l'immagine del cursore del mouse</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-2095">Define the mouse cursor image</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_canvas_mouse_define(GX_CANVAS *canvas,
    GX_MOUSE_CURSOR_INFO *info);
```

<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-2098">Questo servizio definisce le informazioni del mouse per l'area di disegno specificata.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-2098">This service defines mouse information for the specified canvas.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-2099">Questo servizio richiede la definizione di GX_MOUSE_SUPPORT.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-2099">This service requires GX_MOUSE_SUPPORT to be defined.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-2100">Parametri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-2100">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-2101">**area di disegno** Puntatore al blocco di controllo Canvas</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-2101">**canvas** Pointer to canvas control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-2102">**informazioni** su Puntatore alle informazioni del cursore del mouse.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-2102">**info** Pointer to mouse cursor information.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-2103">**Appendice I** contiene la definizione per GX_MOUSE_CURSOR_INFO struttura.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-2103">**Appendix I** contains definition to GX_MOUSE_CURSOR_INFO structure.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-2104">Valori restituiti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-2104">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-2105">Set di informazioni del mouse **GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) riuscito</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-2105">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful mouse info set</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-2106">Puntatore a **GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) non valido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-2106">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-2107">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) chiamante non valido di questa funzione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-2107">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-2108">Consentito da</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-2108">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-2109">Inizializzazione e thread</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-2109">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-2110">Esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-2110">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Set mouse cursor info. */
GX_MOUSE_CURSOR_INFO mouse_cursor;
mouse_cursor.gx_mouse_cursor_image_id = GX_PIXELMAP_ID_MOUSE;
mouse_cursor.gx_mouse_cursor_hotspot_x = 0;
mouse_cursor.gx_mouse_cursor_hotspot_y = 0;

status = gx_canvas_mouse_define(&my_canvas, &mouse_cursor);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the mouse info of “my_canvas” has been
set successfully. */

```

## <a name="gx_canvas_offset_set"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-2153">gx_canvas_offset_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-2153">gx_canvas_offset_set</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-2154">Assegnare l'offset per la visualizzazione di Canvas x, y</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-2154">Assign canvas x,y display offset</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-2155">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-2155">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_canvas_offset_set(
    GX_CANVAS *canvas,
    GX_VALUE x, 
    GX_VALUE y);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-2156">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-2156">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-2157">Questo servizio assegna un offset di visualizzazione x, y per l'area di disegno specificata.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-2157">This service assigns an x,y display offset for the specified canvas.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-2158">Consente di controllare la posizione in cui l'area di disegno è composta nel buffer del frame visibile e viene spesso utilizzata quando l'area di disegno è più piccola della visualizzazione fisica.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-2158">This controls the position at which the canvas is composited into the visible frame buffer, and is often used when the canvas is smaller than the physical display.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-2159">Se l'area di disegno è stata associata a un livello grafico hardware usando l'API gx_canvas_hardware_layer_bind (), il servizio gx_canvas_offset_set viene implementato direttamente usando il supporto hardware.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-2159">If the canvas has been bound to a hardware graphics layer using the gx_canvas_hardware_layer_bind() API, the gx_canvas_offset_set service is implemented directly using hardware support.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-2160">Parametri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-2160">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-2161">**area di disegno** Puntatore al blocco di controllo Canvas</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-2161">**canvas** Pointer to canvas control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-2162">coordinata **x x dell'** offset</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-2162">**x** X coordinate of offset</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-2163">coordinata **y** y dell'offset</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-2163">**y** Y coordinate of offset</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-2164">Valori restituiti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-2164">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-2165">Assegnazione di offset a **GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) riuscita</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-2165">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful assignment of offset</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-2166">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) chiamante non valido di questa funzione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-2166">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-2167">Puntatore a **GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) non valido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-2167">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-2168">Area di disegno **GX_INVALID_CANVAS** (0x20) non valida</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-2168">**GX_INVALID_CANVAS** (0x20) Invalid canvas</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-2169">Consentito da</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-2169">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-2170">Inizializzazione e thread</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-2170">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-2171">Esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-2171">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Set display offset for “my_canvas”. */

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the canvas drawing is now offset from
position 20,30. */
```

## <a name="gx_canvas_pie_draw"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-2181">gx_canvas_pie_draw</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-2181">gx_canvas_pie_draw</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-2182">Grafico a torta</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-2182">Draw pie</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-2183">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-2183">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_canvas_pie_draw(
    INT xcenter, 
    INT ycenter,
    UINT r, 
    INT start_angle, 
    INT end_angle);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-2184">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-2184">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-2185">Questo servizio disegna un grafico a torta nell'area di disegno utilizzando il pennello del contesto di disegno corrente.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-2185">This service draws a pie into the canvas using the current drawing context brush.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-2186">Il grafico a torta viene ritagliato nell'area Canvas non valida.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-2186">The pie is clipped to the canvas invalid region.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-2187">Questo servizio richiede la definizione dell'opzione di configurazione GX_ARC_DRAWING_SUPPORT.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-2187">This service requires the configuration option GX_ARC_DRAWING_SUPPORT to be defined.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-2188">Parametri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-2188">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-2189">**XCENTER** x-posizione del centro della torta</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-2189">**xcenter** x-position of center of the pie</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-2190">**ycenter** y-posizione del centro della torta</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-2190">**ycenter** y-position of center of the pie</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-2191">raggio **r** della torta</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-2191">**r** Radius of the pie</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-2192">**start_angle** Angolo iniziale della torta</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-2192">**start_angle** Starting angle of the pie</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-2193">**END_ANGLE** Angolo finale della torta</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-2193">**end_angle** Ending angle of the pie</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-2194">Valori restituiti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-2194">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-2195">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) riuscite di Arc</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-2195">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful arc draw</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-2196">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) chiamante non valido di questa funzione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-2196">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-2197">Valore di **GX_INVALID_VALUE** (0X22) non valido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-2197">**GX_INVALID_VALUE** (0x22) Invalid value</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-2198">**GX_INVALID_CONTEXT** (0x06) nessun contesto di disegno aperto</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-2198">**GX_INVALID_CONTEXT** (0x06) No open drawing context</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-2201">Esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-2201">Example</span></span>


### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-2216">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-2216">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_canvas_pixel_draw(GX_POINT position);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-2217">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-2217">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-2218">Questo servizio disegna un pixel nell'area di disegno usando il colore della linea del pennello del contesto di disegno corrente.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-2218">This service draws a pixel on the canvas using the line color of the current drawing context brush.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-2219">Se l'opzione di configurazione GX_BRUSH_ALPHA_SUPPORT è definita, fondere il pixel con il in caso contrario, creare il pixel come completamente opaco.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-2219">If configuration option GX_BRUSH_ALPHA_SUPPORT is defined, blend the pixel with the otherwise, draw the pixel as fully opaque.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-2220">posizione **x,** y del pixel da creare</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-2220">**point** x,y position of pixel to draw</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-2221">Valori restituiti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-2221">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-2222">**GX_SUCCESS** di pixelmap (0x00) riuscito</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-2222">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful pixelmap draw</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-2223">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) chiamante non valido di questa funzione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-2223">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-2224">**GX_INVALID_CONTEXT** (0x06) nessun contesto di disegno aperto</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-2224">**GX_INVALID_CONTEXT** (0x06) No open drawing context</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-2225">Consentito da</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-2225">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-2226">Inizializzazione e thread</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-2226">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-2227">Esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-2227">Example</span></span>

```C
GX_POINT point; /* the x,y position you want to draw to */
GX_RECTANGLE drawto; /* the rectangle bounding your drawing */
GX_CANVAS *mycanvas; /* the canvas you want to draw to */

/* calculate 1x1 pixel drawing area: */
gx_utility_rectangle_define(&drawto,
    point.gx_point_x, point.gx_point_y,
    point.gx_point_x, point.gx_point_y);

/* get my canvas: */
gx_widget_canvas_get(win, &mycanvas);

/* open my canvas for drawing: */
gx_canvas_drawing_initiate(mycanvas, win, &drawto);

/* setup my brush colors. Use any color ID in your resources: */
gx_context_line_color_set(GX_COLOR_ID_WINDOW_BORDER);

/* draw a pixel: */
status = gx_canvas_pixel_draw(point);

/* close the canvas: */
gx_canvas_drawing_complete(mycanvas, GX_TRUE);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS, the pixel was successfully drawn to mycanvas. */
```

## <a name="gx_canvas_pixelmap_blend"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-2232">gx_canvas_pixelmap_blend</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-2232">gx_canvas_pixelmap_blend</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-2234">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-2234">Prototype</span></span>

```C
    GX_VALUE x_position,
    GX_VALUE y_position, 
    GX_PIXELMAP *pixelmap, 
    GX_UBYTE alpha);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-2235">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-2235">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-2236">Questo servizio combina un Pixelmap con lo sfondo dell'area di disegno.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-2236">This service blends a pixelmap with the canvas background.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-2237">Il rapporto di fusione è specificato dal chiamante.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-2237">The blending ratio is specified by the caller.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-2238">Il valore alfa può variare da 0 (completamente trasparente) a 255 (completamente opaco).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-2238">The alpha value can range from 0 (fully transparent) to 255 (fully opaque).</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-2239">Pixelmap può includere anche un canale alfa interno, che viene combinato con il valore di fusione in ingresso.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-2239">The pixelmap may also include an internal alpha channel, which is combined with the incoming blending value.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-2240">Questo servizio è supportato solo dai driver di visualizzazione in esecuzione a una profondità di colore a 16 BPP e superiori.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-2240">This service is only supported by display drivers running at 16-bpp color depth and higher.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-2242">**x_start** Inizio della posizione x di pixelmap</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-2242">**x_start** Starting x-position of the pixelmap</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-2243">**y_end** Posizione y iniziale della pixelmap</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-2243">**y_end** Starting y-position of the pixelmap</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-2247">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) chiamante non valido di questa funzione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-2247">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-2248">Puntatore a **GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) non valido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-2248">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-2249">**GX_NOT_SUPPORTED** (0X28) non supportato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-2249">**GX_NOT_SUPPORTED** (0x28) Not supported</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-2250">**GX_INVALID_CONTEXT** (0x06) nessun contesto di disegno aperto</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-2250">**GX_INVALID_CONTEXT** (0x06) No open drawing context</span></span>


## <a name="gx_canvas_pixelmap_rotate"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-2299">gx_canvas_pixelmap_rotate</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-2299">gx_canvas_pixelmap_rotate</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-2300">Estrai Pixelmap ruotato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-2300">Draw rotated pixelmap</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-2301">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-2301">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_canvas_pixelmap_rotate(
    GX_VALUE x_position, 
    GX_VALUE y_position,
    GX_PIXELMAP *pixelmap, 
    INT angle,
    INT rot_cx, 
    INT rot_cy);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-2302">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-2302">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-2303">Questo servizio ruota un Pixelmap all'angolo specificato ed esegue il rendering del Pixelmap nell'area di disegno direttamente quando viene eseguita la rotazione.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-2303">This service rotates a pixelmap at the specified angle and renders the pixelmap to the canvas directly as the rotation is performed.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-2304">Questo servizio è diverso da gx_utility_pixelmap_rotate in quanto l'output della rotazione viene sottoposto direttamente a rendering nella memoria Canvas e il Pixelmap ruotato non viene restituito al chiamante.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-2304">This service differs from gx_utility_pixelmap_rotate in that the output of the rotation is directly rendered to the canvas memory, and the rotated pixelmap is not returned to the caller.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-2305">Il vantaggio di questo servizio rispetto a gx_utility_pixelmap_rotate è che non è necessaria memoria aggiuntiva per conservare il Pixelmap ruotato.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-2305">The advantage of this service over gx_utility_pixelmap_rotate is that no additional memory is required to hold the rotated pixelmap.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-2306">Lo svantaggio è che il codice di rotazione deve essere eseguito ogni volta che viene disegnato il Pixelmap.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-2306">The disadvantage is that the rotation code must be executed each time the pixelmap is drawn.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-2307">La convalida del ritaglio e del viewport viene applicata durante il rendering del Pixelmap ruotato.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-2307">Clipping and viewport validation are enforced during rendering of the rotated pixelmap.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-2308">Parametri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-2308">Parameters</span></span>
