## <a name="gx_canvas_rotated_text_draw"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-2407">gx_canvas_rotated_text_draw</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-2407">gx_canvas_rotated_text_draw</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-2408">Testo disegnato ruotato su un punto centrale (deprecato)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-2408">Draw text rotated about a center point (deprecated)</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-2409">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-2409">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_canvas_rotated_text_draw(
    const GX_CHAR *text,
    GX_VALUE xCenter, 
    GX_VALUE yCenter, 
    INT angle);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-2410">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-2410">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-2411">Questa API è stata deprecata a favore o gx_canvas_rotated_text_draw_ext ().</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-2411">This API has been deprecated in favor or gx_canvas_rotated_text_draw_ext().</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-2412">Anche se ancora supportata, le nuove applicazioni non devono usare questa API e devono invece usare gx_canvas_rotated_text_draw_ext ().</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-2412">While still supported, new applications should not use this API and should instead use gx_canvas_rotated_text_draw_ext().</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-2413">Questo servizio disegna il testo nell'area di disegno.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-2413">This service draws text to the canvas.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-2414">Il testo viene disegnato ruotato intorno al punto centrale richiesto.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-2414">The text is drawn rotated about the requested center point.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-2415">Per il rendering del testo vengono utilizzati il colore corrente del contesto di disegno e del colore della linea del contesto di disegno.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-2415">The current drawing context font and drawing context line color is used to render the text.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-2416">Questo servizio usa la funzione gx_utility_string_to_alphamap per eseguire il rendering della stringa di testo in un Pixelmap 8bpp temporaneo che contiene solo valore alfa.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-2416">This service uses the function gx_utility_string_to_alphamap to render the text string to a temporary 8bpp pixelmap containing only alpha value.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-2417">Il servizio ruota quindi il AlphaMap usando la funzione gx_utility_pixelmap_rotate.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-2417">The service then rotates the alphamap using the function gx_utility_pixelmap_rotate.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-2418">Una volta eseguito il rendering del AlphaMap finale nell'area di disegno, questo servizio libera la AlphaMap temporanea e la memoria associata.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-2418">After the final alphamap is rendered to the canvas, this service frees the temporary alphamap and associated memory.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-2419">Poiché è necessario un AlphaMap temporaneo per il rendering del testo ruotato, l'applicazione deve configurare la gx_system_memory_allocator dall'API gx_system_memory_allocator_set () chiamante prima di provare a disegnare il testo ruotato.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-2419">Since a temporary alphamap is required to render rotated text, the application must configure the gx_system_memory_allocator by the calling gx_system_memory_allocator_set() API before attempting to draw rotated text.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-2420">Questo servizio deve essere usato solo per eseguire il rendering del testo ruotato "One Time".</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-2420">This service should only be used to render rotated text “one time”.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-2421">Se la stessa stringa di testo verrà disegnata più volte in posizioni diverse o con angoli di rotazione diversi, è più efficiente utilizzare la funzione di utilità gx_utility_string_to_alphamap () per creare il testo AlphaMap una volta, quindi utilizzare gx_utility_pixelmap_rotate più volte per ruotare ripetutamente il AlphaMap risultante.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-2421">If the same text string will be drawn multiple times at different locations or different rotation angles, it is more efficient to use the utility function gx_utility_string_to_alphamap() to create the text alphamap once, then use gx_utility_pixelmap_rotate multiple times to rotate the resulting alphamap repeatedly.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-2422">Parametri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-2422">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-2423">**testo** Stringa di testo da disegnare</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-2423">**text** Text string to be drawn</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-2424">**xCenter** Centra posizione intorno a quale testo verrà ruotato.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-2424">**xCenter** Center positon around which text will be rotated.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-2425">**yCenter** Posizione centrale intorno alla quale verrà ruotato il testo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-2425">**yCenter** Center position around which text will be rotated.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-2426">**angolo** Angolo di rotazione del testo desiderato, in gradi.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-2426">**angle** The desired text rotation angle, in degrees.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-2427">Valori restituiti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-2427">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-2428">Rendering del testo riuscito **GX_SUCCESS** (0x00)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-2428">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful text rendering</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-2429">Puntatore a **GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) non valido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-2429">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-2430">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) chiamante non valido di questa funzione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-2430">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-2431">**GX_SYSTEM_MEMORY_ERROR** (0x30) di memoria insufficiente o non è stato assegnato gx_system_memory_allocator</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-2431">**GX_SYSTEM_MEMORY_ERROR** (0x30) Insufficient memory available or gx_system_memory_allocator has not been assigned</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-2432">Lunghezza stringa **GX_INVALID_STRING_LENGTH** (0X34) non valida</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-2432">**GX_INVALID_STRING_LENGTH** (0x34) Invalid string length</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-2433">Consentito da</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-2433">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-2434">Inizializzazione e thread</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-2434">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-2435">Esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-2435">Example</span></span>

```C
void my_window_draw(GX_WINDOW *window)
{

    GX_VALUE xpos = 100;
    GX_VALUE ypos = 100;
    INT dynamic_count = 1234567;
    GX_CHAR dynamic_text[10];

    /* Call default window draw routine. */
    gx_window_draw(window);

    /* Set font. */
    gx_context_font_set(GX_FONT_ID_SMALL_BOLD);

    /* Convert int value to string. */
    gx_utility_ltoa(dynamic_count, dynamic_text, 20);

    /* Draw rotate text. */
    gx_canvas_rotated_text_draw(dynamic_text, xpos, ypos, 45);
}
```

## <a name="gx_canvas_rotated_text_draw_ext"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-2443">gx_canvas_rotated_text_draw_ext</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-2443">gx_canvas_rotated_text_draw_ext</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-2444">Estrai testo ruotato su un punto centrale</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-2444">Draw text rotated about a center point</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-2445">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-2445">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_canvas_rotated_text_draw_ext(
    GX_CONST GX_STRING *text,
    GX_VALUE xCenter, 
    GX_VALUE yCenter, 
    INT angle);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-2446">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-2446">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-2447">Questo servizio disegna il testo nell'area di disegno.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-2447">This service draws text to the canvas.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-2448">Il testo viene disegnato ruotato intorno al punto centrale richiesto.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-2448">The text is drawn rotated about the requested center point.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-2449">Per il rendering del testo vengono utilizzati il colore corrente del contesto di disegno e del colore della linea del contesto di disegno.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-2449">The current drawing context font and drawing context line color is used to render the text.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-2450">Questo servizio usa la funzione gx_utility_string_to_alphamap per eseguire il rendering della stringa di testo in un Pixelmap 8bpp temporaneo che contiene solo valore alfa.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-2450">This service uses the function gx_utility_string_to_alphamap to render the text string to a temporary 8bpp pixelmap containing only alpha value.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-2451">Il servizio ruota quindi il AlphaMap usando la funzione gx_utility_pixelmap_rotate.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-2451">The service then rotates the alphamap using the function gx_utility_pixelmap_rotate.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-2452">Una volta eseguito il rendering del AlphaMap finale nell'area di disegno, questo servizio libera la AlphaMap temporanea e la memoria associata.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-2452">After the final alphamap is rendered to the canvas, this service frees the temporary alphamap and associated memory.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-2453">Poiché è necessario un AlphaMap temporaneo per il rendering del testo ruotato, l'applicazione deve configurare il gx_system_memory_allocator dall'API di ***gx_system_memory_allocator_set*** chiamante prima di provare a disegnare il testo ruotato.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-2453">Since a temporary alphamap is required to render rotated text, the application must configure the gx_system_memory_allocator by the calling ***gx_system_memory_allocator_set*** API before attempting to draw rotated text.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-2454">Questo servizio deve essere usato solo per eseguire il rendering del testo ruotato "One Time".</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-2454">This service should only be used to render rotated text “one time”.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-2455">Se la stessa stringa di testo verrà disegnata più volte in posizioni diverse o con angoli di rotazione diversi, è più efficiente utilizzare la funzione di utilità gx_utility_string_to_alphamap () per creare il testo AlphaMap una volta, quindi utilizzare gx_utility_pixelmap_rotate più volte per ruotare ripetutamente il AlphaMap risultante.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-2455">If the same text string will be drawn multiple times at different locations or different rotation angles, it is more efficient to use the utility function gx_utility_string_to_alphamap() to create the text alphamap once, then use gx_utility_pixelmap_rotate multiple times to rotate the resulting alphamap repeatedly.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-2456">Parametri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-2456">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-2457">**testo** Stringa di testo da disegnare</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-2457">**text** Text string to be drawn</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-2458">**xCenter** Centra posizione intorno a quale testo verrà ruotato.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-2458">**xCenter** Center positon around which text will be rotated.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-2459">**yCenter** Posizione centrale intorno alla quale verrà ruotato il testo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-2459">**yCenter** Center position around which text will be rotated.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-2460">**angolo** Angolo di rotazione del testo desiderato, in gradi.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-2460">**angle** The desired text rotation angle, in degrees.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-2461">Valori restituiti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-2461">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-2462">Rendering del testo riuscito **GX_SUCCESS** (0x00)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-2462">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful text rendering</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-2463">Puntatore a **GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) non valido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-2463">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-2464">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) chiamante non valido di questa funzione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-2464">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-2465">Contesto di estrazione **GX_INVALID_CONTEXT** (0x06) non valido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-2465">**GX_INVALID_CONTEXT** (0x06) Invalid draw context</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-2466">**GX_SYSTEM_MEMORY_ERROR** (0x30) memoria insufficiente o gx_system_memory_allocator non è stata assegnata.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-2466">**GX_SYSTEM_MEMORY_ERROR** (0x30) Insufficient memory available or gx_system_memory_allocator has not been assigned.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-2467">Lunghezza stringa **GX_INVALID_STRING_LENGTH** (0X34) non valida</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-2467">**GX_INVALID_STRING_LENGTH** (0x34) Invalid string length</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-2468">Consentito da</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-2468">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-2469">Inizializzazione e thread</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-2469">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-2470">Esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-2470">Example</span></span>

```C
void my_window_draw(GX_WINDOW *window)
{

    GX_VALUE xpos = 100;
    GX_VALUE ypos = 100;
    INT dynamic_count = 1234567;
    GX_CHAR dynamic_text[10];
    GX_STRING string;

    /* Call default window draw routine. */
    gx_window_draw(window);

    /* Set font. */
    gx_context_font_set(GX_FONT_ID_SMALL_BOLD);

    /* Convert int value to string. */
    gx_utility_ltoa(dynamic_count, dynamic_text, 20);

    string.gx_string_ptr = dynamic_text;
    string.gx_string_length = strlen(dynamic_text);

    /* Draw rotate text. */
    gx_canvas_rotated_text_draw_ext(&string, xpos, ypos, 45);
}
```

## <a name="gx_canvas_shift"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-2478">gx_canvas_shift</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-2478">gx_canvas_shift</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-2479">Sposta Canvas per x, y</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-2479">Shift canvas by x,y</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-2480">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-2480">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_canvas_shift(
    GX_CANVAS *canvas, 
    GX_VALUE x, GX_VALUE y);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-2481">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-2481">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-2482">Questo servizio sposta l'offset dell'area di disegno specificato in base al valore specificato.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-2482">This service shifts the specified canvas offset by the specified amount.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-2483">Ciò influiscono sulla posizione in cui viene eseguito il rendering dell'area di disegno all'interno del buffer del frame visibile.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-2483">This affects the position at which the canvas is rendered within the visible frame buffer.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-2484">Parametri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-2484">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-2485">**area di disegno** Puntatore al blocco di controllo Canvas</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-2485">**canvas** Pointer to canvas control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-2486">**x** pixel da spostare sull'asse x</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-2486">**x** Pixels to shift on the X axis</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-2487">pixel **y** da spostare sull'asse y</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-2487">**y** Pixels to shift on the Y axis</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-2488">Valori restituiti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-2488">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-2489">Spostamento Canvas riuscito **GX_SUCCESS** (0x00)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-2489">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful canvas shift</span></span>

## <a name="gx_canvas_show"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-2502">gx_canvas_show</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-2502">gx_canvas_show</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-2503">Rendere visibile un'area di disegno</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-2503">Make a canvas visible</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-2504">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-2504">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_canvas_show(GX_CANVAS *canvas);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-2505">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-2505">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-2506">Questo servizio rende visibile un'area di disegno.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-2506">This service makes a canvas visible.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-2507">Se l'area di disegno è stata precedentemente associata a un livello di grafica hardware usando l'API gx_canvas_hardware_layer_bind (), il servizio gx_canvas_show () viene implementato direttamente usando il supporto hardware.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-2507">If the canvas has been previously bound to a hardware graphics layer using the gx_canvas_hardware_layer_bind() API, the gx_canvas_show() service is implemented directly using hardware support.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-2508">Parametri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-2508">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-2509">**area di disegno** Puntatore al blocco di controllo Canvas</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-2509">**canvas** Pointer to canvas control block</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-2510">Valori restituiti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-2510">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-2511">Assegnazione di offset a **GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) riuscita</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-2511">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful assignment of offset</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-2512">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) chiamante non valido di questa funzione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-2512">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-2513">Puntatore a **GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) non valido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-2513">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-2514">Area di disegno **GX_INVALID_CANVAS** (0x20) non valida</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-2514">**GX_INVALID_CANVAS** (0x20) Invalid canvas</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-2515">Consentito da</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-2515">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-2516">Inizializzazione e thread</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-2516">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-2517">Esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-2517">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Make this canvas visible. */
status = gx_canvas_show(&my_canvas);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the canvas drawing is now visible */
```

## <a name="gx_canvas_text_draw"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-2526">gx_canvas_text_draw</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-2526">gx_canvas_text_draw</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-2527">Testo da creare (deprecato)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-2527">Draw text (deprecated)</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-2528">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-2528">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_canvas_text_draw(
    GX_VALUE x_start, 
    GX_VALUE y_start,
    GX_CONST GX_CHAR *string, 
    INT length);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-2529">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-2529">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-2530">Questo servizio disegna il testo nell'area di disegno.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-2530">This service draws text on the canvas.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-2531">Questa API, sebbene ancora supportata, è deprecata e le nuove applicazioni devono invece usare gx_canvas_text_draw_ext ().</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-2531">This API, while still supported, is deprecated and new applications should instead use gx_canvas_text_draw_ext().</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-2532">Parametri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-2532">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-2533">**x_start** Avvio della coordinata x per il testo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-2533">**x_start** Starting x-coordinate for text</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-2534">**y_start** Coordinata y di avvio per il testo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-2534">**y_start** Starting y-coordinate for text</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-2535">**stringa** di Puntatore alla stringa da creare</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-2535">**string** Pointer to string to draw</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-2536">**lunghezza** Se length >= 0, limita il numero di caratteri disegnati per la lunghezza.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-2536">**length** If length >= 0, limits the number of characters drawn to length.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-2537">Se length < 0, viene disegnata l'intera stringa fino a quando non viene disegnato il terminatore NULL.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-2537">If length < 0, the entire string until NULL terminator is drawn.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-2538">Valori restituiti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-2538">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-2539">Estrazione testo riuscita **GX_SUCCESS** (0x00)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-2539">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful text draw</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-2540">**GX_FAILURE** (0x1E) non è stato possibile creare il testo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-2540">**GX_FAILURE** (0x1E) Failed text draw</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-2541">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) chiamante non valido di questa funzione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-2541">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-2542">Puntatore a **GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) non valido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-2542">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-2543">**GX_INVALID_CONTEXT** (0x06) nessun contesto di disegno aperto</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-2543">**GX_INVALID_CONTEXT** (0x06) No open drawing context</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-2544">Lunghezza stringa **GX_INVALID_STRING_LENGTH** (0X34) non valida</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-2544">**GX_INVALID_STRING_LENGTH** (0x34) Invalid string length</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-2545">Consentito da</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-2545">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-2546">Inizializzazione e thread</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-2546">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-2547">Esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-2547">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Draw text “example” on current canvas”. */
status = gx_canvas_text_draw(10, 20, “example”, 7);

/* Draw all of a string of unknown length on the current canvas */
status = gx_canvas_text_draw(10, 40, string_ptr, -1);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the text “example” has been drawn. */
```

## <a name="gx_checkbox_create"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-2592">gx_checkbox_create</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-2592">gx_checkbox_create</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-2593">Casella di controllo Crea</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-2593">Create checkbox</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-2594">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-2594">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_checkbox_create(
    GX_CHECKBOX *checkbox, 
    GX_CONST GX_CHAR *name,
    GX_WIDGET *parent, 
    GX_RESOURCE_ID text_id,
    ULONG style, 
    USHORT checkbox_id, 
    GX_CONST GX_RECTANGLE *size);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-2595">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-2595">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-2596">Questo servizio crea un widget CheckBox con le proprietà specificate.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-2596">This service creates a checkbox widget with the specified properties.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-2597">GX_CHECKBOX deriva da GX_TEXT_BUTTON e tutti i servizi gx_text_button possono essere usati con i widget GX_CHECKBOX.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-2597">GX_CHECKBOX is derived from GX_TEXT_BUTTON, and all gx_text_button services may be used with GX_CHECKBOX widgets.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-2598">Parametri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-2598">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-2599">**casella** di controllo Puntatore al nome del blocco di controllo CheckBox nome logico del widget CheckBox</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-2599">**checkbox** Pointer to checkbox control block name Logical name of checkbox widget</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-2600">**elemento padre** Puntatore al widget padre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-2600">**parent** Pointer to the parent widget</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-2601">**TEXT_ID** ID risorsa del testo della casella di controllo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-2601">**text_id** Resource ID of checkbox text</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-2602">**stile** Stile della casella di controllo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-2602">**style** Style of checkbox.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-2603">L' **Appendice D** contiene stili generali predefiniti per tutti i widget e per gli stili specifici dei widget.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-2603">**Appendix D** contains pre-defined general styles for all widgets as well as widget specific styles.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-2604">**checkbox_id** Casella di controllo ID definito dall'applicazione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-2604">**checkbox_id** Application-defined ID of checkbox</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-2605">**dimensioni** Dimensioni della casella di controllo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-2605">**size** Dimensions of checkbox</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-2606">Valori restituiti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-2606">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-2607">Casella di controllo **GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) riuscita creazione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-2607">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful checkbox create</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-2608">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) chiamante non valido di questa funzione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-2608">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-2609">Puntatore a **GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) non valido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-2609">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-2610">Widget **GX_ALREADY_CREATED** (0x13) già creato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-2610">**GX_ALREADY_CREATED** (0x13) Widget already created</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-2611">Dimensioni **GX_INVALID_SIZE** (0X19) non valide</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-2611">**GX_INVALID_SIZE** (0x19) Invalid size</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-2612">Consentito da</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-2612">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-2613">Inizializzazione e thread</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-2613">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-2614">Esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-2614">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Create “my_checkbox”. */
status = gx_checkbox_create(&my_checkbox, “my_checkbox”,
    &my_parent,
    MY_CHECKBOX_TEXT_RESOURCE_ID, GX_STYLE_BORDER_RAISED,
    MY_CHECKBOX_ID,
    &size);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the checkbox “my_checkbox” has been created. */
```

## <a name="gx_checkbox_draw"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-2619">gx_checkbox_draw</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-2619">gx_checkbox_draw</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-2620">Casella di controllo di estrazione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-2620">Draw checkbox</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-2621">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-2621">Prototype</span></span>

```C
VOID gx_checkbox_draw(GX_CHECKBOX *checkbox);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-2622">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-2622">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-2623">Questo servizio disegna la casella di controllo specificata.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-2623">This service draws the specified checkbox.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-2624">Questa funzione viene in genere chiamata internamente dal meccanismo di aggiornamento Canvas di GUIX, ma viene esposta all'applicazione per facilitare l'implementazione di funzioni di disegno personalizzate per i widget di casella di controllo personalizzati.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-2624">This function is normally called internally by the GUIX canvas refresh mechanism, but is exposed to the application to assist with implementing custom drawing functions for custom checkbox widgets.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-2625">Parametri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-2625">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-2626">**casella** di controllo Puntatore al blocco di controllo CheckBox</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-2626">**checkbox** Pointer to checkbox control block</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-2627">Valori restituiti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-2627">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-2628">**Nessuno**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-2628">**None**</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-2629">Consentito da</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-2629">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-2630">Thread</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-2630">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-2631">Esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-2631">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Write a custom checkbox draw function. */
VOID custom_checkbox_draw(GX_CHECKBOX *checkbox)
{
    /* Call default checkbox draw. */
    gx_checkbox_draw(checkbox);

    /* Add custom drawing here. */
}
```

## <a name="gx_checkbox_event_process"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-2636">gx_checkbox_event_process</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-2636">gx_checkbox_event_process</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-2637">Evento casella di controllo processo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-2637">Process checkbox event</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-2638">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-2638">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_checkbox_event_process(
    GX_CHECKBOX *checkbox, 
    GX_EVENT *event_ptr);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-2639">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-2639">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-2640">Questo servizio elabora un evento per la casella di controllo specificata.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-2640">This service processes an event for the specified checkbox.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-2641">Questo servizio deve essere chiamato come gestore eventi predefinito da qualsiasi funzione di elaborazione di eventi CheckBox personalizzata.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-2641">This service should be called as the default event handler by any custom checkbox event processing functions.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-2642">Parametri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-2642">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-2643">**casella** di controllo Puntatore al blocco di controllo CheckBox</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-2643">**checkbox** Pointer to checkbox control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-2644">**event_ptr** Puntatore all'evento da elaborare</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-2644">**event_ptr** Pointer to the event to process</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-2645">Valori restituiti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-2645">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-2646">Procedura di controllo della casella di controllo **GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) riuscita</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-2646">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful checkbox event process</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-2647">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) chiamante non valido di questa funzione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-2647">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-2648">Puntatore a **GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) non valido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-2648">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-2649">Widget **GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) non valido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-2649">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-2650">Consentito da</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-2650">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-2651">Thread</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-2651">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-2652">Esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-2652">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Call generic checkbox event processing as part of custom event processing function. */

UINT custom_checkbox_event_process(GX_CHECKBOX *checkbox,
    GX_EVENT *event)
{
    UINT status = GX_SUCCESS;

    switch(event->gx_event_type)
    {
    case xyz:
        /* Insert custom event handling here */
        break;

    default:
        /* Pass all other events to the default checkbox
            event processing */
        status = gx_checkbox_event_process(checkbox, event);
        break;
    }
    return status;
}
```

## <a name="gx_checkbox_pixelmap_set"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-2657">gx_checkbox_pixelmap_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-2657">gx_checkbox_pixelmap_set</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-2658">Imposta Pixelmap per la casella di controllo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-2658">Set pixelmap for checkbox</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-2659">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-2659">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_checkbox_pixelmap_set(
    GX_CHECKBOX *checkbox,
    GX_RESOURCE_ID unchecked_id, 
    GX_RESOURCE_ID checked_id,
    GX_RESOURCE_ID unchecked_disabled_id, 
    GX_RESOURCE_ID checked_disabled_id);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-2660">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-2660">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-2661">Questo servizio assegna il pixelmaps che deve essere visualizzato dalla casella di controllo specificata per ogni stato della casella di controllo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-2661">This service assigns the pixelmaps to be displayed by the specified checkbox for each checkbox state.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-2662">Gli ID risorsa possono essere duplicati.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-2662">The resource IDs can be duplicated.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-2663">Parametri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-2663">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-2664">**casella** di controllo Puntatore al blocco di controllo CheckBox</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-2664">**checkbox** Pointer to checkbox control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-2665">**unchecked_id** Pixelmap utilizzato per lo stato deselezionato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-2665">**unchecked_id** Pixelmap used for unchecked state</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-2666">**checked_id** Pixelmap utilizzato per lo stato selezionato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-2666">**checked_id** Pixelmap used for checked state</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-2667">**unchecked_disabled_id** Pixelmap usato per una casella di controllo disabilitata e non selezionata</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-2667">**unchecked_disabled_id** Pixelmap used for a disabled and unchecked checkbox</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-2668">**checked_disabled_id** Pixelmap usato per una casella di controllo disabilitata e selezionata</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-2668">**checked_disabled_id** Pixelmap used for a disabled and checked checkbox</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-2669">Valori restituiti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-2669">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-2670">Selezione della casella di controllo **GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) riuscita</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-2670">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful checkbox select</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-2671">Puntatore a **GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) non valido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-2671">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-2672">Widget **GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) non valido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-2672">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-2673">Consentito da</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-2673">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-2674">Inizializzazione e thread</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-2674">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-2675">Esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-2675">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Select “my_checkbox”. */
status = gx_checkbox_pixelmap_set(&my_checkbox,
    PIXELMAP_UNCHECKED_ID,
    PIXELMAP_CHECKED_ID, PIXELMAP_UNCHECKED_DISABLED_ID,
    PIXELMAP_CHECKED_SIABLED_ID));

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the pixelmaps are assigned to the checkbox “my_checkbox” */
```

## <a name="gx_checkbox_select"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-2680">gx_checkbox_select</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-2680">gx_checkbox_select</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-2681">Seleziona casella di controllo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-2681">Select checkbox</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_checkbox_select(GX_CHECKBOX *checkbox);
```

- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-2691">Widget **GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) non valido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-2691">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>


## <a name="gx_circular_gauge_angle_get"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-2699">gx_circular_gauge_angle_get</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-2699">gx_circular_gauge_angle_get</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-2700">Ottieni angolo corrente</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-2700">Get current angle</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-2701">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-2701">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_circular_gauge_angle_get(
    GX_CIRCULAR_GAUGE *gauge, 
    INT *angle);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-2702">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-2702">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-2703">Questo servizio recupera l'angolo dell'ago corrente del widget del misuratore circolare.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-2703">This service retrieves the current needle angle of circular gauge widget.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-2704">Parametri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-2704">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-2705">**misuratore** Puntatore a blocco di controllo misuratore circolare</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-2705">**gauge** Pointer to circular gauge control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-2706">**angolo** Angolo corrente dell'ago da recuperare</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-2706">**angle** Current needle angle to be retrieved</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-2707">Valori restituiti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-2707">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-2708">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) angolo del misuratore circolare riuscito</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-2708">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful circular gauge angle get</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-2709">Puntatore a **GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) non valido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-2709">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-2710">Consentito da</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-2710">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-2711">Inizializzazione e thread</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-2711">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-2712">Esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-2712">Example</span></span>

```C
INT current_angle;

/* Retrieve the current needle angle of “my_gauge”. */
status = gx_circular_gauge_angle_get(&my_gauge, &current_angle);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the current needle angle of “my_gauge” has been retrieved. */
```

## <a name="gx_circular_gauge_angle_set"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-2720">gx_circular_gauge_angle_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-2720">gx_circular_gauge_angle_set</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_circular_gauge_angle_set(
    GX_CIRCULAR_GAUGE *gauge,
    INT angle);
```

<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-2724">Questo servizio imposta l'angolo di destinazione di un widget del misuratore circolare.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-2724">This service sets the target angle of a circular gauge widget.</span></span>

## <a name="gx_circular_gauge_animation_set"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-2742">gx_circular_gauge_animation_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-2742">gx_circular_gauge_animation_set</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-2743">Imposta parametri di animazione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-2743">Set animation parameters</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-2744">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-2744">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_circular_gauge_animation_set(
    GX_CIRCULAR_GAUGE *gauge,
    INT steps, 
    INT delay);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-2745">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-2745">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-2746">Questo servizio imposta i passaggi di animazione e il tempo di ritardo per un widget del misuratore circolare.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-2746">This service sets animation steps and delay time for a circular gauge widget.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-2747">Parametri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-2747">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-2748">**misuratore** Puntatore a blocco di controllo misuratore circolare</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-2748">**gauge** Pointer to circular gauge control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-2749">**passaggi** Passaggi totali per una rotazione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-2749">**steps** Total steps for one rotation</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-2750">**ritardo** Tempo di ritardo per ogni passaggio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-2750">**delay** Delay time for every step</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-2751">Valori restituiti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-2751">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-2752">Selezione della casella di controllo **GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) riuscita</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-2752">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful checkbox select</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-2753">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) chiamante non valido di questa funzione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-2753">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-2754">Puntatore a **GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) non valido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-2754">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-2755">Valore di **GX_INVALID_VALUE** (0X22) non valido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-2755">**GX_INVALID_VALUE** (0x22) Invalid value</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-2756">Consentito da</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-2756">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-2757">Inizializzazione e thread</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-2757">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-2758">Esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-2758">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Set animation steps and delay time of circular gauge “my_gauge”
    to 30 and 1, the needle of “my_gauge” will rotate from
    current angle to target angle by 30 steps with 1 tick delay between every step. */
status = gx_circular_gauge_animation_set(&my_gauge, 30, 1);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the steps and delay time of “my_gauge” has been set. */
```

## <a name="gx_circular_gauge_background_draw"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-2766">gx_circular_gauge_background_draw</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-2766">gx_circular_gauge_background_draw</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-2768">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-2768">Prototype</span></span>

```C
VOID gx_circular_gauge_background_draw(GX_CIRCULAR_GAUGE *gauge);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-2769">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-2769">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-2770">Questo servizio disegna lo sfondo del misuratore circolare specificato.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-2770">This service draws background of the specified circular gauge.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-2771">Questo servizio viene in genere chiamato internamente dalla funzione gx_circular_gauge_draw, ma viene esposto all'applicazione per facilitare la scrittura di funzioni di disegno personalizzate.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-2771">This service is normally called internally by the gx_circular_gauge_draw function, but is exposed to the application to assist in writing custom drawing functions.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-2772">Parametri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-2772">Parameters</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-2774">Valori restituiti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-2774">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-2775">**Nessuno**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-2775">**None**</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-2776">Consentito da</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-2776">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-2777">Thread</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-2777">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-2778">Esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-2778">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Draw circular gauge background. */
gx_circular_gauge_background_draw(&my_circular_gauge);
```

## <a name="gx_circular_gauge_create"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-2786">gx_circular_gauge_create</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-2786">gx_circular_gauge_create</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_circular_gauge_create(
    GX_CIRCULAR_GAUGE *gauge,
    GX_CONST GX_CHAR *name,
    GX_WIDGET *parent,
    GX_CIRCULAR_GAUGE_INFO *info,
    GX_RESOURCE_ID background_id,
    ULONG style,
    USHORT circular_gauge_id,
```

- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-2795">**informazioni** su Puntatore alla struttura delle informazioni del misuratore.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-2795">**info** Pointer to the gauge information structure.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-2796">**Appendice I** contiene la definizione per GX_CIRCULAR_GAUGE_INFO struttura</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-2796">**Appendix I** contains definition to GX_CIRCULAR_GAUGE_INFO structure</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-2797">**background_id** ID risorsa dello sfondo del misuratore circolare pixelmap</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-2797">**background_id** Resource ID of circular gauge background pixelmap</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-2811">Esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-2811">Example</span></span>

```C
GX_CIRCULAR_GAUGE gauge_info;

gauge_info.gx_circular_gauge_info_animation_steps = 30;
gauge_info.gx_circular_gauge_info_animation_delay = 1;
gauge_info.gx_circular_gauge_info_needle_xpos = 140;
gauge_info.gx_circular_gauge_info_needle_ypos = 140;
gauge_info.gx_circular_gauge_info_neelde_xcor = 20;
gauge_info.gx_circular_gauge_info_neelde_ycor = 88;
gauge_info.gx_circular_gauge_info_needle_pixelmap = GX_PIXELMAP_ID_NEEDLE;

/* Create “my_gauge”. */
status = gx_circular_gauge_create(&my_gauge, “my_gauge”,
            &my_parent,
            &gauge_info, MY_PIXELMAP_RESOURCE_ID, GX_NULL,
            MY_ICON_ID, 5, 30);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the circular gauge “my_gauge” has been created. */
```

## <a name="gx_circular_gauge_draw"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-2819">gx_circular_gauge_draw</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-2819">gx_circular_gauge_draw</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-2820">Estrai misuratore circolare</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-2820">Draw circular gauge</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-2821">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-2821">Prototype</span></span>

```C
VOID gx_circular_gauge_draw(GX_CIRCULAR_GAUGE *gauge);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-2822">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-2822">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-2823">Questo servizio disegna il misuratore circolare specificato.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-2823">This service draws the specified circular gauge.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-2824">Questa funzione viene in genere chiamata internamente dal meccanismo di aggiornamento Canvas di GUIX, ma viene esposta all'applicazione per facilitare l'implementazione di funzioni di disegno personalizzate per i widget personalizzati del misuratore.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-2824">This function is normally called internally by the GUIX canvas refresh mechanism, but is exposed to the application to assist with implementing custom drawing functions for custom gauge widgets.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-2825">Parametri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-2825">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-2826">**misuratore** Puntatore a blocco di controllo misuratore circolare</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-2826">**gauge** Pointer to circular gauge control block</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-2827">Valori restituiti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-2827">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-2828">**Nessuno**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-2828">**None**</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-2829">Consentito da</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-2829">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-2830">Thread</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-2830">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-2831">Esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-2831">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Write a custom circular gauge draw function. */
VOID custom_gauge_draw(GX_CIRCULAR_GAUGE *gauge)
{
    /* Call default circular gauge draw. */
    gx_circular_gauge_draw(gauge);

    /* Add custom drawing here. */
}
```

## <a name="gx_circular_gauge_event_process"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-2839">gx_circular_gauge_event_process</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-2839">gx_circular_gauge_event_process</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-2840">Elabora evento misuratore circolare</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-2840">Process circular gauge event</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-2841">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-2841">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_circular_gauge_event_process(
    GX_CIRCULAR_GAUGE *gauge,
    GX_EVENT *event);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-2842">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-2842">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-2843">Questo servizio elabora un evento per il misuratore circolare specificato.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-2843">This service processes an event for the specified circular gauge.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-2844">Parametri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-2844">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-2845">**misuratore** Puntatore al blocco di controllo del misuratore</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-2845">**gauge** Pointer to gauge control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-2846">**event_ptr** Puntatore a evento da elaborare</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-2846">**event_ptr** Pointer to event to process</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-2847">Valori restituiti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-2847">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-2848">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) processo di evento misuratore riuscito</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-2848">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful gauge event process</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-2849">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) chiamante non valido di questa funzione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-2849">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-2850">Puntatore a **GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) non valido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-2850">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-2851">Consentito da</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-2851">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-2852">Thread</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-2852">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-2853">Esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-2853">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Call generic circular gauge event processing as part of custom event processing function. */
UINT custom_gauge_event_process(GX_CIRCULAR_GAUGE *gauge,
    GX_EVENT *event)
{
    UINT status = GX_SUCCESS;

    switch(event->gx_event_type)
    {
    case xyz:
        /* Insert custom event handling here */
        break;

    default:
        /* Pass all other events to the default circular gauge
             event processing */
        status = gx_circular_gauge_event_process(gauge, event);
        break;
}
return status;
```

```C
/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the brush of “my_context” has been set to default. */

```

## <a name="gx_context_brush_define"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-2888">gx_context_brush_define</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-2888">gx_context_brush_define</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-2889">Definire il pennello del contesto di disegno corrente</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-2889">Define brush of current drawing context</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-2890">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-2890">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_context_brush_define(
    GX_RESOURCE_ID line_color_id,
    GX_RESOURCE_ID fill_color_id, 
    UINT style);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-2891">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-2891">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-2892">Questo servizio definisce il pennello del contesto di disegno corrente.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-2892">This service defines the brush of the current drawing context.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-2893">Parametri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-2893">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-2894">**line_color_id** ID risorsa del colore della linea.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-2894">**line_color_id** Resource ID of line color.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-2895">L' **Appendice B** contiene ID di risorsa colore predefiniti.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-2895">**Appendix B** contains pre-defined color Resource IDs.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-2896">Si noti che l'applicazione può aggiungere anche ID di risorse colore personalizzati.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-2896">Note that the application may add custom color Resource IDs as well.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-2897">**fill_color_id** ID risorsa del colore di riempimento.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-2897">**fill_color_id** Resource ID of fill color.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-2898">L' **Appendice B** contiene ID di risorsa colore predefiniti.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-2898">**Appendix B** contains pre-defined color Resource IDs.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-2899">Si noti che l'applicazione può aggiungere anche ID di risorse colore personalizzati.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-2899">Note that the application may add custom color Resource IDs as well.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-2900">**stile** Stile del pennello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-2900">**style** Style of brush.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-2901">L' **Appendice D** descrive gli stili dei pennelli supportati.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-2901">**Appendix D** describes the supported brush styles.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-2902">Gli stili dei pennelli possono essere combinati in un'unica variabile utilizzando l'operazione OR bit per bit.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-2902">Brush styles can be combined into one variable using bitwise OR operation.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-2903">Valori restituiti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-2903">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-2904">Definizione del pennello del contesto **GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) riuscita</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-2904">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful context brush define</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-2905">ID risorsa non valido **GX_INVALID_RESOURCE_ID** (0x33)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-2905">**GX_INVALID_RESOURCE_ID** (0x33) Invalid resource ID</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-2906">**GX_INVALID_CONTEXT** (0x06) non viene definito alcun contesto di disegno attivo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-2906">**GX_INVALID_CONTEXT** (0x06) No active drawing context define</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-2907">ID risorsa non valido **GX_INVALID_RESOURCE_ID** (0x33)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-2907">**GX_INVALID_RESOURCE_ID** (0x33) Invalid resource ID</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-2908">**GX_INVALID_CONTEXT** (0x06) senza contesto di disegno attivo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-2908">**GX_INVALID_CONTEXT** (0x06) No active drawing context</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-2909">Consentito da</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-2909">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-2910">Inizializzazione e thread</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-2910">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-2911">Esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-2911">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Define the brush of the current context. */
status = gx_context_brush_define(GX_COLOR_BLACK_ID,
    GX_COLOR_BLACK_ID,
    GX_STYLE_BORDER_NONE);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the brush of the current context has been defined. */
```

## <a name="gx_context_brush_get"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-2926">gx_context_brush_get</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-2926">gx_context_brush_get</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-2927">Ottiene il pennello del contesto di disegno corrente</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-2927">Get brush of current drawing context</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-2928">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-2928">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_context_brush_get(GX_BRUSH **return_brush);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-2929">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-2929">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-2930">Questo servizio restituisce un puntatore al pennello attivo nel contesto di disegno corrente.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-2930">This service returns a pointer to the active brush in the current drawing context.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-2931">Se non esiste alcun contesto di disegno attivo, il servizio ha esito negativo e restituisce un puntatore NULL.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-2931">If there is no active drawing context, the service fails and returns a NULL pointer.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-2932">Parametri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-2932">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-2933">**return_brush** Puntatore alla destinazione per il pennello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-2933">**return_brush** Pointer to destination for brush.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-2934">Valori restituiti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-2934">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-2935">Il pennello del contesto è stato recuperato **GX_SUCCESS** (0x00)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-2935">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successfully retrieved context brush</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-2936">**GX_INVALID_CONTEXT** (0x06) senza contesto di disegno attivo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-2936">**GX_INVALID_CONTEXT** (0x06) No active drawing context</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-2937">Puntatore a **GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) non valido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-2937">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-2938">Consentito da</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-2938">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-2939">Inizializzazione e thread</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-2939">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-2940">Esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-2940">Example</span></span>

```C
GX_BRUSH *my_brush;

/* Get the brush of the current context. */
status = gx_context_brush_get(&my_brush);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the brush of the current context has been retrieved. */
```

## <a name="gx_context_brush_pattern_set"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-2955">gx_context_brush_pattern_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-2955">gx_context_brush_pattern_set</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-2956">Imposta il modello di pennello del contesto di disegno corrente</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-2956">Set brush pattern of current drawing context</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-2957">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-2957">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_context_brush_pattern_set(ULONG pattern);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-2958">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-2958">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-2959">Questo servizio imposta il modello di pennello del contesto di disegno corrente.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-2959">This service sets the brush pattern of the current drawing context.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-2960">Il modello di pennello viene usato per disegnare linee verticali tratteggiate orizzontali e tratteggiate.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-2960">The brush pattern is used for drawing dashed horizontal and dashed vertical lines.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-2961">Quando viene chiamato il gx_canvas_line_draw () e la riga è orizzontale o verticale e il campo brush.gx_brush_line_pattern è diverso da zero, viene disegnata una linea di pattern.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-2961">When the gx_canvas_line_draw() is called, and the line is horizontal or vertical, and the brush.gx_brush_line_pattern field is non-zero, a pattern line is drawn.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-2962">La maschera del modello di pennello è attualmente supportata solo per le linee orizzontali e verticali.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-2962">The brush pattern mask is currently only supported for horizontal and vertical lines.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-2963">Parametri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-2963">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-2964">**modello** Modello da utilizzare per il pennello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-2964">**pattern** Pattern to be used for the brush.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-2965">Si tratta di un semplice modello di esadecimali on/off da usare per il disegno della linea del modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-2965">This is a simple hexidecimal on/off pattern to be used for pattern line drawing.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-2966">Valori restituiti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-2966">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-2967">Set di pennelli di contesto **GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) riuscito</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-2967">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful context brush set</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-2968">**GX_INVALID_CONTEXT** (0x06) contesto di disegno non valido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-2968">**GX_INVALID_CONTEXT** (0x06) Invalid drawing context</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-2969">Consentito da</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-2969">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-2970">Inizializzazione e thread</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-2970">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-2971">Esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-2971">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Set the brush pattern for the current contex. */
status = gx_context_brush_pattern_set(0x80808080);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the brush pattern of the current context
has been set to the specified pattern. */
```

## <a name="gx_context_brush_set"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-2985">gx_context_brush_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-2985">gx_context_brush_set</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-2986">Imposta il pennello del contesto di disegno corrente</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-2986">Set brush of current drawing context</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-2987">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-2987">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_context_brush_set(GX_BRUSH *brush);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-2988">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-2988">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-2989">Questo servizio imposta il pennello del contesto di disegno corrente.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-2989">This service sets the brush of the current drawing context.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-2990">Parametri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-2990">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-2991">**pennello** Puntatore al pennello da utilizzare per il contesto corrente.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-2991">**brush** Pointer to brush to use for current context.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-2992">Valori restituiti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-2992">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-2993">Set di pennelli di contesto **GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) riuscito</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-2993">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful context brush set</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-2994">**GX_INVALID_CONTEXT** (0x06) senza contesto di disegno attivo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-2994">**GX_INVALID_CONTEXT** (0x06) No active drawing context</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-2995">Puntatore a **GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) non valido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-2995">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-2996">Consentito da</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-2996">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-2997">Inizializzazione e thread</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-2997">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-2998">Esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-2998">Example</span></span>

```C
GX_BRSUH my_brush;
GX_FONT *font;
GX_COLOR fill_color;
GX_COLOR line_color;

/* Retrieve the font that associated with the specified font ID. */
gx_context_font_get(MY_FONT_ID, &font);

/* Retrieve the color that associated with the specified color ID. */
gx_context_color_get(MY_FILL_COLOR_ID, &fill_color);
gx_context_color_get(MY_LINE_COLOR, &line_color);

my_brush.gx_brush_pixelmap = MY_PIXELMAP_ID;
my_brush.gx_brush_font = font;
my_brush.gx_brush_line_pattern = 0x80808080;
my_brush.gx_brush_pattern_mask = 0x80000000;
my_brush.gx_brush_fill_color = fill_color;
my_brush.gx_brush_line_color = line_color;
my_brush.gx_brush_style = GX_BRSUH_SOLID_FILL | GX_BRUSH_ALIAS |
                          GX_BRUSH_PIXELMAP_FILL | GX_BRUSH_ROUND
my_brush.gx_brush_width = 2;
my_brush.gx_brush_alpha = 255;

/* Set the brush of the current context. */
status = gx_context_brush_set(my_brush);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the brush of the current context has been set. */
```

<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-3080">ID risorsa non valido **GX_INVALID_RESOURCE_ID** (0x33)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-3080">**GX_INVALID_RESOURCE_ID** (0x33) Invalid resource ID</span></span>
