## <a name="gx_context_fill_color_set"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-3100">gx_context_fill_color_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-3100">gx_context_fill_color_set</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-3101">Imposta il colore di riempimento del contesto di disegno corrente</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-3101">Set fill color of current drawing context</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-3102">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-3102">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_context_fill_color_set(GX_RESOURCE_ID fill_color_id);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-3103">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-3103">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-3104">Questo servizio imposta il colore di riempimento del pennello attivo nel contesto di disegno corrente.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-3104">This service sets the fill color of the active brush in the current drawing context.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-3105">Parametri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-3105">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-3106">**fill_color_id** ID risorsa del colore di riempimento del contesto corrente.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-3106">**fill_color_id** Resource ID of fill color of current context.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-3107">L' **Appendice B** contiene ID di risorsa colore predefiniti.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-3107">**Appendix B** contains pre-defined color Resource IDs.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-3108">Si noti che l'applicazione può aggiungere anche ID di risorse colore personalizzati.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-3108">Note that the application may add custom color Resource IDs as well.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-3109">Valori restituiti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-3109">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-3110">Impostazione del colore di riempimento del contesto **GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) riuscita</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-3110">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful context fill color set</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-3111">ID risorsa non valido **GX_INVALID_RESOURCE_ID** (0x33)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-3111">**GX_INVALID_RESOURCE_ID** (0x33) Invalid resource ID</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-3112">**GX_INVALID_CONTEXT** (0x06) senza contesto di disegno attivo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-3112">**GX_INVALID_CONTEXT** (0x06) No active drawing context</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-3113">Consentito da</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-3113">Allowed From</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-3115">Esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-3115">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Set the fill color of the current context to black. */
status = gx_context_fill_color_set(MY_BLACK_COLOR_ID);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the fill color of the current context has been set to black. */
```

## <a name="gx_context_font_get"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-3130">gx_context_font_get</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-3130">gx_context_font_get</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_context_font_get(
    GX_RESOURCE_ID font_id,
    GX_FONT **return_font);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-3133">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-3133">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-3134">Questo servizio recupera il puntatore del tipo di carattere associato all'ID del tipo di carattere indicato.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-3134">This service retrieves the font pointer associated with the indicated font ID.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-3135">Questo servizio deve essere chiamato solo dall'interno di un'operazione di disegno attiva.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-3135">This service should only be called from within an active drawing operation.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-3139">Valori restituiti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-3139">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-3140">Il tipo di carattere è stato recuperato **GX_SUCCESS** (0x00)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-3140">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successfully retrieved font</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-3141">ID risorsa non valido **GX_INVALID_RESOURCE_ID** (0x33)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-3141">**GX_INVALID_RESOURCE_ID** (0x33) Invalid resource ID</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-3142">**GX_INVALID_CONTEXT** (0x06) senza contesto di disegno attivo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-3142">**GX_INVALID_CONTEXT** (0x06) No active drawing context</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-3143">Puntatore a **GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) non valido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-3143">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-3144">Consentito da</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-3144">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-3145">Inizializzazione e thread</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-3145">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-3146">Esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-3146">Example</span></span>

```C

/* Get the font pointer. */

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS, the font that indicated with MY_MIDSIZE_FONT has been successfully retrieved. */
```

## <a name="gx_context_font_set"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-3161">gx_context_font_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-3161">gx_context_font_set</span></span>


### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-3168">Valori restituiti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-3168">Return Values</span></span>

## <a name="gx_context_line_color_set"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-3189">gx_context_line_color_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-3189">gx_context_line_color_set</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-3190">Imposta il colore della linea del contesto di disegno corrente</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-3190">Set line color of current drawing context</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-3191">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-3191">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_context_line_color_set(GX_RESOURCE_ID line_color_id);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-3192">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-3192">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-3193">Questo servizio imposta il colore della linea del pennello attivo nel contesto di disegno corrente.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-3193">This service sets the line color of the active brush in the current drawing context.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-3194">Parametri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-3194">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-3195">**line_color_id** Colore della linea del contesto corrente.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-3195">**line_color_id** Line color of current context.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-3196">L' **Appendice B** contiene ID di risorsa colore predefiniti.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-3196">**Appendix B** contains pre-defined color Resource IDs.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-3197">Si noti che l'applicazione può aggiungere anche ID di risorse colore personalizzati.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-3197">Note that the application may add custom color Resource IDs as well.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-3198">Valori restituiti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-3198">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-3199">Set di colori della linea di contesto **GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) riuscito</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-3199">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful context line color set</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-3200">ID risorsa non valido **GX_INVALID_RESOURCE_ID** (0x33)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-3200">**GX_INVALID_RESOURCE_ID** (0x33) Invalid resource ID</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-3201">**GX_INVALID_CONTEXT** (0x06) senza contesto di disegno attivo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-3201">**GX_INVALID_CONTEXT** (0x06) No active drawing context</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-3202">Consentito da</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-3202">Allowed From</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-3204">Esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-3204">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Set the line color of the current context to black. */
status = gx_context_line_color_set(GX_COLOR_BLACK_ID);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the line color of the current context has been set to black. */
```

## <a name="gx_context_pixelmap_get"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-3219">gx_context_pixelmap_get</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-3219">gx_context_pixelmap_get</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-3220">Ottiene Pixelmap associato all'ID Pixelmap nel contesto di estrazione corrente</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-3220">Get pixelmap associated with pixelmap ID in current draw context</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-3221">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-3221">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_context_pixelmap_get(
    GX_RESOURCE_ID pixelmap_id,
    GX_PIXELMAP **return_map);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-3222">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-3222">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-3223">Questo servizio recupera il puntatore Pixelmap associato all'ID Pixelmap indicato.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-3223">This service retrieves the pixelmap pointer associated with the indicated pixelmap ID.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-3224">Parametri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-3224">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-3225">**pixelmap_id** ID risorsa di Pixelmap richiesto.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-3225">**pixelmap_id** Resource ID of pixelmap requested.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-3226">**return_map** Indirizzo della variabile che deve essere contenuta nell'indirizzo Pixelmap restituito.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-3226">**return_map** Address of variable to hold returned pixelmap address.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-3227">Valori restituiti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-3227">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-3228">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) ha recuperato correttamente pixelmap</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-3228">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successfully retrieved pixelmap</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-3229">ID risorsa non valido **GX_INVALID_RESOURCE_ID** (0x33)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-3229">**GX_INVALID_RESOURCE_ID** (0x33) Invalid resource ID</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-3230">**GX_INVALID_CONTEXT** (0x06) senza contesto di disegno attivo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-3230">**GX_INVALID_CONTEXT** (0x06) No active drawing context</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-3231">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) puntatore Pixelmap non valido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-3231">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pixelmap pointer</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-3232">Consentito da</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-3232">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-3233">Inizializzazione e thread</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-3233">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-3234">Esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-3234">Example</span></span>

```C
GX_PIXELMAP *map;

/* Get the pixelmap pointer. */
status = gx_context_pixelmap_get(MY_PIXELMAP_ID, &map);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS, the pixelmap was successfully retrieved. */
```

## <a name="gx_context_pixelmap_set"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-3249">gx_context_pixelmap_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-3249">gx_context_pixelmap_set</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-3251">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-3251">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_context_pixelmap_set(GX_RESOURCE_ID pixelmap_id);
```

- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-3258">ID risorsa non valido **GX_INVALID_RESOURCE_ID** (0x33)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-3258">**GX_INVALID_RESOURCE_ID** (0x33) Invalid resource ID</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-3259">Contesto di **GX_INVLAID_CONTEXT** (0x06) non valido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-3259">**GX_INVLAID_CONTEXT** (0x06) Invalid context</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-3260">Consentito da</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-3260">Allowed From</span></span>

## <a name="gx_context_raw_brush_define"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-3277">gx_context_raw_brush_define</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-3277">gx_context_raw_brush_define</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-3278">Definire il pennello non elaborato del contesto di disegno corrente</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-3278">Define raw brush of current draw context</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-3279">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-3279">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_context_raw_brush_define(
    GX_COLOR line_color,
    GX_COLOR fill_color, 
    UINT style);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-3280">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-3280">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-3281">Questo servizio definisce il pennello non elaborato del contesto dello schermo corrente.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-3281">This service defines the raw brush of the current screen context.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-3282">Le definizioni non elaborate vengono utilizzate quando i valori di colore ARGB a 32 bit devono essere passati al pennello anziché agli ID colore.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-3282">Raw definitions are used when 32-bit ARGB color values are to be passed into the brush rather than color IDs.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-3283">Le definizioni dei colori non elaborati sono utili quando il colore desiderato non è presente nella tabella dei colori di sistema corrente o quando il valore di colore RGB viene calcolato in fase di esecuzione.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-3283">Raw color definitions are useful when the desired color is not present in the current system color table or when the RGB color value is computed at runtime.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-3284">Parametri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-3284">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-3285">**line_color** Colore della linea nel formato di colore ARGB non elaborato a 32 bit.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-3285">**line_color** Color of line in 32-bit raw ARGB color format.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-3286">**L'Appendice A** contiene colori predefiniti.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-3286">**Appendix A** contains pre-defined colors.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-3287">Si noti che l'applicazione può anche aggiungere colori personalizzati.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-3287">Note that the application may add custom colors as well.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-3288">**fill_color** Colore del riempimento nel formato di colore ARGB RAW a 32 bit.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-3288">**fill_color** Color of fill in 32-bit raw ARGB color format.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-3289">**L'Appendice A** contiene colori predefiniti.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-3289">**Appendix A** contains pre-defined colors.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-3290">Si noti che l'applicazione può anche aggiungere colori personalizzati.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-3290">Note that the application may add custom colors as well.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-3291">**stile** Stile del pennello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-3291">**style** Style of brush.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-3292">L' **Appendice D** contiene stili generali predefiniti per tutti i widget e per gli stili specifici dei widget.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-3292">**Appendix D** contains pre-defined general styles for all widgets as well as widget-specific styles.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-3293">Valori restituiti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-3293">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-3294">Definizione del pennello non elaborato del contesto **GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) riuscita</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-3294">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful context raw brush define</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-3295">**GX_INVALID_CONTEXT** (0x06) senza contesto di disegno attivo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-3295">**GX_INVALID_CONTEXT** (0x06) No active drawing context</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-3296">Consentito da</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-3296">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-3297">Inizializzazione e thread</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-3297">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-3298">Esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-3298">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Define the raw brush of the current context. */
status = gx_context_raw_brush_define(GX_COLOR_BLACK,
    GX_COLOR_BLACK, GX_STYLE_BORDER_NONE);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the raw brush of the current context has been defined. */
```

## <a name="gx_context_raw_line_color_set"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-3344">gx_context_raw_line_color_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-3344">gx_context_raw_line_color_set</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-3346">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-3346">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_context_raw_line_color_set(GX_COLOR line_color);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-3347">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-3347">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-3348">Questo servizio imposta il colore della linea del pennello attivo nel contesto di disegno corrente.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-3348">This service sets the line color of the active brush in the current drawing context.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-3349">Il parametro line_color è un valore di colore non elaborato con formato ARGB a 32 bit, anziché un valore di ID del colore.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-3349">The line_color parameter is a 32-bit ARGB format raw color value, rather than a color ID value.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-3350">Le definizioni dei colori non elaborati sono utili quando il colore desiderato non è presente nella tabella dei colori di sistema corrente o quando il valore di colore RGB viene calcolato in fase di esecuzione.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-3350">Raw color definitions are useful when the desired color is not present in the current system color table or when the RGB color value is computed at runtime.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-3351">Parametri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-3351">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-3352">**line_color** Colore del valore della linea.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-3352">**line_color** Color of line value.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-3353">**L'Appendice A** contiene colori predefiniti.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-3353">**Appendix A** contains pre-defined colors.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-3354">Si noti che l'applicazione può anche aggiungere colori personalizzati.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-3354">Note that the application may add custom colors as well.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-3355">Valori restituiti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-3355">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-3356">Set di colori della linea RAW del contesto **GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) riuscita</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-3356">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful context raw line color set</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-3357">**GX_INVALID_CONTEXT** (0x06) senza contesto di disegno attivo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-3357">**GX_INVALID_CONTEXT** (0X06) No active drawing context</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-3358">Consentito da</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-3358">Allowed From</span></span>

```C
/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the raw line color of the current context has been set. */
```

## <a name="gx_context_string_get"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-3374">gx_context_string_get</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-3374">gx_context_string_get</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-3375">Recupera la stringa associata all'ID stringa (deprecata)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-3375">Retrieve string associated with String ID (deprecated)</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-3376">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-3376">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_context_string_get(GX_RESOURCE_ID string_id,
    GX_CONST GX_CHAR **return_string);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-3377">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-3377">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-3378">Questa API deprecata restituisce la stringa associata all'ID stringa specificato.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-3378">This deprecated API returns the string associated with the given string ID.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-3379">Le nuove applicazioni devono usare gx_context_string_get_ext ().</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-3379">New applications should use gx_context_string_get_ext().</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-3380">Parametri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-3380">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-3381">**string_id** ID di stringa generato dall'applicazione GUIX Studio.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-3381">**string_id** String ID generated by the GUIX Studio application.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-3382">**return_string** Indirizzo della variabile per restituire un puntatore di stringa.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-3382">**return_string** Address of variable to return string pointer.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-3383">Valori restituiti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-3383">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-3384">Set di colori della linea RAW del contesto **GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) riuscita</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-3384">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful context raw line color set</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-3385">Puntatore a **GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) non valido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-3385">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-3386">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) chiamante non valido di questa funzione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-3386">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-3387">**GX_INVALID_CONTEXT** (0x06) senza contesto di disegno attivo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-3387">**GX_INVALID_CONTEXT** (0X06) No active drawing context</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-3388">Consentito da</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-3388">Allowed From</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-3390">Esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-3390">Example</span></span>

```C
GX_CHAR *text;

status = gx_context_string_get(GX_ID_ERROR, &text);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the string pointer has been returned. */
```

## <a name="gx_context_string_get_ext"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-3393">gx_context_string_get_ext</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-3393">gx_context_string_get_ext</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-3394">Recupera la stringa associata all'ID stringa specificato.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-3394">Retrieve string associated with given string ID.</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-3395">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-3395">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_context_string_get_ext(
    GX_RESOURCE_ID string_id, 
    GX_STRING *return_string);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-3396">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-3396">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-3397">Questo servizio restituisce la stringa associata a un ID di stringa specificato.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-3397">This service returns the string associated with a given string ID.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-3398">Questo servizio può essere richiamato solo quando esiste un contesto di disegno attivo, ovvero dall'interno della funzione di disegno di un widget.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-3398">This service can only be invoked when there is an active drawing context, i.e. from within the drawing function of a widget.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-3399">Questo servizio identifica l'area di disegno attiva e visualizza e recupera la stringa dall'istanza di visualizzazione individuata.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-3399">This service identifies the active canvas and display and retrieves the string from the located display instance.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-3400">Parametri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-3400">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-3401">**string_id** ID di stringa usato per identificare la stringa, generata da GUIX studio nel file di intestazione della risorsa dell'applicazione.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-3401">**string_id** String ID used to identify the string, as generated by GUIX Studio in the application resource header file.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-3402">**return_string** Indirizzo di GX_STRING variabile in cui verrà restituito il puntatore di stringa e la lunghezza della stringa.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-3402">**return_string** Address of GX_STRING variable in which the string pointer and string length will be returned.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-3403">Valori restituiti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-3403">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-3404">Set di colori della linea RAW del contesto **GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) riuscita</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-3404">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful context raw line color set</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-3405">Puntatore a **GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) non valido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-3405">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-3406">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) chiamante non valido di questa funzione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-3406">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-3407">**GX_INVALID_CONTEXT** (0x06) senza contesto di disegno attivo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-3407">**GX_INVALID_CONTEXT** (0X06) No active drawing context</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-3408">Consentito da</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-3408">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-3409">Inizializzazione e thread</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-3409">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-3410">Esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-3410">Example</span></span>


```C
GX_STRING string;

/* Set the raw line color of the current context. */
status = gx_context_string_get_ext(ID_ERROR, &string);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the string.gx_string_ptr and
string.gx_string_length values have been returned. */
```

## <a name="gx_display_active_language_set"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-3425">gx_display_active_language_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-3425">gx_display_active_language_set</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-3426">Assegna la lingua attiva per la visualizzazione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-3426">Assign the display active language</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-3427">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-3427">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_display_active_language_set(
    GX_DISPLAY *display, 
    GX_UBYTE language);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-3428">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-3428">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-3429">Questo servizio assegna la lingua attualmente attiva per la visualizzazione indicata.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-3429">This service assigns the currently active language for the indicated display.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-3430">L'indice della lingua corrisponde alle lingue definite nella tabella della lingua di visualizzazione e non è un identificatore di lingua ANSI.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-3430">The language index corresponds to the languages defined in the display language table, and is not an ANSI language identifier.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-3431">Diverse visualizzazioni in un sistema a più schermi possono eseguire diverse lingue attive.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-3431">Different displays in a multi display system can each run different active languages.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-3432">Prima di usare questa API, è necessario assegnare la tabella della lingua di visualizzazione.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-3432">The display language table should be assigned before this API is used.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-3433">Quando una visualizzazione viene inizializzata con gx_studio_display_configure, la tabella della lingua viene installata automaticamente e l'applicazione passa all'indice della lingua attiva.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-3433">When a display is initialized using gx_studio_display_configure, the language table is automatically installed and the application passes in the active language index.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-3434">Parametri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-3434">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-3435">**Visualizza** Puntatore al blocco di controllo della visualizzazione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-3435">**display** Pointer to display control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-3436">**lingua** di Indice del linguaggio attivo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-3436">**language** Active language index</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-3437">Valori restituiti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-3437">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-3438">Assegnazione lingua riuscita **GX_SUCCESS** (0x00)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-3438">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful language assign</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-3439">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) puntatore di visualizzazione non valido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-3439">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid display pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-3440">Indice di lingua non valido **GX_INVALID_VALUE** (0x22)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-3440">**GX_INVALID_VALUE** (0x22) Invalid language index</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-3441">Consentito da</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-3441">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-3442">Inizializzazione e thread</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-3442">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-3443">Esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-3443">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Change value of color MY_COLOR_ID. */
status = gx_display_active_language_set(&my_display,
    LANGUAGE_ENGLISH);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the active language has been assigned. */
```

### <a name="see-also"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-3444">Vedere anche</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-3444">See Also</span></span>

## <a name="gx_display_color_set"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-3447">gx_display_color_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-3447">gx_display_color_set</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-3448">Riassegnare un valore di colore</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-3448">Re-assign one color value</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-3449">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-3449">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_display_color_set(
    GX_DISPLAY *display,
    GX_RESOURCE_ID color_id, 
    GX_COLOR new_color);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-3450">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-3450">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-3451">Questo servizio assegna nuovamente il valore del colore associato all'ID colore specificato.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-3451">This service re-assigns the color value associated with the specified color ID.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-3452">Questa operazione può essere utilizzata per modificare la tabella dei colori di una visualizzazione senza fornire una tabella dei colori interamente nuova.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-3452">This can be used to modify the color table of a display without providing an entirely new color table.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-3453">Il valore del colore specificato deve essere nel formato nativo supportato dalla visualizzazione.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-3453">The color value provided must be in the native format supported by the display.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-3454">Parametri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-3454">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-3455">**Visualizza** Puntatore al blocco di controllo della visualizzazione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-3455">**display** Pointer to display control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-3456">**color_id** ID colore da riassegnare</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-3456">**color_id** Color ID to reassign</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-3457">**new_color** Valore del colore da assegnare a questo slot di color_id</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-3457">**new_color** Color value to assign to this color_id slot</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-3458">Valori restituiti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-3458">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-3459">Riassegnazione del colore **GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) riuscita</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-3459">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful color reassign</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-3460">ID colore non valido **GX_INVALID_RESOURCE_ID** (0x33)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-3460">**GX_INVALID_RESOURCE_ID** (0x33) Invalid color ID</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-3461">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) chiamante non valido di questa funzione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-3461">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-3462">Visualizzazione di **GX_INVALID_DISPLAY** (0X1D) non valida</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-3462">**GX_INVALID_DISPLAY** (0x1D) Invalid display</span></span>

## <a name="gx_display_create"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-3488">gx_display_create</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-3488">gx_display_create</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-3489">Crea visualizzazione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-3489">Create display</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-3490">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-3490">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_display_create(
    GX_DISPLAY *display, 
    GX_CONST CHAR *name,
    UINT (*display_driver_setup)(GX_DISPLAY *),
    GX_VALUE width, 
    GX_VALUE height);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-3491">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-3491">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-3492">Questo servizio crea una visualizzazione e chiama la funzione di installazione del driver di visualizzazione.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-3492">This service creates a display and calls the display driver setup function.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-3493">GUIX accetta questa visualizzazione e la aggiunge all'elenco interno di visualizzazioni.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-3493">GUIX takes this display and adds it to its internal list of displays.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-3494">Parametri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-3494">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-3495">**Visualizza** Puntatore al blocco di controllo della visualizzazione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-3495">**display** Pointer to display control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-3496">**nome** Nome della visualizzazione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-3496">**name** Name of the display</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-3497">**display_driver_setup** Puntatore per la visualizzazione della funzione di installazione del driver</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-3497">**display_driver_setup** Pointer to display driver setup function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-3498">**optional_driver_info** Puntatore a informazioni facoltative sul driver</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-3498">**optional_driver_info** Pointer to optional driver information</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-3499">**color_format** Formato colore, come definito nell' **Appendice C**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-3499">**color_format** Color format, as defined in **Appendix C**</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-3500">**larghezza** Numero di pixel sull'asse x</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-3500">**width** Number of pixels on the x-axis</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-3501">**altezza** Numero di pixel sull'asse y</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-3501">**height** Number of pixels on the y-axis</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-3502">Valori restituiti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-3502">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-3503">Creazione della visualizzazione di **GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) riuscita</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-3503">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful display create</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-3504">**GX_SYSTEM_ERROR** (0xFE) non è possibile configurare la visualizzazione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-3504">**GX_SYSTEM_ERROR** (0xFE) Fail to setup display</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-3505">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) chiamante non valido di questa funzione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-3505">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-3506">Puntatore a **GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) non valido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-3506">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-3507">**GX_INVALID_SIZE** (0x23) dimensioni del blocco di controllo visualizzazione non valide</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-3507">**GX_INVALID_SIZE** (0x23) Invalid display control block size</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-3510">Esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-3510">Example</span></span>

```C
GX_DISPLAY my_display;

UINT my_driver_setup_callback(GX_DISPLAY *display)
{
    …
}

/* Create screen “my_display”. */

    my_driver_setup_callback, 320, 480);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS, the screen “my_display” has been created. */
```

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-3521">Valori restituiti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-3521">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-3525">Puntatore a **GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) non valido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-3525">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-3526">Consentito da</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-3526">Allowed From</span></span>

```C
{
    …
}

```

<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-3563">Questo servizio recupera la tabella della lingua dalla visualizzazione indicata.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-3563">This service retrieves the language table from the indicated display.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-3564">Questo servizio può essere usato da un'applicazione per modificare la tabella della lingua di visualizzazione, in fase di esecuzione, usando stringhe definite in modo dinamico.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-3564">This service can be used by an application to modify the display language table, at runtime, using dynamically defined strings.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-3565">Questa API è deprecata e supportata solo per le applicazioni che usano la tabella del linguaggio in stile obsoleto, ovvero il file di risorse generato da Studio viene generato per la versione della libreria precedente alla versione 5,6.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-3565">This API is deprecated and supported only for applications using the old style language table (i.e. the Studio generated resource file is generated for library version prior to version 5.6).</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-3566">Le nuove applicazioni devono usare gx_display_language_table_get_ext ().</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-3566">New applications should use gx_display_language_table_get_ext().</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-3610">Questo servizio è deprecato e le nuove applicazioni devono usare gx_display_language_table_set_ext ().</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-3610">This service is deprecated and new applications should use gx_display_language_table_set_ext().</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-3611">Questo servizio è supportato solo per la compatibilità con i file di risorse generati da studio che fanno riferimento a versioni della libreria precedenti alla versione 5,6.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-3611">This service is supported only for compatibility with Studio generated resources files targeting library versions prior to version 5.6.</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-3746">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-3746">Prototype</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-3758">Indice di lingua non valido **GX_NOT_FOUND** (0x09)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-3758">**GX_NOT_FOUND** (0x09) Invalid language index</span></span>

## <a name="gx_display_theme_install"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-3767">gx_display_theme_install</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-3767">gx_display_theme_install</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-3768">Installa i temi nella visualizzazione specificata</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-3768">Install themes to the specified display</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-3769">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-3769">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_display_theme_install(
    GX_DISPLAY *display, 
    GX_THEME *theme_table);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-3770">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-3770">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-3771">Questo servizio installa i temi nella visualizzazione specificata.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-3771">This service install themes to the specified display.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-3772">Questo servizio viene in genere richiamato dalla funzione di configurazione di visualizzazione generata da studio, ma può essere chiamato anche dal software dell'applicazione.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-3772">This service is normally invoked by the Studio generated display configuration function, but can also be called by the application software.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-3773">Parametri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-3773">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-3774">**Visualizza** Puntatore al blocco di controllo della visualizzazione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-3774">**display** Pointer to display control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-3775">**theme_table** Tabella del tema da installare</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-3775">**theme_table** Theme table to be installed</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-3776">Valori restituiti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-3776">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-3777">Tabella del tema installata correttamente **GX_SUCCESS** (0x00)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-3777">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successfully installed theme table</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-3778">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) chiamante non valido di questa funzione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-3778">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-3779">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) puntatore a tabella del tema non valido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-3779">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid theme table pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-3780">Visualizzazione di **GX_INVALID_DISPLAY** (0X1D) non valida</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-3780">**GX_INVALID_DISPLAY** (0x1D) Invalid display</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-3781">Consentito da</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-3781">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-3782">Inizializzazione e thread</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-3782">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-3783">Esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-3783">Example</span></span>

```C
GX_THEME theme_1;

&theme_table[1] = {
    &theme_1,
    …
}

/* Define resource tables. */
GX_COLOR color_table[32] = {…};
GX_FONT *font_table[32] = {…};
GX_PIXELMAP *pixelmap_table[32] = { … };

/* Define scroll appearance. */
GX_SCROLLBAR_APPEARANCE scroll_appearance;

memset(&scroll_appearance, 0, sizeof(GX_SCROLLBAR_APPEARANCE));

scroll_appearance.gx_scroll_width = 20;
scroll_appearance.gx_scroll_thumb_width = 18;
scroll_appearance.gx_scroll_thumb_color =
    GX_COLOR_ID_SCROLL_BUTTON;
scroll_appearance.gx_scroll_thumb_border_color =
    GX_COLOR_ID_SCROLL_BUTTON;
scroll_appearance.gx_scroll_button_color =
    GX_COLOR_ID_SCROLL_BUTTON;
scroll_appearance.gx_scroll_thumb_travel_min = 20;
scroll_appearance.gx_scroll_thumb_travel_max = 20;
scroll appearance.gx_scroll_thumb_border_style =
    GX_STYLE_BORDER_THIN;

theme_1.theme_color_table = color_table;
theme_1.theme_font_table = font_table;
theme_1.theme_pixlemap_table = pixelmap_table;
theme_1.theme_palette = GX_NULL;
theme_1.theme_vertical_scrollbar_appearance = scroll_appearance;
theme_1.theme_horizontal_scrollbar_appearance = scroll_appearance;
theme_1.theme_vertical_scroll_style = GX_SCROLLBAR_RELATIVE_THUMB;
theme_1.theme_horizontal_scroll_style =
    GX_SCROLLBAR_RELATIVE_THUMB;
theme_1.theme_color_table_size = 32;
theme_1.theme_font_table_size = 32;
theme_1.theme_pixelmap_table_size = 32;
theme_1.theme_palette_size = 0;

/* Install theme table. */
status = gx_display_theme_install(&my_display, theme_table);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the theme table has been installed. */
```

## <a name="gx_drop_list_close"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-3788">gx_drop_list_close</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-3788">gx_drop_list_close</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-3799">Consentito da</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-3799">Allowed From</span></span>


## <a name="gx_drop_list_create"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-3807">gx_drop_list_create</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-3807">gx_drop_list_create</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-3808">Creare un elenco a selezione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-3808">Create a drop list</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-3809">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-3809">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_drop_list_create(
    GX_DROP_LIST *drop_list, 
    GX_CONST
    GX_CHAR *name, 
    GX_WIDGET *parent,
    INT total_rows, 
    INT open_height,
    VOID (*callback)(GX_VERTICAL_LIST *, 
    GX_WIDGET *, INT),
    ULONG style, 
    USHORT drop_list_id,
    GX_CONST GX_RECTANGLE *size)
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-3810">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-3810">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-3811">Questo servizio crea un elenco di selezione.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-3811">This service creates a drop list.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-3812">Un elenco a discesa è una combinazione del widget elenco a discesa e un elenco verticale popup visualizzato quando l'elenco a discesa viene aperto.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-3812">A drop list is a combination of the drop list widget, and a popup vertical list that is displayed when the drop-list is opened.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-3813">L'elenco verticale popup viene creato automaticamente quando il widget elenco a discesa viene creato e visualizzato o nascosto quando si apre o si chiude il widget elenco a discesa, rispettivamente.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-3813">The popup vertical list is created automatically when the drop-list widget is created, and displayed or hidden when the drop-list widget is opened or closed, respectively.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-3814">Il widget Drop List supporta due pixelmaps associati.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-3814">The drop list widget supports two associated pixelmaps.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-3815">Il primo, descritto come "list wallpaper" nella visualizzazione proprietà di studio, è il Pixelmap di sfondo facoltativo visualizzato come sfondo dell'elenco verticale visualizzato quando viene aperto il widget elenco a discesa.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-3815">The first, described as “List Wallpaper” in the Studio properties view, is the optional wallpaper pixelmap that is displayed as the background of the vertical list that is displayed when the drop-list widget is opened.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-3816">Il secondo Pixelmap, descritto come "immagine di sfondo" nella visualizzazione delle proprietà di studio, è un'immagine facoltativa visualizzata come sfondo dell'elenco a discesa.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-3816">The second pixelmap, described as the “Background Image” in the Studio properties view, is an optional image displayed as the background of the drop-list itself.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-3817">Un widget Drop-List può avere (ma non è necessario) un widget figlio usato per aprire e chiudere l'elenco a discesa.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-3817">A drop-list widget can have (but is not required to have) a child widget that is used to open and close the drop list.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-3818">Si tratta abitualmente di un widget icona o pulsante, ma è possibile usare anche un widget personalizzato come interruttore di apertura/chiusura per l'elenco a selezione padre.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-3818">This is customarily an icon or button widget, but even a custom widget could be used as the open/close toggle for the parent drop list.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-3819">L'impostazione della chiave che consente a questo widget figlio di usare l'elenco a discesa è che questo widget figlio deve avere l'ID del widget predefinito ID_DROP_LIST_BUTTON.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-3819">The key setting which makes this child widget operate the drop list is that this child widget must have the pre-defined widget id ID_DROP_LIST_BUTTON.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-3820">Per definire un widget figlio che aprirà e chiuderà l'elenco a discesa, firstadd e il widget figlio nell'elenco a discesa, e posiziona l'elemento figlio all'interno dell'elenco a discesa nel modo desiderato:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-3820">To define a child widget which will open and close the drop-list, firstadd and child widget to the drop list, and position this child within the drop list as desired:</span></span>

![Screenshot dell'elenco a selezione.](./media/guix/image6.jpg)

<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-3822">Usare quindi la visualizzazione delle proprietà di studio per assegnare questo widget figlio al valore ID ID_DROP_LIST_BUTTON, ovvero un valore ID definito internamente riconosciuto dall'elenco a selezione padre:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-3822">Then use the Studio properties view to assign this child widget the ID value ID_DROP_LIST_BUTTON, which is an internally defined ID value recognized by the parent drop list:</span></span>

![Screenshot della visualizzazione delle proprietà di studio.](./media/guix/image7.jpg)

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-3824">Parametri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-3824">Parameters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-3825">**drop_list** Puntatore al blocco di controllo Drop List</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-3825">**drop_list** Pointer to the drop list control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-3826">**nome** Nome dell'elenco a selezione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-3826">**name** Name of the drop list</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-3827">**elemento padre** Puntatore al widget padre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-3827">**parent** Pointer to the parent widget</span></span>

```C
GX_DROP_LIST my_drop_list;
VOID list_row_create(GX_VERTICAL_LIST *list,

    …
}
```

## <a name="gx_drop_list_event_process"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-3849">gx_drop_list_event_process</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-3849">gx_drop_list_event_process</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-3850">Evento di eliminazione elenco processi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-3850">Process drop list event</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-3851">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-3851">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_drop_list_event_process(
    GX_DROP_LIST *list, 
    GX_EVENT *event);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-3852">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-3852">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-3853">Questo servizio elabora un evento per l'elenco a selezione.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-3853">This service processes an event for the drop list.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-3854">Parametri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-3854">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-3855">**drop_list** Blocco di controllo widget Drop List</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-3855">**drop_list** Drop list widget control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-3856">**evento** Puntatore a evento da elaborare</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-3856">**event** Pointer to event to process</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-3857">Valori restituiti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-3857">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-3858">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) ha elaborato l'evento Drop List</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-3858">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successfully processed drop list event</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-3859">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) chiamante non valido di questa funzione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-3859">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-3860">Puntatore a **GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) non valido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-3860">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-3861">Consentito da</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-3861">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-3862">Thread</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-3862">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-3863">Esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-3863">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Call generic drop list event processing as part of custom event processing function. */

UINT custom_drop_list_event_process(GX_DROP_LIST *drop_list,
    GX_EVENT *event)
{
    UINT status = GX_SUCCESS;

    switch(event->gx_event_type)
    {
    case xyz:
        /* Insert custom event handling here */
        break;
    default:
        /* Pass all other events to the default drop list
            event processing */
        status = gx_drop_list_event_process(drop_list, event);
        break;
    }
    return status;
}
```

## <a name="gx_drop_list_pixelmap_set"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-3890">gx_drop_list_pixelmap_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-3890">gx_drop_list_pixelmap_set</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-3891">Assegnare un'immagine di sfondo all'elenco a selezione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-3891">Assign a background image to the drop list</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-3892">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-3892">Prototype</span></span>

```C

    GX_DROP_LIST *drop_list,
    GX_RESOURCE_ID id);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-3893">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-3893">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-3894">Assegnare un'immagine di sfondo all'elenco a selezione.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-3894">Assign a background image to the drop list.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-3895">Questo Pixelmap viene usato come sfondo per il widget Drop List e non per l'elenco verticale popup visualizzato quando l'elenco è aperto.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-3895">This pixelmap is used as the background for the drop list widget itself, and not for the popup vertical list that is displayed when the list is opened.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-3896">Per assegnare un Pixelmap al popup dell'elenco a discesa, è necessario chiamare prima gx_drop_list_popup_get per recuperare un puntatore all'elenco popup, quindi usare gx_window_wallpaper_set () per assegnare un Pixelmap a questo elenco popup.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-3896">To assign a pixelmap to the drop-list popup, you would need to first call gx_drop_list_popup_get to retrieve a pointer to the popup list, and then use gx_window_wallpaper_set() to assign a pixelmap to this popup list.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-3897">Parametri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-3897">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-3898">**drop_list** Puntatore al blocco di controllo Drop List</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-3898">**drop_list** Pointer to the drop list control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-3899">ID risorsa **ID** per pixlemap</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-3899">**id** Resource ID to the pixlemap</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-3901">Set di Pixelmap per l'eliminazione di un elenco di **GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) completato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-3901">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful drop list pixelmap set</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-3902">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) chiamante non valido di questa funzione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-3902">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-3903">Puntatore a **GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) non valido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-3903">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-3904">ID pixlemap non valido **GX_INVALID_RESOURCE_ID** (0x33)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-3904">**GX_INVALID_RESOURCE_ID** (0x33) Invalid pixlemap ID</span></span>

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-3917">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-3917">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-3918">Un widget elenco a discesa è costituito dal widget elenco a discesa e da un elenco verticale popup visualizzato quando viene aperto il widget elenco a discesa.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-3918">A drop-list widget is composed of the drop-list widget itself, and a popup vertical list that is shown when the drop-list widget is opened.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-3919">Questo servizio recupera un puntatore al componente elenco verticale dell'elenco a selezione, consentendo all'applicazione di richiamare direttamente i servizi API in questo elenco verticale.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-3919">This service retrieves a pointer to the vertical list component of the drop list, allowing the application to invoke API services directly on this vertical list.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-3920">Parametri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-3920">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-3921">**drop_list** Puntatore al blocco di controllo Drop List</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-3921">**drop_list** Pointer to the drop list control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-3922">**return_list** Puntatore all'elenco verticale archiviato nell'elenco a selezione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-3922">**return_list** Pointer to the vertical list stored in the drop list</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-3923">Valori restituiti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-3923">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-3924">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) ha recuperato correttamente l'elenco verticale popup</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-3924">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successfully retrieved popup vertical list</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-3925">Puntatore a **GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) non valido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-3925">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-3926">Consentito da</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-3926">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-3927">Inizializzazione e thread</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-3927">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-3928">Esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-3928">Example</span></span>

```C
GX_DROP_LIST drop_list;
GX_VERTICAL_LIST *vertical_list;

/* Retrieve the popup list of “drop_list”. */
status = gx_drop_list_popup_get(&drop_list, &vertical_list)

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS, the popup list was successfully retrieved. */
```

## <a name="gx_horizontal_list_children_position"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-3934">gx_horizontal_list_children_position</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-3934">gx_horizontal_list_children_position</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-3936">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-3936">Prototype</span></span>

```C

```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-3937">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-3937">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-3938">Questa funzione posiziona gli elementi figlio per l'elenco orizzontale.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-3938">This function positions the children for the horizontal list.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-3939">Questa funzione viene chiamata automaticamente quando l'elenco riceve l'evento GX_EVENT_SHOW, ma deve essere chiamato direttamente se l'elenco viene modificato dopo che è stato reso visibile.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-3939">This function is called automatically when the list receives the GX_EVENT_SHOW event, but should be called directly if the list is modified after it has been made visible.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-3940">Parametri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-3940">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-3944">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) chiamante non valido di questa funzione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-3944">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-3945">Puntatore a **GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) non valido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-3945">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-3946">Consentito da</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-3946">Allowed From</span></span>

```C
/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the children in the horizontal list are positioned. */
```

## <a name="gx_horizontal_list_create"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-3957">gx_horizontal_list_create</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-3957">gx_horizontal_list_create</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-3958">Crea elenco orizzontale</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-3958">Create horizontal list</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-3959">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-3959">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_horizontal_list_create(
    GX_HORIZONTAL_LIST *horizontal_list,
    GX_CONST GX_CHAR *name, 
    GX_WIDGET *parent,
    INT total_columns,
    VOID (*callback)(GX_HORIZONTAL_LIST *, 
    GX_WIDGET *, INT),
    ULONG style, 
    USHORT horizontal_list_id,
    GX_CONST GX_RECTANGLE *size);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-3960">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-3960">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-3961">Questo servizio crea un elenco orizzontale.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-3961">This service creates a horizontal list.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-3962">Parametri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-3962">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-3963">**horizontal_list** Blocco di controllo widget Elenco orizzontale</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-3963">**horizontal_list** Horizontal list widget control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-3964">**nome** Nome dell'elenco orizzontale</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-3964">**name** Name of horizontal list</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-3965">**elemento padre** Puntatore al widget padre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-3965">**parent** Pointer to parent widget</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-3966">**total_columns** Numero totale di comumns nell'elenco orizzontale</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-3966">**total_columns** Total number of comumns in horizontal list</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-3967">**callback** di Si tratta di un puntatore a una funzione di callback fornita dall'applicazione.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-3967">**callback** This is a pointer to a callback function provided by the application.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-3968">La funzione di callback viene richiamata quando viene eseguito lo scorrimento dell'elenco orizzontale per creare le nuove voci di elenco visibili.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-3968">The callback function is invoked when the horizontal list is scrolled, to create the newly visible list items.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-3969">In questo modo l'elenco orizzontale può visualizzare qualsiasi tipo di widget definito dall'utente come elementi dell'elenco.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-3969">In this way the horizontal list can display any user-defined widget type as the list items.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-3970">**stile** Stile del widget ScrollBar.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-3970">**style** Style of scrollbar widget.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-3971">L' **Appendice D** contiene stili generali predefiniti per tutti i widget e per gli stili specifici dei widget.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-3971">**Appendix D** contains pre-defined general styles for all widgets as well as widget-specific styles.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-3972">**horizontal_list_id** ID dell'elenco orizzontale definito dall'applicazione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-3972">**horizontal_list_id** Application-defined ID of horizontal list</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-3973">**dimensioni** Dimensioni dell'elenco horitzonal</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-3973">**size** Dimensions of the horitzonal list</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-3974">Valori restituiti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-3974">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-3975">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) ha creato l'elenco orizzontale</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-3975">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successfully created the horizontal list</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-3976">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) chiamante non valido di questa funzione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-3976">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-3977">Puntatore a **GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) non valido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-3977">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-3978">Widget **GX_ALREADY_CREATED** (0x13) già creato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-3978">**GX_ALREADY_CREATED** (0x13) Widget already created</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-3979">**GX_INVALID_SIZE** (0x19) dimensioni del blocco di controllo widget non valide</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-3979">**GX_INVALID_SIZE** (0x19) Invalid widget control block size</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-3980">Numero di colonne **GX_INVALID_VALUE** (0x22) non valide</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-3980">**GX_INVALID_VALUE** (0x22) Number of columns not valid</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-3983">Esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-3983">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Create horizontal list “my_list” with 5 columns. */

    5, callback, GX_STYLE_WRAP, MY_LIST_ID, &size);
```
