## <a name="gx_horizontal_list_event_process"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-3992">gx_horizontal_list_event_process</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-3992">gx_horizontal_list_event_process</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-3993">Elabora evento elenco orizzontale</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-3993">Process horizontal list event</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-3994">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-3994">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_horizontal_list_event_process(
    GX_HORIZONTAL_LIST *list,
    GX_EVENT *event);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-3995">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-3995">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-3996">Questo servizio elabora un evento per l'elenco orizzontale.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-3996">This service processes an event for the horizontal list.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-3997">Parametri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-3997">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-3998">**elenco** di Blocco di controllo widget Elenco orizzontale</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-3998">**list** Horizontal list widget control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-3999">**evento** Puntatore a evento da elaborare</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-3999">**event** Pointer to event to process</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-4000">Valori restituiti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-4000">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-4001">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) ha elaborato un evento elenco orizzontale</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-4001">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successfully processed horizontal list event</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-4002">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) chiamante non valido di questa funzione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-4002">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-4003">Puntatore a **GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) non valido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-4003">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-4004">Consentito da</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-4004">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-4005">Inizializzazione e thread</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-4005">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-4006">Esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-4006">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Call generic horizontal list event processing as part of custom event processing function. */

UINT custom_list_event_process(
    GX_HORIZONTAL_LIST *list,
    GX_EVENT *event)
{
    UINT status = GX_SUCCESS;

    switch(event->gx_event_type)
    {
    case xyz:
        /* Insert custom event handling here */
        break;
    default:
        /* Pass all other events to the default horizontal
        list event processing */
        status =
        gx_horizontal_list_event_process(list, event);
        break;
    }
    return status;
}
```

```C
UINT gx_horizontal_list_page_index_set(
    GX_HORIZONTAL_LIST *list,
    INT *index);
```

<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-4019">Questo servizio imposta l'indice iniziale per l'elenco orizzontale.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-4019">This service sets the starting index for the horizontal list.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-4020">Parametri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-4020">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-4027">Valore di **GX_INVALID_VALUE** (0X22) non valido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-4027">**GX_INVALID_VALUE** (0x22) Invalid value</span></span>

## <a name="gx_horizontal_list_selected_index_get"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-4039">gx_horizontal_list_selected_index_get</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-4039">gx_horizontal_list_selected_index_get</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-4040">Ottenere l'indice di voce selezionato da un elenco orizzontale</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-4040">Get selected entry index from horizontal list</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-4041">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-4041">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_horizontal_list_selected_index_get(
    GX_horizobntal_LIST *horizontal_list,
    INT *return_index);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-4042">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-4042">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-4043">Questo servizio restituisce l'indice della voce di elenco selezionato dell'elenco orizzontale.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-4043">This service returns the selected list entry index of the horizontal list.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-4044">Parametri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-4044">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-4045">**horizontal_list** Blocco di controllo widget Elenco orizzontale</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-4045">**horizontal_list** Horizontal list widget control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-4046">**return_index** Destinazione per l'indice dell'elenco di restituzione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-4046">**return_index** Destination for return list index</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-4047">Valori restituiti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-4047">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-4048">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) ha ottenuto la voce dell'elenco orizzontale</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-4048">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful obtained the horizontal list entry</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-4049">Puntatore a **GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) non valido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-4049">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-4050">Consentito da</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-4050">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-4051">Inizializzazione e thread</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-4051">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-4052">Esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-4052">Example</span></span>

```C
INT current_index_entry;

/* Get the list entry at the current index of horizontal list “my_list”. */
status = gx_horizontal_list_selected_index_get(&my_list,
    &current_index_entry);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS, “current_index_entry” contains the current list selection index. */
```

<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-4062">Assegna la voce selezionata in un elenco orizzontale</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-4062">Assign the selected entry in a horizontal list</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-4063">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-4063">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_horizontal_list_selected_set(
    GX_HORIZONATAL_LIST *horizontal_list,
    INT index);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-4064">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-4064">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-4065">Questo servizio assegna la voce selezionata in un elenco orizzontale.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-4065">This service assigns the selected entry in a horizontal list.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-4066">Se necessario, l'elenco orizzontale scorrerà in modo da rendere visibile la voce selezionata.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-4066">If required, the horizontal list will scroll to make the selected entry visible.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-4067">Parametri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-4067">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-4068">**horizontal_list** Blocco di controllo widget Elenco orizzontale</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-4068">**horizontal_list** Horizontal list widget control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-4069">**Indice** di Posizione basata sull'indice della nuova voce dell'elenco</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-4069">**index** Index based position of new list entry</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-4070">Valori restituiti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-4070">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-4071">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) ha impostato correttamente la voce dell'elenco orizzontale</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-4071">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successfully set the horizontal list entry</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-4072">L'indice **GX_FAILURE** (0x10) non è compreso nell'intervallo valido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-4072">**GX_FAILURE** (0x10) Index is not in invalid range</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-4073">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) chiamante non valido di questa funzione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-4073">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-4074">Puntatore a **GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) non valido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-4074">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-4075">Widget **GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) non valido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-4075">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-4076">Consentito da</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-4076">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-4077">Inizializzazione e thread</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-4077">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-4078">Esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-4078">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Set the list entry of “my_list” to the child in line 12. */
status = gx_horizontal_list_selected_set(&my_list, 12);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS, the list entry of “my_list” has been successfully set to 12. */
```

## <a name="gx_horizontal_list_selected_widget_get"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-4087">gx_horizontal_list_selected_widget_get</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-4087">gx_horizontal_list_selected_widget_get</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-4088">Ottiene la voce selezionata dall'elenco orizzontale</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-4088">Get selected entry from horizontal list</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-4089">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-4089">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_horizontal_list_selected_widget_get(
    GX_horizobntal_LIST *horizontal_list,
    GX_WIDGET **return_list_entry);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-4090">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-4090">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-4091">Questo servizio restituisce la voce di elenco selezionata dell'elenco orizzontale.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-4091">This service returns the selected list entry of the horizontal list.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-4092">Si noti che se l'elenco orizzontale contiene più righe rispetto ai widget figlio e la voce selezionata è stata spostata dalla visualizzazione, questa API restituirà GX_NULL perché i widget figlio vengono riusati quando viene eseguito lo scorrimento del contenuto dell'elenco.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-4092">Note that if the horizontal list has more rows than child widgets, and the selected entry has been scrolled from view, this API will return GX_NULL because the child widgets are re-used as the list content is scrolled.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-4093">La funzione gx_horizontal_list_selected_index_get restituirà in modo affidabile l'indice dell'elemento selezionato, anche se tale elemento è stato spostato dalla visualizzazione.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-4093">The gx_horizontal_list_selected_index_get function will reliably return the index of the selected item, even if that item has been scrolled from view.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-4094">Parametri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-4094">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-4095">**horizontal_list** Blocco di controllo widget Elenco orizzontale</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-4095">**horizontal_list** Horizontal list widget control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-4096">**return_list_entry** Destinazione per il widget voce elenco restituito</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-4096">**return_list_entry** Destination for return list entry widget</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-4097">Valori restituiti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-4097">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-4098">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) ha ottenuto la voce dell'elenco orizzontale</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-4098">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful obtained the horizontal list entry</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-4099">Il widget selezionato **GX_FAILURE** (0x10) è stato spostato dalla visualizzazione in un elenco con più righe rispetto agli elementi figlio del client.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-4099">**GX_FAILURE** (0x10) Selected widget has been scrolled from view in a list with more rows than client children.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-4100">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) chiamante non valido di questa funzione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-4100">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-4101">Puntatore a **GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) non valido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-4101">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-4102">Consentito da</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-4102">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-4103">Inizializzazione e thread</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-4103">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-4104">Esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-4104">Example</span></span>


## <a name="gx_horizontal_scrollbar_create"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-4137">gx_horizontal_scrollbar_create</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-4137">gx_horizontal_scrollbar_create</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-4138">Crea barra di scorrimento orizzontale</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-4138">Create horizontal scrollbar</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-4139">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-4139">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_horizontal_scrollbar_create(
    GX_SCROLLBAR *scrollbar,
    GX_CONST GX_CHAR *name,
    GX_WINDOW *parent,
    GX_SCROLLBAR_APPEARANCE *appearance ULONG style);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-4140">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-4140">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-4141">Questo servizio crea una barra di scorrimento orizzontale.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-4141">This service creates a horizontal scrollbar.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-4142">L'ID di una barra di scorrimento orizzontale è predefinito (perché una finestra deve essere in grado di intercettare gli eventi) e la dimensione è automatica (perché deve riempire la larghezza client della finestra padre).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-4142">The ID for a horizontal scrollbar is pre-defined (because a window has to know how to catch events from it), and the size is automatic (because it has to fill the parent window’s client width).</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-4143">Se si decide di consentire le barre di scorrimento dell'area client, è necessario aggiungere un'altra funzione create con i parametri ID e size.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-4143">If we decide to allow client area scrollbars, we will need to add another create function with the id and size parameters.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-4144">Parametri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-4144">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-4145">**barra di scorrimento** Blocco di controllo widget ScrollBar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-4145">**scrollbar** Scrollbar widget control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-4146">**nome** Nome della barra di scorrimento</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-4146">**name** Name of scrollbar</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-4147">**elemento padre** Puntatore al widget padre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-4147">**parent** Pointer to parent widget</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-4148">**aspetto** La struttura di aspetto definisce l'aspetto della barra di scorrimento.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-4148">**appearance** The appearance structure defines the appearance of the scroll bar.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-4149">Se questo valore è GX_NULL, la barra di scorrimento utilizzerà l'aspetto predefinito della barra di scorrimento definito da gx_system_scroll_appearance_get.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-4149">If this value is GX_NULL, the scrollbar will use the default scrollbar appearance defined by gx_system_scroll_appearance_get.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-4150">Fare riferimento all' **appendice i** per la definizione della struttura GX_SCROLLBAR_APPEARANCE.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-4150">Refer to **Appendix I** for the definition of the GX_SCROLLBAR_APPEARANCE structure.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-4151">**Stile** Stile del widget ScrollBar.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-4151">**Style** Style of scrollbar widget.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-4152">L' **Appendice D** contiene stili generali predefiniti per tutti i widget e per gli stili specifici dei widget.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-4152">**Appendix D** contains pre- defined general styles for all widgets as well as widget-specific styles.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-4153">Valori restituiti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-4153">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-4154">Creazione barra di scorrimento orizzontale **GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) riuscita</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-4154">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful horizontal scrollbar create</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-4155">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) chiamante non valido di questa funzione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-4155">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-4156">Puntatore a **GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) non valido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-4156">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-4157">Widget **GX_ALREADY_CREATED** (0x13) già creato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-4157">**GX_ALREADY_CREATED** (0x13) Widget already created</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-4158">**GX_INVALID_SIZE** (0x19) dimensioni del blocco di controllo widget non valide</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-4158">**GX_INVALID_SIZE** (0x19) Invalid widget control block size</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-4159">Consentito da</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-4159">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-4160">Inizializzazione e thread</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-4160">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-4161">Esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-4161">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Create horizontal scrollbar “my_scrollbar”. */
status = gx_horizontal_scrollbar_create(&my_scrollbar,
    “my_horizontal_scrollbar”, &my_parent, GX_NULL,
    GX_STYLE_SCROLLBAR_END_BUTTONS);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the horizontal scrollbar “my_scrollbar” has been created. */
```

## <a name="gx_icon_button_create"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-4168">gx_icon_button_create</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-4168">gx_icon_button_create</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-4169">Pulsante Crea icona</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-4169">Create icon button</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-4170">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-4170">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_icon_button_create(
    GX_ICON_BUTTON *button,
    GX_CONST GX_CHAR *name, 
    GX_WIDGET *parent,
    GX_RESOURCE_ID icon_id,
    ULONG style,
    USHORT icon_button_id,
    GX_CONST GX_RECTANGLE *size);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-4171">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-4171">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-4172">Questo servizio crea il widget del pulsante dell'icona specificato.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-4172">This service creates the specified icon button widget.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-4173">GX_ICON_BUTTON deriva da GX_BUTTON e supporta tutti i servizi API gx_button.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-4173">GX_ICON_BUTTON is derived from GX_BUTTON and supports all gx_button API services.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-4174">Parametri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-4174">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-4175">**pulsante** Puntatore al blocco di controllo pulsante icona</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-4175">**button** Pointer to icon button control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-4176">**nome** Nome logico del widget del pulsante icona</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-4176">**name** Logical name of icon button widget</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-4177">**elemento padre** Puntatore al widget padre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-4177">**parent** Pointer to the parent widget</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-4178">**icon_id** ID risorsa dell'icona</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-4178">**icon_id** Resource ID of icon</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-4179">**stile** Stile dell'icona.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-4179">**style** Style of icon.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-4180">L' **Appendice D** contiene stili generali predefiniti per tutti i widget e per gli stili specifici dei widget.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-4180">**Appendix D** contains pre-defined general styles for all widgets as well as widget-specific styles.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-4181">**icon_button_id** Pulsante icona con ID definito dall'applicazione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-4181">**icon_button_id** Application-defined ID of icon button</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-4182">**dimensioni** Dimensioni del pulsante icona</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-4182">**size** Dimensions of icon button</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-4183">Valori restituiti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-4183">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-4184">Pulsante icona per la creazione di **GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) completata</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-4184">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successfully created icon button</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-4185">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) chiamante non valido di questa funzione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-4185">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-4186">Puntatore a **GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) non valido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-4186">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-4187">Widget **GX_ALREADY_CREATED** (0x13) già creato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-4187">**GX_ALREADY_CREATED** (0x13) Widget already created</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-4188">**GX_INVALID_SIZE** (0x19) dimensioni del blocco di controllo widget non valide</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-4188">**GX_INVALID_SIZE** (0x19) Invalid widget control block size</span></span>

## <a name="gx_icon_button_draw"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-4208">gx_icon_button_draw</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-4208">gx_icon_button_draw</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-4209">Pulsante icona per la visualizzazione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-4209">Draw an icon button</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-4210">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-4210">Prototype</span></span>

```C
VOID gx_icon_button_draw(GX_ICON_BUTTON *button);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-4211">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-4211">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-4212">Questo servizio disegna il pulsante dell'icona.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-4212">This service draws the icon button.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-4213">Questa funzione viene in genere chiamata internamente da GUIX come parte di un'operazione di aggiornamento Canvas, ma è esposta anche all'applicazione che potrebbe voler fornire una funzione di disegno personalizzata e richiamare il disegno pulsante icona predefinito come base di disegno personalizzato.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-4213">This function is normally called internally by GUIX as part of a canvas refresh operation, but it also exposed to the application that might want to provide a custom drawing function and invoke the default icon button drawing as custom drawing base.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-4214">Parametri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-4214">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-4215">**pulsante** Puntatore al blocco di controllo pulsante icona</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-4215">**button** Pointer to icon button control block</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-4216">Valori restituiti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-4216">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-4217">**Nessuno**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-4217">**None**</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-4218">Consentito da</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-4218">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-4219">Thread</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-4219">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-4220">Esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-4220">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Write a custom icon draw function. */
void MyIconButtonDraw(GX_ICON_BUTTON *button)
{
    /* Do the normal drawing first */
    gx_icon_button_draw(button);

    /* Add custom drawing here */
}
```

## <a name="gx_icon_button_pixelmap_set"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-4237">gx_icon_button_pixelmap_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-4237">gx_icon_button_pixelmap_set</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-4238">Impostare Pixelmap sul widget pulsante icona</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-4238">Set pixelmap to the icon button widget</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-4239">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-4239">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_icon_button_pixelmap_set(
    GX_ICON_BUTTON *button,
    GX_RESOURCE_ID icon_id);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-4240">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-4240">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-4241">Questo servizio assegna un nuovo Pixelmap al widget pulsante icona.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-4241">This service assigns a new pixelmap to the icon button widget.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-4242">Parametri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-4242">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-4243">**pulsante** Puntatore al blocco di controllo pulsante icona</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-4243">**button** Pointer to icon button control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-4244">**icon_id** ID risorsa di pixelmap</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-4244">**icon_id** Resource ID of pixelmap</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-4245">Valori restituiti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-4245">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-4246">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) ha impostato correttamente il pulsante icona pixelmap</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-4246">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successfully set icon button pixelmap</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-4247">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) chiamante non valido di questa funzione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-4247">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-4248">Puntatore a **GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) non valido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-4248">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-4249">Consentito da</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-4249">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-4250">Inizializzazione e thread</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-4250">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-4251">Esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-4251">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Set pixelmap for “my_icon_button”. */
status = gx_icon_button_pixelmap_set(&my_icon_button,
    GX_PIXELMAP_ID_ICON);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS, the pixelmap of the icon button “my_icon_button” has been set. */
```

## <a name="gx_icon_background_draw"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-4268">gx_icon_background_draw</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-4268">gx_icon_background_draw</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-4269">Sfondo icona di estrazione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-4269">Draw icon background</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-4270">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-4270">Prototype</span></span>

```C
VOID gx_icon_background_draw(GX_ICON *icon);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-4271">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-4271">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-4272">Questo servizio disegna lo sfondo del widget icona specificato.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-4272">This service draws background of the specified icon widget.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-4273">Questo servizio viene in genere chiamato internamente dalla funzione gx_icon_button_draw, ma viene esposto all'applicazione per facilitare la scrittura di funzioni di disegno personalizzate.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-4273">This service is normally called internally by the gx_icon_button_draw function, but is exposed to the application to assist in writing custom drawing functions.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-4274">Parametri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-4274">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-4275">**icona** di Puntatore al blocco di controllo widget icona</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-4275">**icon** Pointer to icon widget control block</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-4276">Valori restituiti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-4276">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-4277">**Nessuno**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-4277">**None**</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-4278">Consentito da</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-4278">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-4279">Inizializzazione e thread</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-4279">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-4280">Esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-4280">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Write a custom icon draw function. */
void MyIconButtonDraw(GX_ICON *icon)
{
    /* Call icon background draw. */
    gx_icon_background_draw(icon);

    /* Add custom drawing here */

    /* Draw child widgets. */
    gx_widget_children_draw(icon);
}
```

## <a name="gx_icon_create"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-4286">gx_icon_create</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-4286">gx_icon_create</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-4287">Icona Crea</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-4287">Create icon</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-4288">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-4288">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_icon_create(
    GX_ICON *icon, 
    GX_CONST GX_CHAR *name,
    GX_WIDGET *parent,
    GX_RESOURCE_ID pixelmap_id, 
    ULONG style,
    USHORT icon_id, 
    GX_VALUE x, 
    GX_VALUE y);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-4289">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-4289">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-4290">Questo servizio crea il widget icona specificato.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-4290">This service creates the specified icon widget.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-4291">Parametri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-4291">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-4292">**icona** di Puntatore al blocco di controllo icona</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-4292">**icon** Pointer to icon control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-4293">**nome** Nome logico del widget icona</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-4293">**name** Logical name of icon widget</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-4294">**elemento padre** Puntatore al widget padre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-4294">**parent** Pointer to the parent widget</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-4295">**pixelmap_id** ID risorsa di pixelmap</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-4295">**pixelmap_id** Resource ID of pixelmap</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-4296">**stile** Stile icona</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-4296">**style** Style of icon</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-4297">**icon_id** ID icona definito dall'applicazione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-4297">**icon_id** Application-defined ID of icon</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-4298">**x** inizio posizione della coordinata x</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-4298">**x** Starting x-coordinate position</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-4299">**y** -inizio posizione della coordinata y</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-4299">**y** Starting y-coordinate position</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-4300">Valori restituiti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-4300">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-4301">Creazione icona di **GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) riuscita</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-4301">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful icon create</span></span>

## <a name="gx_icon_draw"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-4313">gx_icon_draw</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-4313">gx_icon_draw</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-4314">Icona di estrazione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-4314">Draw icon</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-4315">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-4315">Prototype</span></span>

```C
VOID gx_icon_draw(GX_ICON *icon);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-4316">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-4316">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-4317">Questo servizio disegna il widget icona specificato.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-4317">This service draws the specified icon widget.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-4318">Questo servizio viene in genere chiamato internamente da GUIX come parte di un'operazione di aggiornamento Canvas, ma è esposto anche all'applicazione che potrebbe voler fornire una funzione di disegno personalizzata e richiamare il disegno dell'icona predefinito come base di disegno personalizzata.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-4318">This service is normally called internally by GUIX as part of a canvas refresh operation, but it also exposed to the application that might want to provide a custom drawing function and invoke the default icon drawing as custom drawing base.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-4319">Parametri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-4319">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-4320">**icona** di Puntatore al blocco di controllo widget icona</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-4320">**icon** Pointer to icon widget control block</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-4321">Valori restituiti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-4321">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-4322">**Nessuno**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-4322">**None**</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-4323">Consentito da</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-4323">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-4324">Thread</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-4324">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-4325">Esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-4325">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Write a custom icon drawing function. */

VOID my_icon_draw(GX_MENU *menu)
{
    /* Call default icon draw. */
    gx_icon_draw(menu);

    /* Add your own drawing here. */
}
```

## <a name="gx_icon_event_process"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-4330">gx_icon_event_process</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-4330">gx_icon_event_process</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-4331">Icona elaborazione eventi widget</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-4331">Icon widget event processing</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-4332">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-4332">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_icon_event_process(
    GX_ICON *icon, 
    GX_EVENT *event_ptr);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-4333">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-4333">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-4334">Questo servizio gestisce gli eventi inviati a un widget GX_ICON.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-4334">This service handles events sent to a GX_ICON widget.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-4335">Parametri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-4335">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-4336">**icona** di Puntatore al blocco di controllo widget icona</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-4336">**icon** Pointer to icon widget control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-4337">**event_ptr** Puntatore alla struttura GX_EVENT</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-4337">**event_ptr** Pointer to GX_EVENT structure</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-4338">Valori restituiti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-4338">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-4339">Evento icona elaborata **GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) riuscita</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-4339">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful processed icon event</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-4340">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) chiamante non valido di questa funzione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-4340">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-4341">Puntatore a **GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) non valido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-4341">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-4342">Consentito da</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-4342">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-4343">Thread</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-4343">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-4344">Esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-4344">Example</span></span>

```C
switch(event_ptr->gx_event_type)
{
case GX_EVENT_SHOW:
    /* Do default handling. */
    status = gx_icon_event_process(icon, event_ptr);

    /* add your own handling here */
    break;
}
```

## <a name="gx_image_reader_create"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-4369">gx_image_reader_create</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-4369">gx_image_reader_create</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-4370">Crea istanza del modulo di lettura immagine</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-4370">Create image reader module instance</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-4371">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-4371">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_image_reader_create(
    GX_IMAGE_READER *image_reader,
    GX_CONST GX_UBYTE *data, 
    INT data_size,
    GX_UBYTE color_format, 
    GX_UBYTE mode);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-4372">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-4372">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-4373">Questa funzione crea un lettore/decodificatore di immagini RAW in fase di esecuzione.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-4373">This function creates a runtime raw image reader / decoder.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-4374">Attualmente sono supportati solo i tipi di immagine RAW JPEG e PNG.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-4374">Currently only jpeg and png raw image types are supported.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-4375">Questo servizio richiede la definizione di GX_SOFTWARE_DECODER_SUPPORT.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-4375">This service requires GX_SOFTWARE_DECODER_SUPPORT to be defined.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-4376">Parametri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-4376">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-4377">**image_reader** Blocco di controllo lettore immagini</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-4377">**image_reader** Image reader control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-4378">**dati** di Puntatore a dati di input non elaborati.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-4378">**data** Pointer to raw input data.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-4379">**DATA_SIZE** Dimensione dei dati di input non elaborati.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-4379">**data_size** Size of raw input data.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-4380">**color_format** Formato del colore di output richiesto.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-4380">**color_format** The requested output color format.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-4381">**modalità** Flag per comprimere, dithering e modalità alfa.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-4381">**mode** Compress, dither and alpha modes flags.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-4382">Valori restituiti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-4382">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-4383">Creazione lettore immagini riuscita **GX_SUCCESS** (0x00)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-4383">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful image reader create</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-4384">Puntatore a **GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) non valido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-4384">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-4385">Dimensioni dati non valide **GX_INVALID_VALUE** (0x22)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-4385">**GX_INVALID_VALUE** (0x22) Invalid data size</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-4386">Consentito da</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-4386">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-4387">Inizializzazione e thread</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-4387">Initialization and Threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-4388">Esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-4388">Example</span></span>

```C
GX_IMAGE_READER my_image_reader;

“color format” could be set to:
    GX_COLOR_FORMAT_32ARGB
    GX_COLOR_FORMAT_24RGB
    GX_COLOR_FORMAT_565RGB
    GX_COLOR_FORMAT_8BIT_PALETTE

/* Create image reader “my_image_reader”. */
status = gx_image_reader_create(&my_image_reader, decoder_data,
    decoder_data_size,
    GX_COLOR_FORMAT_32ARGB,
    GX_IMAGE_READER_MODE_COMPRESS)

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS, “my_image_reader” has been successfully created. */
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-4415">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-4415">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-4416">Questo servizio decodifica un'immagine non elaborata in un formato di colore specificato.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-4416">This service decodes a raw image to a specified color format.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-4417">Attualmente sono supportati solo i tipi di immagine RAW JPEG e PNG.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-4417">Currently only jpeg and png raw image types are supported.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-4418">Questa operazione richiede la definizione di GX_SOFTWARE_DECODER_SUPPORT.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-4418">This requires GX_SOFTWARE_DECODER_SUPPORT to be defined.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-4419">Parametri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-4419">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-4421">**Pixelmap** Pixelmap di output</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-4421">**pixelmap** Output pixelmap</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-4424">L'allocatore di memoria **GX_SYSTEM_MEMORY_ERROR** (0x30) non è definito o l'allocazione della memoria non è riuscita</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-4424">**GX_SYSTEM_MEMORY_ERROR** (0x30) Memory allocator is not defined or memory allocation failed</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-4425">Il tipo di immagine di input **GX_NOT_SUPPORTED** (0x28) o il formato del colore di output non è supportato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-4425">**GX_NOT_SUPPORTED** (0x28) Input image type or output color format is not supported</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-4430">Esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-4430">Example</span></span>

## <a name="gx_line_chart_axis_draw"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-4434">gx_line_chart_axis_draw</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-4434">gx_line_chart_axis_draw</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-4435">Traccia grafico a linee x, asse y</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-4435">Draw line chart x,y axis</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-4436">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-4436">Prototype</span></span>

```C
VOID gx_line_chart_axis_draw(GX_LINE_CHART *chart);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-4437">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-4437">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-4438">Questo servizio disegna l'asse x, y di un grafico a linee.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-4438">This service draws the x,y axis of a line chart.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-4439">I colori dell'asse e i parametri della lunghezza della linea vengono recuperati dalla struttura delle informazioni del grafico a linee.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-4439">The axis colors and line width parameters are retrieved from the line chart information structure.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-4440">Questo servizio viene in genere chiamato internamente dalla funzione gx_line_chart_draw, ma viene esposto all'applicazione per facilitare la scrittura di funzioni di disegno personalizzate.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-4440">This service is normally called internally by the gx_line_chart_draw function, but is exposed to the application to assist in writing custom drawing functions.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-4441">Parametri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-4441">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-4442">**grafico** Blocco di controllo grafico a linee.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-4442">**chart** Line chart control block.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-4443">Valori restituiti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-4443">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-4444">**Nessuno**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-4444">**None**</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-4445">Consentito da</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-4445">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-4446">Thread</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-4446">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-4447">Esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-4447">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Write a custom chart drawing function. */

VOID my_chart_draw(GX_LINE_CHART *chart)
{
    /* Call default window draw. */
    gx_window_draw((GX_WINDOW *)chart);

    /* Draw the line chart axis. */
    gx_line_chart_axis_draw(&chart->gx_line_chart_info);

    /* Draw the data line */
    gx_line_chart_data_draw(&chart->gx_line_chart_info);

    /* Add your own drawing here. */
}
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-4457">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-4457">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-4458">Questo servizio crea una finestra del grafico a linee.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-4458">This service creates a line chart window.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-4459">I parametri di disegno e i dati del grafico vengono passati tramite la struttura del GX_LINE_CHART_INFO.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-4459">The chart drawing parameters and chart data are passed in via the GX_LINE_CHART_INFO structure.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-4460">GX_LINE_CHART si basa su GX_WINDOW e supporta tutte le API di GX_WINDOW.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-4460">GX_LINE_CHART is based on GX_WINDOW, and supports all of the GX_WINDOW APIs.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-4462">**grafico** Puntatore al blocco di controllo GX_LINE_CHART.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-4462">**chart** Pointer to the GX_LINE_CHART control block.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-4463">**nome** Nome grafico a linee facoltativo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-4463">**name** Optional line chart name</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-4464">**elemento padre** Widget padre o GX_NULL</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-4464">**parent** Parent widget, or GX_NULL</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-4465">**informazioni** su Struttura che definisce i parametri di disegno del grafico a linee.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-4465">**info** Structure defining line chart drawing parameters.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-4466">**Appendice I** contiene la definizione per GX_LINE_CHART_INFO struttura.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-4466">**Appendix I** contains definition to GX_LINE_CHART_INFO structure.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-4467">**stile** Flag di stile del widget</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-4467">**style** Widget style flags</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-4468">**chart_id** Valore ID logico grafico</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-4468">**chart_id** Chart logical ID value</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-4469">**dimensioni** Rettangolo di delimitazione della finestra grafico</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-4469">**size** Chart window bounding rectangle</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-4470">Valori restituiti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-4470">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-4471">Creazione di un grafico a linee **GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) riuscita</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-4471">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful line chart create</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-4472">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) chiamante non valido di questa funzione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-4472">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-4473">Puntatore a **GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) non valido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-4473">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-4474">**GX_INVALID_SIZE** (0x19) dimensioni del blocco di controllo widget non valide</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-4474">**GX_INVALID_SIZE** (0x19) Invalid widget control block size</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-4475">Widget **GX_ALREADY_CREATED** (0x13) già creato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-4475">**GX_ALREADY_CREATED** (0x13) Widget already created</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-4476">Consentito da</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-4476">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-4477">Inizializzazione e thread</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-4477">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-4478">Esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-4478">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Create a line chart */
GX_LINE_CHART chart;
GX_RECTANGLE chart_size;
GX_LINE_CHART_INFO gx_chart_info;
GX_WINDOW_ROOT *root_window;

chart_size = root_window->gx_widget_size;

/* Initialize params for the GUIX base chart. */
gx_chart_info.gx_line_chart_min_val = DATA_MIN_VAL;
gx_chart_info.gx_line_chart_max_val = DATA_MAX_VAL;
gx_chart_info.gx_line_chart_max_data_count = MAX_DATA_COUNT;
gx_chart_info.gx_line_chart_active_data_count = 0;
gx_chart_info.gx_line_chart_axis_line_width = AXIS_LINE_WIDTH;
gx_chart_info.gx_line_chart_data_line_width = DATA_LINE_WIDTH;
gx_chart_info.gx_line_chart_data = chart_data;
gx_chart_info.gx_line_chart_line_color = GX_COLOR_ID_DATA_LINE;
gx_chart_info.gx_line_chart_axis_color = GX_COLOR_ID_AXIS_LINE;

/* Leave room for labels on bottom and right. */
gx_chart_info.gx_line_chart_left_margin = 0;
gx_chart_info.gx_line_chart_top_margin = 0;
gx_chart_info.gx_line_chart_right_margin = 80;
gx_chart_info.gx_line_chart_bottom_margin = 32;

status = gx_line_chart_create(&chart, “Line Chart”, root_window,
    &gx_chart_info, GX_STYLE_NONE, &chart_size);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS, the “chart” has been successfully created. */
```

## <a name="gx_line_chart_data_draw"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-4485">gx_line_chart_data_draw</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-4485">gx_line_chart_data_draw</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-4486">Traccia linea dati grafico a linee</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-4486">Draw line chart data line</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-4487">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-4487">Prototype</span></span>

```C
VOID gx_line_chart_data_draw(GX_LINE_CHART *chart);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-4488">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-4488">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-4489">Questo servizio disegna la linea dati del grafico a linee.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-4489">This service draws the line chart data line.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-4490">I colori di linea e i parametri di lunghezza riga vengono recuperati dalla struttura delle informazioni del grafico a linee.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-4490">The line colors and line width parameters are retrieved from the line chart information structure.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-4491">Questo servizio viene in genere chiamato internamente dalla funzione gx_line_chart_draw, ma viene esposto all'applicazione per facilitare la scrittura di funzioni di disegno personalizzate.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-4491">This service is normally called internally by the gx_line_chart_draw function, but is exposed to the application to assist in writing custom drawing functions.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-4492">Parametri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-4492">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-4493">**grafico** Blocco di controllo grafico a linee</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-4493">**chart** Line chart control block</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-4494">Valori restituiti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-4494">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-4495">**Nessuno**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-4495">**None**</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-4496">Consentito da</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-4496">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-4497">Thread</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-4497">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-4498">Esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-4498">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Write a custom chart drawing function. */

VOID my_chart_draw(GX_LINE_CHART *chart)
{
    /* Call default window draw. */
    gx_window_draw((GX_WINDOW *)chart);

    /* Draw the line chart axis. */
    gx_line_chart_axis_draw(chart);

    /* Draw the data line. */
    gx_line_chart_data_draw(chart);

    /* Add your own drawing here. */
}
```

## <a name="gx_line_chart_draw"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-4504">gx_line_chart_draw</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-4504">gx_line_chart_draw</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-4505">Tracciare il grafico a linee</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-4505">Draw the line chart</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-4506">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-4506">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_line_chart_draw(GX_LINE_CHART *chart);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-4507">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-4507">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-4508">Si tratta della funzione predefinita di disegno del grafico a linee, che consente di disegnare l'asse e la linea di dati del grafico.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-4508">This is the default line chart drawing function, which draws the chart axis and data line.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-4509">Le applicazioni in genere forniscono una funzione di disegno personalizzata per sostituire il disegno predefinito per aggiungere elementi quali tickmarks, scale o altre informazioni all'asse del grafico e alla linea dati disegnata dal widget grafico a linee di base.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-4509">Applications usually provide a custom drawing function to replace the default drawing to add things such as tickmarks, scale, or other information to the chart axis and data line drawn by the base line chart widget.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-4510">Parametri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-4510">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-4511">**grafico** Puntatore al blocco di controllo grafico a linee.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-4511">**chart** Pointer to the line chart control block.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-4512">Valori restituiti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-4512">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-4513">**Nessuno**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-4513">**None**</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-4514">Consentito da</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-4514">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-4515">Thread</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-4515">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-4516">Esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-4516">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Write a custom chart drawing function. */

VOID my_chart_draw(GX_LINE_CHART *chart)
{
    /* Call default line chart draw. */
    gx_line_chart_draw(chart);

    /* Add your own drawing here. */
}
```

## <a name="gx_line_chart_update"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-4522">gx_line_chart_update</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-4522">gx_line_chart_update</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-4523">Aggiornare la linea dati del grafico a linee</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-4523">Update line chart data line</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-4524">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-4524">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_line_chart_update(
    GX_LINE_CHART *chart, 
    INT *data,
    INT data_count)
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-4525">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-4525">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-4526">Questo servizio aggiorna la matrice di dati tracciata dalla finestra del grafico a linee e impone il ridisegno della finestra.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-4526">This service updates the data array plotted by the line chart window, and forces the window to redraw.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-4527">Parametri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-4527">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-4528">**grafico** Blocco di controllo grafico a linee</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-4528">**chart** Line chart control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-4529">**dati** di Matrice di dati da tracciare</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-4529">**data** Data array to be plotted</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-4530">**data_count** Dimensioni della matrice di dati</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-4530">**data_count** Size of the data array</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-4531">Valori restituiti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-4531">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-4532">Creazione pulsante di testo **GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) riuscita</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-4532">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful text button create</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-4533">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) chiamante non valido di questa funzione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-4533">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-4534">Puntatore a **GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) non valido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-4534">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-4535">Consentito da</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-4535">Allowed From</span></span>

```C
INT chart_data[100];
GX_LINE_CHART chart;

/* Update the data array associated with “chart”. */

```

## <a name="gx_line_chart_y_scale_calculate"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-4543">gx_line_chart_y_scale_calculate</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-4543">gx_line_chart_y_scale_calculate</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-4544">Calcolare il valore di scala dell'asse y a virgola fissa</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-4544">Calculate fixed-point y axis scaling value</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-4545">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-4545">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_line_chart_y_scale_calculate(
    GX_LINE_CHART *chart,
    INT *return_val);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-4546">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-4546">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-4547">Questo servizio calcola il valore di scala a virgola fissa utilizzato per tracciare i valori dei dati sull'asse Y del grafico.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-4547">This service calculates the fixed-point scaling value used to plot data values on the chart Y axis.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-4548">Per calcolare il valore di ridimensionamento vengono utilizzati i parametri chart_info e il rettangolo di delimitazione dei grafici.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-4548">The chart_info parameters and chart bounding rectangle are used to calculate this scaling value.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-4549">Parametri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-4549">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-4550">**grafico** Blocco di controllo grafico a linee</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-4550">**chart** Line chart control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-4551">**return_val** Indirizzo del valore che deve essere in possesso del valore restituito a virgola fissa.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-4551">**return_val** Address of value to hold fixed-point return value.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-4552">Valori restituiti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-4552">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-4553">Calcolo valore scala y riuscita **GX_SUCCESS** (0x00)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-4553">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful y scale value calculate</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-4554">Puntatore a **GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) non valido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-4554">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-4555">Consentito da</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-4555">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-4556">Inizializzazione e thread</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-4556">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-4557">Esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-4557">Example</span></span>

```C
GX_LINE_CHART chart;
INT y_scale;

/* Caluclate y scale value of “chart”. */
status = gx_line_chart_y_scale_calculate(&chart, &y_scale);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS, y scale value of “chart” has been calculated. */
```

## <a name="gx_menu_create"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-4563">gx_menu_create</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-4563">gx_menu_create</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-4564">Creazione di un menu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-4564">Create a menu</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-4565">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-4565">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_menu_create(
    GX_MENU *menu,GX_CONST GX_CHAR *name,
    GX_WIDGET *parent, 
    GX_RESOURCE_ID text_id,
    GX_RESOURCE_ID fill_id, 
    ULONG style, 
    USHORT menu_id, 
    GX_CONST GX_RECTANGLE *size);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-4566">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-4566">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-4567">Questo servizio crea un menu come specificato e associa il menu al widget padre fornito.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-4567">This service creates a menu as specified and associates the menu with the supplied parent widget.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-4568">Accetta tutti i tipi di widget come voce di menu figlio.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-4568">It accepts all types of widget as child menu item.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-4569">Per inserire un widget come una voce di menu figlio, chiamare **gx_menu_insert**.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-4569">To insert a widget as a child menu item, call **gx_menu_insert**.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-4570">GX_MENU deriva da GX_PIXELMAP_PROMPT e supporta tutti i servizi API gx_pixelmap_prompt.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-4570">GX_MENU is derived from GX_PIXELMAP_PROMPT and supports all gx_pixelmap_prompt API services.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-4571">Parametri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-4571">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-4572">**menu** di Puntatore a blocco di controllo menu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-4572">**menu** Pointer to menu control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-4573">**nome** Nome del menu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-4573">**name** Name of the menu</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-4574">**elemento padre** Puntatore al widget padre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-4574">**parent** Pointer to parent widget</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-4575">**TEXT_ID** ID risorsa del testo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-4575">**text_id** Resource ID of text</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-4576">**fill_id** ID risorsa di riempimento</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-4576">**fill_id** Resource ID of fill</span></span>

## <a name="gx_menu_draw"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-4601">gx_menu_draw</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-4601">gx_menu_draw</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-4602">Menu di progetto</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-4602">Draw menu</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-4603">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-4603">Prototype</span></span>

```C
VOID gx_menu_draw(GX_MENU *menu);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-4604">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-4604">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-4605">Questo servizio disegna il menu specificato.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-4605">This service draws the specified menu.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-4606">Questa funzione viene in genere chiamata internamente dal meccanismo di aggiornamento Canvas di GUIX, ma viene esposta all'applicazione per facilitare l'implementazione di funzioni di disegno personalizzate per i widget di menu personalizzati.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-4606">This function is normally called internally by the GUIX canvas refresh mechanism, but is exposed to the application to assist with implementing custom drawing functions for custom menu widgets.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-4607">Parametri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-4607">Parameters</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-4609">Valori restituiti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-4609">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-4610">**Nessuno**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-4610">**None**</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-4611">Consentito da</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-4611">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-4612">Thread</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-4612">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-4613">Esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-4613">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Write a custom menu drawing function. */

VOID my_menu_draw(GX_MENU *menu)
{
    /* Call default menu draw. */
    gx_menu_draw(menu);

    /* Add your own drawing here. */
}
```

<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-4626">Evento menu elabora</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-4626">Process menu event</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-4627">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-4627">Prototype</span></span>
