
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-4628">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-4628">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-4629">Questo servizio elabora un evento per il menu specificato.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-4629">This service processes an event for the specified menu.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-4630">Questo servizio deve essere chiamato come gestore eventi predefinito da qualsiasi funzione di elaborazione di eventi di menu personalizzata.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-4630">This service should be called as the default event handler by any custom menu event processing functions.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-4631">Parametri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-4631">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-4632">**menu** di Puntatore a blocco di controllo menu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-4632">**menu** Pointer to menu control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-4633">**event_ptr** Puntatore all'evento da elaborare</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-4633">**event_ptr** Pointer to the event to process</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-4634">Valori restituiti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-4634">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-4635">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) processo di eventi di menu riusciti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-4635">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful menu event process</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-4636">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) chiamante non valido di questa funzione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-4636">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-4637">Puntatore a **GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) non valido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-4637">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-4638">Widget **GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x23) non valido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-4638">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x23) Widget not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-4639">Consentito da</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-4639">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-4640">Thread</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-4640">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-4641">Esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-4641">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Call generic menu event processing as part of custom event processing function. */

UINT custom_menu_event_process(GX_MENU *menu, GX_EVENT *event)
{
    UINT status = GX_SUCCESS;

    switch(event->gx_event_type)
    {
    case xyz:
        /* Insert custom event handling here */

        /* Call default event process if this is a system event such as GX_EVENT_SHOW. */
        status = gx_menu_event_process(menu, event);
        break;

    default:
        /* Pass all other events to the default menu
           event processing */
        status = gx_menu_event_process(menu, event);
        break;
    }
    return status;
}

```

## <a name="gx_menu_text_draw"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-4701">gx_menu_text_draw</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-4701">gx_menu_text_draw</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-4702">Testo del menu di estrazione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-4702">Draw menu text</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-4703">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-4703">Prototype</span></span>

```C
VOID gx_menu_text_draw(GX_MENU *menu);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-4704">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-4704">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-4705">Questo servizio disegna il testo di un menu.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-4705">This service draws the text of a menu.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-4706">Questa funzione viene in genere chiamata internamente dal meccanismo di aggiornamento Canvas di GUIX, ma viene esposta all'applicazione per facilitare l'implementazione di funzioni di disegno personalizzate per i widget di menu personalizzati.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-4706">This function is normally called internally by the GUIX canvas refresh mechanism, but is exposed to the application to assist with implementing custom drawing functions for custom menu widgets.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-4707">Parametri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-4707">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-4708">**menu** di Puntatore a blocco di controllo menu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-4708">**menu** Pointer to menu control block</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-4709">Valori restituiti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-4709">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-4710">**Nessuno**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-4710">**None**</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-4711">Consentito da</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-4711">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-4712">Thread</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-4712">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-4713">Esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-4713">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Write a custom menu drawing function. */

VOID my_menu_draw(GX_MENU *menu)
{
    /* Call default menu background draw. */
    gx_pixelmap_prompt_background_draw(
                            (GX_PIXELMAP_PROMPT *)menu);

    /* Draw menu text. */
    gx_menu_text_draw(menu);

    /* Add your own drawing here. */
}
```

- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-4737">Puntatore a **GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) non valido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-4737">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>

## <a name="gx_multi_line_text_button_create"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-4752">gx_multi_line_text_button_create</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-4752">gx_multi_line_text_button_create</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-4753">Pulsante Crea testo con più righe</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-4753">Create multi line text button</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-4754">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-4754">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_multi_line_text_button_create(
    GX_MULTI_LINE_TEXT_BUTTON *text_button,
    GX_CONST GX_CHAR *name,
    GX_WIDGET *parent,
    GX_RESOURCE_ID text_id,
    ULONG style,
    USHORT text_button_id, 
    GX_CONST GX_RECTANGLE *size);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-4755">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-4755">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-4756">Questo servizio crea un widget del pulsante di testo a più righe.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-4756">This service creates a multi-line text button widget.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-4757">Un pulsante di testo su più righe Visualizza il testo del pulsante su 1-n righe.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-4757">A multi-line text button displays the button text over 1-n lines.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-4758">Il numero massimo di righe è definito dalla costante GX_MULTI_LINE_TEXT_BUTTON_MAX_LINES, che per impostazione predefinita è 4.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-4758">The maximum number of lines is defined by the constant GX_MULTI_LINE_TEXT_BUTTON_MAX_LINES, which defaults to 4.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-4759">Le interruzioni di riga vengono impostate in base alle coppie di ritorno a capo e/o ritorno a capo + avanzamento riga nella stringa di testo assegnata al pulsante testo su più righe.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-4759">The line breaks are set by carriage return and/or carriage return + line feed pairs within the text string assigned to the multi-line text button.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-4760">GX_MULTI_LINE_TEXT_BUTTON deriva da GX_TEXT_BUTTON e supporta tutti i servizi API gx_text_button.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-4760">GX_MULTI_LINE_TEXT_BUTTON is derived from GX_TEXT_BUTTON and supports all gx_text_button API services.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-4761">Parametri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-4761">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-4762">**text_button** Puntatore al blocco di controllo del pulsante di testo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-4762">**text_button** Pointer to text button control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-4763">**nome** Nome logico del pulsante di testo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-4763">**name** Logical name of text button</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-4764">**elemento padre** Puntatore al widget padre del pulsante</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-4764">**parent** Pointer to parent widget of the button</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-4765">**TEXT_ID** ID risorsa del testo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-4765">**text_id** Resource ID of text</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-4766">**stile** Stile del pulsante testo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-4766">**style** Text button style.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-4767">L' **Appendice D** contiene stili generali predefiniti per tutti i widget e per gli stili specifici dei widget.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-4767">**Appendix D** contains pre-defined general styles for all widgets as well as widget-specific styles.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-4768">**text_button_id** ID del pulsante testo definito dall'applicazione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-4768">**text_button_id** Application-defined ID of the text button</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-4769">**dimensioni** Dimensioni del pulsante</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-4769">**size** Size of the button</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-4770">Valori restituiti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-4770">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-4771">Creazione di un pulsante testo con più righe **GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) riuscita</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-4771">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful multi line text button create</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-4772">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) chiamante non valido di questa funzione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-4772">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-4773">Puntatore a **GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) non valido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-4773">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-4774">Widget **GX_ALREADY_CREATED** (0x13) già creato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-4774">**GX_ALREADY_CREATED** (0x13) Widget already created</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-4775">**GX_INVALID_SIZE** (0x19) dimensioni del blocco di controllo widget non valide</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-4775">**GX_INVALID_SIZE** (0x19) Invalid widget control block size</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-4776">Consentito da</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-4776">Allowed From</span></span>

```C
/* Create multi-line text button “my_text_button”. */
status = gx_multi_line_text_button_create(&my_text_button, "my text button",
    &my_parent_window, MY_TEXT_RESOURCE_ID,
    GX_STYLE_BUTTON_TOGGLE, MY_TEXT_BUTTON_ID,
    &size);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS, the multi-line text button “my_text_button” was created. */
```

## <a name="gx_multi_line_text_button_draw"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-4786">gx_multi_line_text_button_draw</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-4786">gx_multi_line_text_button_draw</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-4787">Pulsante testo su più righe</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-4787">Draw multi-line text button</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-4788">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-4788">Prototype</span></span>

```C
VOID gx_multi_line_text_button_draw(GX_MULTI_LINE_TEXT_BUTTON *button);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-4789">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-4789">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-4790">Questo servizio disegna il pulsante di testo su più righe.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-4790">This service draws the multi-line text button.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-4791">Questa funzione viene in genere chiamata internamente da GUIX come parte di un'operazione di aggiornamento Canvas, ma è esposta anche all'applicazione che potrebbe voler fornire una funzione di disegno personalizzata e richiamare il disegno del pulsante di testo su più righe predefinito come base di disegno personalizzata.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-4791">This function is normally called internally by GUIX as part of a canvas refresh operation, but it also exposed to the application that might want to provide a custom drawing function and invoke the default multi-line text button drawing as custom drawing base.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-4792">Parametri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-4792">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-4793">**pulsante** Puntatore al blocco di controllo del pulsante di testo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-4793">**button** Pointer to text button control block</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-4794">Valori restituiti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-4794">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-4795">**Nessuno**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-4795">**None**</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-4796">Consentito da</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-4796">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-4797">Thread</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-4797">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-4798">Esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-4798">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Draw the text button “my_text_button”. */
void MyButtonDraw(GX_MULTI_LINE_TEXT_BUTTON *button)
{
    /* Do the normal drawing first */
    gx_multi_line_text_button_draw(&my_text_button);

    /* Add custom drawing here. */
}
```

## <a name="gx_multi_line_text_button_event_process"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-4806">gx_multi_line_text_button_event_process</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-4806">gx_multi_line_text_button_event_process</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-4807">Gestione degli eventi predefiniti per il pulsante testo su più righe</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-4807">Default event handling for multi-line text button</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-4808">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-4808">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_multi_line_text_button_event_process(
    GX_MULTI_LINE_TEXT_BUTTON *button,
    GX_EVENT *event_ptr);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-4809">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-4809">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-4810">Questo servizio è la funzione di gestione degli eventi predefinita per il widget del pulsante testo multiriga.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-4810">This service is the default event handling function for the multi line text button widget.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-4811">Questa funzione viene resa accessibile alle applicazioni che vogliono fornire la gestione di eventi personalizzati per un widget di pulsante di testo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-4811">This function is made accessible to applications that want to provide custom event handling for a text button widget.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-4812">Parametri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-4812">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-4813">**pulsante** Puntatore al blocco di controllo del pulsante di testo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-4813">**button** Pointer to text button control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-4814">**event_ptr** Evento da elaborare</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-4814">**event_ptr** Event to be processed</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-4815">Valori restituiti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-4815">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-4816">Evento gestito da **GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) completato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-4816">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successfully handled event</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-4817">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) chiamante non valido di questa funzione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-4817">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-4818">Puntatore a **GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) non valido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-4818">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-4819">Consentito da</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-4819">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-4820">Inizializzazione e thread</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-4820">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-4821">Esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-4821">Example</span></span>

```C
UINT MyEventHandler(GX_MULTI_LINE_TEXT_BUTTON *button,
    GX_EVENT *event_ptr)
{
    switch(event->gx_event_type)
    {
    case GX_EVENT_SHOW:
        gx_multi_line_text_button_event_process(button, event_ptr);
        /* add custom actions here */
        break;
    default:
        gx_multi_line_text_button_event_process(button, event_ptr);
        break;
    }
    return GX_SUCCESS;
}
```

## <a name="gx_multi_line_text_button_text_draw"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-4829">gx_multi_line_text_button_text_draw</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-4829">gx_multi_line_text_button_text_draw</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-4830">Funzione di supporto del disegno</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-4830">Drawing support function</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-4831">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-4831">Prototype</span></span>

```C
VOID gx_multi_line_text_button_text_draw(GX_MULTI_LINE_TEXT_BUTTON *text_button);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-4832">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-4832">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-4833">Questa funzione di supporto disegna la parte di testo di un pulsante di testo su più righe.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-4833">This support function draws the text portion of a multi-line text button.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-4834">Questa funzione viene chiamata internamente da gx_multi_line_text_button_draw () e viene fornita come API separata per praticità per le applicazioni che definiscono una funzione di disegno di un pulsante di testo a più righe personalizzato.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-4834">This function is called internally by gx_multi_line_text_button_draw(), and is provided as a separate API as a convenience for applications that define a custom multi-line text button drawing function.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-4835">Le applicazioni che desiderano personalizzare il disegno dello sfondo del pulsante possono fornire la funzione di disegno personalizzata e richiamare il servizio multi_line_text_button_text_draw come parte del disegno personalizzato per disegnare il testo del pulsante sullo sfondo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-4835">Applications that want to customize the button background drawing can provide their custom drawing function, and invoke the multi_line_text_button_text_draw service as part of their custom drawing to draw the button text over the background.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-4836">Parametri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-4836">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-4837">**text_button** Puntatore al blocco di controllo del pulsante di testo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-4837">**text_button** Pointer to text button control block</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-4838">Valori restituiti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-4838">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-4839">**Nessuno**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-4839">**None**</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-4840">Consentito da</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-4840">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-4841">Inizializzazione e thread</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-4841">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-4842">Esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-4842">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Define a custom drawing function */
VOID my_button_draw(GX_MULTI_LINE_TEXT_BUTTON *button)
{
    /* insert code here to draw button background */

    /* call support function to do text drawing */
    gx_multi_line_text_button_text_draw();

    /* draw child widgets */
    gx_widget_children_draw((GX_WIDGET *) button);
}
```

## <a name="gx_multi_line_text_button_text_id_set"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-4850">gx_multi_line_text_button_text_id_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-4850">gx_multi_line_text_button_text_id_set</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-4852">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-4852">Prototype</span></span>

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-4853">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-4853">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-4854">Questo servizio imposta l'ID di risorsa di stringa specificato sul pulsante testo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-4854">This service sets the specified string resource ID to the text button.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-4855">La stringa può contenere caratteri di nuova riga che agiscono per visualizzare il testo su più righe all'interno dell'area dei pulsanti.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-4855">The string may contain newline characters which act to display the text on multiple lines within the button area.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-4856">Parametri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-4856">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-4857">**text_button** Puntatore al blocco di controllo del pulsante di testo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-4857">**text_button** Pointer to text button control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-4858">**string_id** ID risorsa della stringa</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-4858">**string_id** Resource ID of the string</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-4859">Valori restituiti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-4859">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-4860">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) ha impostato correttamente l'ID risorsa stringa sul pulsante testo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-4860">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successfully set the string resource ID to the text button</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-4861">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) chiamante non valido di questa funzione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-4861">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-4862">Puntatore a **GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) non valido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-4862">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-4863">Consentito da</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-4863">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-4864">Inizializzazione e thread</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-4864">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-4865">Esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-4865">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Set the string ID ”MY_STRING_ID” to the text button “my_text_button”. */

    &my_text_button, MY_STRING_ID);
```

## <a name="gx_multi_line_text_button_text_set"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-4873">gx_multi_line_text_button_text_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-4873">gx_multi_line_text_button_text_set</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-4874">Assegnare testo al pulsante testo (deprecato)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-4874">Assign text to the text button (deprecated)</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-4875">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-4875">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_mult_line_text_button_text_set(
    GX_MULTI_LINE_TEXT_BUTTON *text_button,
    GX_CHAR *text);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-4876">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-4876">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-4877">Questo servizio è deprecato a favore di gx_multi_line_text_button_text_set_ext ().</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-4877">This service is deprecated in favor of gx_multi_line_text_button_text_set_ext().</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-4878">Questo servizio assegna la stringa specificata al pulsante di testo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-4878">This service assigns the specified string to the text button.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-4879">Se il widget text_button è stato creato con lo stile GX_STYLE_TEXT_COPY, il widget crea una copia privata della stringa di testo assegnata e pertanto l'API gx_system_memmory_allocate_set deve essere richiamata una volta prima che questo servizio venga richiesto.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-4879">If the text_button widget was created with style GX_STYLE_TEXT_COPY, the widget creates a private copy of the text string assigned, and therefore the gx_system_memmory_allocate_set API must be invoked once before this service is requested.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-4880">Se GX_STYLE_TEXT_COPY non è attivo, il widget non crea una copia privata della stringa in ingresso e pertanto la stringa deve essere allocata in modo statico o globale, ovvero potrebbe non essere una variabile automatica o temporanea.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-4880">If GX_STYLE_TEXT_COPY is not active, the widget does not make a private copy of the incoming string, and therefore the string must be statically or globally allocated, i.e. it may not be an automatic or temporary variable.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-4881">Parametri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-4881">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-4882">**text_button** Puntatore al blocco di controllo del pulsante di testo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-4882">**text_button** Pointer to text button control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-4883">puntatore di **testo** alla stringa con TERMINAzione null</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-4883">**text** pointer to the NULL-terminated string</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-4884">Valori restituiti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-4884">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-4885">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) ha impostato correttamente il testo sul pulsante</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-4885">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successfully set the text to the button</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-4886">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) chiamante non valido di questa funzione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-4886">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-4887">Puntatore a **GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) non valido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-4887">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-4888">L'allocatore di memoria **GX_MEMORY_ERROR** (0x30) non è definito</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-4888">**GX_MEMORY_ERROR** (0x30) Memory allocator is not defined</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-4889">Lunghezza stringa **GX_INVALID_STRING_LENGTH** (0X34) non valida</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-4889">**GX_INVALID_STRING_LENGTH** (0x34) Invalid string length</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-4890">Consentito da</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-4890">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-4891">Inizializzazione e thread</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-4891">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-4892">Esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-4892">Example</span></span>

```C
static GX_CHAR text[] = “myrstring”;

/* Set text to the text button “my_text_button”. */
status = gx_multi_line_text_button_text_set(&my_text_button, text);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS, the text of “my_text_button” was set. */
```

## <a name="gx_multi_line_text_button_text_set_ext"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-4900">gx_multi_line_text_button_text_set_ext</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-4900">gx_multi_line_text_button_text_set_ext</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-4901">Assegnare testo al pulsante testo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-4901">Assign text to the text button</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-4902">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-4902">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_mult_line_text_button_text_set_ext(
    GX_MULTI_LINE_TEXT_BUTTON *text_button,
    GX_STRING *string)
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-4903">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-4903">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-4904">Questo servizio assegna la stringa specificata al pulsante di testo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-4904">This service assigns the specified string to the text button.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-4905">Se il widget text_button è stato creato con lo stile GX_STYLE_TEXT_COPY, il widget crea una copia privata della stringa di testo assegnata e pertanto l'API gx_system_memmory_allocate_set deve essere richiamata una volta prima che questo servizio venga richiesto.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-4905">If the text_button widget was created with style GX_STYLE_TEXT_COPY, the widget creates a private copy of the text string assigned, and therefore the gx_system_memmory_allocate_set API must be invoked once before this service is requested.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-4906">Se GX_STYLE_TEXT_COPY non è attivo, il widget non crea una copia privata della stringa in ingresso e pertanto la stringa deve essere allocata in modo statico o globale, ovvero potrebbe non essere una variabile automatica o temporanea.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-4906">If GX_STYLE_TEXT_COPY is not active, the widget does not make a private copy of the incoming string, and therefore the string must be statically or globally allocated, i.e. it may not be an automatic or temporary variable.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-4907">Parametri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-4907">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-4908">**text_button** Puntatore al blocco di controllo del pulsante di testo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-4908">**text_button** Pointer to text button control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-4909">puntatore di **stringa** alla variabile GX_STRING</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-4909">**string** pointer to GX_STRING variable</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-4910">Valori restituiti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-4910">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-4911">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) ha impostato correttamente il testo sul pulsante</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-4911">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successfully set the text to the button</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-4912">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) chiamante non valido di questa funzione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-4912">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-4913">Puntatore a **GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) non valido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-4913">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-4914">L'allocatore di memoria **GX_MEMORY_ERROR** (0x30) non è definito</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-4914">**GX_MEMORY_ERROR** (0x30) Memory allocator is not defined</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-4915">Lunghezza stringa **GX_INVALID_STRING_LENGTH** (0X34) non valida</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-4915">**GX_INVALID_STRING_LENGTH** (0x34) Invalid string length</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-4916">Consentito da</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-4916">Allowed From</span></span>

```C
static GX_CHAR text[] = “myrstring”;
GX_STRING string;

string.gx_string_ptr = text;
string.gx_string_length = strlen(text);

/* Set text to the text button “my_text_button”. */
status = gx_multi_line_text_button_text_set_ext(&my_text_button, string);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS, the text of “my_text_button” was set. */
```

<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-4925">Elimina un carattere prima della posizione del cursore di input di testo a più righe</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-4925">Delete a character before multi line text input cursor position</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-4926">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-4926">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_multi_line_text_input_backspace(
    GX_MULTI_LINE_TEXT_INPUT *text_input);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-4927">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-4927">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-4928">Questo servizio Elimina il carattere prima della posizione del cursore di input di testo a più righe.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-4928">This service deletes the character before multi line text input cursor position.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-4929">Questo servizio viene chiamato internamente quando viene ricevuto un evento di chiave insufficiente, ma può anche essere richiamato dall'applicazione.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-4929">This service is called internally when a backspace key down event is received, but can also be invoked by the application.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-4931">**text_input** Blocco di controllo widget input di testo multilinea</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-4931">**text_input** Multi-line text input widget control block</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-4932">Valori restituiti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-4932">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-4934">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) chiamante non valido di questa funzione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-4934">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-4935">Puntatore a **GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) non valido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-4935">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-4936">Widget **GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x23) non valido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-4936">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x23) Widget not valid</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-4937">Tipo di carattere **GX_FAILURE** (0x10) non valido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-4937">**GX_FAILURE** (0x10) Invalid font</span></span>

```C
/* Delete a character before the cursor of “my_text_input”. */

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the character before the cursor has been deleted. */
```

## <a name="gx_multi_line_text_input_buffer_clear"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-4972">gx_multi_line_text_input_buffer_clear</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-4972">gx_multi_line_text_input_buffer_clear</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-4973">Elimina tutti i caratteri dal buffer di input di testo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-4973">Deletes all characters from the text input buffer</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-4974">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-4974">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_multi_line_text_input_buffer_clear(GX_MULTI_LINE_TEXT_INPUT *text_input);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-4975">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-4975">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-4976">Questo servizio Elimina tutti i caratteri dal buffer di input di testo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-4976">This service deletes all characters from the text input buffer.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-4977">Parametri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-4977">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-4978">**text_input** Blocco di controllo widget input di testo multilinea</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-4978">**text_input** Multi-line text input widget control block</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-4981">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) chiamante non valido di questa funzione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-4981">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-4982">Puntatore a **GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) non valido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-4982">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-4984">Inizializzazione e thread</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-4984">Initialization and threads</span></span>

```C
/* clear input buffer of “my_text_input”. */

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the text input widget has emptied its input buffer. */
```

## <a name="gx_multi_line_text_input_buffer_get"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-5017">gx_multi_line_text_input_buffer_get</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-5017">gx_multi_line_text_input_buffer_get</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-5018">Recupera le informazioni sul buffer del widget input di testo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-5018">Retrieves buffer information of text input widget</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-5019">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-5019">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_multi_line_text_input_buffer_get(
    GX_MULTI_LINE_TEXT_INPUT *text_input, 
    GX_CHAR **buffer_address,
    UINT *content_size, 
    UINT *buffer_size);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-5020">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-5020">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-5021">Questo servizio recupera le informazioni sul buffer di un widget di input di testo su più righe.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-5021">This service retrieves buffer information of a multi-line text input widget.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-5022">Parametri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-5022">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-5023">**text_input** Blocco di controllo widget input di testo multilinea</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-5023">**text_input** Multi-line text input widget control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-5024">**buffer_address** Indirizzo del buffer di input</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-5024">**buffer_address** The address of the input buffer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-5025">**content_size** Numero di byte dei dati di input</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-5025">**content_size** The byte count of the input data</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-5026">**BUFFER_SIZE** Dimensioni del buffer di input</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-5026">**buffer_size** The size of the input buffer</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-5027">Valori restituiti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-5027">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-5028">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) testo a più righe con esito positivo Get</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-5028">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful multi-line text get</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-5029">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) chiamante non valido di questa funzione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-5029">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-5030">Puntatore a **GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) non valido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-5030">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-5031">Consentito da</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-5031">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-5032">Inizializzazione e thread</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-5032">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-5033">Esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-5033">Example</span></span>

```C
GX_CHAR *buffer_address;
UINT context_size;
UINT buffer_size;

/* Retrieves buffer information of “my_text_input” widget. */
status = gx_multi_line_text_input_buffer_get(&my_text_input,
    &buffer_address, &string_size,
    &buffer_size);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the value of buffer_address, string_size and buffer_size has been retrieved. */
```

## <a name="gx_multi_line_text_input_char_insert"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-5065">gx_multi_line_text_input_char_insert</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-5065">gx_multi_line_text_input_char_insert</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-5066">Inserisce una stringa di caratteri nella posizione corrente del cursore di input di testo a più righe (deprecato)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-5066">Insert a character string at current multi line text input cursor position (deprecated)</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-5067">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-5067">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_multi_line_text_input_char_insert(
    GX_MULTI_LINE_TEXT_INPUT *text_input,
    GX_UBYTE *insert_str,
    UINT insert_size);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-5068">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-5068">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-5069">Questa API è deprecata e sostituita da gx_multi_line_text_input_char_insert_ext ().</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-5069">This API is deprecated and replaced by gx_multi_line_text_input_char_insert_ext().</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-5070">Questo servizio inserisce una stringa di caratteri nel buffer della stringa di input di testo a più righe in corrispondenza della posizione corrente del cursore.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-5070">This service inserts a character string into the multi line text input string buffer at the current cursor position.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-5071">Questo servizio viene chiamato internamente quando viene ricevuto un evento di chiave inattivo specifico, ma può anche essere richiamato dall'applicazione.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-5071">This service is called internally when specific key down event is received, but can also be invoked by the application.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-5072">Parametri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-5072">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-5073">**text_input** Blocco di controllo widget input di testo multilinea</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-5073">**text_input** Multi-line text input widget control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-5074">**insert_str** Stringa di caratteri in formato UTF-8 da inserire</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-5074">**insert_str** UTF-8 format character string to be inserted</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-5075">**insert_size** Conteggio byte da inserire</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-5075">**insert_size** Byte count to be inserted</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-5076">Valori restituiti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-5076">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-5077">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) ha inserito correttamente la stringa di caratteri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-5077">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successfully inserted the character string</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-5078">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) chiamante non valido di questa funzione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-5078">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-5079">Puntatore a **GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) non valido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-5079">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-5080">Widget **GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) non valido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-5080">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-5081">Dimensioni stringa non valide **GX_INVALID_VALUE** (0x22)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-5081">**GX_INVALID_VALUE** (0x22) Invalid string size</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-5082">Il tipo di carattere **GX_FAILURE** (0x10) non è valido o non è presente nel buffer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-5082">**GX_FAILURE** (0x10) Invalid font or out of buffer size</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-5083">Consentito da</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-5083">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-5084">Inizializzazione e thread</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-5084">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-5085">Esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-5085">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Insert characters at current cursor position. */
GX_CHAR insert_text[10] = “insert”;
status = gx_multi_line_text_input_char_insert(&my_text_input,
    insert_text,
    GX_STRLEN(insert_text));

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the multi line text input widget has successfully insert the string. */
```

```C
    GX_CHAR *input_buffer, UINT buffer_size,
    ULONG style, USHORT text_input_id, 
    GX_CONST GX_RECTANGLE *size);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-5142">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-5142">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-5143">Questo servizio crea un widget di input di testo su più righe.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-5143">This service creates a multi-line text input widget.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-5144">GX_MULTI_LINE_TEXT_INPUT deriva da GX_MULTI_LINE_TEXT_VIEW e supporta tutti i servizi di gx_multi_line_text_view.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-5144">GX_MULTI_LINE_TEXT_INPUT is derived from GX_MULTI_LINE_TEXT_VIEW and supports all gx_multi_line_text_view services.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-5145">Parametri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-5145">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-5146">**text_input** Blocco di controllo widget input di testo multilinea</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-5146">**text_input** Multi-line text input widget control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-5147">**nome** Nome del widget input di testo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-5147">**name** Name of text input widget</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-5148">**elemento padre** Puntatore al widget padre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-5148">**parent** Pointer to parent widget</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-5149">**input_buffer** Puntatore al buffer di input di testo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-5149">**input_buffer** Pointer to text input buffer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-5150">**BUFFER_SIZE** Dimensioni del buffer di input di testo in byte</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-5150">**buffer_size** Size of text input buffer in bytes</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-5151">**stile** Stile del widget input di testo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-5151">**style** Style of text input widget.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-5152">L' **Appendice D** contiene stili generali predefiniti per tutti i widget e per gli stili specifici dei widget.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-5152">**Appendix D** contains pre-defined general styles for all widgets as well as widget-specific styles.</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-5164">Esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-5164">Example</span></span>

```C
GX_MULTI_LINE_TEXT_INPUT my_text_input;
GX_CHAR my_buffer[100];
GX_RECTANGLE size;

/* Define widget size. */
gx_utility_rectangle_define(&size, 10, 10, 100, 200);

/* Create multi-line text input widget “my_text_input”. */
status = gx_multi_line_text_input_create(&my_text_input,
    “my_text_input”, &my_parent,
    my_buffer, 100, GX_STYLE_BORDER_RAISED,
    MY_TEXT_INPUT_ID, &size);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS, the text input “my_text_input” has been created. */
```

```C
UINT gx_multi_line_text_input_cursor_pos_get(
    GX_MULTI_LINE_TEXT_INPUT *text_input,
    GX_POINT cursor_pos);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-5199">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-5199">Description</span></span>

## <a name="gx_multi_line_text_input_delete"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-5243">gx_multi_line_text_input_delete</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-5243">gx_multi_line_text_input_delete</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-5244">Elimina il carattere nella posizione del cursore di input di testo a più righe</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-5244">Delete the character at the multi line text input cursor position</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-5245">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-5245">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_multi_line_text_input_delete(GX_MULTI_LINE_TEXT_INPUT *text_input);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-5246">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-5246">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-5247">Questo servizio Elimina il carattere dopo la posizione del cursore di input di testo a più righe.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-5247">This service deletes the character after the multi line text input cursor position.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-5248">Questo servizio viene chiamato internamente quando viene ricevuto un evento di eliminazione della chiave, ma può anche essere richiamato dall'applicazione.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-5248">This service is called internally when a delete key down event is received, but can also be invoked by the application.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-5249">Parametri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-5249">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-5250">**text_input** Blocco di controllo widget input di testo multilinea</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-5250">**text_input** Multi-line text input widget control block</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-5251">Valori restituiti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-5251">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-5252">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) ha eliminato un carattere dopo il cursore</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-5252">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successfully delete a character after the cursor</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-5253">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) chiamante non valido di questa funzione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-5253">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-5254">Puntatore a **GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) non valido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-5254">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-5255">Widget **GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) non valido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-5255">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-5256">Tipo di carattere **GX_FAILURE** (0x10) non valido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-5256">**GX_FAILURE** (0x10) Invalid font</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-5257">Consentito da</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-5257">Allowed From</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-5259">Esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-5259">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Delete the character after the cursor of “my_text_input”. */
status = gx_multi_line_text_input_delete(&my_text_input);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the character after the cursor has been deleted. */
```

## <a name="gx_multi_line_text_input_down_arrow"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-5291">gx_multi_line_text_input_down_arrow</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-5291">gx_multi_line_text_input_down_arrow</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-5292">Spostare il cursore di input di testo multilinea nella riga successiva</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-5292">Move the multi line text input cursor to the next line</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-5293">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-5293">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_multi_line_text_input_down_arrow(GX_MULTI_LINE_TEXT_INPUT *text_input);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-5294">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-5294">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-5295">Questo servizio posiziona il cursore del widget input di testo multilinea alla riga successiva.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-5295">This service positions the multi line text input widget cursor to the next line.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-5296">Questo servizio viene chiamato internamente quando viene ricevuto un evento di tasto freccia giù, ma può anche essere richiamato dall'applicazione.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-5296">This service is called internally when a down arrow key down event is received, but can also be invoked by the application.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-5297">Parametri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-5297">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-5298">**text_input** Blocco di controllo widget input di testo multilinea</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-5298">**text_input** Multi-line text input widget control block</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-5299">Valori restituiti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-5299">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-5300">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) ha spostato correttamente il cursore di input di testo nella riga successiva</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-5300">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successfully moved text input cursor to the next line</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-5301">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) chiamante non valido di questa funzione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-5301">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-5302">Puntatore a **GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) non valido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-5302">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-5303">Widget **GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) non valido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-5303">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-5304">**GX_FAILURE** (0x10) carattere o altezza riga non valida</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-5304">**GX_FAILURE** (0x10) Invalid font or line height</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-5305">Consentito da</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-5305">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-5306">Inizializzazione e thread</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-5306">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-5307">Esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-5307">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Move input cursor to the next line. */
status = gx_multi_line_text_input_down_arrow(&my_text_input);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS, text text input cursor has been moved to the next line. */
```

## <a name="gx_multi_line_text_input_end"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-5339">gx_multi_line_text_input_end</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-5339">gx_multi_line_text_input_end</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-5340">Sposta il cursore di input di testo multilinea alla fine della riga corrente</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-5340">Move the multi line text input cursor to the end of the current line</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-5341">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-5341">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_multi_line_text_input_end(GX_MULTI_LINE_TEXT_INPUT *text_input);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-5342">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-5342">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-5343">Questo servizio posiziona il cursore del widget input di testo multilinea alla fine della riga di stringa corrente.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-5343">This service positions the multi line text input widget cursor to the end of the current string line.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-5344">Questo servizio viene chiamato internamente quando viene ricevuto un evento di chiusura della chiave, ma può anche essere richiamato dall'applicazione.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-5344">This service is called internally when an end key down event is received, but can also be invoked by the application.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-5345">Parametri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-5345">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-5346">**text_input** Blocco di controllo widget input di testo multilinea</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-5346">**text_input** Multi-line text input widget control block</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-5347">Valori restituiti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-5347">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-5348">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) ha spostato il cursore di input di testo alla fine della riga corrente</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-5348">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successfully moved text input cursor to end of the current line</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-5349">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) chiamante non valido di questa funzione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-5349">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-5350">Puntatore a **GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) non valido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-5350">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-5351">Widget **GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) non valido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-5351">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-5352">Consentito da</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-5352">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-5353">Inizializzazione e thread</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-5353">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-5354">Esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-5354">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Move input cursor to the end of current line. */
status = gx_multi_line_text_input_end(&my_text_input);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS, the multi line text input cursor has been moved to the end of the current line. */
```

## <a name="gx_multi_line_text_input_event_process"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-5386">gx_multi_line_text_input_event_process</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-5386">gx_multi_line_text_input_event_process</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-5387">Gestione degli eventi predefiniti per input di testo su più righe</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-5387">Default event handling for multi-line text input</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-5388">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-5388">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_multi_line_text_input_event_process(
    GX_MULTI_LINE_TEXT_INPUT *input,
    GX_EVENT *event_ptr);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-5389">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-5389">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-5390">Questo servizio è la funzione di gestione degli eventi predefinita per il widget input di testo multilinea.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-5390">This service is the default event handling function for the multi line text input widget.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-5391">Questa funzione viene resa accessibile alle applicazioni che vogliono fornire la gestione di eventi personalizzati per un widget di input di testo multilinea.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-5391">This function is made accessible to applications that want to provide custom event handling for a multi line text input widget.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-5392">Parametri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-5392">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-5393">**pulsante** Puntatore a blocco di controllo input di testo multilinea</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-5393">**button** Pointer to multi line text input control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-5394">**event_ptr** Evento da elaborare</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-5394">**event_ptr** Event to be processed</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-5395">Valori restituiti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-5395">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-5396">Evento gestito da **GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) completato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-5396">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successfully handled event</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-5397">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) chiamante non valido di questa funzione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-5397">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-5398">Puntatore a **GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) non valido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-5398">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-5399">Il widget padre **GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) non è valido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-5399">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Parent widget not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-5400">Consentito da</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-5400">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-5401">Inizializzazione e thread</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-5401">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-5402">Esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-5402">Example</span></span>

```C
UINT MyEventHandler(GX_MULTI_LINE_TEXT_INPUT *input,
    GX_EVENT *event_ptr)
{
    switch(event->gx_event_type)
    {
    case xyz:
        /* insert custom event handling here */
        break;
    default:
        /* pass all other events to the generic multi line text
            input event processing */
        gx_multi_line_text_input_event_process(input, event_ptr);
        break;
    }
    return GX_SUCCESS;
}
```

## <a name="gx_multi_line_text_input_fill_color_set"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-5434">gx_multi_line_text_input_fill_color_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-5434">gx_multi_line_text_input_fill_color_set</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-5435">Imposta il colore di sfondo dell'input di testo multilinea</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-5435">Set multi line text input background color</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-5436">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-5436">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_multi_line_text_input_fill_color_set(
    GX_MULTI_LINE_TEXT_INPUT *text_input,
    GX_RESOURCE_ID normal_fill_color_id,
    GX_RESOURCE_ID selected_fill_color_id,
    GX_RESOURCE_ID disabled_fill_color_id,
    GX_RESOURCE_ID readonly_fill_color_id);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-5437">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-5437">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-5438">Questo servizio assegna colori di riempimento per il widget input di testo multilinea.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-5438">This service assigns fill colors for the multi-line text input widget.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-5439">Parametri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-5439">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-5440">**text_input** Blocco di controllo widget input di testo multilinea</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-5440">**text_input** Multi-line text input widget control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-5441">**normal_fill_color_id** ID risorsa del colore di riempimento normale usato nello stato normale</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-5441">**normal_fill_color_id** Resource ID of the normal fill color that used in normal state</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-5442">**selected_fill_color_id** ID risorsa del colore di riempimento selezionato usato quando il widget ottiene lo stato attivo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-5442">**selected_fill_color_id** Resource ID of the selected fill color that used when the widget gain focus</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-5443">**disabled_fill_color_id** ID risorsa del colore di riempimento disabilitato usato quando GX_STYLE_ENABLED non è attivo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-5443">**disabled_fill_color_id** Resource ID of the disabled fill color that used when GX_STYLE_ENABLED is not active</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-5444">**readonly_fill_color_id** ID risorsa del colore di riempimento di sola lettura utilizzato quando sono attivi sia GX_STYLE_ENABLED che GX_STYLE_INPUT_READONLY.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-5444">**readonly_fill_color_id** Resource ID of the read only fill color that used when both GX_STYLE_ENABLED and GX_STYLE_INPUT_READONLY are active.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-5445">Valori restituiti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-5445">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-5446">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) ha impostato correttamente i colori per l'input di testo su più righe</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-5446">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successfully set colors for the multi-line text input</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-5447">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) chiamante non valido di questa funzione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-5447">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-5448">Puntatore a **GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) non valido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-5448">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-5449">Consentito da</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-5449">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-5450">Inizializzazione e thread</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-5450">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-5451">Esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-5451">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Set fill colors for the multi-line text input widget “my_text_input”. */

status = gx_multi_line_text_input_fill_color_set(&my_text_input,
    GX_COLOR_ID_NORMAL_FILL,
    GX_COLOR_ID_SELECTED_FILL,
    GX_COLOR_ID_DISABLED_FILL,
    GX_COLOR_ID_READONLY_FILL);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS, the fill color of “my_text_input” has been successfully set. */
```

## <a name="gx_multi_line_text_input_home"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-5483">gx_multi_line_text_input_home</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-5483">gx_multi_line_text_input_home</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-5484">Sposta il cursore di input di testo all'inizio della riga corrente</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-5484">Move the text input cursor to the start of the current line</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-5485">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-5485">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_multi_line_text_input_home(GX_MULTI_LINE_TEXT_INPUT *text_input);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-5486">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-5486">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-5487">Questo servizio sposta la posizione del cursore di input di testo all'inizio della riga corrente.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-5487">This service moves the text input cursor position to the start of the current line.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-5488">Questo servizio viene chiamato internamente quando viene ricevuto un evento di un tasto Home, ma può anche essere richiamato dall'applicazione.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-5488">This service is called internally when a home key down event is received, but can also be invoked by the application.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-5489">Parametri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-5489">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-5490">**text_input** Blocco di controllo widget input di testo multilinea</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-5490">**text_input** Multi-line text input widget control block</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-5491">Valori restituiti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-5491">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-5492">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) ha spostato il cursore all'inizio della riga corrente</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-5492">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successfully moved cursor to start of the current line</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-5493">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) chiamante non valido di questa funzione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-5493">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-5494">Puntatore a **GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) non valido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-5494">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-5495">Widget **GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) non valido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-5495">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-5496">Consentito da</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-5496">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-5497">Inizializzazione e thread</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-5497">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-5498">Esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-5498">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Move cursor to the start of the current line. */
status = gx_multi_line_text_input_home(&my_text_input);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the cursor has been moved to the start of the current line. */
```

## <a name="gx_multi_line_text_input_left_arrow"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-5530">gx_multi_line_text_input_left_arrow</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-5530">gx_multi_line_text_input_left_arrow</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-5531">Sposta il cursore di input di testo multilinea di un carattere a sinistra</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-5531">Move multi line text input cursor one character to the left</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-5532">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-5532">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_multi_line_text_input_left_arrow(GX_MULTI_LINE_TEXT_INPUT *text_input);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-5533">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-5533">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-5534">Questo servizio sposta il cursore di input di testo multilinea di un carattere a sinistra.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-5534">This service moves the multi line text input cursor one character to the left.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-5535">Questo servizio viene chiamato internamente quando viene ricevuto un evento di un tasto sinistro, ma può anche essere richiamato dall'applicazione.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-5535">This service is called internally when a left key down event is received, but can also be invoked by the application.</span></span>
