### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-5538">Valori restituiti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-5538">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-5539">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) ha spostato il cursore a sinistra</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-5539">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successfully moved cursor to the left</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-5540">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) chiamante non valido di questa funzione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-5540">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-5541">Puntatore a **GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) non valido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-5541">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-5542">Widget **GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) non valido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-5542">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-5543">Tipo di carattere **GX_FAILURE** (0x10) non valido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-5543">**GX_FAILURE** (0x10) Invalid font</span></span>

```C
/* Move the cursor one character to the left. */
status = gx_multi_line_text_input_left_arrow(&my_text_input);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the multi line text input cursor has been moved one character to the left. */

```

## <a name="gx_multi_line_text_input_style_add"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-5625">gx_multi_line_text_input_style_add</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-5625">gx_multi_line_text_input_style_add</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-5627">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-5627">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_multi_line_text_input_style_add(
    GX_MULTI_LINE_TEXT_INPUT *text_input,
    ULONG style);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-5628">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-5628">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-5629">Questo servizio aggiunge stili a un widget di input di testo su più righe.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-5629">This service adds styles to a multi-line text input widget.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-5630">Parametri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-5630">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-5632">**stile** Stili da aggiungere.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-5632">**style** Styles to add.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-5633">L' **Appendice D** contiene stili generali predefiniti per tutti i widget</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-5633">**Appendix D** contains pre-defined general styles for all widgets</span></span>

```C
/* Add style GX_STYTLE_CURSOR_ALWAYS to multi-line text input widget “my_text_input”. */
status = gx_multi_line_text_input_style_add(&my_text_input,
    GX_STYLE_CURSOR_ALWAYS);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the style GX_STYLE_CURSOR_ALWAYS has been successfully added. */
```

```C
    ULONG style);
```

## <a name="gx_multi_line_text_input_style_set"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-5719">gx_multi_line_text_input_style_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-5719">gx_multi_line_text_input_style_set</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-5720">Impostare gli stili di input di testo multilinea</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-5720">Set multi line text input styles</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-5721">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-5721">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_multi_line_text_input_style_set(
    GX_MULTI_LINE_TEXT_INPUT *text_input, 
    ULONG style);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-5722">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-5722">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-5723">Questo servizio imposta gli stili per un widget di input di testo su più righe.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-5723">This service sets styles for a multi-line text input widget.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-5724">Parametri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-5724">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-5725">**text_input** Blocco di controllo widget input di testo multilinea</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-5725">**text_input** Multi-line text input widget control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-5726">**stile** Stili da impostare.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-5726">**style** Styles to set.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-5727">L' **Appendice D** contiene stili generali predefiniti per tutti i widget</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-5727">**Appendix D** contains pre-defined general styles for all widgets</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-5728">Valori restituiti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-5728">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-5729">Set di stili di input di testo a più righe con esito positivo **GX_SUCCESS** (0x00)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-5729">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful multi-line text input style set</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-5730">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) chiamante non valido di questa funzione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-5730">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-5731">Puntatore a **GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) non valido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-5731">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-5732">Consentito da</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-5732">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-5733">Inizializzazione e thread</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-5733">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-5734">Esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-5734">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Set style GX_STYLE_CURSOR_ALWAYS for text input widget “my_text_input”. */
status = gx_multi_line_text_input_style_set(&my_text_input,
    GX_STYLE_CURSOR_ALWAYS);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the text input style has been set */
```

## <a name="gx_multi_line_text_input_text_color_set"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-5766">gx_multi_line_text_input_text_color_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-5766">gx_multi_line_text_input_text_color_set</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-5767">Imposta il colore del testo di input di testo multilinea</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-5767">Set multi line text input text color</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-5768">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-5768">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_multi_line_text_input_text_color_set(
    GX_MULTI_LINE_TEXT_INPUT *text_input,
    GX_RESOURCE_ID normal_text_color_id,
    GX_RESOURCE_ID selected_text_color_id,
    GX_RESOURCE_ID disabled_text_color_id,
    GX_RESOURCE_ID readonly_text_color_id);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-5769">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-5769">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-5770">Questo servizio assegna i colori del testo per il widget input di testo multilinea.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-5770">This service assigns text colors for the multi-line text input widget.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-5771">Parametri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-5771">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-5772">**text_input** Blocco di controllo widget input di testo multilinea</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-5772">**text_input** Multi-line text input widget control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-5773">**normal_fill_color_id** ID di risorsa del normale colore del testo usato nello stato normale</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-5773">**normal_fill_color_id** Resource ID of the normal text color that used in normal state</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-5774">**selected_text_color_id** ID risorsa del colore del testo selezionato usato quando il widget ottiene lo stato attivo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-5774">**selected_text_color_id** Resource ID of the selected text color that used when the widget gain focus</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-5775">**disabled_text_color_id** ID risorsa del colore del testo disabilitato usato quando GX_STYLE_ENABLED non è attivo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-5775">**disabled_text_color_id** Resource ID of the disabled text color that used when GX_STYLE_ENABLED is not active</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-5776">**readonly_text_color_id** ID risorsa del colore del testo di sola lettura utilizzato quando sono attivi sia GX_STYLE_ENABLED che GX_STYLE_TEXT_INPUT_READONLY</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-5776">**readonly_text_color_id** Resource ID of the read only text color that used when both GX_STYLE_ENABLED and GX_STYLE_TEXT_INPUT_READONLY are active</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-5777">Valori restituiti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-5777">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-5778">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) ha impostato correttamente i colori per l'input di testo su più righe</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-5778">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successfully set colors for the multi-line text input</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-5779">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) chiamante non valido di questa funzione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-5779">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-5780">Puntatore a **GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) non valido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-5780">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-5781">Consentito da</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-5781">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-5782">Inizializzazione e thread</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-5782">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-5783">Esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-5783">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Set text colors for the multi-line text input widget “my_text_input”. */
status = gx_multi_line_text_input_text_color_set(&my_text_input,
    GX_COLOR_ID_NORMAL_TEXT,
    GX_COLOR_ID_SELECTED_TEXT,
    GX_COLOR_ID_DISABLED_TEXT,
    GX_COLOR_ID_READONLY_TEXT);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS, the fill colors of “my_text_view” has been successfully set. */
```

## <a name="gx_multi_line_text_input_text_select"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-5815">gx_multi_line_text_input_text_select</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-5815">gx_multi_line_text_input_text_select</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-5816">Seleziona testo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-5816">Select text</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-5817">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-5817">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_multi_line_text_input_text_select(
    GX_MULTI_LINE_TEXT_INPUT *text_input,
    UINT start_index, UINT end_index);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-5818">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-5818">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-5819">Questo servizio seleziona il testo di input di testo multilinea con il contrassegno iniziale e l'indice del contrassegno finale specificati ed evidenzia il testo selezionato con i colori di riempimento e testo selezionati.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-5819">This service selects multi line text input text with specified start mark and end mark index and highlights the selected text with the selected fill and text colors.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-5820">Parametri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-5820">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-5821">**text_input** Puntatore a blocco di controllo input di testo multilinea</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-5821">**text_input** Pointer to multi line text input control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-5822">**start_index** Indice del primo carattere selezionato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-5822">**start_index** Index of the first selected character</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-5823">**end_index** Indice dell'ultimo carattere selezionato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-5823">**end_index** Index of the last selected character</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-5824">Valori restituiti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-5824">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-5825">Selezione testo di input di testo a più righe **GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) riuscita</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-5825">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful multi line text input text selection</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-5826">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) chiamante non valido di questa funzione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-5826">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-5827">Puntatore a **GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) non valido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-5827">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-5828">Widget **GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) non valido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-5828">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-5829">Il valore di indice **GX_INVALID_VALUE** (0x22) non è valido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-5829">**GX_INVALID_VALUE** (0x22) Index value not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-5830">Consentito da</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-5830">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-5831">Inizializzazione e thread</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-5831">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-5832">Esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-5832">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Select text between index [0, 9]. */
status = gx_multi_line_text_input_text_select(&my_text_input,
    0,9);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS, the text between 
    index [0, 9] “my_text_input” was selected. */
```

## <a name="gx_multi_line_text_input_text_set"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-5864">gx_multi_line_text_input_text_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-5864">gx_multi_line_text_input_text_set</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-5865">Assegnare testo all'input di testo (deprecato)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-5865">Assign text to the text input (deprecated)</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-5866">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-5866">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_mult_line_text_input_text_set(
    GX_MULTI_LINE_TEXT_INPUT *text_input,
    GX_CHAR *text);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-5867">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-5867">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-5868">Questa API è deprecata e sostituisce gx_multi_line_text_input_text_set_ext ().</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-5868">This API is deprecated and replace by gx_multi_line_text_input_text_set_ext().</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-5869">Questo servizio assegna la stringa specificata all'input di testo a più righe.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-5869">This service assigns the specified string to the multi line text input.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-5870">Se la dimensione del buffer di input multi_line_text_input widget è inferiore alla lunghezza della stringa, la stringa verrà troncata.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-5870">If the multi_line_text_input widget’s input buffer size is smaller than string length, the string will be truncated.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-5871">Parametri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-5871">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-5872">**text_input** Puntatore a blocco di controllo input di testo multilinea</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-5872">**text_input** Pointer to multi line text input control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-5873">puntatore di **testo** alla stringa con TERMINAzione null</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-5873">**text** pointer to the NULL-terminated string</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-5874">Valori restituiti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-5874">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-5875">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) ha impostato correttamente il testo sull'input di testo a più righe</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-5875">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successfully set the text to the multi line text input</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-5876">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) chiamante non valido di questa funzione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-5876">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-5877">Puntatore a **GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) non valido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-5877">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-5878">Lunghezza stringa **GX_INVALID_STRING_LENGTH** (0X34) non valida</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-5878">**GX_INVALID_STRING_LENGTH** (0x34) Invalid string length</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-5879">Consentito da</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-5879">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-5880">Inizializzazione e thread</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-5880">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-5881">Esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-5881">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Set the string “my string” to the text button “my_text_input”. */
status = gx_multi_line_text_input_text_set(&my_text_input,
    “myrstring”);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS, the content of “my_text_input” bas been reset. */
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-5887">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-5887">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-5888">Questo servizio assegna la stringa specificata all'input di testo a più righe.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-5888">This service assigns the specified string to the multi line text input.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-5889">Se la dimensione del buffer di input multi_line_text_input widget è inferiore alla lunghezza della stringa, la stringa verrà troncata.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-5889">If the multi_line_text_input widget’s input buffer size is smaller than string length, the string will be truncated.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-5890">Parametri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-5890">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-5892">puntatore di **stringa** a GX_STRING da assegnare</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-5892">**string** pointer to GX_STRING to assign</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-5894">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) ha impostato correttamente il testo sull'input di testo a più righe</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-5894">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successfully set the text to the multi line text input</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-5895">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) chiamante non valido di questa funzione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-5895">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-5900">Esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-5900">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Set the string “my string” to the text button “my_text_input”. */
GX_STRING string;
string.gx_string_ptr = “myrstring”;
string.gx_string_length = strlen(string.gx_string_ptr);

status = gx_multi_line_text_input_text_set_ext(&my_text_input,
    &string);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS, the content of “my_text_input” bas been reset. */
```

## <a name="gx_multi_line_text_input_up_arrow"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-5932">gx_multi_line_text_input_up_arrow</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-5932">gx_multi_line_text_input_up_arrow</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-5933">Sposta cursore di input di testo multilinea nella riga precedente</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-5933">Move multi line text input cursor to the previous line</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-5934">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-5934">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_multi_line_text_input_up_arrow(GX_MULTI_LINE_TEXT_INPUT *text_input);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-5935">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-5935">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-5936">Questo servizio sposta il cursore di input di testo multilinea nella riga di testo precedente.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-5936">This service moves the multi line text input cursor to the previous line of text.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-5937">Questo servizio viene chiamato internamente quando viene ricevuto un evento di tasto freccia su, ma può anche essere richiamato dall'applicazione.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-5937">This service is called internally when an up arrow key down event is received, but can also be invoked by the application.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-5938">Parametri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-5938">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-5939">**text_input** Blocco di controllo widget input di testo a riga singola</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-5939">**text_input** Single-line text input widget control block</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-5940">Valori restituiti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-5940">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-5941">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) ha spostato correttamente il cursore sulla riga precedente</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-5941">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successfully moved cursor to the previous line</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-5942">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) chiamante non valido di questa funzione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-5942">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-5943">Puntatore a **GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) non valido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-5943">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-5944">Widget **GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) non valido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-5944">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-5945">Consentito da</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-5945">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-5946">Inizializzazione e thread</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-5946">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-5947">Esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-5947">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Move the cursor to the previous line. */
status = gx_multi_line_text_input_up_arrow(&my_text_input);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the multi line text input cursor has been moved to the previous line. */

```

<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-5980">Creazione di una visualizzazione di testo a più righe</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-5980">Create multi-line text view</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-5981">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-5981">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_multi_line_text_view_create(
    GX_MULTI_LINE_TEXT_VIEW *text_view,
    GX_CONST GX_CHAR *name, 
    GX_WINDOW *parent, 
    GX_RESOURCE_ID text_id,
    ULONG style, 
    USHORT text_view_id, 
    GX_CONST GX_RECTANGLE *size);

```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-5982">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-5982">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-5983">Il servizio crea un GX_MULTI_LINE_TEXT_VIEW widget.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-5983">This service creates a GX_MULTI_LINE_TEXT_VIEW widget.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-5984">Questo tipo di widget è derivato da GX_WINDOW e pertanto tutti i servizi API gx_window possono essere usati anche con questo tipo di widget.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-5984">This widget type is derived from GX_WINDOW, and therefore all gx_window API services may also be utilized with this widget type.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-5987">**nome** Nome del widget visualizzazione testo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-5987">**name** Name of the text view widget</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-5988">**elemento padre** Puntatore al widget padre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-5988">**parent** Pointer to parent widget</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-5989">**TEXT_ID** ID risorsa della stringa di testo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-5989">**text_id** Resource ID of the text string</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-5990">**stile** Stile del widget visualizzazione testo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-5990">**style** Style of text view widget.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-5991">L' **Appendice D** contiene stili generali predefiniti per tutti i widget e per gli stili specifici dei widget.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-5991">**Appendix D** contains pre-defined general styles for all widgets as well as widget-specific styles.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-5992">**text_view_id** ID di visualizzazione testo definito dall'applicazione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-5992">**text_view_id** Application-defined ID of text view</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-6002">Esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-6002">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Create multi-line text view widget “my_text_view”. */
status = gx_multi_line_text_view_create(&my_text_view,
    “my_text_view”, &my_parent,
    TEXT_STRING_ID, GX_STYLE_BORDER_RAISED,
    MY_TEXT_VIEW_ID, &size);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the text view “my_text_view” has been successfully created. */
```

<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-6035">Creare un widget visualizzazione testo a più righe</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-6035">Draw a multi line text view widget</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-6036">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-6036">Prototype</span></span>

```C
VOID gx_multi_line_text_view_draw(GX_MULTI_LINE_TEXT_VIEW * text_view);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-6037">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-6037">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-6038">Questo servizio disegna un widget per la visualizzazione di testo a più righe.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-6038">This service draws a multi line text view widget.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-6039">Questo servizio viene in genere chiamato internamente durante l'aggiornamento dell'area di disegno, ma può anche essere chiamato da funzioni di disegno di visualizzazioni di testo a più righe personalizzate.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-6039">This service is normally called internally during canvas refresh, but can also be called from custom multi line text view drawing functions.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-6040">Parametri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-6040">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-6041">**text_view** Blocco di controllo widget visualizzazione testo su più righe</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-6041">**text_view** Multi-line text view widget control block</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-6042">Valori restituiti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-6042">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-6043">**Nessuno**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-6043">**None**</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-6044">Consentito da</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-6044">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-6045">Inizializzazione e thread</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-6045">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-6046">Esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-6046">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Write a custom multi line text view drawing function. */

VOID my_multi_line_text_view_draw(GX_MULTI_LINE_TEXT_VIEW *view)
{
    /* Call default multi line text view draw. */
    gx_multi_line_text_view_draw(view);

    /* Add your own drawing here. */
}
```

## <a name="gx_multi_line_text_view_event_process"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-6078">gx_multi_line_text_view_event_process</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-6078">gx_multi_line_text_view_event_process</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-6079">Evento elabora visualizzazione testo su più righe</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-6079">Process multi-line text view event</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-6080">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-6080">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_multi_line_text_view_event_process(
    GX_MULTI_LINE_TEXT_VIEW *text_view, 
    GX_EVENT *event);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-6081">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-6081">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-6082">Questo servizio elabora un evento per un widget visualizzazione testo su più righe.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-6082">This service processes an event for a multi-line text view widget.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-6083">Parametri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-6083">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-6084">**text_view** Blocco di controllo widget visualizzazione testo su più righe</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-6084">**text_view** Multi-line text view widget control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-6085">**evento** Puntatore a evento da elaborare</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-6085">**event** Pointer to event to process</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-6086">Valori restituiti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-6086">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-6087">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) processo di visualizzazione di testo a più righe riuscito</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-6087">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful multi-line text view event process</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-6088">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) chiamante non valido di questa funzione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-6088">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-6089">Puntatore a **GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) non valido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-6089">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-6090">Widget **GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) non valido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-6090">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-6091">Consentito da</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-6091">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-6092">Thread</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-6092">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-6093">Esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-6093">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Write a custom event handler. */
UINT my_event_handler(GX_MULTI_LINE_TEXT_VIEW *view, GX_EVENT *event_ptr)
{
    switch(event->gx_event_type)
    {
    case GX_EVENT_SHOW:
        gx_multi_line_text_view_event_process(view, event_ptr);
        /* Add custom actions here. */
        break;
    default:
        gx_multi_line_text_view_event_process (view, event_ptr);
        break;
    }
    return GX_SUCCESS;
}
```

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-6127">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-6127">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_multi_line_text_view_text_id_set(
    GX_MULTI_LINE_TEXT_VIEW *text_view, 
    GX_RESOURCE_ID font_id);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-6128">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-6128">Description</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-6132">**font_id** ID risorsa per il tipo di carattere</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-6132">**font_id** Resource ID for the font</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-6133">Valori restituiti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-6133">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-6134">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) ha impostato correttamente il tipo di carattere per la visualizzazione di testo su più righe</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-6134">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successfully set font for the multi-line text view</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-6136">Puntatore a **GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) non valido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-6136">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-6139">Esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-6139">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Set font ID FONT_ID to the multi-line text view widget “my_text_view”. */
status = gx_multi_line_text_view_font_set(&my_text_view, FONT_ID);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS, the text view “my_text_view” will use the specified font to display its text. */
```

## <a name="gx_multi_line_text_view_line_space_set"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-6171">gx_multi_line_text_view_line_space_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-6171">gx_multi_line_text_view_line_space_set</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-6172">Imposta lo spazio della riga della visualizzazione testo su più righe</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-6172">Set multi-line text view line space</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-6173">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-6173">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_multi_line_text_view_line_space_set(
    GX_MULTI_LINE_TEXT_VIEW *text_view, 
    GX_BYTE line_space);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-6174">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-6174">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-6175">Questo servizio imposta la spaziatura tra le righe di testo per il widget visualizzazione testo a più righe.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-6175">This service sets the spacing between lines of text for the multi-line text view widget.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-6176">Parametri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-6176">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-6177">**Visualizza** Blocco di controllo widget visualizzazione testo su più righe</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-6177">**view** Multi-line text view widget control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-6178">**line_space** Valore da impostare</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-6178">**line_space** Value to set</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-6179">Valori restituiti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-6179">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-6180">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) ha impostato correttamente il valore dello spazio della riga per la visualizzazione di testo su più righe</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-6180">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successfully set line space value for the multi-line text view</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-6181">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) chiamante non valido di questa funzione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-6181">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-6182">Puntatore a **GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) non valido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-6182">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-6183">Consentito da</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-6183">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-6184">Inizializzazione e thread</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-6184">Initialization and threads</span></span>

```C
/* Set line space of “my_text_view” to 2. */
status = gx_multi_line_text_view_line_space_set(&my_text_view, 2);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS, the line space of “my_text_view” has been successfully set to 2. */
```

## <a name="gx_multi_line_text_view_scroll_info_get"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-6216">gx_multi_line_text_view_scroll_info_get</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-6216">gx_multi_line_text_view_scroll_info_get</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-6217">Ottenere le informazioni di scorrimento della visualizzazione testo su più righe</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-6217">Get multi-line text view scroll info</span></span>


### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-6218">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-6218">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_multi_line_text_view_scroll_info_get(
    GX_MULTI_LINE_TEXT_VIEW *text_view, ULONG style,
    GX_SCROLL_INFO *info);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-6219">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-6219">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-6220">Questo servizio ottiene le informazioni di scorrimento della visualizzazione testo su più righe.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-6220">This service gets the multi-line text view scroll information.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-6221">Parametri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-6221">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-6222">**text_view** Blocco di controllo widget visualizzazione testo su più righe</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-6222">**text_view** Multi-line text view widget control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-6223">**Stile** GX_SCROLLBAR_HORIZONTAL o GX_SCROLLBAR_VERTICAL</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-6223">**Style** GX_SCROLLBAR_HORIZONTAL or GX_SCROLLBAR_VERTICAL</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-6224">**Informazioni** su Puntatore alla destinazione per le informazioni di scorrimento.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-6224">**Info** Pointer to destination for scroll info.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-6225">**Appendice I** contiene la definizione per GX_SCROLL_INFO struttura.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-6225">**Appendix I** contains definition to GX_SCROLL_INFO structure.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-6226">Valori restituiti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-6226">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-6227">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) ha recuperato correttamente le informazioni di scorrimento della visualizzazione testo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-6227">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successfully retrieved text view scroll info</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-6228">Il widget **GX_FAILURE** (0x10) non è visibile o l'ID del tipo di carattere della visualizzazione testo non è valido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-6228">**GX_FAILURE** (0x10) Widget is not visible or text view font id is not valid</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-6229">Puntatore a **GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) non valido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-6229">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-6230">Consentito da</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-6230">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-6231">Inizializzazione e thread</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-6231">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-6232">Esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-6232">Example</span></span>

```C
GX_SCROLL_INFO scroll_info;

/* Get scroll information for multi-line text view “my_text_view”. */
status = gx_multi_line_text_view_scroll_info_get(&my_text_view,
    &scroll_info);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the “scroll_info” contains the scroll information for multi-line text view “my_text_view”. */
```

## <a name="gx_multi_line_text_view_text_color_set"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-6264">gx_multi_line_text_view_text_color_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-6264">gx_multi_line_text_view_text_color_set</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-6265">Imposta il colore del testo per la visualizzazione di testo a più righe</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-6265">Set the text color for the multi line text view</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-6266">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-6266">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_multi_line_text_view_text_color_set(
    GX_MULTI_LINE_TEXT_VIEW *text_view,
    GX_RESOURCE_ID normal_text_color_id,
    GX_RESOURCE_ID selected_text_color_id,
    GX_RESOURCe_ID disabled_text_color_id);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-6267">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-6267">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-6268">Questo servizio assegna il colore del testo al widget visualizzazione testo su più righe.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-6268">This service assigns text color to the multi-line text view widget.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-6269">Parametri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-6269">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-6270">**text_view** Blocco di controllo widget visualizzazione testo su più righe</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-6270">**text_view** Multi-line text view widget control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-6271">**normal_text_color_id** ID di risorsa del normale colore del testo usato nello stato normale</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-6271">**normal_text_color_id** Resource ID of the normal text color that used in normal state</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-6272">**selected_text_color_id** ID risorsa del colore del testo selezionato usato quando il widget ottiene lo stato attivo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-6272">**selected_text_color_id** Resource ID of the selected text color that used when the widget gain focus</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-6273">**disabled_text_color_id** ID risorsa del colore del testo disabilitato usato GX_STYLE_ENABLED non è attivo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-6273">**disabled_text_color_id** Resource ID of the disabled text color that used GX_STYLE_ENABLED is not active</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-6274">Valori restituiti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-6274">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-6275">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) ha impostato correttamente i colori per la visualizzazione di testo su più righe</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-6275">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successfully set colors for the multi-line text view</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-6276">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) chiamante non valido di questa funzione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-6276">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-6277">Puntatore a **GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) non valido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-6277">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-6278">Consentito da</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-6278">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-6279">Inizializzazione e thread</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-6279">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-6280">Esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-6280">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Set text colors for the multi-line text view widget “my_text_view”. */
status = gx_multi_line_text_view_text_color_set(&my_text_view,
    GX_COLOR_ID_NORMAL_TEXT,
    GX_COLOR_ID_SELECTED_TEXT,
    GX_COLOR_ID_DISABLED_TEXT);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the text color of “my_text_view” has been successfully set. */
```

## <a name="gx_multi_line_text_view_text_id_set"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-6312">gx_multi_line_text_view_text_id_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-6312">gx_multi_line_text_view_text_id_set</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-6313">Imposta la stringa di testo del sistema nella visualizzazione di testo a più righe</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-6313">Set system text string in multi line text view</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-6314">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-6314">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_multi_line_text_view_text_id_set(
    GX_MULTI_LINE_TEXT_VIEW *text_view, 
    GX_RESOURCE_ID text_id);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-6315">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-6315">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-6316">Questo servizio imposta l'ID risorsa di una stringa sul widget visualizzazione testo a più righe.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-6316">This service sets the resource ID of a string to the multi-line text view widget.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-6317">Parametri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-6317">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-6318">**text_view** Blocco di controllo widget visualizzazione testo su più righe</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-6318">**text_view** Multi-line text view widget control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-6319">**TEXT_ID** ID risorsa per la stringa di testo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-6319">**text_id** Resource ID for the text string</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-6320">Valori restituiti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-6320">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-6321">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) ha impostato correttamente l'ID stringa per la visualizzazione di testo su più righe</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-6321">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successfully set string id for the multi-line text view</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-6322">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) chiamante non valido di questa funzione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-6322">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-6323">Puntatore a **GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) non valido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-6323">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-6324">ID risorsa non valido **GX_INVALID_RESOURCE_ID** (0x33)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-6324">**GX_INVALID_RESOURCE_ID** (0x33) Invalid resource ID</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-6325">Consentito da</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-6325">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-6326">Inizializzazione e thread</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-6326">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-6327">Esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-6327">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Set string ID STRING_ID to the multi-line text view widget “my_text_view”. */
status = gx_multi_line_text_view_text_id_set(&my_text_view, STRING_ID);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the text id of “my_text_view” has been successfully set. */
```

## <a name="gx_multi_line_text_view_text_set"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-6359">gx_multi_line_text_view_text_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-6359">gx_multi_line_text_view_text_set</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-6360">Impostare una stringa definita dall'utente nella visualizzazione di testo su più righe</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-6360">Set user-defined string in multi line text view</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-6361">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-6361">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_multi_line_text_view_text_set(
    GX_MULTI_LINE_TEXT_VIEW *text_view, 
    GX_CONST GX_CHAR *text);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-6362">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-6362">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-6363">Questo servizio assegna una stringa di testo al widget visualizzazione testo su più righe.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-6363">This service assigns a text string to the multi-line text view widget.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-6364">Se il widget text_view è stato creato con lo stile GX_STYLE_TEXT_COPY, il widget crea una copia privata della stringa di testo assegnata e pertanto l'API gx_system_memory_allocate_set deve essere richiamata una volta prima che questo servizio venga richiesto.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-6364">If the text_view widget was created with style GX_STYLE_TEXT_COPY, the widget creates a private copy of the text string assigned, and therefore the gx_system_memory_allocate_set API must be invoked once before this service is requested.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-6365">Se GX_STYLE_TEXT_COPY non è attivo, il widget non crea una copia privata della stringa in ingresso e pertanto la stringa assegnata deve essere allocata in modo statico o globale, ovvero potrebbe non essere una variabile automatica o temporanea.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-6365">If GX_STYLE_TEXT_COPY is not active, the widget does not make a private copy of the incoming string, and therefore the assigned string must be statically or globally allocated, i.e. it may not be an automatic or temporary variable.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-6366">Parametri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-6366">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-6367">**text_view** Blocco di controllo widget visualizzazione testo su più righe</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-6367">**text_view** Multi-line text view widget control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-6368">**testo** Stringa di testo con terminazione NULL</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-6368">**text** NULL-terminated text string</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-6369">Valori restituiti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-6369">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-6370">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) ha impostato correttamente la stringa per la visualizzazione di testo su più righe</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-6370">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successfully set string for the multi-line text view</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-6371">L'allocatore di memoria **GX_SYSTEM_MEMORY_ERROR** (0x30) non è definito o l'allocazione della memoria non è riuscita</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-6371">**GX_SYSTEM_MEMORY_ERROR** (0x30) Memory allocator is not defined or memory allocation failed</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-6372">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) chiamante non valido di questa funzione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-6372">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-6373">Puntatore a **GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) non valido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-6373">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-6374">Consentito da</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-6374">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-6375">Inizializzazione e thread</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-6375">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-6376">Esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-6376">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Set string “my string” to the multi-line text view widget “my_text_view”. */
status = gx_multi_line_text_view_text_set(&my_text_view, “my string”);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the text of “my_text_view” has been successfully set. */
```

## <a name="gx_multi_line_text_view_whitespace_set"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-6408">gx_multi_line_text_view_whitespace_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-6408">gx_multi_line_text_view_whitespace_set</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-6409">Imposta spazi vuoti visualizzazione testo su più righe</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-6409">Set multi-line text view whitespace</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-6410">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-6410">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_multi_line_text_view_whitespace_set(
    GX_MULTI_LINE_TEXT_VIEW *text_view, 
    GX_UBYTE whitespace);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-6411">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-6411">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-6412">Questo servizio imposta la spaziatura tra le strutture dei widget e l'area client per un widget visualizzazione testo su più righe.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-6412">This service sets spacing between widget outlines and client area for a multi-line text view widget.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-6413">Parametri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-6413">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-6414">**text_view** Blocco di controllo widget visualizzazione testo su più righe</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-6414">**text_view** Multi-line text view widget control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-6415">**spazio vuoto** Larghezza del margine tra text_view widget e il testo visualizzato, in pixel.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-6415">**whitespace** Width of margin between text_view widget and the displayed text, in pixels.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-6416">Valori restituiti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-6416">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-6417">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) ha impostato correttamente gli spazi vuoti per la visualizzazione di testo su più righe</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-6417">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successfully set whitespace for the multi-line text view</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-6418">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) chiamante non valido di questa funzione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-6418">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-6419">Puntatore a **GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) non valido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-6419">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-6420">Consentito da</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-6420">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-6421">Inizializzazione e thread</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-6421">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-6422">Esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-6422">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Set whitespace of “my_text_view” to 2. */
status = gx_multi_line_text_view_whitespace_set(&my_text_view, 2);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the whitespace of “my_text_view” has been successfully set to 2. */
```

```C
UINT gx_numeric_pixelmap_prompt_create(
    GX_NUMERIC_PIXELMAP_PROMPT *prompt,
    GX_CONST GX_CHAR name, GX_WIDGET *parent,
    GX_RESOURCE_ID text_id, GX_RESOURCE_ID fill_id,
    ULONG style, USHORT pixelmap_prompt_id,
    GX_CONST GX_RECTANGLE *size);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-6457">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-6457">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-6458">Questo servizio crea un widget della richiesta di Pixelmap numerica.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-6458">This service creates a numeric pixelmap prompt widget.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-6459">Una numeric_pixelmap_prompt è semplicemente una pixelmap_prompt che mantiene il proprio buffer e fornisce un'API gx_numeric_pixelmap_prompt_value_set (INT), le dimensioni del buffer sono definite dalla costante GX_NUMERIC_PROMPT_BUFFER_SIZE, che per impostazione predefinita è 16.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-6459">A numeric_pixelmap_prompt is just a pixelmap_prompt that keeps its own buffer and provides a gx_numeric_pixelmap_prompt_value_set(INT) API, the buffer size is defined by the constant GX_NUMERIC_PROMPT_BUFFER_SIZE, which defaults to 16.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-6460">GX_NUMERIC_PIXELMAP_PROMPT deriva da GX_PIXELMAP_PROMPT e supporta tutti i servizi API gx_pixelmap_prompt.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-6460">GX_NUMERIC_PIXELMAP_PROMPT is derived from GX_PIXELMAP_PROMPT and supports all gx_pixelmap_prompt API services.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-6483">Funzione di sostituzione del formato del prompt Pixelmap numerico</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-6483">Override format function of numeric pixelmap prompt</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-6484">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-6484">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_numeric_pixelmap_format_function_set(
    GX_NUMERIC_PIXELMAP_PROMPT *prompt,
    OID (*format_func)(GX_NUMERIC_PIXELMAP_PROMPT *, INT));
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-6485">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-6485">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-6486">Questo servizio esegue l'override della funzione di formattazione predefinita del widget della richiesta di pixlemap numerica.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-6486">This service overrides the default format function of the numeric pixlemap prompt widget.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-6487">La funzione Format predefinita converte il valore numerico della richiesta di Pixelmap in una stringa e lo archivia nel buffer privato del widget.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-6487">The default format function converts the numeric pixelmap prompt value to a string and stores it in the widget’s private buffer.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-6488">Questo servizio consente all'applicazione di definire la propria funzione Format per formattare e archiviare il valore numerico della richiesta di Pixelmap nel buffer privato del widget.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-6488">This service allows the application to define its own format function to format and store the numeric pixelmap prompt value in the widget’s private buffer.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-6489">Parametri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-6489">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-6490">**messaggio di richiesta** Blocco di controllo prompt Pixelmap numerici</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-6490">**prompt** Numeric pixelmap prompt control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-6491">**format_func** Funzione Format da impostare</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-6491">**format_func** Format function to be set</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-6492">Valori restituiti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-6492">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-6493">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) ha impostato correttamente la funzione numeric pixlemap prompt Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-6493">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successfully set numeric pixlemap prompt format function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-6494">Puntatore a **GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) non valido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-6494">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-6495">Consentito da</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-6495">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-6496">Inizializzazione e thread</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-6496">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-6497">Esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-6497">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Define my numeric pixelmap format function. */
VOID my_format_function(GX_NUMERIC_PIXELMAP_PROMPT *prompt,
    INT value)
{
    /* If the value is “1234”, the new format will be “12.34”. */

    INT length;
    gx_utility_ltoa(value / 100,
        prompt->gx_numeric_pixelmap_prompt_buffer,
        GX_NUMERIC_PROMPT_ BUFFER_SIZE);
    Length = GX_STRLEN(prompt->gx_numeric_pixelmap_prompt_buffer);
    prompt->gx_numeric_pixelmap_prompt_buffer[length++] = ‘.’;
    gx_utility_ltoa(value % 100,
        prompt->gx_numeric_pixelmap_prompt_buffer + length,
        GX_NUMERIC_PROMPT_BUFFER_SIZE - length);
}

/* Override default format function of “my_numeric_pix_prompt”. */
status = gx_numeric_pixelmap_prompt_format_function_set(
    &my_numeric_pix_prompt,
    my_format_function);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the format function of “my_numeric_pix_prompt” has been override. */
```

## <a name="gx_numeric_prompt_format_function_set"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-6546">gx_numeric_prompt_format_function_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-6546">gx_numeric_prompt_format_function_set</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-6547">Sostituzione della funzione Format del prompt numerico</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-6547">Override format function of numeric prompt</span></span>

```C

    GX_NUMERIC_PROMPT *prompt,
    VOID (*format_func)(GX_NUMERIC_PROMPT *, INT));
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-6549">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-6549">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-6550">Questo servizio esegue l'override della funzione di formattazione predefinita di un widget della richiesta numerica.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-6550">This service overrides the default format function of a numeric prompt widget.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-6551">La funzione Format predefinita converte il valore del prompt numerico in una stringa e lo archivia nel buffer privato del widget.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-6551">The default format function converts the numeric prompt value to a string and stores it in the widget’s private buffer.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-6552">Questo servizio consente all'applicazione di definire la propria funzione Format per formattare e archiviare il valore della richiesta numerica nel buffer privato del widget.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-6552">This service allows the application to define its own format function to format and store the numeric prompt value in the widget’s private buffer.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-6553">Parametri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-6553">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-6554">**messaggio di richiesta** Blocco di controllo della richiesta numerica</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-6554">**prompt** Numeric prompt control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-6555">**format_func** Funzione Format da impostare</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-6555">**format_func** Format function to be set</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-6556">Valori restituiti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-6556">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-6557">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) ha impostato correttamente la funzione di formato della richiesta numerica</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-6557">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successfully set numeric prompt format function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-6558">Puntatore a **GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) non valido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-6558">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-6559">Consentito da</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-6559">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-6560">Inizializzazione e thread</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-6560">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-6561">Esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-6561">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Define my numeric format function. */
VOID my_format_function(GX_NUMERIC_PROMPT *prompt, INT value)
{
    /* If the value is “1234”, the new format will be “12.34”. */

    INT length;
    gx_utility_ltoa(value / 100, prompt->gx_numeric_prompt_buffer,
        GX_NUMERIC_PROMPT_ BUFFER_SIZE);
    Length = GX_STRLEN(prompt->gx_numeric_prompt_buffer);
    prompt->gx_numeric_prompt_buffer[length++] = ‘.’;
    gx_utility_ltoa(value % 100,
        prompt->gx_numeric_prompt_buffer + length,
        GX_NUMERIC_PROMPT_BUFFER_SIZE - length);
}

/* Override the default format function of “my_numeric_prompt”. */
status = gx_numeric_prompt_format_function_set(&my_numeric_prompt,
    my_format_function);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS, the format function of “my_numeric_prompt” has been override. */
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-6587">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-6587">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-6588">Questo servizio crea un widget della rotellina di scorrimento numerico.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-6588">This service creates a numeric scroll wheel widget.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-6589">Una rotellina di scorrimento numerica è un tipo di widget della rotellina di scorrimento usato in modo specifico per la visualizzazione di un intervallo di numeri.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-6589">A numeric scroll wheel is a type of scroll wheel widget that is specifically used for displaying a range of numbers.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-6590">Sono disponibili anche altri tipi di widget della rotellina di scorrimento.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-6590">Other types of scroll wheel widgets are also available.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-6591">Per ulteriori informazioni sulla gerarchia dei widget della rotellina di scorrimento, sui tipi di widget e sulla derivazione dei widget, vedere l'API gx_scroll_wheel_create ().</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-6591">Refer to the gx_scroll_wheel_create() API for more information about the scroll wheel widget hierarchy, widget types, and widget derivation.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-6592">GX_NUMERIC_SCROLL_WHEEL deriva da GX_TEXT_SCROLL_WHEEL e supporta tutti i servizi di gx_text_scroll_wheel e gx_scroll_wheel.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-6592">GX_NUMERIC_SCROLL_WHEEL is derived from GX_TEXT_SCROLL_WHEEL and supports all gx_text_scroll_wheel and gx_scroll_wheel services.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-6593">Tutti i tipi di rotellina di scorrimento generano eventi GX_EVENT_LIST_SELECT al relativo padre quando viene eseguito lo scorrimento della rotellina di scorrimento.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-6593">All scroll wheel types generate GX_EVENT_LIST_SELECT events to their parent when the scroll wheel is scrolled.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-6594">Una rotellina di scorrimento numerica utilizzerà per impostazione predefinita ABS (end_val – start_val) + 1 righe.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-6594">A numeric scroll wheel will default to having abs(end_val – start_val) + 1 rows.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-6595">In altre parole, la rotellina di scorrimento visualizzerà ogni valore compreso tra start_val e end_val, l'incremento o il decremento di 1 a ogni riga.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-6595">In other words, the scroll wheel will display every value between start_val and end_val, incrementing or decrementing by 1 with each row.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-6596">Si noti che start_val può essere maggiore o minore di end_val, a seconda del modo in cui l'applicazione desidera che l'intervallo venga visualizzato.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-6596">Note that start_val can be greater or less than end_val, depending on which way the application wants the range to appear.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-6597">Se l'applicazione desidera modificare l'incremento della riga, è possibile eseguire questa operazione chiamando gx_scroll_wheel_total_rows_set () dopo la creazione della rotellina di scorrimento numerica.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-6597">If the application wants to change the row increment, it can do this by calling gx_scroll_wheel_total_rows_set() after creating the numeric scroll wheel.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-6598">Ad esempio, un'applicazione che vuole creare una rotellina di scorrimento che Visualizza i valori da anni 1980 a 2020, incrementando di 5, può eseguire questa operazione:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-6598">For example, an application wanting to create a scroll wheel that displays the values years 1980 to 2020, incrementing by 5, might do this:</span></span>

```C
gx_numeric_scroll_wheel_create(&wheel, GX_NULL, parent, 1980,
    2020, style, id, &size);

/* the years 1980 through 2020, inclusive, incrementing by 5 years,
yields 9 total rows */

gx_scroll_wheel_total_rows_set(&wheel, 9);
```

```C
/* Create “year_wheel”. */
status = gx_numeric_scroll_wheel_create(&year_wheel,
    “year_selector””, &parent,
    1980, 2040,
    GX_STYLE_ENABLED | GX_STYLE_TEXT_CENTER |
    GX_STYLE_TRANSPARENT | GX_STYLE_WRAP |
    GX_STYLE_TEXT_SCROLL_WHEEL_ROUND,
    YEAR_WHEEL_ID,
    &size);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the scroll wheel “year_wheel” has been created. */
```
