## <a name="gx_numeric_scroll_wheel_range_set"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-6635">gx_numeric_scroll_wheel_range_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-6635">gx_numeric_scroll_wheel_range_set</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-6636">Assegnare un intervallo di valori della rotellina di scorrimento numerica</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-6636">Assign value range of numeric scroll wheel</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-6637">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-6637">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT
gx_numeric_scroll_wheel_range_set(
    GX_NUMERIC_SCROLL_WHEEL *wheel,
    INT start_val, INT end_val);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-6638">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-6638">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-6639">Questo servizio modifica l'intervallo di valori consentiti e visualizzati da un widget della rotellina di scorrimento numerico.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-6639">This service modifies the range of values allowed and displayed by a numeric scroll wheel widget.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-6640">Una rotellina di scorrimento numerica è un tipo di widget della rotellina di scorrimento usato in modo specifico per la visualizzazione di un intervallo di numeri.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-6640">A numeric scroll wheel is a type of scroll wheel widget that is specifically used for displaying a range of numbers.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-6641">Sono disponibili anche altri tipi di widget della rotellina di scorrimento.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-6641">Other types of scroll wheel widgets are also available.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-6642">Per ulteriori informazioni sulla gerarchia dei widget della rotellina di scorrimento, sui tipi di widget e sulla derivazione dei widget, vedere l'API gx_scroll_wheel_create ().</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-6642">Refer to the gx_scroll_wheel_create() API for more information about the scroll wheel widget hierarchy, widget types, and widget derivation.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-6643">La chiamata di questa API Reimposta le righe totali della rotellina di scorrimento su ABS (end_val – start_val) + 1, ovvero la rotellina di scorrimento aumenterà di 1 per ogni riga.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-6643">Invoking this API resets the scroll wheel total rows to abs(end_val – start_val) + 1, meaning the scroll wheel will increment by 1 for each row.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-6644">Per modificare questa impostazione, l'applicazione può chiamare gx_scroll_wheel_total_rows_set () per modificare il numero totale di righe, modificando in effetti l'incremento del valore tra le righe.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-6644">To change this, the application can call gx_scroll_wheel_total_rows_set() to change the total number of row, effectively changing the value increment between rows.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-6645">Parametri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-6645">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-6646">**rotellina** Puntatore a blocco di controllo rotellina di scorrimento numerico</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-6646">**wheel** Pointer to numeric scroll wheel control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-6647">**start_val** Valore numerico iniziale</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-6647">**start_val** Starting numeric value</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-6648">**end_val** Valore numerico finale</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-6648">**end_val** Ending numeric value</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-6649">Valori restituiti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-6649">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-6650">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) ha impostato correttamente un intervallo di rotellina di scorrimento numerico</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-6650">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successfully set numeric scroll wheel range</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-6651">Puntatore a **GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) non valido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-6651">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-6652">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) chiamante non valido di questa funzione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-6652">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-6653">Consentito da</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-6653">Allowed From</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-6655">Esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-6655">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Change range of “rate” scroll wheel. */

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the scroll wheel range has been modified. */
```

## <a name="gx_pixelmap_button_create"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-6674">gx_pixelmap_button_create</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-6674">gx_pixelmap_button_create</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-6675">Pulsante Crea pixelmap</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-6675">Create pixelmap button</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-6676">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-6676">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_pixelmap_button_create(
    GX_PIXELMAP_BUTTON *button,
    GX_CONST GX_CHAR *name,
    GX_WIDGET *parent,
    GX_RESOURCE_ID normal_id,
    GX_RESOURCE_ID selected_id,
    GX_RESOURCE_ID disabled_id,
    ULONG style,
    USHORT pixelmap_button_id,
    GX_CONST GX_RECTANGLE *size);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-6677">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-6677">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-6678">Questo servizio crea un widget di pulsante Pixelmap.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-6678">This service creates a pixelmap button widget.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-6679">GX_PIXELMAP_BUTTON deriva da GX_BUTTON e supporta tutti i servizi di gx_button.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-6679">GX_PIXELMAP_BUTTON is derived from GX_BUTTON and supports all gx_button services.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-6681">**pulsante** Puntatore al blocco di controllo del pulsante pixelmap</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-6681">**button** Pointer to pixelmap button control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-6682">**nome** Nome logico del widget del pulsante pixelmap</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-6682">**name** Logical name of pixelmap button widget</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-6683">**elemento padre** Puntatore al widget padre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-6683">**parent** Pointer to the parent widget</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-6684">**normal_id** ID risorsa stato normale</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-6684">**normal_id** Normal state Resource ID</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-6685">**selected_id** ID risorsa stato selezionato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-6685">**selected_id** Selected state Resource ID</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-6686">**disabled_id** ID risorsa stato disabilitato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-6686">**disabled_id** Disabled state Resource ID</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-6687">**stile** Stile della casella di controllo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-6687">**style** Style of checkbox.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-6688">L' **Appendice D** contiene stili generali predefiniti per tutti i widget e per gli stili specifici dei widget.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-6688">**Appendix D** contains pre-defined general styles for all widgets as well as widget-specific styles.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-6689">**pixelmap_button_id** ID del pulsante Pixelmap definito dall'applicazione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-6689">**pixelmap_button_id** Application-defined ID of pixelmap button</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-6690">**dimensioni** Dimensioni del pulsante pixelmap</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-6690">**size** Dimensions of pixelmap button</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-6691">Valori restituiti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-6691">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-6692">Il pulsante Pixelmap è stato creato con **GX_SUCCESS** (0x00)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-6692">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successfully created pixelmap button</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-6693">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) chiamante non valido di questa funzione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-6693">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>

```C
    “my_pixelmap_button”, &my_parent,
    MY_NORMAL_RESOURCE_ID, MY_SELECTED_RESOURCE_ID,
```

## <a name="gx_pixelmap_button_draw"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-6721">gx_pixelmap_button_draw</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-6721">gx_pixelmap_button_draw</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-6722">Pulsante di Pixelmap di estrazione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-6722">Draw pixelmap button</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-6723">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-6723">Prototype</span></span>

```C
VOID gx_pixelmap_button_draw(GX_PIXELMAP_BUTTON *button);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-6724">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-6724">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-6725">Questo servizio disegna un widget di pulsante Pixelmap.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-6725">This service draws a pixelmap button widget.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-6726">Questa funzione viene in genere chiamata internamente dal meccanismo di aggiornamento Canvas di GUIX, ma viene esposta all'applicazione per facilitare l'implementazione di funzioni di disegno personalizzate per i widget personalizzati dei pulsanti di Pixelmap.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-6726">This function is normally called internally by the GUIX canvas refresh mechanism, but is exposed to the application to assist with implementing custom drawing functions for custom pixelmap button widgets.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-6727">Parametri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-6727">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-6728">**pulsante** Puntatore al blocco di controllo del pulsante pixelmap</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-6728">**button** Pointer to pixelmap button control block</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-6729">Valori restituiti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-6729">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-6730">**Nessuno**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-6730">**None**</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-6731">Consentito da</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-6731">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-6732">Thread</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-6732">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-6733">Esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-6733">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Write a custom pixelmap button drawing function. */

VOID my_pixelmap_button_draw(GX_PIXELMAP_BUTTON *button)
{
    /* Call default pixelmap button draw. */
    gx_pixelmap_button_draw(button);

    /* Add your own drawing here. */
}
```

```C
UINT gx_pixelmap_button_event_process(
    GX_PIXELMAP_BUTTON *button,
    GX_EVENT *event_ptr);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-6758">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-6758">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-6759">Questo servizio fornisce la gestione degli eventi predefinita per il tipo di widget del pulsante Pixelmap.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-6759">This service provides default event handling for the pixelmap button widget type.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-6760">Parametri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-6760">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-6761">**pulsante** Puntatore al blocco di controllo del pulsante pixelmap</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-6761">**button** Pointer to pixelmap button control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-6762">**event_ptr** Puntatore alla struttura GX_EVENT</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-6762">**event_ptr** Pointer to GX_EVENT structure</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-6763">Valori restituiti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-6763">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-6764">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Pixelmap pulsante di estrazione riuscita</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-6764">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful pixelmap button draw</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-6765">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) chiamante non valido di questa funzione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-6765">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-6766">Puntatore a **GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) non valido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-6766">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-6767">Consentito da</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-6767">Allowed From</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-6769">Esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-6769">Example</span></span>

```C
switch(event_ptr->gx_event_type)
{
    case GX_EVENT_SHOW:
        /* Do default handling. */
        status = gx_pixelmap_button_event_process(icon, event_ptr);
    
        /* add my own handling here */
        break;
}
```

## <a name="gx_pixelmap_button_pixelmap_set"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-6791">gx_pixelmap_button_pixelmap_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-6791">gx_pixelmap_button_pixelmap_set</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-6792">Pulsante assegna pixelmaps a</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-6792">Assign pixelmaps to button</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-6793">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-6793">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_pixelmap_button_pixelmap_set(
    GX_PIXELMAP_BUTTON *button, 
    GX_RESOURCE_ID normal_id,
    GX_RESOURCE_ID selected_id, 
    GX_RESOURCE_ID disabled_id);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-6794">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-6794">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-6795">Questo servizio imposta pixelmaps sul pulsante Pixelmap.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-6795">This service sets pixelmaps to the pixelmap button.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-6796">Parametri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-6796">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-6797">**pulsante** Puntatore al blocco di controllo del pulsante pixelmap</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-6797">**button** Pointer to pixelmap button control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-6798">**normal_id** ID risorsa del Pixelmap da usare come stato normale</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-6798">**normal_id** Resource ID of the pixelmap to be used as normal state</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-6799">**selected_id** ID risorsa del Pixelmap da usare quando si seleziona il pulsante</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-6799">**selected_id** Resource ID of the pixelmap to be used when the button is selected</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-6800">**disabled_id** ID risorsa del Pixelmap da utilizzare quando il pulsante è disabilitato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-6800">**disabled_id** Resource ID of the pixelmap to be used when the button is disabled</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-6801">Valori restituiti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-6801">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-6802">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) ha esito positivo imposta Pixelmap sul pulsante</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-6802">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful sets the pixelmap to the button</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-6803">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) chiamante non valido di questa funzione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-6803">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-6804">Puntatore a **GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) non valido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-6804">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-6805">Consentito da</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-6805">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-6806">Inizializzazione e thread</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-6806">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-6807">Esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-6807">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Draw “my_pixelmap_button”. */
status = gx_pixelmap_button_pixelmap_set (&my_pixelmap_button,
    NORMAL_ID, SELECTED_ID,
    DISABLED_ID);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the pixelmap button is properly configured with the specified pixelmaps. */
```

## <a name="gx_pixelmap_prompt_create"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-6829">gx_pixelmap_prompt_create</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-6829">gx_pixelmap_prompt_create</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-6830">Crea prompt pixelmap</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-6830">Create pixelmap prompt</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-6831">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-6831">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_pixelmap_prompt_create(
    GX_PIXELMAP_PROMPT *prompt,
    GX_CONST GX_CHAR *name,
    GX_WIDGET *parent,
    GX_RESOURCE_ID text_id,
    GX_RESOURCE_ID fill_pixelmap_id,
    ULONG style,
    USHORT pixelmap_prompt_id,
    GX_CONST GX_RECTANGLE *size);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-6832">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-6832">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-6833">Questo servizio crea un widget della richiesta di Pixelmap.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-6833">This service creates a pixelmap prompt widget.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-6834">Un prompt Pixelmap differisce da un GX_PROMPT standard in quanto dipinge lo sfondo del prompt usando pixelmaps.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-6834">A pixelmap prompt differs from a standard GX_PROMPT in that it paints the background of the prompt using pixelmaps.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-6835">La funzione Create accetta un ID Pixelmap, il normale riempimento dello stato Pixelmap.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-6835">The create function accepts one pixelmap id, the normal state fill pixelmap.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-6836">Al prompt di Pixelmap è possibile assegnare fino a sei pixelmaps.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-6836">Up to six pixelmaps may be assigned to the pixelmap prompt.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-6837">Parametri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-6837">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-6838">**messaggio di richiesta** Puntatore al blocco di controllo prompt pixelmap</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-6838">**prompt** Pointer to pixelmap prompt control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-6839">**nome** Nome logico del widget della richiesta di pixelmap</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-6839">**name** Logical name of pixelmap prompt widget</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-6840">**elemento padre** Puntatore al widget padre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-6840">**parent** Pointer to the parent widget</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-6841">**TEXT_ID** ID risorsa del testo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-6841">**text_id** Resource ID of text</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-6842">**fill_id** ID risorsa di riempimento</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-6842">**fill_id** Resource ID of fill</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-6843">**stile** Stile della casella di controllo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-6843">**style** Style of checkbox.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-6844">L' **Appendice D** contiene stili generali predefiniti per tutti i widget e per gli stili specifici dei widget.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-6844">**Appendix D** contains pre-defined general styles for all widgets as well as widget-specific styles.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-6845">**pixelmap_prompt_id** ID del prompt Pixelmap definito dall'applicazione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-6845">**pixelmap_prompt_id** Application-defined ID of pixelmap prompt</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-6846">**dimensioni** Dimensioni del prompt pixelmap</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-6846">**size** Dimensions of pixelmap prompt</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-6847">Valori restituiti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-6847">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-6848">Creazione della richiesta di Pixelmap riuscita di **GX_SUCCESS** (0x00)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-6848">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful pixelmap prompt create</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-6849">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) chiamante non valido di questa funzione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-6849">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-6850">Puntatore a **GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) non valido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-6850">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-6851">**GX_INVALID_SIZE** (0x19) dimensioni del blocco di controllo widget non valide</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-6851">**GX_INVALID_SIZE** (0x19) Invalid widget control block size</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-6852">Widget **GX_ALREADY_CREATED** (0x13) già creato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-6852">**GX_ALREADY_CREATED** (0x13) Widget already created</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-6853">Consentito da</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-6853">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-6854">Inizializzazione e thread</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-6854">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-6855">Esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-6855">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Create “my_pixelmap_prompt”. */
status = gx_pixelmap_prompt_create(&my_pixelmap_prompt,
    “my_pixelmap_prompt”, &my_parent,
    MY_TEXT_RESOURCE_ID, MY_LEFT_RESOURCE_ID,
    MY_FILL_RESOURCE_ID, MY_RIGHT_RESOURCE_ID,
    GX_STYLE_BORDER_RAISED, MY_PIXELMAP_PROMPT_ID,
    &size);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the pixelmap prompt “my_pixelmap_prompt” has been created. */
```

## <a name="gx_pixelmap_prompt_draw"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-6871">gx_pixelmap_prompt_draw</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-6871">gx_pixelmap_prompt_draw</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-6872">Estrai prompt pixelmap</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-6872">Draw pixelmap prompt</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-6873">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-6873">Prototype</span></span>

```C
VOID gx_pixelmap_prompt_draw(GX_PIXELMAP_PROMPT *prompt);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-6874">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-6874">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-6875">Questo servizio disegna un widget della richiesta di Pixelmap.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-6875">This service draws a pixelmap prompt widget.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-6876">Questa funzione viene in genere chiamata internamente dal meccanismo di aggiornamento Canvas di GUIX, ma viene esposta all'applicazione per facilitare l'implementazione di funzioni di disegno personalizzate per i widget personalizzati della richiesta di Pixelmap.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-6876">This function is normally called internally by the GUIX canvas refresh mechanism, but is exposed to the application to assist with implementing custom drawing functions for custom pixelmap prompt widgets.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-6877">Parametri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-6877">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-6878">**messaggio di richiesta** Puntatore al blocco di controllo prompt pixelmap</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-6878">**prompt** Pointer to pixelmap prompt control block</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-6879">Valori restituiti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-6879">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-6880">**Nessuno**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-6880">**None**</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-6881">Consentito da</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-6881">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-6882">Inizializzazione e thread</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-6882">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-6883">Esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-6883">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Write a custom pixelmap prompt drawing function. */

VOID my_pixelmap_button_draw(GX_PIXELMAP_PROMPT *prompt)
{
    /* Call default pixelmap prompt draw. */
    gx_pixelmap_prompt_draw(prompt);

    /* Add your own drawing here. */
}
```

## <a name="gx_pixelmap_prompt_pixelmap_set"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-6899">gx_pixelmap_prompt_pixelmap_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-6899">gx_pixelmap_prompt_pixelmap_set</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-6900">Assegna pixelmaps al prompt</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-6900">Assign pixelmaps to prompt</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-6901">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-6901">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_pixelmap_prompt_pixelmap_set(
    GX_PIXELMAP_PROMPT *prompt,
    GX_RESOURCE_ID normal_left_pixelmap,
    GX_RESOURCE_ID normal_fill_pixelmap,
    GX_RESOURCE_ID normal_right_pixelmap,
    GX_RESOURCE_ID selected_left_pixelmap,
    GX_RESOURCE_ID selected_fill_pixelmap,
    GX_RESOURCE_ID selected_right_pixelmap);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-6902">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-6902">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-6903">Questo servizio assegna gli ID Pixelmap al prompt di Pixelmap.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-6903">This service assigns pixelmap ids to the pixelmap prompt.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-6904">Gli ID Pixelmap a sinistra, riempimento e destro vengono usati per consentire all'applicazione di usare un set di pixelmaps per i prompt di diverse larghezze, ma un'altezza comune per risparmiare sui requisiti di archiviazione.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-6904">The left, fill, and right pixelmap ids are used to allow the application to use one set of pixelmaps for prompts of various widths but a common height to save on storage requirements.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-6905">Se gli ID sinistro e destro non vengono usati, devono essere impostati su 0.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-6905">If the left and right IDs are not used, they should be set to 0.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-6906">Se la richiesta deve essere disegnata in modo diverso quando ottiene lo stato attivo per l'input, gli ID Pixelmap selezionati vengono usati a tale scopo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-6906">If the prompt should draw itself differently when it gains input focus, the selected pixelmap ids are used for that purpose.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-6907">Se gli ID selezionati non vengono utilizzati o corrispondono agli ID normali, impostarli su 0.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-6907">If the selected ids are not used or are the same as the normal ids, set them to 0.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-6908">Parametri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-6908">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-6909">**messaggio di richiesta** Puntatore al blocco di controllo prompt pixelmap</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-6909">**prompt** Pointer to pixelmap prompt control block</span></span>

```C
/* Assign pixelmap IDs to “my_prompt”. Only the normal state pixelmaps are used in this case */
```

## <a name="gx_pixelmap_slider_create"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-6945">gx_pixelmap_slider_create</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-6945">gx_pixelmap_slider_create</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-6946">Crea dispositivo di scorrimento pixelmap</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-6946">Create pixelmap slider</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-6947">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-6947">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_pixelmap_slider_create(
    GX_PIXELMAP_SLIDER *slider,
    GX_CONST GX_CHAR *name, GX_WIDGET *parent,
    GX_SLIDER_INFO *info,
    GX_PIXELMAP_SLIDER_INFO *pixelmap_info, ULONG style,
    USHORT pixelmap_slider_id,
    GX_CONST GX_RECTANGLE *size);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-6948">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-6948">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-6949">Questo servizio crea un widget Pixelmap Slider.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-6949">This service creates a pixelmap slider widget.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-6950">Parametri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-6950">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-6951">**dispositivo di scorrimento** Puntatore al blocco di controllo dispositivo di scorrimento pixelmap</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-6951">**slider** Pointer to pixelmap slider control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-6952">**nome** Nome logico del widget dispositivo di scorrimento pixelmap</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-6952">**name** Logical name of pixelmap slider widget</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-6953">**elemento padre** Puntatore al widget padre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-6953">**parent** Pointer to the parent widget</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-6954">**informazioni** su Puntatore a una struttura di GX_SLIDER_INFO contenente valori che definiscono il valore minimo del dispositivo di scorrimento, il valore massimo, il valore corrente e i limiti della lancetta.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-6954">**info** Pointer to a GX_SLIDER_INFO structure which contains values defining the slider minimum value, maximum value, current value, and needle limits.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-6955">**Appendice I** contiene la definizione per la struttura GX_SLIDER_INFO.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-6955">**Appendix I** contains definition for GX_SLIDER_INFO structure.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-6956">**pixelmap_info** Puntatore a una struttura GX_PIXELMAP_SLIDER_INFO che definisce la pixelmaps utilizzata per creare lo sfondo e la lancetta del dispositivo di scorrimento.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-6956">**pixelmap_info** Pointer to a GX_PIXELMAP_SLIDER_INFO structure which defines the pixelmaps used to draw the slider background and needle.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-6957">**Appendice I** contiene la definizione per la struttura GX_PIXELMAP_SLIDER_INFO.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-6957">**Appendix I** contains definition for GX_PIXELMAP_SLIDER_INFO structure.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-6958">Lo sfondo del dispositivo di scorrimento può usare uno o due pixelmaps.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-6958">The slider background can use one or two pixelmaps.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-6959">Se uno, lo sfondo non cambia quando la lancetta viene spostata.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-6959">If one, the background does not change as the needle moves.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-6960">Se vengono definiti due sfondi, lo sfondo prima della lancetta usa il primo Pixelmap di sfondo e lo sfondo dopo la lancetta usa il secondo Pixelmap di sfondo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-6960">If two backgrounds are defined, the background before the needle uses the first background pixelmap, and the background after the needle uses the second background pixelmap.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-6961">**stile** Stile del dispositivo di scorrimento.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-6961">**style** Style of slider.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-6962">L' **Appendice D** contiene stili generali predefiniti per tutti i widget e per gli stili specifici dei widget.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-6962">**Appendix D** contains pre-defined general styles for all widgets as well as widget-specific styles.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-6963">**pixelmap_slider_id** ID definito dall'applicazione del dispositivo di scorrimento pixelmap</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-6963">**pixelmap_slider_id** Application-defined ID of pixelmap slider</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-6964">**dimensioni** Dimensioni del prompt pixelmap</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-6964">**size** Dimensions of pixelmap prompt</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-6965">Valori restituiti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-6965">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-6966">Il dispositivo di scorrimento Pixelmap è stato creato con **GX_SUCCESS** (0x00)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-6966">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successfully created pixelmap slider</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-6967">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) chiamante non valido di questa funzione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-6967">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-6968">Puntatore a **GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) non valido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-6968">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-6969">Widget **GX_ALREADY_CREATED** (0x13) già creato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-6969">**GX_ALREADY_CREATED** (0x13) Widget already created</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-6970">**GX_INVALID_SIZE** (0x19) dimensioni del blocco di controllo widget non valide</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-6970">**GX_INVALID_SIZE** (0x19) Invalid widget control block size</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-6971">Consentito da</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-6971">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-6972">Inizializzazione e thread</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-6972">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-6973">Esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-6973">Example</span></span>

```C
GX_SLIDER_INFO info;
GX_PIXELMAP_SLIDER_INFO pixelmap_info;

/* Initiate slider information structure. */
info.gx_slider_info_min_val = 0;
info.gx_slider_info_max_val = 100;
info.gx_slider_info_current_val = 50;
info.gx_slider_info_min_travel = 10;
info.gx_slider_info_max_tralvel = 10;
info.gx_slider_info_needle_width = 5;
info.gx_slider_info_needle_height = 10;
info.gx_slider_info_needle_inset = 5;
info.gx_slider_info_needle_hotspot_offset;

/* Initiate pixelmap slider information structure. */
pixelmap_info.gx_pixelmap_slider_info_lower_background_pixelmap =
                                        GX_PIXELMAP_ID_ORANGE;
pixelmap_info.gx_pixelmap_slider_info_upper_background_pixelmap =
                                        GX_PIXELMAP_ID_EMPTY;
pixelmap_info.gx_pixelmap_slider_info_needle_pixelmap =
                                        GX_PIXELMAP_ID_NEEDLE;

/* Create “my_pixelmap_slider”. */
status = gx_pixelmap_slider_create(&my_pixelmap_slider,
                            “my_pixelmap_slider”, &my_parent,
                            &info, &pixelmap_info,
                            GX_STYLE_BORDER_RAISED,
                            MY_PIXELMAP_SLIDER_ID, &size);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the pixelmap slider “my_pixelmap_slider” has been created. */
```

## <a name="gx_pixelmap_slider_draw"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-6993">gx_pixelmap_slider_draw</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-6993">gx_pixelmap_slider_draw</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-6994">Dispositivo di scorrimento Pixelmap disegnato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-6994">Draw pixelmap slider</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-6995">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-6995">Prototype</span></span>

```C
VOID gx_pixelmap_slider_draw(GX_PIXELMAP_SLIDER *slider);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-6996">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-6996">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-6997">Questo servizio disegna un widget dispositivo di scorrimento Pixelmap.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-6997">This service draws a pixelmap slider widget.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-6998">Questa funzione viene in genere chiamata internamente dal meccanismo di aggiornamento Canvas di GUIX, ma viene esposta all'applicazione per facilitare l'implementazione di funzioni di disegno personalizzate per i widget personalizzati del dispositivo di scorrimento Pixelmap.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-6998">This function is normally called internally by the GUIX canvas refresh mechanism, but is exposed to the application to assist with implementing custom drawing functions for custom pixelmap slider widgets.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-6999">Parametri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-6999">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-7000">**dispositivo di scorrimento** Puntatore al blocco di controllo dispositivo di scorrimento pixelmap</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-7000">**slider** Pointer to pixelmap slider control block</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-7001">Valori restituiti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-7001">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-7002">**Nessuno**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-7002">**None**</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-7003">Consentito da</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-7003">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-7004">Thread</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-7004">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-7005">Esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-7005">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Write a custom pixelmap slider drawing function. */

VOID my_pixelmap_slider_draw(GX_PIXELMAP_SLIDER *pixelmap_slider)
{
    /* Call default pixelmap slider draw. */
    gx_pixelmap_slider_draw(pixelmap_slider);

    /* Add your own drawing here. */
}
```

## <a name="gx_pixelmap_slider_event_process"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-7026">gx_pixelmap_slider_event_process</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-7026">gx_pixelmap_slider_event_process</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-7027">Evento del dispositivo di scorrimento Pixelmap processo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-7027">Process pixelmap slider event</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-7028">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-7028">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_pixelmap_slider_event_process(
    GX_PIXELMAP_SLIDER *slider,
    GX_EVENT *event);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-7029">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-7029">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-7030">Questo servizio elabora un evento per il widget del dispositivo di scorrimento Pixelmap specificato.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-7030">This service processes an event for the specified pixelmap slider widget.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-7031">Parametri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-7031">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-7032">**dispositivo di scorrimento** Puntatore a pixelmap</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-7032">**slider** Pointer to pixelmap</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-7033">Puntatore di un evento del blocco di controllo **Slider** a un evento da elaborare</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-7033">**slider** control block event Pointer to event to process</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-7034">Valori restituiti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-7034">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-7035">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) processo dell'evento Slider Pixelmap riuscito</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-7035">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful pixelmap slider event process</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-7036">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) chiamante non valido di questa funzione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-7036">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-7037">Puntatore a **GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) non valido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-7037">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-7038">Widget **GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) non valido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-7038">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-7039">Consentito da</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-7039">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-7040">Inizializzazione e thread</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-7040">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-7041">Esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-7041">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Write a custom event processing function. */
UINT my_event_hanlder(GX_PIXELMAP_SLIDER *pixelmap_slider, GX_EVENT *event_ptr)
{
    switch(event_ptr->gx_event_type)
    {
    case GX_EVENT_SHOW:
        /* Do default handling. */
        status = gx_pixelmap_slider_event_process(pixelmap_slider,
                                                    event_ptr);

        /* add my own handling here */
        break;
    default:
        status = gx_pixelmap_slider_event_process(pixelmap_slider,
                                                  event_ptr);
        break;
    }
    return status;
}
```

## <a name="gx_pixelmap_slider_pixelmap_set"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-7062">gx_pixelmap_slider_pixelmap_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-7062">gx_pixelmap_slider_pixelmap_set</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-7063">Assegnare pixelmaps al dispositivo di scorrimento</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-7063">Assign pixelmaps to slider</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-7064">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-7064">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_pixelmap_slider_pixelmap_set(
    GX_PIXELMAP_SLIDER *slider,
    GX_PIXELMAP_SLIDER_INFO *pixinfo);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-7065">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-7065">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-7066">Questo servizio imposta pixelmaps sul dispositivo di scorrimento Pixelmap.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-7066">This service sets pixelmaps to the pixelmap slider.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-7067">Parametri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-7067">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-7068">**dispositivo di scorrimento** Puntatore al blocco di controllo dispositivo di scorrimento pixelmap</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-7068">**slider** Pointer to pixelmap slider control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-7069">**pixinfo** Puntatore a una struttura GX_PIXELMAP_SLIDER_INFO che definisce la pixelmaps utilizzata per creare lo sfondo e la lancetta del dispositivo di scorrimento.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-7069">**pixinfo** Pointer to a GX_PIXELMAP_SLIDER_INFO structure which defines the pixelmaps used to draw the slider background and needle.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-7070">**Appendice I** contiene la definizione per la struttura GX_PIXELMAP_SLIDER_INFO.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-7070">**Appendix I** contains definition for GX_PIXELMAP_SLIDER_INFO structure.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-7071">Lo sfondo del dispositivo di scorrimento può usare uno o due pixelmaps.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-7071">The slider background can use one or two pixelmaps.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-7072">Se uno, lo sfondo non cambia quando la lancetta viene spostata.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-7072">If one, the background does not change as the needle moves.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-7073">Se vengono definiti due sfondi, lo sfondo prima della lancetta usa il primo Pixelmap di sfondo e lo sfondo dopo la lancetta usa il secondo Pixelmap di sfondo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-7073">If two backgrounds are defined, the background before the needle uses the first background pixelmap, and the background after the needle uses the second background pixelmap.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-7074">Valori restituiti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-7074">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-7075">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) ha esito positivo imposta Pixelmap sul dispositivo di scorrimento</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-7075">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful sets the pixelmap to the slider</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-7076">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) chiamante non valido di questa funzione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-7076">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-7077">Puntatore a **GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) non valido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-7077">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-7078">Consentito da</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-7078">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-7079">Inizializzazione e thread</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-7079">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-7080">Esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-7080">Example</span></span>

```C
GX_PIXELMAP_SLIDER_INFO pixelmap_info;

/* Initiate pixelmap slider information structure. */
pixelmap_info.gx_pixelmap_slider_info_lower_background_pixelmap =
                                        GX_PIXELMAP_ID_ORANGE;
pixelmap_info.gx_pixelmap_slider_info_upper_background_pixelmap =
                                        GX_PIXELMAP_ID_EMPTY;
pixelmap_info.gx_pixelmap_slider_info_needle_pixelmap =
                                        GX_PIXELMAP_ID_NEEDLE;

/* Draw “my_pixelmap_button”. */
status = gx_pixelmap_slider _pixelmap_set (&my_pixelmap_slider,
                                &pixelmap_info);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the pixelmap slider is properly configured with “pixelmap_info”. */
```

## <a name="gx_progress_bar_background_draw"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-7102">gx_progress_bar_background_draw</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-7102">gx_progress_bar_background_draw</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-7103">Sfondo indicatore di stato disegnato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-7103">Draw progress bar background</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-7104">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-7104">Prototype</span></span>

```C
VOID gx_progress_bar_background_draw(GX_PROGRESS_BAR *progress_bar)
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-7105">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-7105">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-7106">Questo servizio disegna lo sfondo dell'indicatore di stato specificato.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-7106">This service draws the background of the specified progress bar.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-7107">Questa funzione viene chiamata internamente come parte del gx_progress_bar_draw (), ma viene esposta all'applicazione per supportare i casi in cui l'applicazione definisce una funzione di disegno di un indicatore di stato personalizzato.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-7107">This function is called internally as part of the gx_progress_bar_draw(), but is exposed to the application to support those cases where the application defines a custom progress bar drawing function.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-7108">Parametri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-7108">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-7109">**indicatore di stato** Puntatore al blocco di controllo indicatore di stato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-7109">**progress bar** Pointer to progress bar control block</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-7110">Valori restituiti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-7110">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-7111">**Nessuno**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-7111">**None**</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-7112">Consentito da</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-7112">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-7113">Thread</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-7113">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-7114">Esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-7114">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Write a custom progress bar drawing function. */

VOID my_progress_bar_draw(GX_PROGRESS_BAR *progress_bar)
{
    /* Call default progress bar background draw. */
    gx_progress_bar_background_draw(progress_bar);

    /* Call default progress bar text draw. */
    gx_progress_bar_text_draw(progress_bar);

    /* Add your own drawing here. */
}
```

## <a name="gx_progress_bar_create"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-7125">gx_progress_bar_create</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-7125">gx_progress_bar_create</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-7126">Creazione di un indicatore di stato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-7126">Create a progress bar</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-7127">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-7127">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_progress_bar_create(
    GX_PROGRESS_BAR *progress_bar,
    GX_CONST GX_CHAR *name,
    GX_WIDGET *parent,
    GX_PROGRESS_BAR_INFO *progress_bar_info,
    ULONG style, 
    USHORT progress_bar_id, 
    GX_CONST GX_RECTANGLE *size);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-7128">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-7128">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-7129">Questo servizio crea un widget indicatore di stato.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-7129">This service creates a progress bar widget.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-7130">Parametri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-7130">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-7131">**progress_bar** Blocco di controllo indicatore di stato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-7131">**progress_bar** Progress bar control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-7132">**nome** Nome logico</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-7132">**name** Logical name</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-7133">**elemento padre** Puntatore al widget padre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-7133">**parent** Pointer to the parent widget</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-7134">**progress_bar_info** Puntatore a una struttura GX_PROGRESS_BAR_INFO.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-7134">**progress_bar_info** Pointer to a GX_PROGRESS_BAR_INFO structure.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-7135">**Appendice I** contiene la definizione per la struttura GX_PROGRESS_BAR_INFO.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-7135">**Appendix I** contains definition for GX_PROGRESS_BAR_INFO structure.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-7136">**stile** Stile dell'indicatore di stato.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-7136">**style** Style of progress bar.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-7137">L' **Appendice D** contiene stili generali predefiniti per tutti i widget e per gli stili specifici dei widget.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-7137">**Appendix D** contains pre-defined general styles for all widgets as well as widget-specific styles.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-7138">**progress_bar_id** ID dell'indicatore di stato definito dall'applicazione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-7138">**progress_bar_id** Application-defined ID of progress bar</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-7139">**dimensioni** Dimensioni dell'indicatore di stato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-7139">**size** Dimensions of progress bar</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-7140">Valori restituiti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-7140">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-7141">Creazione barra di avanzamento **GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) riuscita</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-7141">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful progress bar create</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-7142">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) chiamante non valido di questa funzione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-7142">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-7143">Puntatore a **GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) non valido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-7143">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-7144">Widget **GX_ALREADY_CREATED** (0x13) già creato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-7144">**GX_ALREADY_CREATED** (0x13) Widget already created</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-7145">**GX_INVALID_SIZE** (0x19) dimensioni del blocco di controllo widget non valide</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-7145">**GX_INVALID_SIZE** (0x19) Invalid widget control block size</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-7146">Il widget padre **GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) non è valido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-7146">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Parent widget not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-7147">Consentito da</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-7147">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-7148">Inizializzazione e thread</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-7148">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-7149">Esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-7149">Example</span></span>

```C
GX_PROGRESS_BAR_INFO info;
GX_RECTANGLE size;

info.gx_progress_bar_info_min_val = 0;
info.gx_progress_bar_info_max_val = 100;
info.gx_progress_bar_info_current_val = 0;
info.gx_progress_bar_font_id = GX_FONT_ID_SYSTEM_FONT;
info.gx_progress_bar_normal_text_color = GX_COLOR_ID_WHITE;
info.gx_progress_bar_selected_text_color = GX_COLOR_ID_BLUE;
info.gx_progress_bar_fill_pixelmap = 0;

size.gx_rectangle_left = 10;
size.gx_rectangle_top = 10;
size.gx_rectangle_right = 110;
size.gx_rectangle_bottom = 140;

/* Create a progress bar with the specified information. */
status = gx_progress_bar_create(&my_progress_bar, GX_NULL, GX_NULL,
                        &info, GX_STYLE_BORDER_THIN,
                        0, &size);

/* If status is GX_SUCSESS the progress bar “my_progress_bar” has been successfully created. */
```

## <a name="gx_progress_bar_draw"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-7160">gx_progress_bar_draw</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-7160">gx_progress_bar_draw</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-7161">Creare un indicatore di stato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-7161">Draw a progress bar</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-7162">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-7162">Prototype</span></span>

```C
VOID gx_progress_bar_draw(GX_PROGRESS_BAR *progress_bar);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-7163">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-7163">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-7164">Questo servizio disegna un widget indicatore di stato.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-7164">This service draws a progress bar widget.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-7165">Questa funzione viene in genere chiamata internamente dal meccanismo di aggiornamento Canvas di GUIX, ma viene esposta all'applicazione per facilitare l'implementazione di funzioni di disegno personalizzate per i widget personalizzati dell'indicatore di stato.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-7165">This function is normally called internally by the GUIX canvas refresh mechanism, but is exposed to the application to assist with implementing custom drawing functions for custom progress bar widgets.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-7166">Parametri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-7166">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-7167">**progress_bar** Blocco di controllo indicatore di stato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-7167">**progress_bar** Progress bar control block</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-7168">Valori restituiti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-7168">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-7169">**Nessuno**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-7169">**None**</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-7170">Consentito da</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-7170">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-7171">Thread</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-7171">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-7172">Esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-7172">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Write a custom progress bar drawing function. */

VOID my_progress_bar_draw(GX_PROGRESS_BAR *progress_bar)
{
    /* Call default progress bar draw. */
    gx_progress_bar_draw(progress_bar);

    /* Add your own drawing here. */
}
```

<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-7187">Questo servizio elabora un evento indicatore di stato.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-7187">This service processes a progress bar event.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-7188">Parametri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-7188">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-7190">**event_ptr** Puntatore alla struttura GX_EVENT</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-7190">**event_ptr** Pointer to GX_EVENT structure</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-7191">Valori restituiti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-7191">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-7192">Creazione della richiesta di conferma **GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) riuscita</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-7192">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful prompt create</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-7193">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) chiamante non valido di questa funzione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-7193">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-7194">Puntatore a **GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) non valido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-7194">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-7195">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) widget non valido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-7195">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Invalid widget</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-7196">Consentito da</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-7196">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-7197">Inizializzazione e thread</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-7197">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-7198">Esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-7198">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Write a custom event processing function. */

UINT my_event_process (GX_PROGRESS_BAR *progress_bar, GX_EVENT *event_ptr)
{
    switch(event_ptr->gx_event_type)
    {
    case GX_EVENT_SHOW:
        /* Do default handling. */
        status = gx_progress_bar_event_process(progress_bar,
                                                event_ptr);
        /* add my own handling here */
        break;
    default:
        status = gx_progress_bar_event_process(progress_bar,
                                                event_ptr);
        break;
    }
    return status;
}
```

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-7239">Parametri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-7239">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-7245">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) chiamante non valido di questa funzione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-7245">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-7249">Esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-7249">Example</span></span>

```C
GX_PROGRESS_BAR_INFO info;

info.gx_progress_bar_info_min_val = 0;
info.gx_progress_bar_info_max_val = 100;
info.gx_progress_bar_info_current_val = 0;
info.gx_progress_bar_font_id = GX_FONT_ID_SYSTEM_FONT;
info.gx_progress_bar_normal_text_color = GX_COLOR_ID_WHITE;
info.gx_progress_bar_selected_text_color = GX_COLOR_ID_BLUE;
info.gx_progress_bar_fill_pixelmap = 0;

status = gx_progress_bar_info_set(&progress_bar, &info);

/* if status == GX_SUCCESS the progress bar info was re-assigned. */
```

## <a name="gx_progress_bar_text_color_set"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-7311">gx_progress_bar_text_color_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-7311">gx_progress_bar_text_color_set</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-7312">Imposta il colore del testo di un indicatore di stato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-7312">Set the text color of a progress bar</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-7313">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-7313">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_progress_bar_text_color_set(
    GX_PROGRESS_BAR *progress_bar,
    GX_RESOURCE_ID normal_text_color,
    GX_RESOURCE_ID selected_text_color,
    GX_RESOURCE_ID disabled_text_color);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-7314">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-7314">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-7315">Questo servizio imposta il colore del testo di un widget dell'indicatore di stato.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-7315">This service sets the text color of a progress bar widget.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-7316">Parametri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-7316">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-7317">**progress_bar** Blocco di controllo indicatore di stato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-7317">**progress_bar** Progress bar control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-7318">**normal_text_color** ID di risorsa del normale colore del testo usato nello stato normale</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-7318">**normal_text_color** Resource ID of normal text color that used in normal state</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-7319">**selected_text_color** ID risorsa del colore del testo selezionato usato quando il widget ottiene lo stato attivo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-7319">**selected_text_color** Resource ID of selected text color that used when the widget gain focus</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-7320">**disabled_text_color** ID risorsa del colore del testo disabilitato usato quando GX_STYLE_ENABLED non è attivo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-7320">**disabled_text_color** Resource ID of disabled text color that used when GX_STYLE_ENABLED is not active</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-7321">Valori restituiti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-7321">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-7322">Set di colori del testo della barra di stato **GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) riuscita</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-7322">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful progress bar text color set</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-7323">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) chiamante non valido di questa funzione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-7323">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-7324">Puntatore a **GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) non valido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-7324">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-7325">Consentito da</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-7325">Allowed From</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-7327">Esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-7327">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Set text colors for the progress bar “my_progress_bar”*/
UINT status = gx_progress_bar_text_color_set(&my_progress_bar,
                        GX_COLOR_ID_NORMAL_TEXT,
                        GX_COLOR_ID_SELECTED_TEXT,
                        GX_COLOR_ID_DISABLED_TEXT);

/* if status is GX_SUCCESS, the progress bar text colors were successfully assigned. */
```

## <a name="gx_progress_bar_text_draw"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-7338">gx_progress_bar_text_draw</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-7338">gx_progress_bar_text_draw</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-7339">Estrai testo indicatore di stato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-7339">Draw progress bar text</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-7340">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-7340">Prototype</span></span>

```C
VOID gx_progress_bar_text_draw(GX_PROGRESS_BAR *progress_bar)
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-7341">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-7341">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-7342">Questo servizio disegna il testo dell'indicatore di stato specificato.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-7342">This service draws the text of specified progress bar.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-7343">Questa funzione viene chiamata internamente come parte del gx_progress_bar_draw (), ma viene esposta all'applicazione per supportare i casi in cui l'applicazione definisce una funzione di disegno di un indicatore di stato personalizzato.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-7343">This function is called internally as part of the gx_progress_bar_draw(), but is exposed to the application to support those cases where the application defines a custom progress bar drawing function.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-7344">Parametri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-7344">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-7345">**indicatore di stato** Puntatore al blocco di controllo indicatore di stato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-7345">**progress bar** Pointer to progress bar control block</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-7346">Valori restituiti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-7346">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-7347">**Nessuno**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-7347">**None**</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-7348">Consentito da</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-7348">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-7349">Thread</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-7349">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-7350">Esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-7350">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Write a custom progress bar drawing function. */

VOID my_progress_bar_draw(GX_PROGRESS_BAR *progress_bar)
{
    /* Call default progress bar background draw. */
    gx_progress_bar_background_draw(progress_bar);

    /* Call default progress bar text draw. */
    gx_progress_bar_text_draw(progress_bar);

    /* Add your own drawing here. */
}
```

## <a name="gx_progress_bar_value_set"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-7361">gx_progress_bar_value_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-7361">gx_progress_bar_value_set</span></span>

```C
    GX_PROGRESS_BAR *progress_bar,
    INT value);
```

<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-7365">Questo servizio assegna il valore corrente dell'indicatore di stato.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-7365">This service assigns the progress bar current value.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-7366">Il widget indicatore di stato verrà invalidato e ridisegnato automaticamente quando viene modificato il valore dell'indicatore di stato.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-7366">The progress bar widget will automatically invalidate and redraw itself when the progress bar value is changed.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-7367">Parametri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-7367">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-7369">**valore** di Valore corrente indicatore di stato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-7369">**value** Progress bar current value</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-7370">Valori restituiti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-7370">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-7371">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) ha completato l'impostazione del valore dell'indicatore di stato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-7371">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful set the value of the progress bar</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-7372">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) chiamante non valido di questa funzione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-7372">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
