## <a name="gx_prompt_create"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-7387">gx_prompt_create</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-7387">gx_prompt_create</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-7388">Crea richiesta</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-7388">Create prompt</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-7389">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-7389">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_prompt_create(
    GX_PROMPT *prompt, 
    GX_CONST GX_CHAR *name,
    GX_WIDGET *parent, 
    GX_RESOURCE_ID text_id,
    ULONG style, 
    USHORT prompt_id,
    GX_CONST GX_RECTANGLE *size);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-7390">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-7390">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-7391">Questo servizio crea un widget di richiesta.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-7391">This service creates a prompt widget.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-7392">GX_PROMPT deriva da GX_WIDGET e supporta tutti i servizi di gx_widget.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-7392">GX_PROMPT is derived from GX_WIDGET and supports all gx_widget services.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-7393">Parametri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-7393">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-7394">**Puntatore** al widget padre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-7394">**Pointer** to the parent widget</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-7395">**TEXT_ID** ID risorsa del testo della richiesta</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-7395">**text_id** Resource ID of prompt text</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-7396">**stile** Stile della richiesta.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-7396">**style** Style of prompt.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-7397">L' **Appendice D** contiene stili generali predefiniti per tutti i widget e per gli stili specifici dei widget.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-7397">**Appendix D** contains pre-defined general styles for all widgets as well as widget-specific styles.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-7398">**prompt_id** ID della richiesta definito dall'applicazione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-7398">**prompt_id** Application-defined ID of prompt</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-7399">**dimensioni** Dimensioni del messaggio di richiesta</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-7399">**size** Dimensions of prompt</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-7400">Valori restituiti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-7400">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-7401">Creazione della richiesta di conferma **GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) riuscita</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-7401">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful prompt create</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-7402">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) chiamante non valido di questa funzione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-7402">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-7403">Puntatore a **GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) non valido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-7403">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-7404">Widget **GX_ALREADY_CREATED** (0x13) già creato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-7404">**GX_ALREADY_CREATED** (0x13) Widget already created</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-7405">**GX_INVALID_SIZE** (0x19) dimensioni del blocco di controllo widget non valide</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-7405">**GX_INVALID_SIZE** (0x19) Invalid widget control block size</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-7406">Consentito da</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-7406">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-7407">Inizializzazione e thread</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-7407">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-7408">Esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-7408">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Create “my_prompt”. */
status = gx_prompt_create(&my_prompt, “my_promPt”, &my_parent,
                    MY_PROMPT_TEXT_RESOURCE_ID,
                    GX_STYLE_BORDER_RAISED, MY_PROPMT_ID, &size);

```

## <a name="gx_prompt_draw"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-7420">gx_prompt_draw</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-7420">gx_prompt_draw</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-7421">Richiesta di estrazione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-7421">Draw prompt</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-7422">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-7422">Prototype</span></span>

```C
VOID gx_prompt_draw(GX_PROMPT *prompt);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-7423">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-7423">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-7424">Questo servizio disegna un widget di richiesta.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-7424">This service draws a prompt widget.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-7425">Questo servizio viene chiamato internamente da GUIX durante l'aggiornamento Canvas, ma può essere chiamato anche dalle funzioni di disegno personalizzate.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-7425">This service is called internally by GUIX during canvas refresh, but can also be called by custom drawing functions.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-7428">Valori restituiti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-7428">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-7429">**Nessuno**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-7429">**None**</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-7430">Consentito da</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-7430">Allowed From</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-7432">Esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-7432">Example</span></span>

```C
    /* Add your own drawing here. */
}
```

## <a name="gx_prompt_event_process"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-7444">gx_prompt_event_process</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-7444">gx_prompt_event_process</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-7445">Evento di richiesta di elaborazione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-7445">Process prompt event</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-7446">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-7446">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_prompt_event_process(GX_PROMPT *prompt, GX_EVENT *event_ptr);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-7447">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-7447">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-7448">Questo servizio elabora un evento per la richiesta specificata.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-7448">This service processes an event for the specified prompt.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-7449">Questo servizio deve essere chiamato come gestore eventi predefinito da qualsiasi funzione di elaborazione di eventi di richiesta personalizzata.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-7449">This service should be called as the default event handler by any custom prompt event processing functions.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-7450">Parametri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-7450">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-7451">**messaggio di richiesta** Puntatore al blocco di controllo prompt</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-7451">**prompt** Pointer to prompt control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-7452">**event_ptr** Puntatore all'evento da elaborare</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-7452">**event_ptr** Pointer to the event to process</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-7453">Valori restituiti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-7453">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-7454">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) processo dell'evento di richiesta riuscita</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-7454">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful prompt event process</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-7455">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) chiamante non valido di questa funzione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-7455">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-7456">Puntatore a **GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) non valido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-7456">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-7457">Widget **GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) non valido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-7457">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-7458">Consentito da</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-7458">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-7459">Thread</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-7459">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-7460">Esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-7460">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Call generic prompt event processing as part of custom event processing function. */

UINT custom_prompt_event_process(GX_PROMPT *prompt, GX_EVENT *event)
{
    UINT status = GX_SUCCESS;

    switch(event->gx_event_type)
    {
    case xyz:
        /* Insert custom event handling here */
        break;

    default:
        /* Pass all other events to the default prompt event processing */
        status = gx_prompt_event_process(prompt, event);
        break;
    }
    return status;
}
```

## <a name="gx_prompt_text_color_set"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-7499">gx_prompt_text_color_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-7499">gx_prompt_text_color_set</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-7500">Imposta il colore del testo della richiesta</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-7500">Set prompt text color</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-7501">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-7501">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_prompt_text_color_set(
    GX_PROMPT *prompt,
    GX_RESOURCE_ID normal_color,
    GX_RESOURCE_ID selected_color,
    GX_RESOURCE_ID disabled_color);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-7502">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-7502">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-7503">Questo servizio imposta il colore del testo di un widget di richiesta.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-7503">This service sets the text color of a prompt widget.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-7504">Parametri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-7504">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-7505">**messaggio di richiesta** Puntatore a prompt del blocco di controllo widget</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-7505">**prompt** Pointer to prompt widget control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-7506">**normal_color** ID risorsa di colore per il testo normale.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-7506">**normal_color** Resource ID of color for normal text.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-7507">**L'Appendice A** contiene ID di risorsa colore predefiniti.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-7507">**Appendix A** contains pre-defined color Resource IDs.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-7508">Si noti che l'applicazione può aggiungere anche ID di risorse colore personalizzati.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-7508">Note that the application may add custom color Resource IDs as well.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-7509">**selected_color** ID risorsa di colore per il testo selezionato, usato quando il widget ottiene lo stato attivo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-7509">**selected_color** Resource ID of color for selected text, used when the widget gain focus.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-7510">**L'Appendice A** contiene ID di risorsa colore predefiniti.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-7510">**Appendix A** contains pre-defined color Resource IDs.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-7511">Si noti che l'applicazione può aggiungere anche ID di risorse colore personalizzati.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-7511">Note that the application may add custom color Resource IDs as well.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-7512">**disabled_color** ID risorsa di colore per il testo disabilitato, utilizzato quando GX_STYLE_ENABLED non è attivo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-7512">**disabled_color** Resource ID of color for disabled text, used when GX_STYLE_ENABLED is not active.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-7513">**L'Appendice A** contiene ID di risorsa colore predefiniti.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-7513">**Appendix A** contains pre-defined color Resource IDs.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-7514">Si noti che l'applicazione può aggiungere anche ID di risorse colore personalizzati.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-7514">Note that the application may add custom color Resource IDs as well.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-7515">Valori restituiti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-7515">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-7516">Set di colori del testo della richiesta di conferma **GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) completato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-7516">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful prompt text color set</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-7517">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) chiamante non valido di questa funzione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-7517">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-7518">Puntatore a **GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) non valido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-7518">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-7519">Dimensioni del widget **GX_INVALID_WIDGET_SIZE** (0X14) non valide</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-7519">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET_SIZE** (0x14) Invalid widget size</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-7520">Consentito da</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-7520">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-7521">Inizializzazione e thread</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-7521">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-7522">Esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-7522">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Set the text color of “my_prompt”. */
status = gx_prompt_text_color_set(&my_prompt,
                    GX_COLOR_ID_BLACK,
                    GX_COLOR_ID_LIGHTGRAY,
                    GX_COLOR_ID_DISABLED_TEXT);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the text color for prompt “my_prompt” has been set. */
```

## <a name="gx_prompt_text_draw"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-7534">gx_prompt_text_draw</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-7534">gx_prompt_text_draw</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-7535">Funzione di supporto del disegno</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-7535">Drawing support function</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-7536">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-7536">Prototype</span></span>

```C
VOID gx_prompt_text_draw(GX_PROMPT *prompt);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-7537">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-7537">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-7538">Questa funzione di supporto disegna la parte di testo di un messaggio di richiesta.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-7538">This support function draws the text portion of a prompt.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-7539">Questa funzione viene chiamata internamente da gx_prompt_draw () e viene fornita come API separata per praticità per le applicazioni che definiscono una funzione di disegno di prompt personalizzato.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-7539">This function is called internally by gx_prompt_draw(), and is provided as a separate API as a convenience for applications that define a custom prompt drawing function.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-7540">Le applicazioni che desiderano personalizzare il disegno in background della richiesta possono fornire la funzione di disegno personalizzata e richiamare il servizio gx_prompt_text_draw come parte del disegno personalizzato per disegnare il testo del messaggio di richiesta sullo sfondo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-7540">Applications that want to customize the prompt background drawing can provide their custom drawing function, and invoke the gx_prompt_text_draw service as part of their custom drawing to draw the prompt text over the background.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-7541">Parametri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-7541">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-7542">**messaggio di richiesta** Puntatore al blocco di controllo prompt</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-7542">**prompt** Pointer to the prompt control block</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-7543">Valori restituiti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-7543">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-7544">**Nessuno**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-7544">**None**</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-7545">Consentito da</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-7545">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-7546">Thread</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-7546">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-7547">Esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-7547">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Define a custom drawing function */
VOID my_prompt_draw(GX_PROMPT *prompt)
{
    /* insert code here to draw prompt background */

    /* call support function to do text drawing */
    gx_prompt_text_draw();

    /* draw child widgets */
    gx_widget_children_draw((GX_WIDGET *) prompt);
}
```

## <a name="gx_prompt_text_get"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-7559">gx_prompt_text_get</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-7559">gx_prompt_text_get</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-7560">Ottenere il testo della richiesta (deprecato)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-7560">Get prompt text (deprecated)</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-7561">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-7561">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_prompt_text_get(
    GX_PROMPT *prompt, 
    GX_CHAR **return_text);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-7562">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-7562">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-7563">Questo servizio è deprecato a favore di gx_prompt_text_get_ext ().</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-7563">This service is deprecated in favor of gx_prompt_text_get_ext().</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-7564">Questo servizio ottiene il testo di un widget di richiesta.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-7564">This service gets the text of a prompt widget.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-7565">Parametri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-7565">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-7566">**messaggio di richiesta** Puntatore a prompt del blocco di controllo widget</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-7566">**prompt** Pointer to prompt widget control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-7567">**return_text** Puntatore alla destinazione per il testo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-7567">**return_text** Pointer to destination for text</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-7568">Valori restituiti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-7568">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-7569">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) il testo della richiesta Get riuscito</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-7569">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful prompt text get</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-7570">Puntatore a **GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) non valido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-7570">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-7571">Widget **GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) non valido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-7571">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-7572">Consentito da</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-7572">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-7573">Inizializzazione e thread</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-7573">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-7574">Esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-7574">Example</span></span>

```C
GX_PROMPT my_prompt;
GX_CHAR *my_prompt_text;

/* Get the text of “my_prompt”. */
status = gx_prompt_text_get(&my_prompt, &my_prompt_text);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the pointer “my_prompt_text” points to the text displayed by “my_prompt”. */
```

<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-7587">Ottenere il testo della richiesta</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-7587">Get prompt text</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-7588">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-7588">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_prompt_text_get(
    GX_PROMPT *prompt, 
    GX_STRING *return_string);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-7589">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-7589">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-7590">Questo servizio ottiene la stringa di un widget di richiesta.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-7590">This service gets the string of a prompt widget.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-7591">Parametri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-7591">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-7592">**messaggio di richiesta** Puntatore a prompt del blocco di controllo widget</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-7592">**prompt** Pointer to prompt widget control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-7593">**return_string** Puntatore alla destinazione per la stringa</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-7593">**return_string** Pointer to destination for string</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-7594">Valori restituiti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-7594">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-7596">Puntatore a **GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) non valido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-7596">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-7597">Widget **GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) non valido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-7597">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>

```C

GX_STRING my_prompt_string;

/* Get the text of “my_prompt”. */

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS then my_prompt_string has been initialize to hold a copy of the prompt string. */
```

## <a name="gx_prompt_text_set"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-7639">gx_prompt_text_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-7639">gx_prompt_text_set</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-7640">Imposta testo richiesta (deprecato)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-7640">Set prompt text (deprecated)</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-7641">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-7641">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_prompt_text_set(
    GX_PROMPT *prompt, 
    GX_CHAR *text);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-7642">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-7642">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-7643">Questo servizio è stato deprecato a favore di gx_prompt_text_set_ext ().</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-7643">This service has been deprecated in favor of gx_prompt_text_set_ext().</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-7644">Questo servizio imposta il testo di un widget di richiesta.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-7644">This service sets the text of a prompt widget.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-7645">Se il widget di richiesta è stato creato con lo stile GX_STYLE_TEXT_COPY, il widget crea una copia privata della stringa di testo assegnata.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-7645">If the prompt widget was created with style GX_STYLE_TEXT_COPY, the widget creates a private copy of the text string assigned.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-7646">Se GX_STYLE_TEXT_COPY non è attivo, il widget non crea una copia privata della stringa in ingresso e pertanto la stringa deve essere allocata in modo statico o globale, ovvero potrebbe non essere una variabile automatica o temporanea.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-7646">If GX_STYLE_TEXT_COPY is not active, the widget does not make a private copy of the incoming string, and therefore the string must be statically or globally allocated, i.e. it may not be an automatic or temporary variable.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-7647">GX_PROMPT deriva da GX_WIDGET e pertanto tutti i servizi API gx_widget possono essere utilizzati con GX_PROMPT.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-7647">GX_PROMPT is derived from GX_WIDGET, and therefore all gx_widget API services may be used with GX_PROMPT.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-7648">Parametri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-7648">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-7649">**messaggio di richiesta** Puntatore a prompt del blocco di controllo widget</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-7649">**prompt** Pointer to prompt widget control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-7650">**testo** Puntatore al testo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-7650">**text** Pointer to text</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-7651">Valori restituiti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-7651">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-7652">Set di testo della richiesta di conferma **GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) completato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-7652">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful prompt text set</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-7653">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) chiamante non valido di questa funzione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-7653">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-7654">Puntatore a **GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) non valido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-7654">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-7655">La funzione di allocazione della memoria **GX_SYSTEM_MEMORY_ERROR** (0x30) non è definita</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-7655">**GX_SYSTEM_MEMORY_ERROR** (0x30) Memory allocate function is not defined</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-7656">Lunghezza stringa **GX_INVALID_STRING_LENGTH** (0X34) non valida</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-7656">**GX_INVALID_STRING_LENGTH** (0x34) Invalid string length</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-7657">Consentito da</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-7657">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-7658">Inizializzazione e thread</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-7658">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-7659">Esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-7659">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Set the text of “my_prompt” to “my_text”. */
status = gx_prompt_text_set(&my_prompt, “my_text”);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the text for “my_prompt” has been set. */
```


### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-7674">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-7674">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-7675">Questo servizio imposta il testo di un widget di richiesta.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-7675">This service sets the text of a prompt widget.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-7676">Se il widget di richiesta è stato creato con lo stile GX_STYLE_TEXT_COPY, il widget crea una copia privata della stringa di testo assegnata.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-7676">If the prompt widget was created with style GX_STYLE_TEXT_COPY, the widget creates a private copy of the text string assigned.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-7677">Se GX_STYLE_TEXT_COPY non è attivo, il widget non crea una copia privata della stringa in ingresso e pertanto la stringa deve essere allocata in modo statico o globale, ovvero potrebbe non essere una variabile automatica o temporanea.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-7677">If GX_STYLE_TEXT_COPY is not active, the widget does not make a private copy of the incoming string, and therefore the string must be statically or globally allocated, i.e. it may not be an automatic or temporary variable.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-7678">GX_PROMPT deriva da GX_WIDGET e pertanto tutti i servizi API gx_widget possono essere utilizzati con GX_PROMPT.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-7678">GX_PROMPT is derived from GX_WIDGET, and therefore all gx_widget API services may be used with GX_PROMPT.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-7679">Parametri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-7679">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-7680">**messaggio di richiesta** Puntatore a prompt del blocco di controllo widget</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-7680">**prompt** Pointer to prompt widget control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-7681">**testo** Puntatore al testo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-7681">**text** Pointer to text</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-7682">Valori restituiti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-7682">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-7683">Set di testo della richiesta di conferma **GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) completato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-7683">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful prompt text set</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-7684">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) chiamante non valido di questa funzione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-7684">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-7685">Puntatore a **GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) non valido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-7685">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-7686">La funzione di allocazione della memoria **GX_SYSTEM_MEMORY_ERROR** (0x30) non è definita</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-7686">**GX_SYSTEM_MEMORY_ERROR** (0x30) Memory allocate function is not defined</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-7687">Lunghezza stringa **GX_INVALID_STRING_LENGTH** (0X34) non valida</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-7687">**GX_INVALID_STRING_LENGTH** (0x34) Invalid string length</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-7688">Consentito da</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-7688">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-7689">Inizializzazione e thread</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-7689">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-7690">Esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-7690">Example</span></span>

```C
GX_STRING new_string;
new_string.gx_string_ptr = “my_text”;
new_string.gx_string_length = strlen(new_string.gx_string_ptr);

/* Set the text of “my_prompt” to “new_string”. */
status = gx_prompt_text_set(&my_prompt, &new_string);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the text for “my_prompt” has been set. */
```

## <a name="gx_radial_progress_bar_anchor_set"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-7702">gx_radial_progress_bar_anchor_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-7702">gx_radial_progress_bar_anchor_set</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_radial_progress_bar_anchor_set(

    GX_VALUE angle);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-7705">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-7705">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-7706">Questo servizio imposta l'angolo iniziale per l'indicatore di stato radiale.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-7706">This service sets the starting angle for radial progress bar.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-7707">Parametri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-7707">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-7709">**angolo** Angolo iniziale dell'arco circolare</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-7709">**angle** Starting angle of the circular arc</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-7711">Set di ancoraggio della barra di avanzamento radiale **GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) riuscito</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-7711">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful radial progress bar anchor set</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-7713">Puntatore a **GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) non valido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-7713">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>

## <a name="gx_radial_progress_bar_background_draw"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-7728">gx_radial_progress_bar_background_draw</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-7728">gx_radial_progress_bar_background_draw</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-7729">Sfondo di estrazione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-7729">Draw background</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-7730">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-7730">Prototype</span></span>

```C
VOID gx_radial_progress_bar_background_draw(GX_RADIAL_PROGRESS_BAR *progress_bar);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-7731">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-7731">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-7732">Questo servizio disegna uno sfondo dell'indicatore di stato radiale.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-7732">This service draws a radial progress bar background.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-7733">A questo servizio viene fatto riferimento internamente la funzione gx_radial_progress_bar_draw, ma viene esposta per l'uso da parte dell'applicazione nei casi in cui l'applicazione definisce una funzione di disegno di un indicatore di stato radiale personalizzato.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-7733">This service is internally referenced by the gx_radial_progress_bar_draw function, but is exposed for use by the application in those cases where the application defines a custom radial progress bar drawing function</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-7734">Parametri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-7734">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-7735">**indicatore di stato** Puntatore al blocco di controllo indicatore di stato radiale</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-7735">**progress bar** Pointer to radial progress bar control block</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-7736">Valori restituiti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-7736">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-7737">**Nessuno**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-7737">**None**</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-7738">Consentito da</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-7738">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-7739">Thread</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-7739">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-7740">Esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-7740">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Write a custom radial progress bar drawing function. */

VOID my_radial_progress_bar_draw(GX_RADIAL_PROGRESS_BAR *radial_progress)
{
    /* Call default radial progress bar background draw. */
    gx_radial_progress_bar_background_draw(radial_progress);

    /* Add your own drawing here. */

    /* Draw child widgets. */
    gx_widget_children_draw((GX_WIDGET *)radial_progress);
}
```

## <a name="gx_radial_progress_bar_create"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-7751">gx_radial_progress_bar_create</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-7751">gx_radial_progress_bar_create</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-7752">Crea indicatore di stato radiale</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-7752">Create radial progress bar</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-7753">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-7753">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_radial_progress_bar_create(
    GX_RADIAL_PROGRESS_BAR *progress_bar,
    GX_CONST GX_CHAR *name,
    GX_WIDGET *parent,
    GX_RADIAL_PROGRESS_BAR_INFO *info,
    ULONG style
    USHORT id);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-7754">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-7754">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-7755">Questo servizio crea un indicatore di stato radiale.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-7755">This service creates a radial progress bar.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-7756">Se lo stile widget GX_STYLE_ENABLED viene applicato all'indicatore di stato, l'indicatore di stato accetterà pen_down, pen_drag e pen_up input per modificare il valore corrente dell'indicatore di stato.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-7756">If the widget style GX_STYLE_ENABLED is applied to the progress bar, the progress bar will accept pen_down, pen_drag, and pen_up input to modify the progress bar current value.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-7757">Lo stile del widget GX_STYLE_PROGRESS_TEXT_DRAW può essere usato per abilitare il disegno del valore dell'indicatore di stato come testo all'interno dell'area dell'indicatore di stato.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-7757">The widget style GX_STYLE_PROGRESS_TEXT_DRAW can be used to enable drawing the progress bar value as text within the progress bar area.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-7758">Se questo stile viene usato in combinazione con il GX_STYLE_PROGRESS_PERCENT di stile, il valore dell'indicatore di stato viene visualizzato come percentuale.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-7758">If this style is used in combination with the style GX_STYLE_PROGRESS_PERCENT, the progress bar value is displayed as a percentage.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-7759">In caso contrario, il valore dell'indicatore di stato viene visualizzato come valore angolare corrente.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-7759">Otherwise the progress bar value is displayed as the current angular value.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-7760">Parametri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-7760">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-7761">**indicatore di stato** Puntatore al controllo indicatore di stato radiale</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-7761">**progress bar** Pointer to radial progress bar control</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-7762">Puntatore indicatore di **stato** al blocco di controllo indicatore di stato radiale</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-7762">**progress** bar Pointer to radial progress bar control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-7763">**nome** Nome dell'indicatore di stato radiale</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-7763">**name** Name of radial progress bar</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-7764">**elemento padre** Puntatore al widget padre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-7764">**parent** Pointer to parent widget</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-7777">Esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-7777">Example</span></span>

```C
GX_RAIDAL_PROGRESS_BAR_INFO info;

info.gx_radial_progress_bar_info_xcenter = 200;
info.gx_radial_progress_bar_info_ycenter = 200;
info.gx_radial_progress_bar_info_radius = 100;
info.gx_radial_progress_bar_info_current_angle = 180;
info.gx_radial_progress_bar_info_anchor_val = -180;
info.gx_radial_progress_bar_info_font_id = GX_FONT_ID_SYSTEM;
info.gx_raidal_progress_bar_info_normal_text_color =
                                        GX_COLOR_ID_TEXT;
info.gx_radial_progress_bar_info_selected_text_color =
                                        GX_COLOR_ID_TEXT;
info.gx_radial_progress_bar_info_disabled_text_color =
                                        GX_COLOR_ID_DISABLED_TEXT;
info.gx_radial_progress_bar_info_normal_brush_width = 20;
info.gx_raidal_progress_bar_info_selected_brush_width = 16;
info.gx_radial_progress_bar_info_normal_brush_color =
                                        GX_COLOR_ID_WIDGET_FILL;
info.gx_radial_progress_bar_info_selected_brush_color =
                                        GX_COLOR_ID_SELECTED_FILL;

/* Create a radial progress bar “my_progress_bar”. */
status = gx_radial_progress_bar_create(&my_progress_bar,
                    “my_progress_bar”, parent, &info,
                    GX_STYLE_ENABLED | GX_STYLE_TRANSPARENT |
                    GX_STYLE_PROGRESS_TEXT_DRAW,
                    ID_MY_RADIAL_PROGRESS);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the radial progress bar “my_progress_bar” has been created. */
```

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-7790">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-7790">Prototype</span></span>


### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-7791">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-7791">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-7792">Questo servizio disegna un indicatore di stato radiale.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-7792">This service draws a radial progress bar.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-7793">Questo servizio viene usato internamente a cui fa riferimento la funzione gx_radial_progress_bar_create, ma viene esposto per l'uso da parte dell'applicazione nei casi in cui l'applicazione definisce una funzione di disegno di un indicatore di stato radiale personalizzato.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-7793">This service is used internally referenced by the gx_radial_progress_bar_create function, but is exposed for use by the application in those cases where the application defines a custom radial progress bar drawing function.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-7795">**indicatore di stato** Puntatore al blocco di controllo indicatore di stato radiale</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-7795">**progress bar** Pointer to radial progress bar control block</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-7796">Valori restituiti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-7796">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-7797">**Nessuno**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-7797">**None**</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-7800">Esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-7800">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Write a custom radial progress bar drawing function. */

VOID my_radial_progress_bar_draw(GX_RADIAL_PROGRESS_BAR *radial_progress)
{
    /* Call default radial progress bar draw. */
    gx_radial_progress_bar_draw(radial_progress);

    /* Add your own drawing here. */

    /* Draw child widgets. */
    gx_widget_children_draw((GX_WIDGET *)radial_progress);
}
```

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-7814">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-7814">Prototype</span></span>

```C

    GX_EVENT *event_ptr);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-7815">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-7815">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-7816">Questo servizio elabora un evento indicatore di stato radiale.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-7816">This service processes a radial progress bar event.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-7817">Questa funzione viene a cui fa riferimento internamente la funzione gx_radial_progress_bar_create, ma viene esposta per l'uso da parte dell'applicazione nei casi in cui l'applicazione definisce una funzione di elaborazione di eventi di stato radiale personalizzata.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-7817">This function is internally referenced by the gx_radial_progress_bar_create function, but is exposed for use by the application in those cases where the application defines a custom radial progress event processing function.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-7818">Parametri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-7818">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-7819">Puntatore indicatore di **stato** al blocco di controllo indicatore di stato radiale</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-7819">**progress** bar Pointer to radial progress bar control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-7820">**event_ptr** Puntatore a evento da elaborare</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-7820">**event_ptr** Pointer to event to process</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-7821">Valori restituiti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-7821">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-7822">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) processo di evento indicatore di stato radiante riuscito</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-7822">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful radial progress bar event process</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-7823">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) chiamante non valido di questa funzione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-7823">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-7824">Puntatore a **GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) non valido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-7824">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-7825">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) widget non valido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-7825">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Invalid widget</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-7826">Consentito da</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-7826">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-7827">Inizializzazione e thread</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-7827">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-7828">Esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-7828">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Write a custom event processing function. */

UINT my_event_process (GX_RADIAL_PROGRESS_BAR *radial_progress, GX_EVENT *event_ptr)
{
    switch(event_ptr->gx_event_type)
    {
        case GX_EVENT_SHOW:
        /* Do default handling. */
        status = gx_radial_progress_bar_event_process(
                            radial_progress, event_ptr);
        /* add my own handling here */
        break;
    default:
        status = gx_radial_progress_bar_event_process(
                            radial_progress, event_ptr);
        break;
    }
    return status;
}
```

## <a name="gx_radial_progress_bar_info_set"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-7866">gx_radial_progress_bar_info_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-7866">gx_radial_progress_bar_info_set</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-7867">Imposta informazioni indicatore di stato radiale</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-7867">Set radial progress bar information</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-7868">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-7868">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_radial_progress_bar_info_set(
    GX_RADIAL_PROGRESS_BAR *progress_bar,
    GX_RADIAL_PROGRESS_BAR_INFO *info);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-7869">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-7869">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-7870">Questo servizio Reimposta i parametri delle informazioni assegnati all'indicatore di stato radiale.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-7870">This service resets the information parameters assigned to the radial progress bar.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-7871">Parametri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-7871">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-7872">Puntatore indicatore di **stato** al blocco di controllo indicatore di stato radiale</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-7872">**progress** bar Pointer to radial progress bar control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-7873">**informazioni** su Puntatore alla struttura delle informazioni dell'indicatore di stato radiale.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-7873">**info** Pointer to radial progress bar information structure.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-7874">**Appendice I** contiene la definizione per la struttura GX_RADIAL_PROGRESS_BAR_INFO.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-7874">**Appendix I** contains definition for GX_RADIAL_PROGRESS_BAR_INFO structure.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-7875">Valori restituiti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-7875">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-7876">Set di informazioni indicatore di stato radiale con **GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) riuscito</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-7876">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful radial progress bar info set</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-7877">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) chiamante non valido di questa funzione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-7877">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-7878">Puntatore a **GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) non valido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-7878">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-7879">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) widget non valido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-7879">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Invalid widget</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-7880">Consentito da</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-7880">Allowed From</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-7882">Esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-7882">Example</span></span>

```C
GX_RAIDAL_PROGRESS_BAR_INFO info;

info.gx_radial_progress_bar_info_xcenter = 200;
info.gx_radial_progress_bar_info_ycenter = 200;
info.gx_radial_progress_bar_info_radius = 100;
info.gx_radial_progress_bar_info_current_angle = 180;
info.gx_radial_progress_bar_info_anchor_val = -180;
info.gx_radial_progress_bar_info_font_id = GX_FONT_ID_SYSTEM;
info.gx_raidal_progress_bar_info_normal_text_color =
                                GX_COLOR_ID_TEXT;
info.gx_radial_progress_bar_info_selected_text_color =
                                GX_COLOR_ID_TEXT;
info.gx_radial_progress_bar_info_disabled_text_color =
                                GX_COLOR_ID_DISABLED_TEXT;
info.gx_radial_progress_bar_info_normal_brush_width = 20;
info.gx_raidal_progress_bar_info_selected_brush_width = 16;
info.gx_radial_progress_bar_info_normal_brush_color =
                                GX_COLOR_ID_WIDGET_FILL;
info.gx_radial_progress_bar_info_selected_brush_color =
                                GX_COLOR_ID_SELECTED_FILL;

/* Set appearance information for radial progress bar “my_progress_bar”. */
status = gx_radial_progress_bar_info_set(&my_progress_bar, &info);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the appearance information of “my_progress_bar” has been set. */
```

## <a name="gx_radial_progress_bar_text_color_set"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-7893">gx_radial_progress_bar_text_color_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-7893">gx_radial_progress_bar_text_color_set</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-7894">Imposta colore testo indicatore di stato radiale</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-7894">Set radial progress bar text color</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-7895">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-7895">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_radial_progress_bar_text_color_set(
    GX_RADIAL_PROGRESS_BAR *progress_bar,
    GX_RESOURCE_ID normal_text_color,
    GX_RESOURCE_ID selected_text_color,
    GX_RESOURCE_ID disabled_text_color);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-7896">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-7896">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-7897">Questo servizio imposta il colore del testo della barra di stato radiale.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-7897">This service sets the text color of radial progress bar.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-7898">Questo valore viene utilizzato solo se è impostato il GX_STYLE_PROGRESS_TEXT_DRAW di stile.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-7898">This value is only used if the style GX_STYLE_PROGRESS_TEXT_DRAW is set.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-7900">Puntatore indicatore di **stato** al blocco di controllo indicatore di stato radiale</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-7900">**progress** bar Pointer to radial progress bar control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-7901">**normal_color** ID risorsa del colore del testo nello stato normale.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-7901">**normal_color** Resource ID of text color in normal state.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-7902">**L'Appendice A** contiene ID di risorsa colore predefiniti.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-7902">**Appendix A** contains pre-defined color Resource IDs.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-7903">Si noti che l'applicazione può aggiungere anche ID di risorse colore personalizzati.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-7903">Note that the application may add custom color Resource IDs as well.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-7904">**selected_color** ID risorsa del colore del testo quando il widget ottiene lo stato attivo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-7904">**selected_color** Resource ID of text color when the widget gain focus.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-7905">**L'Appendice A** contiene ID di risorsa colore predefiniti.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-7905">**Appendix A** contains pre-defined color Resource IDs.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-7906">Si noti che l'applicazione può aggiungere anche ID di risorse colore personalizzati.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-7906">Note that the application may add custom color Resource IDs as well.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-7907">**disabled_color** ID risorsa del colore del testo quando lo stile GX_STYLE_ENABLED non è impostato.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-7907">**disabled_color** Resource ID of text color when the style GX_STYLE_ENABLED is not set.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-7908">**L'Appendice A** contiene ID di risorsa colore predefiniti.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-7908">**Appendix A** contains pre-defined color Resource IDs.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-7909">Si noti che l'applicazione può aggiungere anche ID di risorse colore personalizzati.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-7909">Note that the application may add custom color Resource IDs as well.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-7911">Set di colori del testo della barra di avanzamento radiale **GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) riuscita</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-7911">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful radial progress bar text color set</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-7912">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) chiamante non valido di questa funzione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-7912">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-7913">Puntatore a **GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) non valido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-7913">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>

```C
/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the text color of “my_progress_bar” has been set. */
```

## <a name="gx_radial_progress_bar_text_draw"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-7928">gx_radial_progress_bar_text_draw</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-7928">gx_radial_progress_bar_text_draw</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-7929">Testo indicatore di stato radiale</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-7929">Draw radial progress bar text</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-7930">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-7930">Prototype</span></span>

```C
VOID gx_radial_progress_bar_text_draw(GX_RADIAL_PROGRESS_BAR *progress_bar);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-7931">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-7931">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-7932">Questo servizio disegna il testo dell'indicatore di stato radiale specificato.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-7932">This service draws the text of specified radial progress bar.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-7933">Questa funzione viene chiamata internamente come parte del gx_radial_progress_bar_draw (), ma viene esposta all'applicazione per supportare i casi in cui l'applicazione definisce una funzione di disegno di un indicatore di stato personalizzato.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-7933">This function is called internally as part of the gx_radial_progress_bar_draw(), but is exposed to the application to support those cases where the application defines a custom progress bar drawing function.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-7934">Parametri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-7934">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-7935">**indicatore di stato** Puntatore al blocco di controllo indicatore di stato radiale</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-7935">**progress bar** Pointer to radial progress bar control block</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-7936">Valori restituiti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-7936">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-7937">**Nessuno**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-7937">**None**</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-7940">Esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-7940">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Draw text for radial progress bar “my_progress_bar”. */
status = gx_radial_progress_bar_text_draw (&my_progress_bar);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the text of “my_progress_bar” has been drawn. */

/* Write a custom radial progress bar drawing function. */
VOID my_radial_progress_bar_draw(GX_RADIAL_PROGRESS_BAR *radial_progress)
{
    /* Add your own background draw here. */

    /* Call default radial progress bar text draw. */
    gx_radial_progress_bar_text_draw(radial_progress);

    /* Draw child widgets. */
    gx_widget_children_draw((GX_WIDGET *)radial_progress);
}
```

## <a name="gx_radial_progress_bar_value_set"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-7951">gx_radial_progress_bar_value_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-7951">gx_radial_progress_bar_value_set</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-7952">Imposta valore indicatore di stato radiale</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-7952">Set radial progress bar value</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-7953">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-7953">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_radial_progress_bar_value_set(
    GX_RADIAL_PROGRESS_BAR *progress_bar, 
    GX_VALUE value);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-7954">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-7954">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-7955">Questo servizio imposta un valore indicatore di stato radiale.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-7955">This service sets radial progress bar value.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-7956">Il valore assegnato è limitato all'intervallo [-360, 360], che definisce il possibile intervallo di valori angolari per la posizione corrente dell'indicatore di stato.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-7956">The assigned value is limited to the range [-360, 360], defining the possible range of angular values for the progress bar current location.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-7957">L'applicazione deve ridimensionare il valore del mondo reale indicato per assegnare un valore angolare al widget indicatore di stato.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-7957">The application must scale the real-world value being indicated to assign an angular value to the progress bar widget.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-7958">L'indicatore di stato viene disegnato in modo tale che il valore corrente indichi il Delta angolare tra la posizione di ancoraggio e il punto finale dell'arco superiore. I valori negativi determinano il disegno dell'arco in senso orario a partire dalla posizione di ancoraggio.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-7958">The progress bar is drawn such that the current value indicates the angular delta between the anchor position and the end point of the upper arc. Negative values cause the arc to be drawn in a clockwise direction starting at the anchor position.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-7959">Il valore corrente positivo fa in modo che l'arco venga disegnato in senso antiorario a partire dalla posizione di ancoraggio.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-7959">Positive current value causes the arc to be drawn in a counter-clockwise direction starting at the anchor position.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-7960">Ad esempio, per creare un arco a partire dalla parte superiore dell'arco (posizione 12) e che termina a destra (tre ore), assegnare un valore di ancoraggio di 90 gradi e un valore corrente di-90 gradi.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-7960">For example, to draw an arc starting at the top of the arc (12 o’clock position) and ending at the right (three o’clock position), assign an anchor value of 90 degrees and a current value of -90 degrees.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-7961">Parametri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-7961">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-7962">Puntatore indicatore di **stato** al blocco di controllo indicatore di stato radiale</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-7962">**progress** bar Pointer to radial progress bar control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-7963">**valore** di Nuovo valore indicatore di stato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-7963">**value** New progress bar value</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-7965">Set di valori indicatore di stato radiale riuscito **GX_SUCCESS** (0x00)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-7965">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful radial progress bar value set</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-7966">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) chiamante non valido di questa funzione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-7966">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-7967">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) puntatori non validi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-7967">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointers</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-7968">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) widget non valido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-7968">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Invalid widget</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-7969">Consentito da</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-7969">Allowed From</span></span>

```C
GX_VALUE new_value = 180;

/* Set value for radial progress bar “my_progress_bar”. */
status = gx_radial_progress_bar_value_set(&my_progress_bar,
                                        new_value);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the value of “my_progress_bar” has been set. */
```

## <a name="gx_radio_button_create"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-7982">gx_radio_button_create</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-7982">gx_radio_button_create</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-7983">Pulsante di opzione Crea</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-7983">Create radio button</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-7984">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-7984">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_radio_button_create(
    GX_RADIO_BUTTON *button,
    GX_CONST GX_CHAR *name,
    GX_WIDGET *parent,
    GX_RESOURCE_ID text_id, ULONG style,
    USHORT radio_button_id,
    GX_CONST GX_RECTANGLE *size);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-7985">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-7985">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-7986">Questo servizio crea un widget del pulsante di opzione.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-7986">This service creates a radio button widget.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-7987">GX_RADIO_BUTTON deriva da GX_TEXT_BUTTON e pertanto tutti i servizi gx_text_button sono supportati anche da questo tipo di widget.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-7987">GX_RADIO_BUTTON is derived from GX_TEXT_BUTTON, and therefore all gx_text_button services are also supported by this widget type.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-7988">Parametri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-7988">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-7989">**pulsante** Puntatore al blocco di controllo del pulsante di opzione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-7989">**button** Pointer to radio button control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-7990">**nome** Nome logico del widget del pulsante di opzione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-7990">**name** Logical name of radio button widget</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-7991">**elemento padre** Puntatore al widget padre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-7991">**parent** Pointer to the parent widget</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-7992">**TEXT_ID** ID risorsa del pulsante di opzione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-7992">**text_id** Resource ID of radio button</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-7993">**stile** Stile del pulsante di opzione.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-7993">**style** Style of radio button.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-7994">L' **Appendice D** contiene stili generali predefiniti per tutti i widget e per gli stili specifici dei widget.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-7994">**Appendix D** contains pre-defined general styles for all widgets as well as widget-specific styles.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-7995">**radio_button_id** ID del pulsante di opzione definito dall'applicazione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-7995">**radio_button_id** Application-defined ID of radio button</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-7996">**dimensioni** Dimensioni del pulsante di opzione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-7996">**size** Dimensions of radio button</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-7997">Valori restituiti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-7997">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-7998">Creazione pulsante di opzione **GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) riuscita</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-7998">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful radio button create</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-7999">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) chiamante non valido di questa funzione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-7999">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-8000">Puntatore a **GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) non valido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-8000">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-8001">Widget **GX_ALREADY_CREATED** (0x13) già creato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-8001">**GX_ALREADY_CREATED** (0x13) Widget already created</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-8002">**GX_INVALID_** Dimensioni (0x19) dimensioni del blocco di controllo widget non valide</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-8002">**GX_INVALID_** SIZE (0x19) Invalid widget control block size</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-8003">ID risorsa non valido **GX_INVALID_RESOURCE_ID** (0x33)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-8003">**GX_INVALID_RESOURCE_ID** (0x33) Invalid resource ID</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-8004">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) widget non valido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-8004">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Invalid widget</span></span>

## <a name="gx_radio_button_draw"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-8022">gx_radio_button_draw</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-8022">gx_radio_button_draw</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-8024">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-8024">Prototype</span></span>

```C
VOID gx_radio_button_draw(GX_RADIO_BUTTON *button);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-8025">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-8025">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-8026">Questo servizio disegna un widget di pulsante di opzione.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-8026">This service draws a radio button widget.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-8027">Questo servizio viene chiamato internamente dall'aggiornamento Canvas di GUIX, ma può essere chiamato anche dalle funzioni di disegno sottoposte a override.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-8027">This service is called internally by the GUIX canvas refresh, but can also be called by overridden drawing functions.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-8028">Parametri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-8028">Parameters</span></span>

```C
/* Write a custom radio button drawing function. */

VOID my_radio_button_draw(GX_RADIO_BUTTON *radio_button)
{
    /* Call default radio button draw. */
    gx_radio_button_draw(radio_button);

    /* Add your own drawing here. */

    /* Draw child widgets. */
    gx_widget_children_draw((GX_WIDGET *)radio_button);
}
```

## <a name="gx_radio_button_pixelmap_set"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-8049">gx_radio_button_pixelmap_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-8049">gx_radio_button_pixelmap_set</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-8050">Impostare pixelmaps per il pulsante di opzione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-8050">Set pixelmaps for radio button</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-8051">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-8051">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_radio_button_pixelmap_set(
    GX_RADIO_BUTTON *button,
    GX_RESOURCE_ID off_id,
    GX_RESOURCE_ID on_id,
    GX_RESOURCE_ID off_disabled_id,
    GX_RESOURCE_ID on_disabled_id);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-8052">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-8052">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-8053">Questo servizio assegna il pixelmaps che deve essere visualizzato dal pulsante di opzione specificato per ogni stato del pulsante.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-8053">This service assigns the pixelmaps to be displayed by the specified radio button for each button state.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-8054">Gli ID risorsa possono essere duplicati.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-8054">The resource IDs can be duplicated.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-8055">Parametri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-8055">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-8056">**off_id** Pixelmap utilizzato per lo stato del pulsante di opzione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-8056">**off_id** Pixelmap used for radio button off state</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-8057">**on_id** Pixelmap usato per il pulsante di opzione sullo stato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-8057">**on_id** Pixelmap used for radio button on state</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-8058">**off_disabled_id** Pixelmap utilizzato per il pulsante di opzione disabilitato e disattivato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-8058">**off_disabled_id** Pixelmap used for radio button disabled and off state</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-8059">**on_disabled_id** Pixelmap utilizzato per il pulsante di opzione disabilitato e stato attivo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-8059">**on_disabled_id** Pixelmap used for radio button disabled and on state</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-8060">Valori restituiti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-8060">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-8061">Pulsante di opzione pixelmaps (0x00) riuscito **GX_SUCCESS**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-8061">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful radio button pixelmaps set</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-8062">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) chiamante non valido di questa funzione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-8062">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-8063">Puntatore a **GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) non valido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-8063">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-8064">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) widget non valido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-8064">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Invalid widget</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-8065">Consentito da</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-8065">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-8066">Inizializzazione e thread</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-8066">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-8067">Esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-8067">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Set pixelmap for “my_radio_button”. */
status = gx_radio_button_pixelmap_set(&my_radio_button,
                                MY_OFF_PIXELMAP,
                                MY_ON_PIXELMAP,
                                MY_OFF_DISABLED_PIXELMAP,
                                MY_ON_DISABLED_PIXELMAP);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the pixelmaps for radio button “my_radio_button” has been set. */
```
