## <a name="gx_radial_slider_anchor_angles_set"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-8082">gx_radial_slider_anchor_angles_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-8082">gx_radial_slider_anchor_angles_set</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-8083">Imposta elenco di ancoraggio del dispositivo di scorrimento radiale</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-8083">Set radial slider anchor list</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-8084">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-8084">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_radial_slider_anchor_angles_set(
    GX_RADIAL_SLIDER *slider,
    GX_VALUE *anchor_angles, 
    USHORT anchor_count);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-8085">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-8085">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-8086">Questo servizio imposta gli angoli di ancoraggio per il dispositivo di scorrimento radiale.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-8086">This service sets anchor angles for radial slider.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-8087">Se è impostato l'elenco degli angoli di ancoraggio, l'angolo del dispositivo di scorrimento radiale sarà uno degli angoli di ancoraggio definiti.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-8087">If anchor angle list is set, the radial slider angle will be one of defined anchor angles.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-8088">Parametri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-8088">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-8089">**dispositivo di scorrimento** Blocco di controllo dispositivo di scorrimento radiale</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-8089">**slider** Radial slider control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-8090">**anchor_angles** Elenco angoli da impostare</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-8090">**anchor_angles** Angle list to set</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-8091">**anchor_count** Conteggio degli angoli di ancoraggio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-8091">**anchor_count** Count of the anchor angles</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-8092">Valori restituiti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-8092">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-8093">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) set di angoli di ancoraggio riusciti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-8093">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful anchor angles set</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-8094">Puntatore a **GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) non valido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-8094">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-8095">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) widget non valido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-8095">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Invalid widget</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-8096">Elenco di ancoraggio **GX_INVALID_VALUE** (0X22) non valido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-8096">**GX_INVALID_VALUE** (0x22) Invalid anchor list</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-8097">Consentito da</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-8097">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-8098">Inizializzazione e thread</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-8098">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-8099">Esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-8099">Example</span></span>

```C
GX_VALUE anchor_angles[]={0, 30, 60, 90, 120, 150, 180};
USHORT anchor_count = 7;

/* Set anchor angles for radial slider. */
status = gx_radial_slider_anchor_angles_set(&my_radial_slider,
                                anchor_angles, anchor_count);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the anchor angles have been set for “my_radial_slider”. */

/* Set anchor angles for radial slider. */
status = gx_radial_slider_anchor_angles_set(&my_radial_slider,
                                GX_NULL, 0);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the anchor angles have been removed from “my_radial_slider”. */
```

## <a name="gx_radial_slider_angle_set"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-8110">gx_radial_slider_angle_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-8110">gx_radial_slider_angle_set</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-8111">Imposta angolo dispositivo di scorrimento radiale</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-8111">Set radial slider angle</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-8112">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-8112">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_radial_slider_angle_set(
    GX_RADIAL_SLIDER *slider,
    GX_VALUE new_angle);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-8113">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-8113">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-8114">Questo servizio imposta un nuovo valore dell'angolo per il dispositivo di scorrimento radiale.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-8114">This service sets new angle value for radial slider.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-8115">Parametri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-8115">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-8116">**dispositivo di scorrimento** Puntatore al blocco di controllo dispositivo di scorrimento radiale</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-8116">**slider** Pointer to radial slider control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-8117">**new_angle** Nuovo valore dell'angolo da impostare</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-8117">**new_angle** New angle value to be set</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-8118">Valori restituiti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-8118">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-8119">Set di angoli del dispositivo di scorrimento radiale riuscito **GX_SUCCESS** (0x00)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-8119">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful radial slider angle set</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-8120">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) chiamante non valido di questa funzione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-8120">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-8121">Puntatore a **GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) non valido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-8121">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-8122">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) widget non valido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-8122">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Invalid widget</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-8123">Consentito da</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-8123">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-8124">Inizializzazione e thread</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-8124">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-8125">Esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-8125">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Set “my_radial_slider” angle to 0 degree(3 o’clock position). */
status = gx_radial_slider_angle_set(&my_radial_slider, 0);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the value of “my_radial_slider” has been set to 0 degree. */
```

## <a name="gx_radial_slider_animation_set"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-8136">gx_radial_slider_animation_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-8136">gx_radial_slider_animation_set</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-8137">Crea informazioni sull'animazione del dispositivo di scorrimento radiale</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-8137">Create radial slider animation info</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-8138">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-8138">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_radial_slider_animation_set(
    GX_RADIAL_SLIDER *slider,
    USHORT steps, USHORT delay, 
    USHORT animation_style,
    VOID (*animation_update_callback)(GX_RADIAL_SLIDER *slider));
```

  - <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-8150">GX_ANIMATION_BOUNCE_EASE_OUT</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-8150">GX_ANIMATION_BOUNCE_EASE_OUT</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-8151">GX_ANIMATION_BOUNCE_EASE_IN_OUT</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-8151">GX_ANIMATION_BOUNCE_EASE_IN_OUT</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-8152">GX_ANIMATION_CIRC_EASE_IN</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-8152">GX_ANIMATION_CIRC_EASE_IN</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-8153">GX_ANIMATION_CIRC_EASE_OUT</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-8153">GX_ANIMATION_CIRC_EASE_OUT</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-8170">GX_ANIMATION_QUINT_EASE_IN</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-8170">GX_ANIMATION_QUINT_EASE_IN</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-8171">GX_ANIMATION_QUINT_EASE_OUT</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-8171">GX_ANIMATION_QUINT_EASE_OUT</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-8178">Set di animazioni del dispositivo di scorrimento radiale **GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) riuscito</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-8178">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful radial slider animation set</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-8179">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) chiamante non valido di questa funzione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-8179">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-8183">Inizializzazione e thread</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-8183">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-8184">Esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-8184">Example</span></span>

```C
VOID animation_callback(GX_RADIAL_SLIDER *slider)
{
    /* This function will be called after each animation step,
    add custom code here. */
}

/* Set animation info for “my_radial_slider”. */
status = gx_radial_slider_animation_set(&my_radial_slider, 15, 2,
                                GX_ANIMATION_CIRC_EASE_IN_OUT,
                                animation_callback);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the radial slider needle will move with specified animation. */

/* Disable animation for “my_radial_slider”. */
status = gx_radial_slider_animation_set(&my_radial_slider, 0, 0,
                                        0, 0);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the radial slider needle will move without animation. */
```

## <a name="gx_radial_slider_animation_start"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-8195">gx_radial_slider_animation_start</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-8195">gx_radial_slider_animation_start</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_radial_slider_animation_start(
    GX_RADIAL_SLIDER *slider,
    GX_VALUE target_angle);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-8198">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-8198">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-8199">Questo servizio avvia un'animazione per spostare l'ago del dispositivo di scorrimento dalla posizione corrente alla posizione specificata.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-8199">This service starts an animation to move the slider needle from current position to the specified position.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-8200">Parametri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-8200">Parameters</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-8208">Consentito da</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-8208">Allowed From</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-8244">Esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-8244">Example</span></span>

```C
GX_RADIAL_SLIDER_INFO info;
GX_RECTANGLE size;

/* Distance from left side of widget to rotating center. */
info.gx_radial_slider_info_xcenter = 100;

/* Distance from top size of widget to rotating center. */
info.gx_radial_slider_info_ycenter = 100;

/* Radius of rotating circle. */
info.gx_radial_slider_info_radius = 100;

/* Widget of rotating track. */
info.gx_radial_slider_info_track_width = 40;

/* Current angle value. */
info.gx_radial_slider_info_current_angle = 0;

/* Minimum angle value. */
info.gx_radial_slider_min_anlge = -60;

/* Maximum angle value. */
info.gx_radial_slider_max_angle = 240;

/* Anchor value list. */
info.gx_radial_slider_angle_list = GX_NULL;

/* Anchor value count. */
info.gx_radial_slider_list_count = 0;

/* Resource ID of background pixelmap. */
info.gx_radial_slider_background_pixelmap = GX_PIXELMAP_ID_BKGRD;

/* Resource ID of needle pixelmap. */
info.gx_radial_slider_needle_pixelmap = GX_PIXELMAP_ID_NEEDLE;

/* Define widget size. */
gx_utility_rectangle_define(&size, 0, 0, 200, 200);

/* Create “my_radial_slider”. */
status = gx_radial_slider_create(&my_radial_slider,
                                “my_radial_slider”, &my_parent,
                                &info, GX_STYLE_ENABLED,
                                MY_RADIAL_SLIDER_ID, &size);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the radial slider “my_radial_slider” has been created. */
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-8282">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-8282">Description</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-8293">Consentito da</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-8293">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-8294">Inizializzazione e thread</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-8294">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-8295">Esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-8295">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Write a custom event processing function. */

UINT my_event_process(GX_RADIAL_SLIDER *slider,
                    GX_EVENT *event_ptr)
{
    switch(event_ptr->gx_event_type)
    {
    case GX_EVENT_SHOW:
        /* Do default handling. */
        status = gx_radial_slider_event_process(slider, event_ptr);

        /* add my own handling here */
        break;
    default:
        status = gx_radial_slider_event_process(slider, event_ptr);
        break;
    }
    return status;
}
```

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-8311">Parametri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-8311">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-8313">**informazioni** su Puntatore alle informazioni sul dispositivo di scorrimento radiale recuperato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-8313">**info** Retrieved radial slider information pointer</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-8314">Valori restituiti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-8314">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-8315">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) informazioni sul dispositivo di scorrimento radiale riuscito</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-8315">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful radial slider info</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-8316">Puntatore a **GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) non valido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-8316">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-8317">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) widget non valido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-8317">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Invalid widget</span></span>

```C
GX_RADIAL_SLIDER_INFO *info;

/* Retrive radial slider information structure. */
status = gx_radial_slider_info_get(&my_radial_slider,
                                    “my_radial_slider”, &info);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the radial slider information pointer of “my_radial_slider” has been retrieved. */
```

## <a name="gx_radial_slider_info_set"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-8331">gx_radial_slider_info_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-8331">gx_radial_slider_info_set</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-8332">Imposta le informazioni sul dispositivo di scorrimento radiale</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-8332">Set radial slider info</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-8333">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-8333">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_radial_slider_info_set(
    GX_RADIAL_SLIDER *slider,
    GX_RADIAL_SLIDER_INFO *info);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-8334">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-8334">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-8335">Questo servizio imposta le informazioni sul dispositivo di scorrimento radiale.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-8335">This service sets radial slider information.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-8336">Parametri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-8336">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-8337">**dispositivo di scorrimento** Puntatore al blocco di controllo dispositivo di scorrimento radiale</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-8337">**slider** Pointer to radial slider control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-8338">**informazioni** su Informazioni sul dispositivo di scorrimento radiale da impostare</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-8338">**info** Radial slider information to set</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-8339">Valori restituiti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-8339">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-8340">Set di informazioni sul dispositivo di scorrimento radiale **GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) riuscito</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-8340">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful radial slider info set</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-8341">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) chiamante non valido di questa funzione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-8341">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-8342">Puntatore a **GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) non valido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-8342">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-8343">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) widget non valido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-8343">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Invalid widget</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-8344">Consentito da</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-8344">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-8345">Inizializzazione e thread</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-8345">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-8346">Esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-8346">Example</span></span>

```C
GX_RADIAL_SLIDER_INFO info;

/* Distance from left side of widget to rotating center. */
info.gx_radial_slider_info_xcenter = 100;

/* Distance from top size of widget to rotating center. */
info.gx_radial_slider_info_ycenter = 100;

/* Radius of rotating circle. */
info.gx_radial_slider_info_radius = 100;

/* Widget of rotating track. */
info.gx_radial_slider_info_track_width = 40;

/* Current angle value. */
info.gx_radial_slider_info_current_angle = 0;

/* Minimum angle value. */
info.gx_radial_slider_min_anlge = -60;

/* Maximum angle value. */
info.gx_radial_slider_max_angle = 240;

/* Anchor value list. */
info.gx_radial_slider_angle_list = GX_NULL;

/* Anchor value count. */
info.gx_radial_slider_list_count = 0;

/* Resource ID of background pixelmap. */
info.gx_radial_slider_background_pixelmap = GX_PIXELMAP_ID_BKGRD;

/* Resource ID of needle pixelmap. */
info.gx_radial_slider_needle_pixelmap = GX_PIXELMAP_ID_NEEDLE;

/* Reset radial slider info for “my_radial_slider”. */
status = gx_radial_slider_info_set(&my_radial_slider, &info);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the radial slider info of “my_radial_slider” has been reset. */
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-8387">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-8387">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-8388">Questo servizio crea una visualizzazione RTF come specificato.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-8388">This service creates a rich text view as specified.</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-8389">**I tag di formattazione vengono usati per visualizzare i tipi speciali per il testo:**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-8389">**Formatting tags are used to display special types for text:**</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-8390">**\<b>\</b>** Imposta tipo di carattere testo con ID carattere grassetto specificato dall'utente</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-8390">**\<b>\</b>** Set text font with user specified bold font id</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-8391">**\<i>\</i>** Imposta il carattere del testo con l'ID del tipo di carattere corsivo specificato dall'utente</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-8391">**\<i>\</i>** Set text font with user specified italic font id</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-8392">**\<u>\</u>** Abilita sottolineatura testo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-8392">**\<u>\</u>** Enable text underline</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-8393">**\<f GX_FONT_ID>\</f>** Imposta il tipo di carattere del testo con l'ID carattere specificato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-8393">**\<f GX_FONT_ID>\</f>** Set text font with specified font id</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-8394">**\<c GX_COLOR_ID>\</c>** Imposta il tipo di carattere del testo con ID colore specificato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-8394">**\<c GX_COLOR_ID>\</c>** Set text font with specified color id</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-8395">**\<hc GX_COLOR_ID>\</hc>** Imposta il colore dell'evidenziazione del testo specificato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-8395">**\<hc GX_COLOR_ID>\</hc>** Set text highlight color specified color id</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-8396">**\<align left/right/center>\</align>** Imposta allineamento testo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-8396">**\<align left/right/center>\</align>** Set text alignment</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-8397">**Esempi di utilizzo dei tag di formattazione:**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-8397">**Examples of formatting tag usage:**</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-8398">\<b>Testo in grassetto< \b></span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-8398">\<b>This is bold text<\b></span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-8424">Esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-8424">Example</span></span>

```C
GX_RICH_TEXT_VIEW rich_view;
GX_RCIH_TEXT_FONTS fonts;
GX_RECTANGLE size;

/* Defined widget size. */
gx_utility_rectangle_define(&size, 100, 100, 300, 150);

/* Define font information. */
fonts.gx_rich_text_fonts_normal_id = GX_FONT_ID_SYSTEM;
fonts.gx_rich_text_fonts_bold_id = GX_FONT_ID_SYSTEM;
fonts.gx_rich_text_fonts_italic_id = GX_FONT_ID_SYSTEM;
fonts.gx_rich_text_fonts_bold_italic_id = GX_FONT_ID_SYSTEM;

/* Create rich text view widget. */
status = gx_rich_text_view_create(&rich_view, “my_rich_view”,
                                  parent, GX_STRING_ID_TEST_STRING,
                                  &fonts,
                                  GX_STYLE_ENABLED,
                                  MY_RICH_VIEW_ID, &size);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the rich text view was successfully created. */

```

<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-8425">L'applicazione demo demo_guix_widget_types, fornita come parte dell'installazione di GUIX studio, fornisce un esempio completo dell'uso del widget visualizzazione RTF.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-8425">The demo application demo_guix_widget_types, provided as part of the GUIX Studio installation, provides a complete example of using the rich text view widget.</span></span>

## <a name="gx_rich_text_view_draw"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-8430">gx_rich_text_view_draw</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-8430">gx_rich_text_view_draw</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-8431">Estrai visualizzazione testo RTF</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-8431">Draw rich text view</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-8432">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-8432">Prototype</span></span>

```C
VOID gx_rich_text_view_draw(GX_RICH_TEXT_VIEW *text_view);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-8433">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-8433">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-8434">Questo servizio disegna il widget di visualizzazione RTF specificato.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-8434">This service draws the specified rich text view widget.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-8435">Questo servizio viene in genere chiamato internamente da GUIX come parte di un'operazione di aggiornamento Canvas, ma è esposto anche all'applicazione che potrebbe voler fornire una funzione di disegno personalizzata e richiamare il disegno della visualizzazione RTF predefinita come base di disegno personalizzata.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-8435">This service is normally called internally by GUIX as part of a canvas refresh operation, but it also exposed to the application that might want to provide a custom drawing function and invoke the default rich text view drawing as custom drawing base.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-8436">Parametri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-8436">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-8437">**text_view** Puntatore a blocco di controllo widget visualizzazione testo RTF</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-8437">**text_view** Pointer to rich text view widget control block</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-8438">Valori restituiti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-8438">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-8439">**Nessuno**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-8439">**None**</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-8440">Consentito da</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-8440">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-8441">Thread</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-8441">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-8442">Esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-8442">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Write a custom rich text view drawing function. */

VOID my_rich_text_view_draw(GX_RICH_TEXT_VIEW *text_view)
{
    /* Call default rich text view draw. */
    gx_rich_text_view_draw(text_view);

    /* Add your own drawing here. */
}
```

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-8449">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-8449">Prototype</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-8451">Questo servizio imposta i tipi di carattere di un widget visualizzazione RTF.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-8451">This service sets the fonts of a rich text view widget.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-8452">Parametri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-8452">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-8453">**text_view** Puntatore a blocco di controllo widget visualizzazione testo RTF</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-8453">**text_view** Pointer to rich text view widget control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-8454">**tipi di carattere** Puntatore alle informazioni sul tipo di carattere della visualizzazione RTF.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-8454">**fonts** Pointer to rich text view font information.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-8455">**Appendice** contiene le definizioni per GX_RICH_TEXT_FONTS struttura.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-8455">**Apendix I** contains definitions to GX_RICH_TEXT_FONTS structure.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-8457">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) set di caratteri di visualizzazione testo RTF riusciti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-8457">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful rich text view fonts set</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-8458">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) chiamante non valido di questa funzione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-8458">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-8459">Puntatore a **GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) non valido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-8459">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-8460">Widget **GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) non valido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-8460">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-8461">Consentito da</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-8461">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-8462">Inizializzazione e thread</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-8462">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-8463">Esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-8463">Example</span></span>

```C
GX_RICH_TEXT_FONTS fonts;

/* Replace the font ids as needed. */
fonts.gx_rich_text_fonts_normal_id = GX_FONT_ID_SYSTEM;
fonts.gx_rich_text_fonts_bold_id = GX_FONT_ID_SYSTEM;
fonts.gx_rich_text_fonts_italic_id = GX_FONT_ID_SYSTEM;
fonts.gx_rich_text_fonts_bold_italic_id = GX_FONT_ID_SYSTEM;

/* Set the font of “my_rich_view”. */
status = gx_rich_text_view_fonts_set(&my_rich_view, &fonts);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the font for rich text view “my_rich_view” has been set. */
```

## <a name="gx_rich_text_view_text_draw"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-8468">gx_rich_text_view_text_draw</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-8468">gx_rich_text_view_text_draw</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-8469">Estrai testo di visualizzazione RTF</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-8469">Draw rich text view text</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-8470">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-8470">Prototype</span></span>

```C
VOID gx_rich_text_view_text_draw(GX_RICH_TEXT_VIEW *text_view);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-8471">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-8471">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-8472">Questa funzione di supporto disegna la parte di testo di una visualizzazione di testo RTF.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-8472">This support function draws the text portion of a rich text view.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-8473">Questa funzione viene chiamata internamente da gx_rich_text_view_draw () e viene fornita come un'API separata per praticità per le applicazioni che definiscono una funzione di disegno di visualizzazione RTF personalizzata.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-8473">This function is called internally by gx_rich_text_view_draw(), and is provided as a separate API as a convenience for applications that define a custom rich text view drawing function.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-8474">Le applicazioni che desiderano personalizzare il disegno di sfondo della visualizzazione RTF possono fornire la funzione di disegno personalizzata e richiamare il servizio gx_rich_text_view_text_draw come parte del disegno personalizzato per disegnare il testo della visualizzazione RTF sullo sfondo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-8474">Applications that want to customize the rich text view background drawing can provide their custom drawing function, and invoke the gx_rich_text_view_text_draw service as part of their custom drawing to draw the rich text view text over the background.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-8475">Parametri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-8475">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-8476">**text_view** Puntatore a blocco di controllo widget visualizzazione testo RTF</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-8476">**text_view** Pointer to rich text view widget control block</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-8477">Valori restituiti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-8477">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-8478">**Nessuno**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-8478">**None**</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-8479">Consentito da</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-8479">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-8480">Thread</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-8480">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-8481">Esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-8481">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Write a custom rich text view drawing function. */

VOID my_rich_text_view_draw(GX_RICH_TEXT_VIEW *text_view)
{
    /* Insert code here to draw rich text view background. */

    /* Call support function to do text drawing. */
    gx_rich_text_view_text_draw();

    /* Draw child widgets. */
    gx_widget_children_draw((GX_WIDGET *) rich_text_view);
}
```

## <a name="gx_screen_stack_create"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-8486">gx_screen_stack_create</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-8486">gx_screen_stack_create</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-8487">Inizializzare uno stack di schermate</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-8487">Initialize a screen stack</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-8488">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-8488">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_screen_stack_create(
    GX_SCREEN_STACK_CONTROL *control,
    GX_WIDGET **memory_buffer, 
    INT buffer_size);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-8489">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-8489">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-8490">Questo servizio Inizializza uno stack di schermate.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-8490">This service initializes a screen stack.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-8491">L'applicazione deve definire il blocco di memoria e le dimensioni del buffer usati per implementare la funzionalità dello stack dello schermo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-8491">The application must define the memory block and buffer size used to implement the screen stack feature.</span></span>

> [!NOTE]
> <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-8492">*Questa API è obsoleta e viene sostituita con gx_system_screen_stack_create (). Questa versione viene fornita solo per compatibilità con le versioni precedenti.*</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-8492">*This API is obsoleted, and is replaced with gx_system_screen_stack_create(). This version is provided only for backwards compatibility with previous library releases..*</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-8493">Parametri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-8493">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-8494">**controllo** di Blocco di controllo dello stack dello schermo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-8494">**control** Screen stack control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-8495">**memory_buffer** Puntatore a un buffer di memoria utilizzato come stack dello schermo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-8495">**memory_buffer** Pointer to a memory buffer that used as a screen stack</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-8496">**BUFFER_SIZE** Dimensioni della memoria in byte</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-8496">**buffer_size** Memory size in bytes</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-8497">Valori restituiti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-8497">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-8498">Creazione dello stack di schermate **GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) riuscita</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-8498">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful screen stack create</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-8499">Puntatore a **GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) non valido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-8499">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-8500">Dimensioni del buffer di **GX_INVALID_VALUE** (0X22) non valide</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-8500">**GX_INVALID_VALUE** (0x22) Invalid buffer size</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-8501">Consentito da</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-8501">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-8502">Inizializzazione e thread</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-8502">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-8503">Esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-8503">Example</span></span>

```C
#define SCREEN_STACK_SIZE 10

GX_SCREEN_STACK_CONTROL my_stack_control;
GX_WIDGET *screen_stack[SCREEN_STACK_SIZE];

/* Initialize “my_stack_control”. */
status = gx_screen_stack_create(&my_stack_control, screen_stack,
                        SCREEN_STACK_SIZE * sizeof(GX_WIDGET *));

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the screen control block “my_stack control” has been initialized. */
```

## <a name="gx_screen_stack_pop"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-8508">gx_screen_stack_pop</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-8508">gx_screen_stack_pop</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-8509">Rimuovere la voce più in alto dallo stack dello schermo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-8509">Remove the topmost entry from the screen stack</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-8510">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-8510">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_screen_stack_pop(GX_SCREEN_STACK_CONTROL *control);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-8511">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-8511">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-8512">Questo servizio rimuove la voce più in alto dallo stack dello schermo e connette la schermata spuntata al padre precedente.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-8512">This service removes the topmost entry from the screen stack, and attaches the popped screen to its previous parent.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-8513">Questa API disconnette anche tutti gli elementi figlio esistenti dall'elemento padre.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-8513">This API also detaches any existing children from the parent.</span></span>

> [!NOTE]
> <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-8514">*Questa API è obsoleta e viene sostituita con gx_system_screen_stack_pop (). Questa versione viene fornita solo per compatibilità con le versioni precedenti.*</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-8514">*This API is obsoleted, and is replaced with gx_system_screen_stack_pop(). This version is provided only for backwards compatibility with previous library releases..*</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-8515">Parametri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-8515">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-8516">**controllo** di Blocco di controllo dello stack dello schermo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-8516">**control** Screen stack control block</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-8517">Valori restituiti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-8517">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-8518">Pop dello stack di schermo **GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) riuscito</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-8518">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful screen stack pop</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-8519">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) chiamante non valido di questa funzione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-8519">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-8520">Puntatore a **GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) non valido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-8520">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-8521">Consentito da</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-8521">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-8522">Thread</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-8522">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-8523">Esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-8523">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Remove the topmost entry from the screen stack. */
status = gx_screen_stack_pop(&my_stack_control);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the topmost entry has been removed from the screen stack, 
    and the popped screen has been attached to its parent. */
```

### <a name="see-also"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-8524">Vedere anche</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-8524">See Also</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-8526">gx_screen_stack_push</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-8526">gx_screen_stack_push</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-8527">gx_screen_stack_reset</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-8527">gx_screen_stack_reset</span></span>

## <a name="gx_screen_stack_push"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-8528">gx_screen_stack_push</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-8528">gx_screen_stack_push</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-8529">Schermata push e i relativi elementi padre nello stack</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-8529">Push screen and its parents to stack</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-8530">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-8530">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_screen_stack_push(
    GX_SCREEN_STACK_CONTROL *control,
    GX_WIDGET *screen,
    GX_WIDGET *new_screen);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-8531">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-8531">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-8532">Questo servizio scollega la schermata dall'elemento padre e inserisce il puntatore dello schermo e il puntatore padre sullo stack dello schermo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-8532">This service detaches screen from its parent, and pushes the screen pointer and the parent pointer onto the screen stack.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-8533">Il puntatore alla nuova schermata viene quindi collegato all'elemento padre.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-8533">The new screen pointer is then attached to the parent.</span></span>


> [!NOTE]
> <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-8534">*Questa API è obsoleta e viene sostituita con gx_system_screen_stack_pop (). Questa versione viene fornita solo per compatibilità con le versioni precedenti.*</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-8534">*This API is obsoleted, and is replaced with gx_system_screen_stack_pop(). This version is provided only for backwards compatibility with previous library releases..*</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-8535">Parametri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-8535">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-8536">**controllo** di Blocco di controllo dello stack dello schermo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-8536">**control** Screen stack control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-8537">**schermata** di Puntatore a schermo da inserire</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-8537">**screen** Screen pointer to push</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-8538">**new_screen** Puntatore della nuova schermata</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-8538">**new_screen** Pointer of the new screen</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-8539">Valori restituiti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-8539">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-8540">Push dello stack dello schermo riuscito per **GX_SUCCESS** (0x00)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-8540">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful screen stack push</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-8541">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) chiamante non valido di questa funzione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-8541">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-8542">Puntatore a **GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) non valido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-8542">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-8543">Consentito da</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-8543">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-8544">Thread</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-8544">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-8545">Esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-8545">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Push “screen” and its parent to screen stack, Dettach “screen” from its parent, and attach “new screen” to the parent. */
status = gx_screen_stack_push(&my_stack_control,
                                screen, new_screen);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the widget “screen” and its parent have been pushed to screen stack, “screen” has been detached from its parent, “new_screen” has been attached to the parent. */
```

### <a name="see-also"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-8546">Vedere anche</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-8546">See Also</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-8547">gx_screen_stack_create</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-8547">gx_screen_stack_create</span></span>

## <a name="gx_screen_stack_reset"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-8550">gx_screen_stack_reset</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-8550">gx_screen_stack_reset</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-8551">Rimuove tutte le voci dallo stack dello schermo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-8551">Removes all entries from the screen stack</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-8552">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-8552">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_screen_stack_reset(GX_SCREEN_STACK_CONTROL *control);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-8553">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-8553">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-8554">Questo servizio rimuove tutte le voci dallo stack dello schermo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-8554">This service removes all entries from the screen stack.</span></span>

> [!NOTE]
> <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-8555">*Questa API è obsoleta e viene sostituita con gx_system_screen_stack_pop (). Questa versione viene fornita solo per compatibilità con le versioni precedenti.*</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-8555">*This API is obsoleted, and is replaced with gx_system_screen_stack_pop(). This version is provided only for backwards compatibility with previous library releases..*</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-8556">Parametri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-8556">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-8557">**controllo** di Blocco di controllo dello stack dello schermo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-8557">**control** Screen stack control block</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-8558">Valori restituiti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-8558">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-8559">Creazione di un cursore di scorrimento **GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) riuscita</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-8559">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful scroll thumb create</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-8560">Puntatore a **GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) non valido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-8560">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-8561">Consentito da</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-8561">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-8562">Thread</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-8562">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-8563">Esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-8563">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Remove all enteries from the screen stack. */

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS all entries of screen stack has been removed. */
```

## <a name="gx_scroll_thumb_create"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-8568">gx_scroll_thumb_create</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-8568">gx_scroll_thumb_create</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-8570">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-8570">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_scroll_thumb_create(
    GX_SCROLL_THUMB *scroll_thumb,
    GX_SCROLLBAR *parent, ULONG style);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-8571">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-8571">Description</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-8574">Parametri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-8574">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-8575">**scroll_thumb** Blocco di controllo widget Scroll Thumb</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-8575">**scroll_thumb** Scroll thumb widget control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-8576">**elemento padre** Puntatore alla barra di scorrimento padre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-8576">**parent** Pointer to parent scrollbar</span></span>

## <a name="gx_scroll_thumb_draw"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-8592">gx_scroll_thumb_draw</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-8592">gx_scroll_thumb_draw</span></span>


### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-8595">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-8595">Description</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-8600">Valori restituiti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-8600">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-8601">**Nessuno**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-8601">**None**</span></span>

## <a name="gx_scroll_thumb_event_process"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-8608">gx_scroll_thumb_event_process</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-8608">gx_scroll_thumb_event_process</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-8609">Evento scorrimento cursore processo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-8609">Process scroll thumb event</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-8610">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-8610">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_scroll_thumb_event_process(
    GX_SCROLL_THUMB *scroll_thumb,
    GX_EVENT *event);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-8611">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-8611">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-8612">Questo servizio gestisce gli eventi inviati a un rotella della barra di scorrimento.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-8612">This service handles events sent to a scrollbar thumbwheel.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-8613">Questo servizio viene normalmente usato internamente da GUIX, ma è reso pubblico per facilitare l'implementazione di comportamenti della barra di scorrimento personalizzati.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-8613">This service is normally used internally by GUIX, but is made public to assist with implementing custom scrollbar behaviors.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-8614">Parametri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-8614">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-8615">**scroll_thumb** Blocco di controllo widget Scroll Thumb</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-8615">**scroll_thumb** Scroll thumb widget control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-8616">**evento** Puntatore a evento da elaborare</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-8616">**event** Pointer to event to process</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-8617">Valori restituiti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-8617">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-8618">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) processo di evento Thumb Scroll riuscito</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-8618">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful scroll thumb event process</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-8619">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) chiamante non valido di questa funzione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-8619">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-8620">Puntatore a **GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) non valido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-8620">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-8621">Widget **GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) non valido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-8621">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-8622">Consentito da</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-8622">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-8623">Inizializzazione e thread</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-8623">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-8624">Esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-8624">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Write a custom event processing function. */

UINT my_event_process (GX_SCROLL_THUMB *thumb, GX_EVENT *event_ptr)
{
    switch(event_ptr->gx_event_type)
    {
    case GX_EVENT_SHOW:
        /* Do default handling. */
        status = gx_scroll_thumb_event_process(thumb, event_ptr);

        /* add my own handling here */
        break;
    default:
        status = gx_scroll_thumb_event_process(thumb, event_ptr);
        break;
    }
    return status;
}
```

## <a name="gx_scroll_wheel_create"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-8628">gx_scroll_wheel_create</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-8628">gx_scroll_wheel_create</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-8629">Creare un widget della rotellina di scorrimento di base</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-8629">Create a base scroll wheel widget</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-8630">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-8630">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_scroll_wheel_create( 
    GX_SCROLL_WHEEL *wheel, 
    GX_CONST GX_CHAR *name,
    GX_WIDGET *parent,
    INT total_rows, 
    ULONG style,
    USHORT id, 
    GX_CONST GX_RECTANGLE *size);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-8631">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-8631">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-8632">Questo servizio crea un widget della rotellina di scorrimento generica.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-8632">This service creates a generic scroll wheel widget.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-8633">Una rotellina di scorrimento generica è il widget di base per tutti i tipi di widget della rotellina di scorrimento, inclusa la *gx_text_scroll_wheel*\* \* che rappresenta la base per i widget *gx_numeric_scroll_wheel*\* \* e *gx_string_ scroll_wheel*\* \*.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-8633">A generic scroll wheel is the base widget for all scroll wheel widget types, including the *gx_text_scroll_wheel*\*\* which is the base for *gx_numeric_scroll_wheel*\*\* and *gx_string_ scroll_wheel*\*\* widgets.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-8634">Il widget rotellina di scorrimento di base fornisce la gestione degli eventi, l'animazione a scorrimento e il calcolo delle righe selezionate per tutti i tipi di widget della rotellina di scorrimento</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-8634">The base scroll wheel widget provides event handling, scrolling animation, and selected row calculation for all scroll wheel widget types.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-8635">In genere, le applicazioni non creano un'istanza di un widget della rotellina di scorrimento generico, perché questo tipo di widget non fornisce funzioni di disegno.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-8635">Applications would not normally create an instance of a generic scroll wheel widget, since this widget type provides no drawing function.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-8636">Tuttavia, l'accesso a questa API viene fornito per supportare le applicazioni che devono creare un tipo di widget della rotellina di scorrimento personalizzato.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-8636">However access to this API is provided to assist applications which need to create a custom scroll wheel widget type.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-8637">GX_SCROLL_WHEEL si basa su GX_WINDOW e pertanto tutte le API di GX_WINDOW possono essere utilizzate con GX_SCROLL_WHEEL e widget derivati da GX_SCROLL_WHEEL.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-8637">GX_SCROLL_WHEEL is based on GX_WINDOW, and therefore all GX_WINDOW APIs may be used with GX_SCROLL_WHEEL and widgets derived from GX_SCROLL_WHEEL.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-8638">Parametri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-8638">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-8639">**rotellina** Puntatore al blocco di controllo della rotellina di scorrimento generico</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-8639">**wheel** Pointer to generic scroll wheel control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-8640">**nome** Nome widget assegnato all'applicazione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-8640">**name** Application assigned widget name</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-8641">**elemento padre** Widget padre o GX_NULL</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-8641">**parent** Parent widget, or GX_NULL</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-8642">**total_rows** Totale righe disponibili</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-8642">**total_rows** Total available rows</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-8643">**stile** Flag di stile del widget</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-8643">**style** Widget style flags</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-8644">ID widget assegnato all'applicazione **ID**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-8644">**id** Application assigned widget ID</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-8645">**dimensioni** Rettangolo che definisce le dimensioni iniziali del widget.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-8645">**size** Rectangle defining initial widget size.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-8646">Valori restituiti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-8646">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-8647">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) ha creato la rotellina di scorrimento</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-8647">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successfully created scroll wheel</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-8648">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) chiamante non valido di questa funzione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-8648">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-8649">Puntatore a **GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) non valido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-8649">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-8650">Dimensioni del blocco di controllo **GX_INVALID_SIZE** (0X19) non valide</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-8650">**GX_INVALID_SIZE** (0x19) Invalid control block size</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-8651">Widget **GX_ALREADY_CREATED** (0x13) creato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-8651">**GX_ALREADY_CREATED** (0x13) Widget created</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-8652">Il widget padre **GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) non è valido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-8652">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Parent widget not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-8653">Consentito da</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-8653">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-8654">Inizializzazione e thread</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-8654">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-8655">Esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-8655">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Call generic create function during custom widget createl. */

UINT custom_scroll_wheel_create(CUSTOM_SCROLL_WHEEL *wheel,
                    GX_CONST GX_CHAR *name,
                    GX_WIDGET *parent,
                    INT total_rows, ULONG style,
                    USHORT id,
                    GX_CONST GX_RECTANGLE *size)
{
    /* create base widget as part of custom create */
    status = gx_scroll_wheel_create(wheel, name, parent,
                            total_rows, style, id, size);

    /* If status is GX_SUCCESS the base scroll wheel has been created. */
}
```

## <a name="gx_scroll_wheel_event_process"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-8675">gx_scroll_wheel_event_process</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-8675">gx_scroll_wheel_event_process</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-8676">Funzione di elaborazione eventi per il widget della rotellina di scorrimento generico</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-8676">Event processing function for generic scroll wheel widget</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-8677">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-8677">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_scroll_wheel_event_process(
    GX_SCROLL_WHEEL *wheel,
    GX_EVENT *event);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-8678">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-8678">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-8679">Questo servizio fornisce la gestione degli eventi di input di base per tutti i tipi di widget della rotellina di scorrimento.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-8679">This service provides the basic input event handling for all scroll wheel widget types.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-8680">Questa funzione è esposta al software applicativo per supportare le applicazioni che devono creare un tipo di widget della rotellina di scorrimento personalizzato.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-8680">This function is exposed to the application software to assist with applications which need to create a custom scroll wheel widget type.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-8681">Le applicazioni spesso forniscono la propria funzione di elaborazione degli eventi, ma richiamano l'elaborazione di eventi generici per i widget della rotellina per gli eventi che non è necessario personalizzare.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-8681">Applications would often provide their own event processing function, but invoke the generic event processing for wheel widgets for events that they do not need to customize.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-8682">Parametri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-8682">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-8683">**rotellina** Puntatore al blocco di controllo della rotellina di scorrimento generico</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-8683">**wheel** Pointer to generic scroll wheel control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-8684">**evento** Puntatore GX_EVENT</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-8684">**event** GX_EVENT pointer</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-8685">Valori restituiti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-8685">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-8686">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) ha completato il processo di scorrimento della rotellina</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-8686">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successfully scroll wheel event process</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-8687">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) chiamante non valido di questa funzione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-8687">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-8688">Puntatore a **GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) non valido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-8688">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-8689">Widget **GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) non valido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-8689">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-8690">Consentito da</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-8690">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-8691">Inizializzazione e thread</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-8691">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-8692">Esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-8692">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Call generic scroll wheel event processing 
    as part of custom event processing function. */

UINT custom_scroll_wheel_event_process(CUSTOM_SCROLL_WHEEL *wheel,
                    GX_EVENT *event)
{
    switch(event->gx_event_type)
    {
    case xyz:
        /* insert custom event handling here */
        break;

    default:
        /* pass all other events to the generic scroll wheel
            event processing */
        gx_scroll_wheel_event_process(wheel, event);
        break;
    }
}
```

## <a name="gx_scroll_wheel_gradient_alpha_set"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-8712">gx_scroll_wheel_gradient_alpha_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-8712">gx_scroll_wheel_gradient_alpha_set</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-8713">Assegnare i valori alfa sfumatura per la sfumatura sovrapposta facoltativa</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-8713">Assign gradient alpha values for optional overlay gradient</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-8714">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-8714">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_scroll_wheel_gradient_alpha_set(
    GX_SCROLL_WHEEL *wheel,
    GX_UBYTE start_alpha,
    GX_UBYTE end_alpha);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-8715">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-8715">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-8716">Questo servizio definisce i valori alfa iniziali e finali per una sovrapposizione sfumata facoltativa del widget della rotellina di scorrimento.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-8716">This service defines the starting and ending alpha values for an optional gradient overlay of the scroll wheel widget.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-8717">Tutti i widget della rotellina di scorrimento supportano un effetto "dissolvenza" delle righe della rotellina di scorrimento come righe vicino al bordo superiore e inferiore del widget della rotellina di scorrimento.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-8717">All scroll wheel widgets support a “fade” effect of the scroll wheel rows as the rows near the top and bottom edge of the scroll wheel widget.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-8718">Questo effetto dissolvenza viene eseguito disegnando una sfumatura Pixelmap sulle righe della rotellina di scorrimento, che rendono le righe visualizzate come dissolvenza quando le righe vengono disegnate nella parte superiore e inferiore del widget della rotellina di scorrimento.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-8718">This fade effect is accomplished by drawing a gradient pixelmap over the scroll wheel rows, which make the rows appear to fade out as the rows are drawn near the top and bottom of the scroll wheel widget.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-8719">Questo servizio API consente all'applicazione di modificare l'intensità dell'effetto dissolvenza o di disabilitare completamente questo effetto impostando i valori alfa iniziali e finali su 0.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-8719">This API service allows the application to modify the fading effect intensity, or disable this effect entirely by setting the start and end alpha values to 0.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-8720">La sfumatura Pixelmap viene creata in fase di esecuzione quando la rotellina di scorrimento diventa inizialmente visibile.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-8720">The gradient pixelmap is created at runtime when the scroll wheel initially becomes visible.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-8721">A tale scopo, è necessario che sia stato definito un servizio di allocazione della memoria di runtime utilizzando _gx_system_memory_allocator_set ().</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-8721">This requires that a runtime memory allocation service has been defined using _gx_system_memory_allocator_set().</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-8722">Se non è stata definita alcuna funzione allocatore di memoria, l'immagine sfumatura non verrà creata e non sarà disponibile alcun effetto dissolvenza.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-8722">If no memory allocator function has been defined, the gradient image will not be created and no fade effect will be available.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-8723">Parametri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-8723">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-8724">**rotellina** Puntatore al blocco di controllo della rotellina di scorrimento generico</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-8724">**wheel** Pointer to generic scroll wheel control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-8725">**start_alpha** Valore alfa della sfumatura di sovrimpressione iniziale.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-8725">**start_alpha** The overlay gradient starting alpha value.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-8726">**end_alpha** Valore alfa finale della sfumatura di sovrapposizione.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-8726">**end_alpha** The overlay gradient ending alpha value.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-8727">Valori restituiti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-8727">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-8728">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) ha impostato il gradiente alfa della rotellina di scorrimento</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-8728">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successfully set the scroll wheel gradient alpha</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-8729">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) chiamante non valido di questa funzione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-8729">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-8730">Puntatore a **GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) non valido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-8730">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-8731">Widget **GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) non valido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-8731">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-8732">Consentito da</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-8732">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-8733">Inizializzazione e thread</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-8733">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-8734">Esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-8734">Example</span></span>

```C
status = gx_scroll_wheel_gradient_alpha_set(&wheel, 240, 0);
/* if status == GX_SUCCESS the wheel gradient alpha values were
Successfully assigned. */
```

<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-8755">Assegnare l'altezza della riga per ogni riga della rotellina</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-8755">Assign the row height for each wheel row</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-8756">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-8756">Prototype</span></span>

```C
    GX_SCROLL_WHEEL *wheel,
    GX_VALUE row_height);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-8757">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-8757">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-8758">Questo servizio assegna l'altezza della riga per ogni riga della rotellina di scorrimento.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-8758">This service assigns the row height for each row of the scroll wheel.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-8759">Si noti che se la rotellina di scorrimento ha GX_STYLE_TEXT_SCROLL_WHEEL_ROUND di stile, l'altezza della riga passa attraverso una trasformazione che riduce in modo efficace l'altezza della riga, in quanto la riga si avvicina al bordo superiore o inferiore della rotellina.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-8759">Note that if the scroll wheel has style GX_STYLE_TEXT_SCROLL_WHEEL_ROUND, the row height passes through a transform which effectively reduces the row height as the row nears the top or bottom edge of the wheel.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-8760">Parametri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-8760">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-8761">**rotellina** Puntatore al blocco di controllo della rotellina di scorrimento generico</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-8761">**wheel** Pointer to generic scroll wheel control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-8762">**row_height** Valore dell'altezza della riga, in pixel.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-8762">**row_height** Row height value, in pixels.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-8763">Valori restituiti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-8763">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-8764">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) ha impostato l'altezza della rotellina di scorrimento</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-8764">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successfully set scroll wheel height</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-8765">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) chiamante non valido di questa funzione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-8765">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-8766">Puntatore a **GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) non valido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-8766">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-8767">Widget **GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) non valido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-8767">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-8768">Consentito da</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-8768">Allowed From</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-8770">Esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-8770">Example</span></span>

```C
status = gx_scroll_wheel_row_height_set(&wheel, 40);

/* if status == GX_SUCCESS the wheel row height has been set to 40
pixels. */
```
