## <a name="gx_scroll_wheel_selected_background_set"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-8790">gx_scroll_wheel_selected_background_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-8790">gx_scroll_wheel_selected_background_set</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-8791">Assegna immagine di sfondo per la riga selezionata della rotellina</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-8791">Assign background image for wheel selected row</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-8792">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-8792">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_scroll_wheel_selected_background_set(
    GX_SCROLL_WHEEL*wheel, 
    GX_RESOURCE_ID image_id);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-8793">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-8793">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-8794">Questo servizio assegna un ID Pixelmap facoltativo che viene disegnato dietro la riga selezionata della rotellina di scorrimento.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-8794">This service assigns an optional pixelmap ID that is drawn behind the selected row of the scroll wheel.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-8795">Questo può essere usato per evidenziare la riga selezionata in modo che l'utente possa distinguere facilmente la riga della rotellina di scorrimento selezionata.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-8795">This can be used to highlight the selected row so that the user can easily distinguish which row of the scroll wheel is selected.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-8796">Parametri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-8796">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-8797">**rotellina** Puntatore al blocco di controllo della rotellina di scorrimento generico</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-8797">**wheel** Pointer to generic scroll wheel control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-8798">**image_id** ID Pixelmap da utilizzare come immagine di sfondo della riga selezionata.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-8798">**image_id** Pixelmap ID to use as the selected row background image.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-8799">Valori restituiti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-8799">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-8800">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) ha impostato lo sfondo della rotellina di scorrimento</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-8800">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successfully set scroll wheel background</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-8801">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) chiamante non valido di questa funzione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-8801">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-8802">Puntatore a **GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) non valido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-8802">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-8803">Widget **GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) non valido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-8803">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-8804">Consentito da</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-8804">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-8805">Inizializzazione e thread</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-8805">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-8806">Esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-8806">Example</span></span>

```C
status = gx_scroll_wheel_selected_background_set(&wheel,
GX_PIXELMAP_ID_SELECTED_ROW);

/* if status == GX_SUCCESS the background image has been
assigned. */
```

## <a name="gx_scroll_wheel_selected_get"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-8826">gx_scroll_wheel_selected_get</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-8826">gx_scroll_wheel_selected_get</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-8827">Recupera la riga della rotellina attualmente selezionata</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-8827">Retrieve the currently selected wheel row</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-8828">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-8828">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_scroll_wheel_selected_get(
    GX_SCROLL_WHEEL *wheel,
    INT *row);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-8829">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-8829">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-8830">Questo servizio eseguirà una query sulla rotellina di scorrimento per recuperare la riga attualmente selezionata.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-8830">This service will query the scroll wheel to retrieve the currently selected row.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-8831">Il chiamante deve passare il percorso per restituire l'indice di riga selezionato come secondo parametro della funzione.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-8831">The caller must pass the location to return the selected row index as the second parameter to this function.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-8832">Parametri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-8832">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-8833">**rotellina** Puntatore al blocco di controllo della rotellina di scorrimento generico</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-8833">**wheel** Pointer to generic scroll wheel control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-8834">**riga** di Posizione in cui verrà restituito il valore di riga selezionato.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-8834">**row** Location in which selected row value will be returned.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-8835">Valori restituiti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-8835">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-8836">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) ha recuperato la riga selezionata della rotellina</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-8836">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successfully retrieved selected wheel row</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-8837">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) chiamante non valido di questa funzione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-8837">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-8838">Puntatore a **GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) non valido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-8838">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-8839">Widget **GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x19) non valido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-8839">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x19) Widget not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-8840">Consentito da</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-8840">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-8841">Inizializzazione e thread</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-8841">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-8842">Esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-8842">Example</span></span>

```C
INT row;
status = gx_scroll_wheel_selected_get(&wheel, &row);

/* if status == GX_SUCCESS the selected row has been returned in
the row variable. */
```

## <a name="gx_scroll_wheel_selected_set"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-8862">gx_scroll_wheel_selected_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-8862">gx_scroll_wheel_selected_set</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-8863">Assegna riga della rotellina di scorrimento selezionata</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-8863">Assign selected scroll wheel row</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-8864">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-8864">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_scroll_wheel_selected_set(
    GX_SCROLL_WHEEL *wheel,
    INT row);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-8865">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-8865">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-8866">Questo servizio assegna la riga della rotellina di scorrimento attualmente selezionata.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-8866">This service assigns the currently selected scroll wheel row.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-8867">Parametri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-8867">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-8868">**rotellina** Puntatore al blocco di controllo della rotellina di scorrimento generico</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-8868">**wheel** Pointer to generic scroll wheel control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-8869">**riga** di Riga della rotellina di scorrimento da selezionare.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-8869">**row** Row of the scroll wheel to be selected.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-8870">Valori restituiti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-8870">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-8871">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) ha impostato correttamente la riga della rotellina selezionata</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-8871">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successfully set the selected wheel row</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-8872">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) chiamante non valido di questa funzione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-8872">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-8873">Puntatore a **GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) non valido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-8873">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-8874">Widget **GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) non valido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-8874">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-8875">Consentito da</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-8875">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-8876">Inizializzazione e thread</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-8876">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-8877">Esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-8877">Example</span></span>

```C
status = gx_scroll_wheel_selected_set(&wheel, 20);

/* if status == GX_SUCCESS the scroll wheel has been set to select
row 20 */
```

## <a name="gx_scroll_wheel_speed_set"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-8897">gx_scroll_wheel_speed_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-8897">gx_scroll_wheel_speed_set</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-8898">Assegna velocità di scorrimento</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-8898">Assign scrolling speed</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-8899">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-8899">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_scroll_wheel_speed_set(
    GX_SCROLL_WHEEL *wheel,
    GX_FIXED_VAL start_speed_rate,
    GX_FIXED_VAL end_speed_rate,
    GX_VALUE max_steps,
    GX_VALUE delay);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-8900">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-8900">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-8901">Questo servizio assegna la velocità di scorrimento per il widget della rotellina di scorrimento.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-8901">This service assigns the scrolling speed for the scroll wheel widget.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-8902">Parametri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-8902">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-8903">**rotellina** Puntatore al blocco di controllo della rotellina di scorrimento generico</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-8903">**wheel** Pointer to generic scroll wheel control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-8904">**start_speed_rate** Frequenza di scorrimento della velocità di avvio per la velocità di scorrimento rapido.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-8904">**start_speed_rate** The rate of scrolling start speed to flick speed.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-8905">**end_speed_rate** Frequenza di scorrimento della velocità finale per la velocità di scorrimento rapido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-8905">**end_speed_rate** The rate of scrolling end speed to flick speed</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-8906">**max_steps** Numero massimo di passaggi per lo scorrimento.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-8906">**max_steps** Max steps for scrolling.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-8907">**ritardo** Tempo di ritardo di ogni passaggio.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-8907">**delay** Delay time of each step.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-8908">Valori restituiti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-8908">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-8909">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) ha impostato la velocità della rotellina</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-8909">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successfully set wheel speed</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-8910">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) chiamante non valido di questa funzione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-8910">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-8911">Puntatore a **GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) non valido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-8911">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-8912">Widget **GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) non valido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-8912">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-8913">Valore di **GX_INVALID_VALUE** (0X22) non valido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-8913">**GX_INVALID_VALUE** (0x22) Invalid value</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-8914">Consentito da</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-8914">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-8915">Inizializzazione e thread</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-8915">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-8916">Esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-8916">Example</span></span>

```C
status = gx_scroll_wheel_speed_set(&wheel, GX_FIXED_VAL_MAKE(2),
                                GX_FIXED_VAL_MAKE(1) / 2, 10, 2);

/* if status == GX_SUCCESS the scroll wheel speed has been
successfully set. */
```

## <a name="gx_scroll_wheel_total_rows_set"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-8936">gx_scroll_wheel_total_rows_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-8936">gx_scroll_wheel_total_rows_set</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-8937">Assegnare le righe totali della rotellina di scorrimento disponibili</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-8937">Assign the total scroll wheel rows available</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-8938">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-8938">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_scroll_wheel_total_rows_set(
    GX_SCROLL_WHEEL *wheel,
    INT total_rows);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-8939">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-8939">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-8940">Questo servizio assegna il numero di righe disponibili nella rotellina di scorrimento indicata.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-8940">This service assigns the number of rows available in the indicated scroll wheel.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-8941">Il widget della rotellina di scorrimento riceve in genere il contenuto della riga dall'applicazione sotto forma di matrice di stringhe o dati stringa forniti dall'utente.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-8941">The scroll wheel widget usually receives the row content from the application in the form of an array of strings or user supplied string data.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-8942">Questa API informa la rotellina di scorrimento del numero totale di righe da presentare all'utente.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-8942">This API informs the scroll wheel of the total number of rows that should be presented to the user.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-8943">Parametri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-8943">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-8944">**rotellina** Puntatore al blocco di controllo della rotellina di scorrimento generico</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-8944">**wheel** Pointer to generic scroll wheel control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-8945">**total_rows** Numero totale di righe della rotellina da presentare all'utente.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-8945">**total_rows** Total number of wheel rows to present to the user.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-8946">Valori restituiti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-8946">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-8947">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) ha impostato correttamente la riga del totale della rotellina di scorrimento</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-8947">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successfully set scroll wheel total row</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-8948">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) chiamante non valido di questa funzione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-8948">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-8949">Puntatore a **GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) non valido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-8949">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>

## <a name="gx_scrollbar_draw"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-8973">gx_scrollbar_draw</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-8973">gx_scrollbar_draw</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-8974">Estrai barra di scorrimento</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-8974">Draw scrollbar</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-8975">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-8975">Prototype</span></span>

```C
VOID gx_scrollbar_draw(GX_SCROLLBAR *scrollbar);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-8976">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-8976">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-8977">Questo servizio disegna una barra di scorrimento.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-8977">This service draws a scrollbar.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-8978">Una funzione di disegno comune viene utilizzata per i widget della barra di scorrimento verticale e orizzontale.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-8978">A common drawing function is used for both vertical and horizontal scrollbar widgets.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-8979">Questo servizio viene chiamato internamente dall'aggiornamento Canvas di GUIX, ma può essere chiamato anche dalle funzioni di disegno sottoposte a override.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-8979">This service is called internally by the GUIX canvas refresh, but can also be called by overridden drawing functions.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-8980">Parametri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-8980">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-8981">**barra di scorrimento** Widget ScrollBar da creare</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-8981">**scrollbar** Scrollbar widget to draw</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-8982">Valori restituiti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-8982">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-8983">**Nessuno**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-8983">**None**</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-8984">Consentito da</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-8984">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-8985">Thread</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-8985">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-8986">Esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-8986">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Write a custom scrollbar drawing function. */

VOID my_scrollbar_draw(GX_SCROLLBAR *scrollbar)
{
    /* Call default scrollbar draw. */
    gx_scrollbar_draw(thumb);

    /* Add your own drawing here. */
}
```

## <a name="gx_scrollbar_event_process"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-8993">gx_scrollbar_event_process</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-8993">gx_scrollbar_event_process</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-8994">Evento della barra di scorrimento processo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-8994">Process scrollbar event</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-8995">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-8995">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_scrollbar_event_process(
    GX_SCROLLBAR *scrollbar,
    GX_EVENT *event);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-8996">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-8996">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-8997">Questo servizio elabora un evento ScrollBar.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-8997">This service processes a scrollbar event.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-8998">Funzione di gestione degli eventi comune utilizzata per i widget della barra di scorrimento verticale e orizzontale.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-8998">A common event handling function used for both vertical and horizontal scrollbar widgets.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-8999">Parametri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-8999">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-9000">**barra di scorrimento** Blocco di controllo widget ScrollBar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-9000">**scrollbar** Scrollbar widget control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-9001">**evento** Puntatore a evento da elaborare</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-9001">**event** Pointer to event to process</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-9002">Valori restituiti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-9002">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-9003">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) processo dell'evento ScrollBar riuscito</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-9003">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful scrollbar event process</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-9004">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) chiamante non valido di questa funzione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-9004">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-9005">Puntatore a **GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) non valido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-9005">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-9006">Widget **GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) non valido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-9006">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-9007">Consentito da</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-9007">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-9008">Thread</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-9008">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-9009">Esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-9009">Example</span></span>

```C
Call generic scrollbar event processing as part of custom event processing function. */

UINT custom_scrollbar_event_process(GX_SCROLLBAR *scrollbar,
                                    GX_EVENT *event)
{
    switch(event->gx_event_type)
    {
    case xyz:
        /* insert custom event handling here */
        break;
    default:
        /* pass all other events to the generic scrollbar
            event processing */
        gx_scrollbar_event_process(scrollbar, event);
        break;
    }
}
```

- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-9025">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) chiamante non valido di questa funzione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-9025">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-9027">Widget **GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) non valido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-9027">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-9054">Esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-9054">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Reset scrollbar “my_scrollbar”. */

GX_SCROLL_INFO my_info;

my_info.gx_scroll_value = 0;
my_info.gx_scroll_minimum = 0;
my_info.gx_scroll_maximum = 100;
my_info.gx_scroll_visible = 10;
my_info.gx_scroll_increment = 1;

status = gx_scrollbar_reset(&my_scrollbar, &my_info);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the scrollbar “my_scrollbar” has been reset. */
```

## <a name="gx_single_line_text_input_buffer_get"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-9158">gx_single_line_text_input_buffer_get</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-9158">gx_single_line_text_input_buffer_get</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-9160">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-9160">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_single_line_text_input_buffer_get(
    GX_SINGLE_LINE_TEXT_INPUT *text_input,
    GX_CHAR **buffer_address, 
    UINT *content_size, 
    UINT *buffer_size);
```

<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-9162">Questo servizio recupera le informazioni sul buffer del widget input di testo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-9162">This service retrieves buffer information of the text input widget.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-9165">**buffer_address** Indirizzo del buffer di input</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-9165">**buffer_address** The address of the input buffer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-9166">**content_size** Numero di byte dei dati di input</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-9166">**content_size** The byte count of the input data</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-9167">**BUFFER_SIZE** Dimensioni del buffer di input</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-9167">**buffer_size** The size of the input buffer</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-9168">Valori restituiti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-9168">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-9169">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) ha recuperato correttamente le informazioni sul buffer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-9169">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successfully retrieved buffer information</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-9170">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) chiamante non valido di questa funzione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-9170">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>

```C
UINT buffer_size;
UINT content_size;

```

<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-9273">Creare un widget di input di testo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-9273">Create a text input widget</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-9274">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-9274">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_single_line_text_input_create(
    GX_SINGLE_LINE_TEXT_INPUT *text_input,
    GX_CONST GX_CHAR *name, GX_WIDGET *parent,
    GX_CHAR *input_buffer, UINT buffer_size,
    UINT style, USHORT text_input_id, GX_CONST GX_RECTANGLE *size);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-9275">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-9275">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-9276">Questo servizio crea un widget di input di testo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-9276">This service creates a text input widget.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-9277">Il chiamante deve fornire spazio di archiviazione per la stringa di input e indicare la lunghezza massima della stringa.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-9277">The caller must provide storage for the input string and indicate the maximum length of the string.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-9278">GX_SINGLE_LINE_TEXT_INPUT deriva da GX_PROMPT e pertanto tutti i servizi gx_prompt possono essere utilizzati con i widget GX_SINGLE_LINE_TEXT_INPUT.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-9278">GX_SINGLE_LINE_TEXT_INPUT is derived from GX_PROMPT and therefore all gx_prompt services may be used with GX_SINGLE_LINE_TEXT_INPUT widgets.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-9281">**nome** Nome logico widget facoltativo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-9281">**name** Optional widget logical name</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-9282">**elemento padre** Widget padre facoltativo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-9282">**parent** Optional parent widget</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-9283">**input_buffer** Archiviazione per stringa di input</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-9283">**input_buffer** Storage for input string</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-9284">**BUFFER_SIZE** Dimensioni dell'area di archiviazione della stringa di input, in byte.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-9284">**buffer_size** Size of input string storage area, in bytes.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-9285">**stile** Flag di stile input di testo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-9285">**style** Text input style flags</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-9287">**dimensioni** Rettangolo che definisce le dimensioni iniziali del widget</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-9287">**size** Rectangle defining initial widget size</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-9288">Valori restituiti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-9288">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-9289">Creazione input di testo a riga singola **GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) riuscita</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-9289">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful single-line text input create</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-9290">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) chiamante non valido di questa funzione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-9290">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-9291">Puntatore a **GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) non valido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-9291">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-9293">**GX_INVALID_SIZE** (0x19) dimensioni del blocco di controllo widget non valide</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-9293">**GX_INVALID_SIZE** (0x19) Invalid widget control block size</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-9297">Esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-9297">Example</span></span>

```C
GX_SINGLE_LINE_TEXT_INPUT my_text_input;
static GX_CHAR           text_input_buffer[100];
GX_RECTANGLE             size;

/* Define widget size. */
gx_utility_rectangle_define(&size, 10, 10, 110, 40);

/* Create single-line text input widget “my_text_input”. */
status = gx_single_line_text_input_create(&my_text_input,
                        “text_input”, GX_NULL, text_input_buffer, 100,
                        GX_STYLE_ENABLED, 0, &size);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS, the text input widget has been created. */
```

## <a name="gx_single_line_text_input_draw"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-9319">gx_single_line_text_input_draw</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-9319">gx_single_line_text_input_draw</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-9320">Creare un widget di input di testo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-9320">Draw a text input widget</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-9321">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-9321">Prototype</span></span>

```C
VOID gx_single_line_text_input_draw(GX_SINGLE_LINE_TEXT_INPUT *text_input);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-9322">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-9322">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-9323">Questo servizio disegna un widget di input di testo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-9323">This service draws a text input widget.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-9324">Questo servizio viene in genere chiamato internamente durante l'aggiornamento dell'area di disegno, ma può essere chiamato anche dalle funzioni di disegno dell'input di testo personalizzato.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-9324">This service is normally called internally during canvas refresh, but can also be called from custom text input drawing functions.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-9325">Parametri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-9325">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-9326">**text_input** Blocco di controllo widget input di testo a riga singola</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-9326">**text_input** Single-line text input widget control block</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-9327">Valori restituiti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-9327">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-9328">**Nessuno**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-9328">**None**</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-9329">Consentito da</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-9329">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-9330">Thread</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-9330">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-9331">Esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-9331">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Write a custom single line text input draw function. */

VOID my_sl_text_input_draw(GX_SINGLE_LINE_TEXT_INPUT *input)
{
    /* Call default single line text input draw. */
    gx_single_line_text_input_draw(input);

    /* Add your own drawing here. */
}
```

## <a name="gx_single_line_text_input_draw_position_get"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-9353">gx_single_line_text_input_draw_position_get</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-9353">gx_single_line_text_input_draw_position_get</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-9354">Recupera posizione iniziale di estrazione testo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-9354">Retrieve text draw start position</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-9355">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-9355">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_single_line_text_input_draw_position_get(
    GX_SINGLE_LINE_TEXT_INPUT *text_input,
    GX_VALUE *xpos, GX_VALUE *ypos);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-9356">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-9356">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-9357">Questo servizio recupera la posizione iniziale del testo di input di testo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-9357">This service retrieves the draw start position of text input text.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-9358">Parametri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-9358">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-9359">**text_input** Blocco di controllo widget input di testo a riga singola</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-9359">**text_input** Single-line text input widget control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-9360">**XPos** Posizione iniziale di inizio estrazione nella coordinata x</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-9360">**xpos** Retrieved draw start position in x coordinate</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-9361">**YPos** Posizione iniziale di inizio estrazione nella coordinata y</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-9361">**ypos** Retrieved draw start position in y coordinate</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-9362">Valori restituiti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-9362">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-9363">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) spostare correttamente il cursore di input di testo alla fine</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-9363">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successfully move text input cursor to end</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-9364">Puntatore a **GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) non valido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-9364">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-9365">Widget **GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) non valido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-9365">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-9368">Esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-9368">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Write a custom single line text input draw function. */

VOID my_sl_text_input_draw(GX_SINGLE_LINE_TEXT_INPUT *input)
{
GX_VALUE xpos;
GX_VALUE ypos;

    /* Draw background. */
    gx_widget_border_draw(input, border_color, upper_fill_color,
                          lower_fill_color, GX_TRUE);

    /* Retrieve text draw start position. */
    gx_single_line_text_input_draw_position_get(input, xpos,
                                                ypos);

    /* Add your text drawing here. */
}
```

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-9428">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-9428">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_single_line_text_input_event_process(
    GX_SINGLE_LINE_TEXT_INPUT *text_input, 
    GX_EVENT *event_ptr);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-9429">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-9429">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-9430">Questo servizio elabora un evento di input di testo a riga singola.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-9430">This service processes a single line text input event.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-9431">Questa funzione viene a cui fa riferimento internamente la funzione gx_single_line_text_input_create, ma viene esposta per l'uso da parte dell'applicazione nei casi in cui l'applicazione definisce una funzione di elaborazione degli eventi di input di testo a riga singola personalizzata.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-9431">This function is internally referenced by the gx_single_line_text_input_create function, but is exposed for use by the application in those cases where the application defines a custom single line text input event processing function.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-9432">Parametri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-9432">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-9433">**text_input** Blocco di controllo widget input di testo a riga singola</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-9433">**text_input** Single-line text input widget control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-9434">**event_ptr** Puntatore alla struttura GX_EVENT</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-9434">**event_ptr** Pointer to GX_EVENT structure</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-9435">Valori restituiti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-9435">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-9436">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) ha elaborato l'evento di input di testo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-9436">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successfully processed text input event</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-9437">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) chiamante non valido di questa funzione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-9437">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-9438">Puntatore a **GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) non valido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-9438">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-9439">Widget **GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) non valido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-9439">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-9440">Consentito da</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-9440">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-9441">Inizializzazione e thread</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-9441">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-9442">Esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-9442">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Call generic single line text input event processing as part of custom event processing function. */

UINT custom_sl_text_input_event_process(
                                GX_SINGLE_LINE_TEXT_INPUT *input,
                                GX_EVENT *event)
{
    UINT status = GX_SUCCESS;

    switch(event->gx_event_type)
    {
    case xyz:
        /* Insert custom event handling here */
        break;
    default:
        /* Pass all other events to the default single line
            text input event processing */
        status =
        gx_single_line_text_input_event_process(input, event);
        break;
    }
    return status;
}
```

## <a name="gx_single_line_text_input_fill_color_set"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-9464">gx_single_line_text_input_fill_color_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-9464">gx_single_line_text_input_fill_color_set</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-9465">Imposta il colore di sfondo dell'input di testo a riga singola</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-9465">Set single line text input background color</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-9466">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-9466">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_single_line_text_input_fill_color_set(
    GX_SINGLE_LINE_TEXT_INPUT *text_input,
    GX_RESOURCE_ID normal_fill_color_id,
    GX_RESOURCE_ID selected_fill_color_id,
    GX_RESOURCE_ID disabled_fill_color_id,
    GX_RESOURCE_ID readonly_fill_color_id);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-9467">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-9467">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-9468">Questo servizio imposta il colore di riempimento dell'input di testo a riga singola.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-9468">This service sets the fill color of the single line text input.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-9469">Parametri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-9469">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-9470">**text_input** Puntatore a un blocco di controllo input di testo a riga singola</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-9470">**text_input** Pointer to single line text input control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-9471">**normal_fill_color_id** ID risorsa del colore di riempimento del widget nello stato normale.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-9471">**normal_fill_color_id** Resource ID of the widget fill color in normal state.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-9472">**L'Appendice A** contiene ID di risorsa colore predefiniti.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-9472">**Appendix A** contains pre-defined color Resource IDs.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-9473">Si noti che l'applicazione può aggiungere anche ID di risorse colore personalizzati.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-9473">Note that the application may add custom color Resource IDs as well.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-9474">**selected_fill_color_id** ID risorsa del colore di riempimento del widget quando il widget ottiene lo stato attivo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-9474">**selected_fill_color_id** Resource ID of the widget fill color when the widget gain focus.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-9475">**L'Appendice A** contiene ID di risorsa colore predefiniti.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-9475">**Appendix A** contains pre-defined color Resource IDs.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-9476">Si noti che l'applicazione può aggiungere anche ID di risorse colore personalizzati.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-9476">Note that the application may add custom color Resource IDs as well.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-9477">**disabled_fill_color_id** ID risorsa del colore di riempimento del widget quando lo stile GX_STYLE_ENABLED non è impostato.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-9477">**disabled_fill_color_id** Resource ID of the widget fill color when the style GX_STYLE_ENABLED is not set.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-9478">**L'Appendice A** contiene ID di risorsa colore predefiniti.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-9478">**Appendix A** contains pre-defined color Resource IDs.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-9479">Si noti che l'applicazione può aggiungere anche ID di risorse colore personalizzati.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-9479">Note that the application may add custom color Resource IDs as well.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-9480">**readonly_fill_color_id** ID risorsa del colore di riempimento del widget quando sono impostati sia GX_STYLE_ENABLED stile sia GX_STYLE_TEXT_INPUT_READYONLY.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-9480">**readonly_fill_color_id** Resource ID of the widget fill color when both style GX_STYLE_ENABLED and GX_STYLE_TEXT_INPUT_READYONLY are set.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-9481">**L'Appendice A** contiene ID di risorsa colore predefiniti.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-9481">**Appendix A** contains pre-defined color Resource IDs.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-9482">Si noti che l'applicazione può aggiungere anche ID di risorse colore personalizzati.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-9482">Note that the application may add custom color Resource IDs as well.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-9484">Set di colori di riempimento input di testo a riga singola riuscita **GX_SUCCESS** (0x00)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-9484">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful single line text input fill color set</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-9490">Esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-9490">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Set fill colors for single line text input “my_text_input”. */
status = gx_single_line_text_input_fill_color_set(&my_text_input,
                    GX_COLOR_ID_NORMAL_FILL,
                    GX_COLOR_ID_SELECTED_FILL,
                    GX_COLOR_ID_DISABLED_FILL,
                    GX_COLOR_ID_READONLY_FILL);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS, the fill color of “my_text_input” was
set. */
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-9515">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-9515">Description</span></span>

## <a name="gx_single_line_text_input_position_get"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-9586">gx_single_line_text_input_position_get</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-9586">gx_single_line_text_input_position_get</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-9587">Sposta cursore in posizione pixel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-9587">Move cursor to pixel position</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-9588">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-9588">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_single_line_text_input_position_get(
    GX_SINGLE_LINE_TEXT_INPUT *text_input,
    INT pixel_position);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-9589">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-9589">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-9590">Questo servizio posiziona il cursore di input di testo in base alla posizione del pixel richiesta.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-9590">This service positions the text input cursor based on the requested pixel position.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-9591">L'indice del cursore di input di testo verrà calcolato in base al valore x della posizione dei pixel.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-9591">The text input cursor index will be calculated based on the x value of the pixel position.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-9592">Questo servizio viene chiamato internamente quando viene ricevuto un evento Pen Down, ma può anche essere richiamato dall'applicazione.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-9592">This service is called internally when a pen down event is received, but can also be invoked by the application.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-9593">Parametri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-9593">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-9594">**text_input** Blocco di controllo widget input di testo a riga singola</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-9594">**text_input** Single-line text input widget control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-9595">**pixel_position** Valore X della posizione in pixel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-9595">**pixel_position** X value of pixel position</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-9596">Valori restituiti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-9596">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-9597">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) ha impostato correttamente il cursore sulla posizione richiesta</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-9597">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successfully set the cursor to requested position</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-9598">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) chiamante non valido di questa funzione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-9598">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-9599">Puntatore a **GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) non valido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-9599">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-9600">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) widget non valido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-9600">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Invalid widget</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-9601">Consentito da</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-9601">Allowed From</span></span>

```C

                                                100);

```

## <a name="gx_single_line_text_input_right_arrow"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-9625">gx_single_line_text_input_right_arrow</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-9625">gx_single_line_text_input_right_arrow</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-9626">Spostare il cursore di input di un carattere a destra</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-9626">Move input cursor one character to the right</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-9627">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-9627">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_single_line_text_input_right_arrow(
    GX_SINGLE_LINE_TEXT_INPUT *text_input);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-9628">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-9628">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-9629">Questo servizio sposta il cursore di input di testo di un carattere a destra.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-9629">This service moves the text input cursor one character to the right.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-9630">Questo servizio viene chiamato internamente quando viene ricevuto un evento di tasto destro, ma può anche essere richiamato dall'applicazione.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-9630">This service is called internally when a right key down event is received, but can also be invoked by the application.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-9631">Parametri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-9631">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-9632">**text_input** Blocco di controllo widget input di testo a riga singola</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-9632">**text_input** Single-line text input widget control block</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-9633">Valori restituiti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-9633">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-9634">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) ha spostato il cursore a destra</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-9634">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successfully moved cursor to the right</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-9635">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) chiamante non valido di questa funzione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-9635">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-9636">Puntatore a **GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) non valido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-9636">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-9637">Widget **GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) non valido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-9637">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-9638">Consentito da</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-9638">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-9639">Inizializzazione e thread</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-9639">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-9640">Esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-9640">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Move cursor one character to the right. */
status = gx_single_line_text_input_right_arrow(&my_text_input);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the text input cursor has been moved one character to the right. */
```

```C
UINT gx_single_line_text_input_style_add(
    GX_SINGLE_LINE_TEXT_INPUT *text_input, 
    ULONG style);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-9664">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-9664">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-9665">Questo servizio aggiunge uno o più stili specificati al widget di input di testo a riga singola.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-9665">This service adds the specified style(s) to the single line text input widget.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-9666">Parametri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-9666">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-9667">**text_input** Blocco di controllo widget input di testo a riga singola</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-9667">**text_input** Single-line text input widget control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-9668">**stile** Nuovo stile da aggiungere.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-9668">**style** New style to add.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-9669">L' **Appendice D** contiene stili generali predefiniti per tutti i widget</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-9669">**Appendix D** contains pre-defined general styles for all widgets</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-9671">Lo stile del **GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) è stato aggiunto al widget</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-9671">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successfully added style to widget</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-9672">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) chiamante non valido di questa funzione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-9672">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-9673">Puntatore a **GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) non valido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-9673">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-9674">Widget **GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) non valido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-9674">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-9675">Consentito da</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-9675">Allowed From</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-9677">Esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-9677">Example</span></span>

```C

GX_STYLE_CURSOR_AWAYS);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the GX_STYLE_CUSROSR_SHOR have been successfully added. */
```

## <a name="gx_single_line_text_input_style_set"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-9734">gx_single_line_text_input_style_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-9734">gx_single_line_text_input_style_set</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-9735">Imposta stili input di testo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-9735">Set text input styles</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_single_line_text_input_style_set(
    GX_SINGLE_LINE_TEXT_INPUT *text_input, 
    ULONG style);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-9737">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-9737">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-9738">Questo servizio imposta gli stili specificati sul widget di input di testo a riga singola.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-9738">This service sets the specified style(s) to the single line text input widget.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-9741">flag **di stile da** assegnare</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-9741">**style** style flags to assign</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-9742">Valori restituiti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-9742">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-9743">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) ha impostato correttamente lo stile di input di testo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-9743">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successfully set the text input style</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-9744">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) chiamante non valido di questa funzione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-9744">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-9745">Puntatore a **GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) non valido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-9745">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-9746">Widget **GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) non valido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-9746">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-9747">Consentito da</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-9747">Allowed From</span></span>

```C

                    GX_STYLE_ENABLED | GX_STYLE_CURSOR_BLINK);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the text input style has been successfully set to the specified styles. */
```

## <a name="gx_single_line_text_input_text_color_set"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-9769">gx_single_line_text_input_text_color_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-9769">gx_single_line_text_input_text_color_set</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-9770">Imposta il colore del testo dell'input di testo a riga singola</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-9770">Set single line text input text color</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-9771">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-9771">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_single_line_text_input_text_color_set(
    GX_SINGLE_LINE_TEXT_INPUT *text_input,
    GX_RESOURCE_ID normal_text_color_id,
    GX_RESOURCE_ID selected_text_color_id,
    GX_RESOURCE_ID disabled_text_color_id,
    GX_RESOURCE_ID readonly_text_color_id);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-9772">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-9772">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-9773">Questo servizio imposta il colore del testo dell'input di testo a riga singola.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-9773">This service sets the text color of the single line text input.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-9774">Parametri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-9774">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-9775">**text_input** Puntatore a un blocco di controllo input di testo a riga singola</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-9775">**text_input** Pointer to single line text input control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-9776">**normal_text_color_id** ID risorsa del colore del testo nello stato normale.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-9776">**normal_text_color_id** Resource ID of the text color in normal state.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-9777">**L'Appendice A** contiene ID di risorsa colore predefiniti.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-9777">**Appendix A** contains pre-defined color Resource IDs.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-9778">Si noti che l'applicazione può aggiungere anche ID di risorse colore personalizzati.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-9778">Note that the application may add custom color Resource IDs as well.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-9779">**selected_text_color_id** ID risorsa del colore del testo quando il widget ottiene lo stato attivo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-9779">**selected_text_color_id** Resource ID of the text color when the widget gain focus.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-9780">**L'Appendice A** contiene ID di risorsa colore predefiniti.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-9780">**Appendix A** contains pre-defined color Resource IDs.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-9781">Si noti che l'applicazione può aggiungere anche ID di risorse colore personalizzati.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-9781">Note that the application may add custom color Resource IDs as well.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-9782">**disabled_text_color_id** ID risorsa del colore del testo quando lo stile GX_STYLE_ENABLED non è impostato.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-9782">**disabled_text_color_id** Resource ID of the text color when the style GX_STYLE_ENABLED is not set.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-9783">**L'Appendice A** contiene ID di risorsa colore predefiniti.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-9783">**Appendix A** contains pre-defined color Resource IDs.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-9784">Si noti che l'applicazione può aggiungere anche ID di risorse colore personalizzati.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-9784">Note that the application may add custom color Resource IDs as well.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-9785">**readonly_text_color_id** ID di risorsa del colore del testo quando vengono impostati sia GX_STYLE_ENABLED stile sia GX_STYLE_TEXT_INPUT_READONLY.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-9785">**readonly_text_color_id** Resource ID of the text color when both style GX_STYLE_ENABLED and GX_STYLE_TEXT_INPUT_READONLY are set.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-9786">**L'Appendice A** contiene ID di risorsa colore predefiniti.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-9786">**Appendix A** contains pre-defined color Resource IDs.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-9787">Si noti che l'applicazione può aggiungere anche ID di risorse colore personalizzati.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-9787">Note that the application may add custom color Resource IDs as well.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-9788">Valori restituiti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-9788">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-9789">Set di colori del testo di input di testo a riga singola riuscita **GX_SUCCESS** (0x00)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-9789">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful single line text input text color set</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-9790">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) chiamante non valido di questa funzione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-9790">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-9791">Puntatore a **GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) non valido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-9791">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-9792">Widget **GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) non valido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-9792">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-9793">Consentito da</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-9793">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-9794">Inizializzazione e thread</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-9794">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-9795">Esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-9795">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Set text colors for single line text input “my_text_input”. */
status = gx_single_line_text_input_text_color_set(&my_text_input,
                                        GX_COLOR_ID_NORMAL_TEXT,
                                        GX_COLOR_ID_SELECTED_TEXT,
                                        GX_COLOR_ID_DISABLED_TEXT,
                                        GX_COLOR_ID_READONLY_TEXT);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS, the text color “my_text_input” was set. */
```

## <a name="gx_single_line_text_input_text_select"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-9817">gx_single_line_text_input_text_select</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-9817">gx_single_line_text_input_text_select</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-9818">Seleziona testo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-9818">Select text</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-9819">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-9819">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_single_line_text_input_text_color_set(
    GX_SINGLE_LINE_TEXT_INPUT *text_input,
    UINT start_index, UINT end_index);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-9820">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-9820">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-9821">Questo servizio seleziona il testo con il contrassegno iniziale e l'indice del contrassegno finale specificati ed evidenzia il testo selezionato con i colori di riempimento e testo selezionati.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-9821">This service selects text with specified start mark and end mark index and highlights the selected text with the selected fill and text colors.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-9822">Parametri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-9822">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-9823">**text_input** Puntatore a un blocco di controllo input di testo a riga singola</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-9823">**text_input** Pointer to single line text input control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-9824">**start_index** Indice del primo carattere selezionato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-9824">**start_index** Index of the first selected character</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-9825">**end_index** Indice dell'ultimo carattere selezionato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-9825">**end_index** Index of the last selected character</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-9826">Valori restituiti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-9826">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-9827">Selezione testo di input di testo a riga singola riuscita **GX_SUCCESS** (0x00)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-9827">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful single line text input text selection</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-9828">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) chiamante non valido di questa funzione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-9828">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-9829">Puntatore a **GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) non valido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-9829">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-9830">Widget **GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) non valido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-9830">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-9831">Il valore di indice **GX_INVALID_VALUE** (0x22) non è valido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-9831">**GX_INVALID_VALUE** (0x22) Index value not valid</span></span>

```C
/* Select text between index [0, 9]. */
status = gx_single_line_text_input_text_select(&my_text_input,
                                                0,9);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS, the text between index [0, 9] “my_text_input” was selected. */
```

```C
    GX_SINGLE_LINE_TEXT_INPUT *text_input,
    GX_CONST GX_CHAR *text);
```

```C
GX_CONST GX_CHAR new_text = “Set Single Line Text Input Text”;

/* Set text for single line text input “my_text_input”. */

                                        new_text);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS, the text of “my_text_input” was set. */
```
