## <a name="gx_slider_create"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-9912">gx_slider_create</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-9912">gx_slider_create</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-9913">Crea dispositivo di scorrimento</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-9913">Create slider</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-9914">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-9914">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_slider_create(
    GX_SLIDER *slider, 
    GX_CONST GX_CHAR *name,
    GX_WIDGET *parent, INT tick_count,
    GX_SLIDER_INFO *slider_info,
    ULONG style, USHORT slider_id,
    GX_CONST GX_RECTANGLE *size);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-9915">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-9915">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-9916">Questo servizio crea un widget Slider.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-9916">This service creates a slider widget.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-9917">GX_SLIDER deriva da GX_WIDGET e pertanto tutti i servizi API gx_widget possono essere usati con i widget di tipo GX_SLIDER.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-9917">GX_SLIDER is derived from GX_WIDGET, and therefore all gx_widget API services may be used with GX_SLIDER type widgets.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-9918">Parametri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-9918">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-9919">**dispositivo di scorrimento**: blocco di controllo del dispositivo slider</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-9919">**slider**: Slider widget control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-9920">**nome**: nome del dispositivo di scorrimento</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-9920">**name**: Name of slider</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-9921">**padre**: puntatore al widget padre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-9921">**parent**: Pointer to parent widget</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-9922">**tick_count**: numero di cicli di scorrimento</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-9922">**tick_count**: Number of slider ticks</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-9923">**slider_info**: puntatore a informazioni sul dispositivo di scorrimento che è una struttura usata per passare i limiti del valore del dispositivo di scorrimento, le dimensioni e la posizione degli aghi e altri parametri del dispositivo di scorrimento.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-9923">**slider_info**: Pointer to slider info which is a structure used to pass the slider value limits, slider needle size and position, and other slider parameters.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-9924">**Appendice I** contiene la definizione per GX_SLIDER_INFO struttura.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-9924">**Appendix I** contains definition to GX_SLIDER_INFO structure.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-9925">**stile**: stile del dispositivo di scorrimento.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-9925">**style**: Style of slider.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-9926">L' **Appendice D** contiene stili generali predefiniti per tutti i widget e per gli stili specifici dei widget.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-9926">**Appendix D** contains predefined general styles for all widgets as well as widget-specific styles.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-9927">**slider_id**: ID del dispositivo di scorrimento definito dall'applicazione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-9927">**slider_id**: Application-defined ID of slider</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-9928">**dimensioni**: dimensioni del dispositivo di scorrimento</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-9928">**size**: Dimensions of slider</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-9929">Valori restituiti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-9929">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-9930">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) creazione Slider riuscita</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-9930">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) Successful slider create</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-9931">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**: (0x11) il chiamante di questa funzione non è valido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-9931">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**: (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-9932">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) puntatore non valido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-9932">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-9933">**GX_ALREADY_CREATED**: il widget (0x13) è già stato creato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-9933">**GX_ALREADY_CREATED**: (0x13) Widget already created</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-9934">**GX_INVALID_SIZE**: (0x19) dimensioni del blocco di controllo widget non valide</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-9934">**GX_INVALID_SIZE**: (0x19) Invalid widget control block size</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-9935">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET**: (0x12) widget padre non valido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-9935">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET**: (0x12) Parent widget not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-9936">Consentito da</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-9936">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-9937">Inizializzazione e thread</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-9937">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-9938">Esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-9938">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Create slider “my_slider”. */

GX_SLIDER my_slider;
GX_SLIDER_INFO info;

info.gx_slider_info_min_val = 0;
info.gx_slider_info_max_val = 100;
info.gx_slider_info_current_val = 50;
info.gx_slider_info_increment = 1;
info.gx_slider_info_min_travel = 20;
info.gx_slider_info_max_travel = 20;
info.gx_slider_info_needle_width = 10;
info.gx_slider_info_needle_height = 10;
info.gx_slider_info_needle_inset = 5;
info.gx_slider_info_needle_hotspot_offset = 5;

status = gx_slider_create(&my_slider, “my_slider”,
    &my_parent, 10, info, GX_STYLE_ENABLED, ID_MY_SLIDER, &size);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the slider “my_slider” has been created. */
```

## <a name="gx_slider_draw"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-9953">gx_slider_draw</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-9953">gx_slider_draw</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-9954">Dispositivo di scorrimento disegnato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-9954">Draw slider</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-9955">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-9955">Prototype</span></span>

```C
VOID gx_slider_draw(GX_SLIDER *slider);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-9956">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-9956">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-9957">Questo servizio disegna un dispositivo di scorrimento.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-9957">This service draws a slider.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-9958">Questo servizio viene utilizzato internamente dalla funzione gx_slider_create, ma viene inoltre esposto per l'utilizzo da parte dell'applicazione in tali istanze quando viene definita una funzione di disegno del dispositivo di scorrimento personalizzata.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-9958">This service is used internally by the gx_slider_create function, but is also exposed for use by the application in those instances when a custom slider drawing function is defined.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-9959">Parametri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-9959">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-9960">**dispositivo di scorrimento**: blocco di controllo del dispositivo slider</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-9960">**slider**: Slider widget control block</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-9961">Valori restituiti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-9961">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-9962">**Nessuno**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-9962">**None**</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-9963">Consentito da</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-9963">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-9964">Thread</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-9964">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-9965">Esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-9965">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Write a custom slider draw function. */
VOID my_slider_draw(GX_SLIDER *slider)
{
    /* Call default slider draw. */
    gx_slider_draw(slider);

    /* Add your own drawing here. */
}
```

## <a name="gx_slider_event_process"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-9980">gx_slider_event_process</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-9980">gx_slider_event_process</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-9981">Evento dispositivo di scorrimento processo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-9981">Process slider event</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-9982">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-9982">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_slider_event_process(
    GX_SLIDER *slider, 
    GX_EVENT *event);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-9983">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-9983">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-9984">Questo servizio elabora un evento Slider.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-9984">This service processes a slider event.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-9985">Questa funzione viene a cui fa riferimento internamente la funzione gx_slider_create, ma viene esposta per l'uso da parte dell'applicazione nei casi in cui l'applicazione definisce una funzione di elaborazione di eventi del dispositivo di scorrimento personalizzata.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-9985">This function is internally referenced by the gx_slider_create function, but is exposed for use by the application in those cases where the application defines a custom slider event processing function.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-9986">Parametri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-9986">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-9987">**dispositivo di scorrimento**: blocco di controllo del dispositivo slider</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-9987">**slider**: Slider widget control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-9988">**evento**: puntatore a evento da elaborare</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-9988">**event**: Pointer to event to process</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-9989">Valori restituiti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-9989">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-9990">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) processo dell'evento Slider riuscito</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-9990">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) Successful slider event process</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-9991">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**: (0x11) il chiamante di questa funzione non è valido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-9991">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**: (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-9992">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) puntatore non valido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-9992">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-9993">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET**: (0X12) widget non valido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-9993">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET**: (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-9994">Consentito da</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-9994">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-9995">Thread</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-9995">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-9996">Esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-9996">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Call generic slider event processing as part of custom event processing function. */

UINT custom_slider_event_process(GX_SLIDER *slider,
    GX_EVENT *event)
{
    UINT status = GX_SUCCESS;
    switch(event->gx_event_type)
    {
        case xyz:
            /* Insert custom event handling here */
            break;
        default:
            /* Pass all other events to the default slider event processing */
            status = gx_slider_event_process(slider, event);
            break;
    }
    return status;
}
```

## <a name="gx_slider_info_set"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-10011">gx_slider_info_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-10011">gx_slider_info_set</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-10012">Imposta blocco informazioni dispositivo di scorrimento</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-10012">Set slider information block</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-10013">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-10013">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_slider_info_set(
    GX_SLIDER *slider, 
    GX_SLIDER_INFO *info);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-10014">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-10014">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-10015">Questo servizio assegna al dispositivo di scorrimento indicato le informazioni di dispositivo di scorrimento specificate, ad esempio il valore minimo del dispositivo di scorrimento, il valore massimo del dispositivo di scorrimento e lo slider</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-10015">This service assigns the specified slider information such as slider minimum, slider maximum, and slider current value to the indicated slider.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-10016">Il dispositivo di scorrimento aggiornerà la posizione della lancetta e ridisegnato in base alle nuove informazioni sul dispositivo di scorrimento.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-10016">The slider will update the needle position and redraw based on the new slider information.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-10017">Parametri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-10017">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-10018">**dispositivo di scorrimento**: blocco di controllo del dispositivo slider</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-10018">**slider**: Slider widget control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-10019">**info**: puntatore alla struttura delle informazioni sul dispositivo di scorrimento.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-10019">**info**: Pointer to the slider information structure.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-10020">**Appendice I** contiene la definizione per GX_SLIDER_INFO struttura.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-10020">**Appendix I** contains definition to GX_SLIDER_INFO structure.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-10021">Valori restituiti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-10021">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-10022">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) impostare correttamente le informazioni sul dispositivo di scorrimento</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-10022">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) Successfully set slider information</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-10023">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**: (0x11) il chiamante di questa funzione non è valido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-10023">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**: (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-10024">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) puntatore non valido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-10024">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-10025">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET**: (0X12) widget non valido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-10025">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET**: (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-10026">Consentito da</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-10026">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-10027">Inizializzazione e thread</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-10027">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-10028">Esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-10028">Example</span></span>

```C
GX_SLIDER_INFO my_slider_info;
my_slider_info.gx_slider_info_min_val = 0;
my_slider_info.gx_slider_info_max_val = 100;
my_slider_info.gx_slider_info_current_val = 50;
my_slider_info.gx_slider_info_increment = 1;
my_slider_info.gx_slider_info_min_travel = 20;
my_slider_info.gx_slider_info_max_travel = 20;
my_slider_info.gx_slider_info_needle_width = 10;
my_slider_info.gx_slider_info_needle_height = 10;
my_slider_info.gx_slider_info_needle_inset = 5;

my_slider_info.gx_slider_info_needle_hotspot_offset = 5;

/* Set slider information for slider “my_slider”. */
status = gx_slider_info_set (&my_slider, &my_slider_info);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the “my_slider” is configured with my_slider_info. */
```

## <a name="gx_slider_needle_draw"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-10043">gx_slider_needle_draw</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-10043">gx_slider_needle_draw</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-10044">Lancetta del dispositivo di scorrimento disegnato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-10044">Draw slider needle</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-10045">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-10045">Prototype</span></span>

```C
VOID gx_slider_needle_draw(GX_SLIDER *slider);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-10046">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-10046">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-10047">Questo servizio disegna un dispositivo di scorrimento.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-10047">This service draws a slider needle.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-10048">Questo servizio viene chiamato automaticamente dalla funzione gx_slider_draw, ma può anche essere richiamato dall'applicazione come parte di una funzione di disegno del dispositivo di scorrimento personalizzata.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-10048">This service is automatically called by the gx_slider_draw function, but may also be invoked by the application as part of a customized slider drawing function.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-10049">Parametri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-10049">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-10050">**dispositivo di scorrimento**: blocco di controllo del dispositivo slider</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-10050">**slider**: Slider widget control block</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-10051">Valori restituiti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-10051">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-10052">**Nessuno**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-10052">**None**</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-10053">Consentito da</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-10053">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-10054">Thread</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-10054">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-10055">Esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-10055">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Write a custom slider draw function. */
VOID my_slider_draw(GX_SLIDER *slider)
{
    /* Add your own background draw here. */

    /* Call default tickmarks draw. */
    gx_slider_tickmarks_draw(slider);

    /* Call default slider needle draw. */
    gx_slider_needle_draw(slider);
}
```

## <a name="gx_slider_needle_position_get"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-10070">gx_slider_needle_position_get</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-10070">gx_slider_needle_position_get</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-10071">Ottenere la posizione dell'ago del dispositivo di scorrimento</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-10071">Get slider needle position</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-10072">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-10072">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_slider_needle_position_get(
    GX_SLIDER *slider,
    GX_SLIDER_INFO *slider_info,
    GX_RECTANGLE *return_position);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-10073">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-10073">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-10074">Questo servizio calcola la posizione della lancetta del dispositivo di scorrimento in base al valore del dispositivo di scorrimento corrente.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-10074">This service computes the slider needle position based on the current slider value.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-10075">Parametri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-10075">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-10076">**dispositivo di scorrimento**: blocco di controllo del dispositivo slider</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-10076">**slider**: Slider widget control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-10077">**slider_info**: puntatore alla struttura delle informazioni sul dispositivo di scorrimento che definisce i limiti del dispositivo di scorrimento, le dimensioni e l'offset degli aghi e altri parametri del dispositivo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-10077">**slider_info**: Pointer to slider information structure defining the slider limits, needle size and offset, and other slider parameters.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-10078">**Appendice I** contiene la definizione per GX_SLIDER_INFO struttura.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-10078">**Appendix I** contains definition to GX_SLIDER_INFO structure.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-10079">**return_position**: puntatore alla destinazione per la posizione della lancetta</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-10079">**return_position**: Pointer to destination for needle position</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-10080">Valori restituiti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-10080">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-10081">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) la posizione dell'ago del dispositivo di scorrimento è riuscita</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-10081">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) Successful slider needle position get</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-10082">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**: (0x11) il chiamante di questa funzione non è valido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-10082">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**: (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-10083">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) puntatore non valido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-10083">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-10084">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET**: (0X12) widget non valido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-10084">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET**: (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-10085">**GX_INVALID_VALUE**: (0x22) informazioni sul dispositivo di scorrimento non valide</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-10085">**GX_INVALID_VALUE**: (0x22) Slider info not valid</span></span>

## <a name="gx_slider_tickmarks_draw"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-10103">gx_slider_tickmarks_draw</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-10103">gx_slider_tickmarks_draw</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-10104">Tickmarks Slider di disegni</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-10104">Draw slider tickmarks</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-10105">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-10105">Prototype</span></span>

```C
VOID gx_slider_tickmarks_draw(GX_SLIDER *slider);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-10106">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-10106">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-10107">Questo servizio disegna il dispositivo di scorrimento tickmarks.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-10107">This service draws the slider tickmarks.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-10108">Questa funzione viene chiamata internamente dalla funzione gx_slider_draw, ma viene esposta per l'uso da parte di applicazioni che potrebbero implementare una funzione di disegno Slider personalizzata.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-10108">This function is called internally by the gx_slider_draw function, but is exposed for use by applications that might implement a custom slider drawing function.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-10109">Parametri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-10109">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-10110">**dispositivo di scorrimento**: blocco di controllo del dispositivo slider</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-10110">**slider**: Slider widget control block</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-10111">Valori restituiti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-10111">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-10112">**Nessuno**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-10112">**None**</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-10113">Consentito da</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-10113">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-10114">Thread</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-10114">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-10115">Esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-10115">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Write a custom slider draw function. */
VOID my_slider_draw(GX_SLIDER *slider)
{
    /* Add your own background draw here. */

    /* Call default tickmarks draw. */
    gx_slider_tickmarks_draw(slider);

    /* Call default slider needle draw. */
    gx_slider_needle_draw(slider);
}
```

## <a name="gx_slider_travel_get"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-10130">gx_slider_travel_get</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-10130">gx_slider_travel_get</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-10131">Ottenere la corsa del dispositivo di scorrimento</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-10131">Get slider travel</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-10132">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-10132">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_slider_travel_get(
    GX_SLIDER *widget,
    GX_SLIDER_INFO *info,
    INT *return_min_travel, 
    INT *return_max_travel);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-10133">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-10133">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-10134">Questo servizio ottiene la corsa del dispositivo di scorrimento.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-10134">This service gets the slider travel.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-10135">Parametri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-10135">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-10136">**dispositivo di scorrimento**: blocco di controllo del dispositivo slider</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-10136">**slider**: Slider widget control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-10137">**info**: puntatore alla struttura delle informazioni sul dispositivo di scorrimento.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-10137">**info**: Pointer to slider info structure.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-10138">**Appendice I** contiene la definizione per GX_SLIDER_INFO struttura.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-10138">**Appendix I** contains definition to GX_SLIDER_INFO structure.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-10139">**return_min_travel**: puntatore alla destinazione per un valore di viaggio minimo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-10139">**return_min_travel**: Pointer to destination for minimum travel value</span></span></td>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-10140">**return_max_travell**: puntatore alla destinazione per il valore di viaggio massimo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-10140">**return_max_travell**: Pointer to destination for maximum travel value</span></span></td>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-10141">Valori restituiti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-10141">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-10142">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) operazione riuscita per il dispositivo di scorrimento</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-10142">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) Successful slider travel get</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-10143">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**: (0x11) il chiamante di questa funzione non è valido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-10143">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**: (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-10144">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) puntatore non valido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-10144">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-10145">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET**: (0X12) widget non valido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-10145">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET**: (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-10146">**GX_INVALID_VALUE**: (0x22) informazioni sul dispositivo di scorrimento non valide</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-10146">**GX_INVALID_VALUE**: (0x22) Slider info not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-10147">Consentito da</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-10147">Allowed From</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-10149">Esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-10149">Example</span></span>

```C

    &my_min_travel, &my_max_travel);

```

## <a name="gx_slider_value_calculate"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-10164">gx_slider_value_calculate</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-10164">gx_slider_value_calculate</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-10165">Calcolare il valore del dispositivo di scorrimento</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-10165">Calculate slider value</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-10166">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-10166">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_slider_value_calculate(
    GX_SLIDER *slider, 
    GX_SLIDER_INFO *info,
    INT new_position);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-10167">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-10167">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-10168">Questo servizio calcola il valore del dispositivo di scorrimento in base alla posizione della lancetta del dispositivo di scorrimento.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-10168">This service calculates the slider value based on the slider needle position.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-10169">Questa funzione viene chiamata internamente da GUIX quando l'utente sposta l'ago del dispositivo di scorrimento, ma può anche essere richiamato dall'applicazione durante l'implementazione di un widget Slider personalizzato.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-10169">This function is called internally by GUIX when the user moves the slider needle, but can also be invoked by the application when implementing a custom slider widget.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-10170">Parametri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-10170">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-10171">**dispositivo di scorrimento**: blocco di controllo del dispositivo slider</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-10171">**slider**: Slider widget control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-10172">**info**: puntatore alle informazioni sul dispositivo di scorrimento.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-10172">**info**: Pointer to slider info.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-10173">**Appendice I** contiene la definizione per GX_LISDER_INFO struttura.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-10173">**Appendix I** contains definition to GX_LISDER_INFO structure.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-10174">**new_position**: nuova posizione del dispositivo di scorrimento</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-10174">**new_position**: New slider position</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-10175">Valori restituiti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-10175">Return Values</span></span>

## <a name="gx_slider_value_set"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-10198">gx_slider_value_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-10198">gx_slider_value_set</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-10199">Imposta valore dispositivo di scorrimento</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-10199">Set slider value</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-10200">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-10200">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_slider_value_set(
    GX_SLIDER *slider,
    GX_SLIDER_INFO *info, 
    INT new_value);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-10201">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-10201">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-10202">Questo servizio imposta il valore del dispositivo di scorrimento.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-10202">This service sets the slider value.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-10203">Questa API può essere chiamata dall'applicazione per spostare una lancetta del dispositivo di scorrimento sotto il controllo del programma, ignorando la necessità che l'input dell'utente trascini l'ago del dispositivo di scorrimento.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-10203">This API can be called by the application to move a slider needle under program control, bypassing the need for user input to drag the slider needle.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-10204">Parametri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-10204">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-10205">**dispositivo di scorrimento**: blocco di controllo del dispositivo slider</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-10205">**slider**: Slider widget control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-10206">**info**: puntatore alla struttura delle informazioni sul dispositivo di scorrimento.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-10206">**info**: Pointer to slider info structure.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-10207">**Appendice I** contiene la definizione per GX_SLIDER_INFO struttura</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-10207">**Appendix I** contains definition to GX_SLIDER_INFO structure</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-10208">**NEW_VALUE**: nuovo valore del dispositivo di scorrimento</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-10208">**new_value**: New slider value</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-10209">Valori restituiti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-10209">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-10210">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) set di valori di dispositivo di scorrimento riusciti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-10210">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) Successful slider value set</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-10211">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**: (0x11) il chiamante di questa funzione non è valido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-10211">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**: (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-10212">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) puntatore non valido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-10212">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-10213">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET**: (0X12) widget non valido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-10213">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET**: (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>

```C
/* Set new value for slider “my_slider”. */

    &my_slider.gx_slider_info, new_value);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the new value has been set for slider “my_slider”. */
```

##  <a name="gx_sprite_create"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-10231">gx_sprite_create</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-10231">gx_sprite_create</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-10232">Creare un widget di sprite</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-10232">Create a sprite widget</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-10233">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-10233">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_sprite_create(
    GX_SPRITE *sprite, GX_CONST GX_CHAR *name,
    GX_WIDGET *parent,
    GX_SPRITE_FRAME *frame_list,
    USHORT frame_count,
    ULONG style, USHORT sprite_id, 
    GX_CONST GX_RECTANGLE *size);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-10234">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-10234">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-10235">Il servizio crea un GX_SPRITE widget.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-10235">This service creates a GX_SPRITE widget.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-10236">Uno sprite viene usato per visualizzare una sequenza di pixelmaps come in un'animazione oppure può essere usato come widget di visualizzazione Pixelmap a più Stati.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-10236">A sprite is used to display a sequence of pixelmaps as in an animation, or can be used as a multi-state pixelmap display widget.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-10237">GX_SPRITE deriva da GX_WIDGET e supporta tutti i servizi API gx_widget.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-10237">GX_SPRITE is derived from GX_WIDGET and supports all gx_widget API services.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-10238">Il widget GX_SPRITE richiede una matrice di strutture GX_SPRITE_FRAME per definire l'animazione sprite.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-10238">The GX_SPRITE widget requires an array of GX_SPRITE_FRAME structures to define the sprite animation.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-10239">**Appendice I** contiene la definizione per GX_PRITE_FRAME struttura.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-10239">**Appendix I** contains definition to GX_PRITE_FRAME structure.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-10240">Parametri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-10240">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-10241">**sprite**: blocco di controllo widget sprite</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-10241">**sprite**: Sprite widget control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-10242">**nome**: nome sprite facoltativo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-10242">**name**: Optional sprite name</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-10243">**padre**: puntatore al widget padre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-10243">**parent**: Pointer to parent widget</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-10244">**frame_list**: una matrice di strutture di GX_SPRITE_FRAME</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-10244">**frame_list**: An array of GX_SPRITE_FRAME structures</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-10245">**frame_count**: specifica il numero di voci nella matrice dell'elenco di frame</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-10245">**frame_count**: specifies the number of entries in the frame list array</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-10246">**Style**: stile dello sprite.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-10246">**style**: Style of sprite.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-10247">L' **Appendice D** contiene stili generali predefiniti per tutti i widget e per gli stili specifici dei widget.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-10247">**Appendix D** contains predefined general styles for all widgets as well as widget-specific styles.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-10248">**sprite_id**: ID di sprite definito dall'applicazione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-10248">**sprite_id**: Application-defined ID of sprite</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-10249">**dimensioni**: dimensioni dello sprite</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-10249">**size**: Dimensions of sprite</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-10250">Valori restituiti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-10250">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-10251">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) creazione sprite riuscita</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-10251">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) Successful sprite create</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-10252">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**: (0x11) il chiamante di questa funzione non è valido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-10252">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**: (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-10253">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) puntatore non valido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-10253">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-10254">**GX_ALREADY_CREATED**: il widget (0x13) è già stato creato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-10254">**GX_ALREADY_CREATED**: (0x13) Widget already created</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-10255">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET**: (0x12) widget padre non valido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-10255">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET**: (0x12) Parent widget not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-10256">Consentito da</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-10256">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-10257">Inizializzazione e thread</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-10257">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-10258">Esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-10258">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Create sprite “my_sprite”. */

status = gx_sprite_create(&my_sprite, “my_sprite”,
    &my_parent,
    sprite_frame_list, frame_count,
    GX_STYLE_SPRITE_AUTO|GX_STYLE_SPRITE_LOOP,
    ID_MY_SPRITE, &size);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the sprite “my_sprite” has been created. */
```

## <a name="gx_sprite_current_frame_set"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-10264">gx_sprite_current_frame_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-10264">gx_sprite_current_frame_set</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-10265">Assegna frame sprite</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-10265">Assign sprite frame</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-10266">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-10266">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_sprite_current_frame_set(
    GX_SPRITE *sprite, 
    USHORT frame);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-10267">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-10267">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-10268">Questo servizio assegna il frame sprite corrente.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-10268">This service assigns the current sprite frame.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-10269">Se un widget di GX_SPRITE non è in esecuzione automatica, può essere usato come stato controllato dal programma, visualizzando il frame di comando Pixelmap.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-10269">If a GX_SPRITE widget is not auto-running, it can be used as a program controlled state light, displaying the commanded frame pixelmap.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-10270">Parametri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-10270">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-10271">**sprite**: blocco di controllo widget sprite</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-10271">**sprite**: Sprite widget control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-10272">**frame**: frame sprite da visualizzare</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-10272">**frame**: Sprite frame to display</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-10273">Valori restituiti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-10273">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-10274">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) riuscita</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-10274">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) Successful</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-10275">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**: (0x11) il chiamante di questa funzione non è valido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-10275">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**: (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-10276">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) puntatore non valido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-10276">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-10277">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET**: (0X12) widget non valido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-10277">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET**: (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-10278">Consentito da</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-10278">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-10279">Inizializzazione e thread</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-10279">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-10280">Esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-10280">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Assign frame number 3 as the current sprite frame */
status = gx_sprite_current_frame_set(&my_sprite, 3);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the sprite “my_sprite” will display frame index 3. */
```

## <a name="gx_sprite_frame_list_set"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-10286">gx_sprite_frame_list_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-10286">gx_sprite_frame_list_set</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-10287">Assegnare o modificare un elenco di frame sprite</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-10287">Assign or alter a sprite frame list</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-10288">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-10288">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_sprite_frame_list_set(
    GX_SPRITE *sprite,
    GX_SPRITE_FRAME *frame_list,
    USHORT frame_count);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-10289">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-10289">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-10290">Questo servizio può essere usato per assegnare o riassegnare l'elenco di frame usato da un widget sprite dopo la creazione del widget sprite.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-10290">This service can be used to assign or re-assign the frame list used by a sprite widget after the sprite widget has been created.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-10291">Per informazioni sul contenuto di un elenco di frame sprite, vedere la documentazione dell'API gx_sprite_create.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-10291">For information about the contents of a sprite frame list, refer to the gx_sprite_create API documentation.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-10292">Parametri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-10292">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-10293">**sprite**: blocco di controllo widget sprite</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-10293">**sprite**: Sprite widget control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-10294">**frame_list**: matrice di strutture GX_SPRITE_FRAME o GX_NULL se non è presente alcun elenco di frame.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-10294">**frame_list**: Array of GX_SPRITE_FRAME structures or GX_NULL if no frame list.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-10295">**frame_count**: numero di frame nella matrice dell'elenco di frame</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-10295">**frame_count**: Number of frames in frame list array</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-10296">Valori restituiti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-10296">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-10297">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) set di elenchi di frame sprite riusciti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-10297">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) Successful sprite frame list set</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-10298">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**: (0x11) il chiamante di questa funzione non è valido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-10298">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**: (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-10299">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) puntatore non valido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-10299">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-10300">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET**: (0X12) widget non valido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-10300">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET**: (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-10301">Consentito da</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-10301">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-10302">Inizializzazione e thread</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-10302">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-10303">Esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-10303">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Assign framelist_1, which has 10 frames, to my_sprite */
status = gx_sprite_frame_list_set(&my_sprite, framelist_1, 10);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the new frame list is now associated with this sprite */
```

### <a name="see-also"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-10304">Vedere anche</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-10304">See Also</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-10305">gx_sprite_current_frame_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-10305">gx_sprite_current_frame_set</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-10306">gx_sprite_stop</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-10306">gx_sprite_stop</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-10307">gx_sprite_create</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-10307">gx_sprite_create</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-10308">gx_sprite_create</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-10308">gx_sprite_create</span></span>

## <a name="gx_sprite_start"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-10309">gx_sprite_start</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-10309">gx_sprite_start</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-10310">Avviare una sequenza di esecuzione sprite</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-10310">Start a sprite run sequence</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-10311">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-10311">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_sprite_start(
    GX_SPRITE *sprite, 
    USHORT frame);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-10312">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-10312">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-10313">Questo servizio avvia una sequenza di esecuzione automatica sprite.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-10313">This service starts a sprite auto-run sequence.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-10314">Il widget sprite scorrerà i frame degli sprite fino al raggiungimento dell'ultimo frame oppure verrà eseguito in modo continuo se lo stile del GX_SPRITE_LOOP è impostato.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-10314">The sprite widget will cycle through the sprite frames until the last frame is reached, or will run continuously if the GX_SPRITE_LOOP style is set.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-10315">Parametri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-10315">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-10316">**sprite**: blocco di controllo widget sprite</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-10316">**sprite**: Sprite widget control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-10317">**frame**: frame sprite iniziale da visualizzare, in genere frame 0</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-10317">**frame**: Initial sprite frame to display, usually frame 0</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-10318">Valori restituiti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-10318">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-10319">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) avvio dell'esecuzione di sprite completata</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-10319">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) Successfully started sprite run</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-10320">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**: (0x11) il chiamante di questa funzione non è valido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-10320">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**: (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-10321">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) puntatore non valido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-10321">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-10322">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET**: (0X12) widget non valido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-10322">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET**: (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-10323">Consentito da</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-10323">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-10324">Thread</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-10324">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-10325">Esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-10325">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Start the sprite “my_sprite” */
status = gx_sprite_start(&my_sprite, 0);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the sprite “my_sprite” will start running */
```

### <a name="see-also"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-10326">Vedere anche</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-10326">See Also</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-10327">gx_sprite_current_frame_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-10327">gx_sprite_current_frame_set</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-10328">gx_sprite_stop</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-10328">gx_sprite_stop</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-10329">gx_sprite_create</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-10329">gx_sprite_create</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-10330">gx_sprite_frame_list_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-10330">gx_sprite_frame_list_set</span></span>

## <a name="gx_sprite_stop"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-10331">gx_sprite_stop</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-10331">gx_sprite_stop</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-10332">Arrestare una sequenza di esecuzione sprite</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-10332">Stop a sprite run sequence</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-10333">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-10333">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_sprite_stop(GX_SPRITE *sprite);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-10334">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-10334">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-10335">Questo servizio interrompe una sequenza di esecuzione automatica sprite.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-10335">This service stops a sprite auto-run sequence.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-10336">Parametri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-10336">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-10337">**sprite**: blocco di controllo widget sprite</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-10337">**sprite**: Sprite widget control block</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-10338">Valori restituiti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-10338">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-10339">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) l'esecuzione di sprite è stata arrestata</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-10339">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) Successfully stopped sprite run</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-10340">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**: (0x11) il chiamante di questa funzione non è valido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-10340">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**: (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-10341">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) puntatore non valido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-10341">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-10342">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET**: (0X12) widget non valido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-10342">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET**: (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-10343">Consentito da</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-10343">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-10344">Thread</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-10344">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-10345">Esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-10345">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Stop the sprite sequence */
status = gx_sprite_stop(&my_sprite);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the sprite “my_sprite” is stopped. */
```

### <a name="see-also"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-10346">Vedere anche</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-10346">See Also</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-10347">gx_sprite_current_frame_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-10347">gx_sprite_current_frame_set</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-10348">gx_sprite_start</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-10348">gx_sprite_start</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-10349">gx_sprite_create</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-10349">gx_sprite_create</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-10350">gx_sprite_frame_list_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-10350">gx_sprite_frame_list_set</span></span>

## <a name="gx_string_scroll_wheel_create"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-10351">gx_string_scroll_wheel_create</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-10351">gx_string_scroll_wheel_create</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-10352">Creare una rotellina di scorrimento del tipo stringa</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-10352">Create a string type scroll wheel</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-10353">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-10353">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_string_scroll_wheel_create(
    GX_STRING_SCROLL_WHEEL *wheel,
    GX_CONST GX_CHAR *name, 
    GX_WIDGET *parent, 
    INT total_rows,
    GX_CONST GX_CHAR **string_list, 
    ULONG style,
    USHORT Id, 
    GX_CONST GX_RECTANGLE *size)
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-10354">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-10354">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-10355">Questo servizio crea una rotellina di scorrimento del tipo stringa.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-10355">This service creates a string type scroll wheel.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-10356">GX_STRING_SCROLL_WHEEL deriva da GX_TEXT_SCROLL_WHEEL e pertanto tutte le funzioni API gx_text_scroll_wheel potrebbero essere usate con i widget GX_STRING_SCROLL_WHEEL.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-10356">GX_STRING_SCROLL_WHEEL is derived from GX_TEXT_SCROLL_WHEEL, and therefore all gx_text_scroll_wheel API functions maybe be used with GX_STRING_SCROLL_WHEEL widgets.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-10357">L'applicazione può passare una matrice di stringhe semplice alla funzione create che definisce le stringhe che saranno visualizzate dalla rotellina di scorrimento oppure l'applicazione può passare GX_NULL come parametro di string_list e chiamare l' `gx_string_scroll_wheel_string_id_list_set()` API per fornire una matrice di ID di stringa.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-10357">The application can pass in a simple string array to the create function which defines the strings that will be displayed by the scroll wheel, or the application can pass GX_NULL as the string_list parameter and call the `gx_string_scroll_wheel_string_id_list_set()` API to provide an array of String IDs.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-10358">Se viene usato il secondo metodo, la rotellina di scorrimento della stringa cambierà automaticamente le stringhe visualizzate se viene modificata la lingua dell'applicazione attiva.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-10358">If the latter method is used the string scroll wheel will automatically switch the displayed strings if the active application language is modified.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-10359">In alternativa, se le stringhe da visualizzare non sono definite in modo statico o non si conoscono al momento della creazione della rotellina di scorrimento, l'applicazione può passare GX_NULL come parametro dell'elenco di stringhe e chiamare la funzione API gx_text_scroll_wheel_callback_set () per definire una funzione di callback che fornirà le stringhe da visualizzare in tempo reale in base alle esigenze.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-10359">As an alternative, if the strings to be displayed are not statically defined or not know at the time the scroll wheel is created, the application can pass GX_NULL as the string list parameter, and call the API function gx_text_scroll_wheel_callback_set() to define a callback function which will provide the strings to be displayed in a real-time as-needed basis..</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-10360">Parametri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-10360">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-10361">**Wheel**: Indirizzo blocco di controllo rotellina di scorrimento stringa</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-10361">**wheel**: String scroll wheel control block address</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-10362">**nome**: nome del widget definito dall'applicazione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-10362">**name**: Application defined widget name</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-10377">Esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-10377">Example</span></span>

```C
GX_CONST GX_CHAR *days[] = {
    “Sunday”,
    “Monday”,
    “Tuesday”,
    “Wednesday”,
    “Thursday”,
    “Friday”,
    “Saturday”
};

GX_STRING_SCROLL_WHEEL wheel;

/* Create the string scroll wheel. */

status = gx_string_scroll_wheel_create(&wheel, “Day Wheel”,
    root, 7, days,
    GX_STYLE_ENABLED|GX_STYLE_TEXT_CENTER|GX_STYLE_TRANSPARENT|
    GX_STYLE_WRAP|GX_STYLE_TEXT_SCROLL_WHEEL_ROUND,
    ID_SCROLL_WHEEL_DAY, &size);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the string scroll wheel has been created. */
```

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-10398">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-10398">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_string_scroll_wheel_string_id_list_set(
    GX_STRING_SCROLL_WHEEL *wheel,
    GX_CONST GX_RESOURCE_ID *string_id_list, 
    INT id_count);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-10399">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-10399">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-10400">Questo servizio elabora un evento per la rotellina di scorrimento della stringa specificata.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-10400">This service processes an event for the specified string scroll wheel.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-10401">Questo servizio deve essere chiamato come gestore eventi predefinito dalle funzioni di elaborazione degli eventi della rotellina di scorrimento della stringa personalizzata.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-10401">This service should be called as the default event handler by any custom string scroll wheel event processing functions.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-10402">Parametri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-10402">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-10404">**event_ptr** Puntatore all'evento da elaborare</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-10404">**event_ptr** Pointer to the event to process</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-10407">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) chiamante non valido di questa funzione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-10407">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-10408">Puntatore a **GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) non valido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-10408">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-10409">Widget **GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) non valido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-10409">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-10410">Consentito da</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-10410">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-10411">Thread</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-10411">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-10412">Esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-10412">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Call generic string scroll wheel event processing as part of custom event processing function. */

UINT custom_string_scroll_wheel_event_process(GX_STRING_SCROLL_WHEEL *wheel, GX_EVENT *event)
{
    UINT status = GX_SUCCESS;

    switch(event->gx_event_type)
    {
    case xyz:
        /* Insert custom event handling here */
        break;

    default:
        /* Pass all other events to the default string scroll wheel event processing */
        status = gx_string_scroll_wheel_event_process(wheel, event);
        break;
    }
    return status;
}
```

## <a name="gx_string_scroll_wheel_string_id_list_set"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-10431">gx_string_scroll_wheel_string_id_list_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-10431">gx_string_scroll_wheel_string_id_list_set</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-10432">Assegnare una matrice di ID stringa</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-10432">Assign array of string IDs</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-10433">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-10433">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_string_scroll_wheel_string_id_list_set(
    GX_STRING_SCROLL_WHEEL *wheel,
    GX_CONST GX_RESOURCE_ID *string_id_list, INT id_count);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-10434">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-10434">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-10435">Questo servizio assegna una matrice di ID stringa a un widget della rotellina di scorrimento della stringa.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-10435">This service assigns an array of string IDs to a string scroll wheel widget.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-10436">Questo metodo di assegnazione di stringhe a una rotellina di scorrimento della stringa è consigliato se le stringhe sono definite in modo statico e il widget deve funzionare in più lingue.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-10436">This method of assigning strings to a string scroll wheel is recommended if the strings are statically defined and the widget must operate in multiple languages.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-10437">Se è necessario usare questa API, il widget della rotellina di scorrimento deve prima essere creato con un elenco di stringhe GX_NULL.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-10437">If this API is to be used, the scroll wheel widget should first be created with a GX_NULL string list.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-10438">Parametri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-10438">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-10439">**Wheel**: Indirizzo blocco di controllo rotellina di scorrimento stringa</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-10439">**wheel**: String scroll wheel control block address</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-10440">**string_id_list**: matrice di ID stringa</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-10440">**string_id_list**: Array of String IDs</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-10441">**ID_COUNT**: dimensione dell'elenco di ID.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-10441">**id_count**: Size of the ID list.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-10442">Valori restituiti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-10442">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-10443">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) impostazione della matrice ID stringa completata</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-10443">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) Successfully set string ID array</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-10444">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**: (0x11) il chiamante di questa funzione non è valido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-10444">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**: (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-10445">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) puntatore non valido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-10445">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-10446">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET**: (0X12) widget non valido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-10446">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET**: (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-10447">**GX_INVALID_VALUE**: 0x22) dimensioni elenco ID non valide</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-10447">**GX_INVALID_VALUE**: 0x22) Invalid ID list size</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-10448">Consentito da</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-10448">Allowed From</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-10450">Esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-10450">Example</span></span>

```C
GX_CONST RESOURCE_ID wheel_ids[] = {
    GX_STRING_ID_SUNDAY,
    GX_STRING_ID_MONDAY,
    GX_STRING_ID_TUESDAY,
    GX_STRING_ID_WEDNESDAY,
    GX_STRING_ID_THURSDAY,
    GX_STRING_ID_FRIDAY,
    GX_STRING_ID_SATURDAY
};

GX_STRING_SCROLL_WHEEL wheel;

/* Stop the sprite sequence */

status = gx_string_scroll_wheel_string_id_list_set(&wheel, wheel_ids, 7);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the ID list has been assigned. */
```

## <a name="gx_string_scroll_wheel_string_list_set"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-10469">gx_string_scroll_wheel_string_list_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-10469">gx_string_scroll_wheel_string_list_set</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-10470">Assegnare una matrice di stringhe</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-10470">Assign array of strings</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-10471">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-10471">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_string_scroll_wheel_string_list_set(
    GX_STRING_SCROLL_WHEEL *wheel,
    GX_CONST GX_CHAR *string_list, 
    INT string_count);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-10472">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-10472">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-10473">Viene assegnata una matrice di stringhe a un widget della rotellina di scorrimento della stringa.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-10473">This assigns an array of strings to a string scroll wheel widget.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-10474">Questa operazione può essere usata per modificare le stringhe visualizzate dopo che il widget è stato inizialmente creato.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-10474">This can be used to modify the strings displayed after the widget has initially been created.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-10475">Si noti che string_scroll_wheel non supporta GX_STYLE_TEXT_COPY e pertanto la matrice di stringhe passata a questa funzione deve essere definita in modo statico dall'applicazione.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-10475">Note that string_scroll_wheel does not support GX_STYLE_TEXT_COPY, and therefore the array of strings passed into this function should be statically defined by the application.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-10476">Parametri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-10476">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-10477">**Wheel**: Indirizzo blocco di controllo rotellina di scorrimento stringa</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-10477">**wheel**: String scroll wheel control block address</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-10478">**string_list**: matrice di puntatori di stringa</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-10478">**string_list**: Array of string pointers</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-10479">**string_count**: dimensione della matrice di stringhe.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-10479">**string_count**: Size of the string array.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-10480">Valori restituiti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-10480">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-10481">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) modifiche delle stringhe per la rotellina di scorrimento completata</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-10481">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) Successfully changed strings for scroll wheel</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-10482">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**: (0x11) il chiamante di questa funzione non è valido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-10482">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**: (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-10483">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) puntatore non valido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-10483">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-10484">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET**: (0X12) widget non valido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-10484">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET**: (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-10485">**GX_INVALID_VALUE**: (0x22) dimensioni elenco stringhe non valide</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-10485">**GX_INVALID_VALUE**: (0x22) Invalid string list size</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-10486">Consentito da</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-10486">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-10487">Inizializzazione e thread</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-10487">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-10488">Esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-10488">Example</span></span>

```C
GX_CONST GX_CHAR *days[] = {
    “Sunday”,
    “Monday”,
    “Tuesday”,
    “Wednesday”,
    “Thursday”,
    “Friday”,
    “Saturday”
};

GX_STRING_SCROLL_WHEEL wheel;

/* Set the array of strings to the scroll wheel. */

status = gx_string_scroll_wheel_string_list_set(&wheel, days, 7);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the string array has been assigned. */
```
