## <a name="gx_studio_widget_create"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-10507">gx_studio_widget_create</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-10507">gx_studio_widget_create</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-10508">Crea il widget definito nel file delle specifiche generate da studio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-10508">Create widget defined in Studio generated specifications file</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-10509">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-10509">Prototype</span></span>

```C
GX_WIDGET *gx_studio_widget_create(
    GX_BYTE *control,
    GX_CONST GX_STUDIO_WIDGET *definition, 
    GX_WIDGET *parent);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-10510">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-10510">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-10511">Questo servizio crea un widget e gli elementi figlio del widget usando una specifica del widget definita all'interno del file delle specifiche generate da GUIX Studio.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-10511">This service creates a widget and the widget’s children using a widget specification defined within the GUIX Studio generated specifications file.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-10512">Questa funzione evita la ricerca "per nome" della funzione simile `gx_studio_named_widget_create()` .</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-10512">This function avoids the “by name” lookup of the similar function `gx_studio_named_widget_create()`.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-10513">La struttura del GX_STUDIO_WIDGET viene definita nel file di intestazione delle specifiche dell'applicazione generato da GUIX Studio.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-10513">The GX_STUDIO_WIDGET structure is defined in the application specifications header file generated by GUIX Studio.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-10514">Per i widget allocati in modo statico, il blocco di controllo widget è definito nel file delle specifiche generate. c e, in base al nome del widget definito in GUIX Studio.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-10514">For statically allocated widgets, the widget control block is defined in the generated specifications.c file, and given the widget name defined within GUIX Studio.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-10515">Per i widget allocati dinamicamente, l'applicazione deve passare GX_NULL come indirizzo del blocco di controllo widget e la funzione tenterà di allocare dinamicamente il blocco di controllo widget usando la `gx_system_memory_allocate()` funzione, definita anche da e fornita dall'applicazione.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-10515">For dynamically allocated widgets, the application should pass GX_NULL as the widget control block address and the function will attempt to dynamically allocate the widget control block using the `gx_system_memory_allocate()` function, which is also defined by and provided by the application.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-10516">Per fare in modo che un'applicazione faccia riferimento direttamente alla definizione del widget GUIX studio nel file delle specifiche generate, è necessario seguire la convenzione di denominazione usata dal generatore di codice di GUI Studio.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-10516">For an application to directly reference the GUIX Studio widget definition within the generated specifications file, it is necessary to follow the naming convention utilized by the GUI Studio code generator.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-10517">La struttura GX_STUDIO_WIDGET generata all'interno del file Specifications. c viene sempre denominata in base a questa convenzione: <widget_name>_define, in cui il campo <widget_name> può essere ripetuto più volte se il widget è figlio di un widget figlio.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-10517">The GX_STUDIO_WIDGET structure generated within the specifications.c file is always named according to this convention: <widget_name>_define, where the <widget_name> field may be repeated multiple times if the widget is child of a child widget.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-10518">Parametri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-10518">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-10519">**controllo** di Puntatore al blocco di controllo widget o GX_NULL se allocato in modo dinamico.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-10519">**control** Pointer to widget control block, or GX_NULL if dynamically allocated.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-10520">**definizione** di Struttura di definizione widget generata da studio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-10520">**definition** Studio generated widget definition structure</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-10521">puntatore **padre** all'elemento padre del widget, se presente</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-10521">**parent** pointer to the widget parent, if any</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-10522">Valori restituiti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-10522">Return Values</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-10523">Puntatore al blocco di controllo widget creato oppure GX_NULL se la creazione ha avuto esito negativo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-10523">Pointer to the created widget control block, or GX_NULL if the creation was not successful.</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-10524">Consentito da</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-10524">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-10525">Inizializzazione e thread</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-10525">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-10526">Esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-10526">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Create the widget “playlist_screen”, which is statically allocated. */

widget = gx_studio_widget_create(&playlist_screen,
    &playlist_screen_define,
    root_window);

/* If widget != GX_NULL the widget was created. */

/* create the widget “songs_screen”, which is dynamically allocated */

widget = gx_studio_widget_create(GX_NULL,
    &songs_screen_define, root_window);
```

### <a name="see-also"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-10527">Vedere anche</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-10527">See Also</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-10528">gx_studio_named_widget_create</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-10528">gx_studio_named_widget_create</span></span>

## <a name="gx_studio_named_widget_create"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-10529">gx_studio_named_widget_create</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-10529">gx_studio_named_widget_create</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-10530">Crea il widget definito nel file delle specifiche generate da studio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-10530">Create widget defined in Studio generated specifications file</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-10531">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-10531">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT *gx_studio_named_widget_create(
    char *name, 
    GX_WIDGET *parent,
    GX_WIDGET **new_widget);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-10532">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-10532">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-10533">Questo servizio crea un widget e gli elementi figlio del widget usando una specifica del widget definita all'interno del file delle specifiche generate da GUIX Studio.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-10533">This service creates a widget and the widget’s children using a widget specification defined within the GUIX Studio generated specifications file.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-10534">Questa funzione API viene usata per creare schermate di primo livello usando il nome della schermata specificato all'interno dell'applicazione GUIX Studio come identificatore della definizione del widget.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-10534">This API function is used to create top-level screens using the screen name specified within the GUIX Studio application as the widget definition identifier.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-10535">Parametri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-10535">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-10536">**nome**: nome della schermata come definito all'interno dell'applicazione GUIX Studio.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-10536">**name**: Screen name as defined within GUIX Studio application.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-10537">**Parent**: puntatore all'elemento padre del widget, se presente</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-10537">**parent**: pointer to the widget parent, if any</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-10538">**new_widget**: percorso per restituire il puntatore del widget creato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-10538">**new_widget**: location to return created widget pointer</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-10539">Valori restituiti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-10539">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-10540">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) riuscita</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-10540">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) Successful</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-10541">**GX_FAILURE**: (0X11) nome widget non trovato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-10541">**GX_FAILURE**: (0x11) Named widget could not be found</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-10542">Consentito da</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-10542">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-10543">Inizializzazione e thread</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-10543">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-10544">Esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-10544">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Create the widget named “child_popup”,
   which is a child of the top-level screen “main_screen”. */

GX_WIDGET *menu_screen;

status = gx_studio_named_widget_create(“main_menu”,
    &root_window, &menu_screen);

/* If status == GX_SUCCESS the screen was created
   and linked to the root window. */
```

## <a name="gx_studio_display_configure"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-10547">gx_studio_display_configure</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-10547">gx_studio_display_configure</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-10548">Configurare la visualizzazione definita nel progetto GUIX Studio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-10548">Configure display defined in GUIX Studio project</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-10549">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-10549">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT *gx_studio_display_configure(
    USHORT display,
    UINT (*driver)(GX_DISPLAY *),
    USHORT language, 
    USHORT theme,
    GX_WINDOW_ROOT **return_root);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-10550">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-10550">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-10551">Questo servizio Inizializza un GX_DISPLAY in modo che sia pronto per l'utilizzo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-10551">This service initializes a GX_DISPLAY so that it is ready for use.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-10552">Questa funzione consolida le funzioni per inizializzare un blocco di controllo GX_DISPLAY, creare un'area di disegno per adattarla alla visualizzazione e creare una finestra radice per l'area di disegno.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-10552">This function consolidates the functions to initialize a GX_DISPLAY control block, create a canvas to fit the display, and create a root window for the canvas.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-10553">Questa funzione installa anche la lingua e il tema delle risorse richiesti dopo l'inizializzazione della visualizzazione.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-10553">This function also installs the language and resource theme requested after the display has been initialized.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-10554">Questa funzione consolida lo sforzo di programmazione più comunemente richiesto per preparare una visualizzazione per l'utilizzo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-10554">This function consolidates the programming effort most commonly required to prepare a display for use.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-10555">La funzione richiama le funzioni gx_display_create (), gx_display_color_table_set, gx_display_font_table_set, gx_display_pixelmap_table_set, gx_system_language_table_set, gx_system_active_language_set, gx_system_scroll_appearance_set, gx_canvas_create e gx_window_root_create, tutte o alcune delle quali altrimenti sarebbero richieste dal programma applicativo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-10555">The function invokes the gx_display_create(), gx_display_color_table_set, gx_display_font_table_set, gx_display_pixelmap_table_set, gx_system_language_table_set, gx_system_active_language_set, gx_system_scroll_appearance_set, gx_canvas_create, and gx_window_root_create functions, all or some of which would otherwise be required by the application program.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-10556">Parametri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-10556">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-10557">**display**: index nella tabella display, che corrisponde alle definizioni di visualizzazione nel file di progetto di studio.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-10557">**display**: Index into the display table, which corresponds to the display definitions in the Studio project file.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-10558">**driver**: puntatore per la visualizzazione della funzione di inizializzazione del driver.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-10558">**driver**: pointer to display driver initialization function.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-10559">Questa funzione viene richiamata per inizializzare i puntatori a funzione indiretta del blocco di controllo GX_DISPLAY, nonché per eseguire qualsiasi configurazione hardware richiesta.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-10559">This function is invoked to initialize the indirect function pointers of the GX_DISPLAY control block, as well as perform any required hardware setup.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-10560">**lingua**: indice della tabella della lingua iniziale</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-10560">**language**: initial language table index</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-10561">**lingua**: Indice del tema iniziale</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-10561">**language**: initial theme index</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-10562">**root**: puntatore alla variabile in cui restituire l'indirizzo della finestra radice o GX_NULL.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-10562">**root**: pointer to variable in which to return root window address, or GX_NULL.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-10563">Valori restituiti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-10563">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-10564">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) riuscita</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-10564">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) Successful</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-10565">**GX_FAILURE**: non è stato possibile inizializzare la visualizzazione (0x11)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-10565">**GX_FAILURE**: (0x11) Display could not be initialized</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-10566">Consentito da</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-10566">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-10567">Inizializzazione e thread</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-10567">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-10568">Esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-10568">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Create the widget named “child_popup”, which is a child of the
   top-level screen “main_screen”. */

GX_WIDGET *menu_screen;

status = gx_studio_display_configure(MAIN_DISPLAY,
    my_driver_setup, LANGUAGE_ENGLISH, DEFAULT_THEME, GX_NULL);

/* If status == GX_SUCCESS the display was initialized, a canvas was
created for the display, a root window was created for the canvas, and
the requested language and theme have been installed.
*/
```

- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-10573">gx_display_pixelmap_table_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-10573">gx_display_pixelmap_table_set</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-10578">gx_window_root_create</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-10578">gx_window_root_create</span></span>

## <a name="gx_system_active_language_set"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-10579">gx_system_active_language_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-10579">gx_system_active_language_set</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-10580">Imposta lingua attiva</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-10580">Set active language</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-10581">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-10581">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_system_active_language_set(GX_UBYTE language);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-10582">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-10582">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-10583">Questo servizio ha impostato la lingua corrente.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-10583">This service set the current language.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-10584">L'indice della lingua deve essere minore del numero di colonne nella tabella delle stringhe dell'applicazione.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-10584">The language index must be less than the number of columns in the application string table.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-10585">Questa funzione è stata deprecata a favore di gx_display_active_language_set.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-10585">This function has been deprecated in favor of gx_display_active_language_set.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-10586">Tutte le nuove applicazioni devono usare gx_display_active_langauge_set.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-10586">All new applications should use gx_display_active_langauge_set.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-10587">Parametri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-10587">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-10588">**Language**: indice della lingua, definito nel file di intestazione della risorsa.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-10588">**language**: Language index, defined in resource header file.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-10589">Valori restituiti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-10589">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-10590">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) impostazione della lingua attiva completata</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-10590">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) Successfully set active language</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-10591">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**: \* \* (0x11) il chiamante di questa funzione non è valido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-10591">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**: \*\* (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-10592">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: \* \* (0x07) puntatore non valido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-10592">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: \*\* (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-10593">**GX_INVALID_VALUE**: \* \* (0x22) indice della lingua non valido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-10593">**GX_INVALID_VALUE**: \*\* (0x22) Invalid language index</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-10594">Consentito da</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-10594">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-10595">Inizializzazione e thread</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-10595">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-10596">Esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-10596">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Set active language and mark widget canvas as dirty. */
status = gx_system_active_language_set(ID_LANGUAGE_ENGLISH);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the active language has been assigned. */
```

## <a name="gx_system_animation_get"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-10601">gx_system_animation_get</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-10601">gx_system_animation_get</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-10602">Ottenere il blocco di controllo animazione dal pool di sistema</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-10602">Obtain animation control block from system pool</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-10603">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-10603">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_system_animation_get(GX_ANIMATION **animation);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-10604">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-10604">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-10605">Questo servizio può essere utilizzato per ottenere un blocco di controllo Animation da un pool di tali blocchi di controllo gestiti dal componente gx_system.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-10605">This service can be used to obtain an animation control block from a pool of such control blocks maintained by the gx_system component.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-10606">Il pool di blocchi di controllo dell'animazione e i servizi API correlati vengono forniti solo se la costante GX_ANIMATION_POOL_SIZE viene definita con un valore 0.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-10606">The animation control block pool and related API services are only provided if the constant GX_ANIMATION_POOL_SIZE is defined with a value 0.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-10607">L'impostazione predefinita per questo valore è 6, vale a dire che il pool di blocchi di controllo dell'animazione di sistema contiene le dimensioni GX_ANIMATION blocco di controllo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-10607">The default setting for this value is 6, meaning that the system animation control block pool contains size GX_ANIMATION control block.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-10608">Un blocco di controllo animazione allocato con questa API viene restituito automaticamente al pool libero se l'animazione viene eseguita fino al completamento.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-10608">An animation control block allocated using this API is automatically returned to the free pool if the animation runs to completion.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-10609">Se l'animazione viene arrestata utilizzando gx_animation_stop o non viene avviata a causa di un errore restituito, il blocco di controllo dell'animazione deve essere restituito al pool libero dall'applicazione utilizzando gx_system_animation_free.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-10609">If the animation is stopped using gx_animation_stop, or fails to be started due to some returned error, the animation control block should be returned to the free pool by the application using gx_system_animation_free.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-10610">Parametri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-10610">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-10611">**animazione**: indirizzo del puntatore per la ricezione GX_ANIMATION puntatore.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-10611">**animation**: Address of pointer to receive GX_ANIMATION pointer.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-10612">Valori restituiti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-10612">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-10613">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) ha ottenuto correttamente il blocco di controllo Animation</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-10613">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) Successfully obtained animation control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-10614">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**: (0x11) il chiamante di questa funzione non è valido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-10614">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**: (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-10615">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) puntatore di animazione non valido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-10615">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) Invalid animation pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-10616">**GX_OUT_OF_ANIMATIONS**: (0x31) pool di animazioni di sistema esaurito</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-10616">**GX_OUT_OF_ANIMATIONS**: (0x31) System animation pool exhausted</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-10617">Consentito da</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-10617">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-10618">Inizializzazione e thread</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-10618">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-10619">Esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-10619">Example</span></span>

```C
GX_ANIMATION *animation;

UINT status = gx_system_animation_get(&animation);

if (status == GX_SUCCESS)
{
    gx_animation_start(animation, animation_info);
}
```

- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-10624">gx_system_animation_free</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-10624">gx_system_animation_free</span></span>

## <a name="gx_system_animation_free"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-10625">gx_system_animation_free</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-10625">gx_system_animation_free</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-10626">Restituisce un blocco di controllo Animation al pool di sistema</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-10626">Return an animation control block to the system pool</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-10627">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-10627">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_system_animation_free(GX_ANIMATION *animation);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-10628">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-10628">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-10629">Questo servizio può essere utilizzato per restituire un blocco di controllo Animation al pool di sistema.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-10629">This service can be used to return an animation control block to the system pool.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-10630">Il pool di blocchi di controllo dell'animazione e i servizi API correlati vengono forniti solo se la costante GX_ANIMATION_POOL_SIZE viene definita con un valore 0.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-10630">The animation control block pool and related API services are only provided if the constant GX_ANIMATION_POOL_SIZE is defined with a value 0.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-10631">L'impostazione predefinita per questo valore è 6, vale a dire che il pool di blocchi di controllo dell'animazione di sistema contiene le dimensioni GX_ANIMATION blocco di controllo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-10631">The default setting for this value is 6, meaning that the system animation control block pool contains size GX_ANIMATION control block.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-10632">Un blocco di controllo dell'animazione allocato usando gx_system_animation_get () viene restituito automaticamente al pool libero se l'animazione viene eseguita fino al completamento.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-10632">An animation control block allocated using gx_system_animation_get() is automatically returned to the free pool if the animation runs to completion.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-10633">Il tentativo di restituire un blocco di controllo Animation al pool libero che è già stato restituito al pool libero non ha alcun effetto.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-10633">Attempting to return an animation control block to the free pool that has already been returned to the free pool has no effect.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-10634">Se l'animazione viene arrestata utilizzando gx_animation_stop o non viene avviata a causa di un errore restituito, il blocco di controllo dell'animazione ottenuto utilizzando gx_system_animation_get () deve essere restituito al pool libero dall'applicazione utilizzando gx_system_animation_free ().</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-10634">If the animation is stopped using gx_animation_stop, or fails to be started due to some returned error, the animation control block that has been obtained using gx_system_animation_get() should be returned to the free pool by the application using gx_system_animation_free().</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-10635">Un'animazione deve essere in stato inattivo prima di poterla restituire al pool libero.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-10635">An animation must be in IDLE state before it can be returned to the free pool.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-10636">Un'animazione è nello stato inattivo quando non è stata avviata, quando viene arrestata o quando viene eseguita fino al completamento.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-10636">An animation is in the IDLE state when it has not been started, when it is stopped, or when it runs to completion.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-10637">Parametri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-10637">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-10638">**animazione**: puntatore al blocco di controllo GX_ANIMATION.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-10638">**animation**: Pointer to the GX_ANIMATION control block.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-10639">Valori restituiti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-10639">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-10640">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) uccessfully del blocco di animazione rilasciato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-10640">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) uccessfully released animation block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-10641">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**: (0x11) il chiamante di questa funzione non è valido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-10641">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**: (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-10642">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) puntatore di animazione non valido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-10642">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) Invalid animation pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-10643">**GX_INVALID_ANIMATION**: (0X32) l'animazione non è inattiva o non è stata allocata dal pool di sistema</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-10643">**GX_INVALID_ANIMATION**: (0x32) The animation is not IDLE, or it has not been allocated from the system pool</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-10644">Consentito da</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-10644">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-10645">Inizializzazione e thread</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-10645">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-10646">Esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-10646">Example</span></span>

```C
GX_ANIMATION *animation;

UINT status = gx_system_animation_get(&animation);

if (status == GX_SUCCESS)
{
    status = gx_animation_start(animation, animation_info);

    if (status != GX_SUCCESS)
    {
        /* animation did not start, return it to the free pool */
        gx_system_animation_free(animation);
    }
}
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-10655">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-10655">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-10656">Questo servizio Disabilita il supporto dinamico per il testo bidirezionale.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-10656">This service disables dynamic bi-directional text support.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-10657">Questo servizio richiede la definizione di GX_DYNAMIC_BIDI_TEXT_SUPPORT durante la compilazione della libreria GUIX ed è necessario solo se sono necessari riordino del runtime di dati di stringa BiDi.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-10657">This service requires GX_DYNAMIC_BIDI_TEXT_SUPPORT to be defined when building the GUIX library, and is only required if runtime reordering of BiDi string data is needed.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-10658">La maggior parte delle applicazioni usa GUIX Studio per produrre stringhe di testo BiDi riordinate correttamente.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-10658">Most applications utilize GUIX Studio to produce correctly reorderd BiDi text strings.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-10662">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) ha disabilitato il supporto del testo bidi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-10662">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successfully disabled bidi text support</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-10663">Consentito da</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-10663">Allowed From</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-10665">Esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-10665">Example</span></span>

```C

/* Diable bidi text support. */

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS, bidi text support was disabled. */
```

## <a name="gx_system_canvas_refresh"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-10684">gx_system_canvas_refresh</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-10684">gx_system_canvas_refresh</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-10688">Questo servizio impone un ridisegno immediato di tutti i widget e le Canvas sporchi.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-10688">This service forces an immediate redrawing of all dirty widgets and canvases.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-10689">Questo servizio viene in genere richiamato internamente dal componente di sistema GUIX, ma può essere chiamato dall'applicazione per forzare un'operazione di ridisegno del sistema immediata.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-10689">This service is normally invoked internally by the GUIX system component, but can be called by the application to force an immediate system redrawing operation.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-10690">Parametri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-10690">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-10694">**GX_INVALID_CANVAS**: (0x20) non è stato creato alcun Canvas</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-10694">**GX_INVALID_CANVAS**: (0x20) No canvas created</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-10695">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**: (0x11) il chiamante di questa funzione non è valido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-10695">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**: (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-10697">Inizializzazione e thread</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-10697">Initialization and threads</span></span>

```C

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS, canvas has been redraw. */
```

## <a name="gx_system_dirty_mark"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-10723">gx_system_dirty_mark</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-10723">gx_system_dirty_mark</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-10724">Area contrassegno Dirty</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-10724">Mark area dirty</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-10725">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-10725">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_system_dirty_mark(GX_WIDGET *widget);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-10726">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-10726">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-10727">Questo servizio contrassegna l'area del widget come dirty.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-10727">This service marks the area of this widget as dirty.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-10728">In questo modo viene accodato il widget per il ridisegno quando l'elaborazione degli eventi di sistema è stata completata.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-10728">This effectively queues the widget for redrawing when the system event processing has been completed.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-10729">Parametri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-10729">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-10730">**widget**: puntatore al blocco di controllo widget</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-10730">**widget**: Pointer to widget control block</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-10731">Valori restituiti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-10731">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-10732">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) contrassegnato con il widget Dirty</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-10732">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) Successfully marked widget dirty</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-10733">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**: (0x11) il chiamante di questa funzione non è valido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-10733">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**: (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-10734">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) puntatore non valido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-10734">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-10735">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET**: (0X12) widget non valido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-10735">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET**: (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-10736">Consentito da</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-10736">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-10737">Inizializzazione e thread</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-10737">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-10738">Esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-10738">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Mark widget “my_widget” as dirty. */
status = gx_system_dirty_mark(&my_widget);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the area associated
   with “my_widget” has been marked as dirty. */
```

## <a name="gx_system_dirty_partial_add"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-10763">gx_system_dirty_partial_add</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-10763">gx_system_dirty_partial_add</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-10764">Contrassegna Dirty area parziale</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-10764">Mark partial area dirty</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-10765">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-10765">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_system_dirty_partial_add(
    GX_WIDGET *widget,
    GX_RECTANGLE *dirty_area);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-10766">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-10766">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-10767">Questo servizio contrassegna l'area parziale del widget come dirty.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-10767">This service marks the partial area of this widget as dirty.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-10768">Questo Accoda il widget per il ridisegno dall'operazione di aggiornamento Canvas di GUIX al termine dell'elaborazione dell'evento di sistema.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-10768">This queues the widget for redrawing by the GUIX canvas refresh operation when the system event processing has been completed.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-10769">Parametri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-10769">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-10770">**widget**: puntatore al blocco di controllo widget</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-10770">**widget**: Pointer to widget control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-10771">**dirty_area**: area dirty del widget per contrassegnare Dirty</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-10771">**dirty_area**: Dirty area of widget to mark dirty</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-10772">Valori restituiti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-10772">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-10773">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) contrassegno area dirty parzialmente riuscita</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-10773">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) Successful partial dirty area mark</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-10774">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**: (0x11) il chiamante di questa funzione non è valido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-10774">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**: (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-10775">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) puntatore non valido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-10775">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-10776">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET**: (0X12) widget non valido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-10776">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET**: (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-10777">**GX_INVALID_SIZE**: (0x19) dimensioni non valide dell'area dirty</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-10777">**GX_INVALID_SIZE**: (0x19) Invalid size of dirty area</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-10778">Consentito da</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-10778">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-10779">Inizializzazione e thread</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-10779">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-10780">Esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-10780">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Mark widget “my_widget” partial area as dirty. */

status = gx_system_dirty_partial_add(&my_widget,
    &partial_area);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the partial area “partial_area”
associated with “my_widget” has been marked as dirty. */
```

## <a name="gx_system_draw_context_get"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-10805">gx_system_draw_context_get</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-10805">gx_system_draw_context_get</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-10806">Ottenere il contesto di disegno</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-10806">Get drawing context</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-10807">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-10807">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_system_draw_context_get(GX_DRAW_CONTEXT **current_context);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-10808">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-10808">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-10809">Questo servizio restituisce un puntatore al contesto di disegno corrente.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-10809">This service returns a pointer to the current drawing context.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-10810">Parametri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-10810">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-10811">**current_context**: puntatore alla destinazione per il puntatore del contesto di disegno corrente</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-10811">**current_context**: Pointer to destination for current drawing context pointer</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-10812">Valori restituiti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-10812">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-10813">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) Get del contesto corrente riuscito</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-10813">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) Successful current context get</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-10814">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: 0x07) puntatore non valido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-10814">**GX_PTR_ERROR**:0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-10815">Consentito da</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-10815">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-10816">Inizializzazione e thread</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-10816">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-10817">Esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-10817">Example</span></span>

```C
GX_DRAW_CONTEXT *current_context;

/* Get current drawing context. */

status = gx_system_draw_context_get(&current_context);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the current drawing context
   is contained in “current_context”. */
```

## <a name="gx_system_event_fold"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-10842">gx_system_event_fold</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-10842">gx_system_event_fold</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-10843">Invia evento</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-10843">Send event</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-10844">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-10844">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_system_event_fold(GX_EVENT *event);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-10845">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-10845">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-10846">Questo servizio esegue la ricerca nella coda degli eventi di GUIX per un evento dello stesso tipo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-10846">This service searches the GUIX event queue for an event of the same type.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-10847">Se esiste un evento dello stesso tipo, il payload dell'evento viene aggiornato in modo che corrisponda al nuovo evento.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-10847">If an event of the same type exists, the event payload is updated to match the new event.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-10848">Se non viene trovato alcun evento corrispondente, viene chiamata la funzione gx_system_event_send per aggiungere il nuovo evento alla fine della coda degli eventi.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-10848">If no matching event is found, the gx_system_event_send function is called to add the new event to the end of the event queue.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-10849">Questa funzione viene comunemente usata dai driver di input di tocco rapido per impedire il riempimento della coda di eventi con più eventi PEN_DRAG.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-10849">This function is commonly used by fast touch input drivers to prevent filling the event queue with multiple PEN_DRAG events.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-10850">Questa funzione può essere chiamata anche dall'applicazione per impedire l'aggiunta di più eventi dello stesso tipo alla coda di eventi GUIX.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-10850">This function can also be called by the application to prevent multiple events of the same type from being added to the GUIX event queue.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-10851">Parametri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-10851">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-10852">**evento**: puntatore all'evento</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-10852">**event**: Pointer to event</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-10853">Valori restituiti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-10853">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-10854">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) trasmissione evento riuscita</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-10854">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) Successful event send</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-10855">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**: (0x11) il chiamante di questa funzione non è valido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-10855">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**: (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-10856">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) puntatore non valido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-10856">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-10857">Consentito da</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-10857">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-10858">Inizializzazione e thread</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-10858">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-10859">Esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-10859">Example</span></span>

```C
GX_EVENT my_event;

memset(&my_event, 0, sizeof(GX_EVENT));

my_event.gx_event_type = GX_EVENT_PEN_DOWN;

my_event.gx_event_payload.gx_event_pointdata.gx_point_x = 100;
my_event.gx_event_payload.gx_event_pointdata.gx_point_y = 200;

/* Send “my_event” for processing. */
status = gx_system_event_fold(&my_event);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the event has been sent for processing. */
```

## <a name="gx_system_event_send"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-10884">gx_system_event_send</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-10884">gx_system_event_send</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-10885">Invia evento</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-10885">Send event</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-10886">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-10886">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_system_event_send(GX_EVENT *event);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-10887">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-10887">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-10888">Questo servizio invia l'evento specificato nella coda degli eventi di sistema GUIX.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-10888">This service sends the specified event into the GUIX system event queue.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-10889">Il nuovo evento viene inserito alla fine della coda.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-10889">The new event is placed at the end of the queue.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-10890">Parametri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-10890">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-10891">**evento**: puntatore all'evento</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-10891">**event**: Pointer to event</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-10892">Valori restituiti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-10892">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-10893">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) trasmissione evento riuscita</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-10893">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) Successful event send</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-10894">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**: (0x11) il chiamante di questa funzione non è valido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-10894">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**: (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-10895">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) puntatore non valido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-10895">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-10896">Consentito da</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-10896">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-10897">Inizializzazione e thread</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-10897">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-10898">Esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-10898">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Send “new_event” for processing. */

GX_EVENT new_event;

new_event.gx_event_target = widget ->gx_widget_parent;
new_event.gx_event_type = MY_EVENT_TYPE;

/* Set optional param. */
new_event.gx_event_payload.xxxx = yyyy
new_event.gx_event_sender = widget->gx_widget_id;

/* Push the event to event pool. */
status = gx_system_event_send(&new_event);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the event has been sent for processing. */
```

## <a name="gx_system_focus_claim"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-10923">gx_system_focus_claim</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-10923">gx_system_focus_claim</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-10924">Stato attivo attestazione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-10924">Claim focus</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-10925">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-10925">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_system_focus_claim(GX_WIDGET *widget);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-10926">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-10926">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-10927">Questo servizio dichiara lo stato attivo per il widget specificato.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-10927">This service claims the focus for the specified widget.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-10928">Se il widget non aveva lo stato attivo in precedenza, riceverà un evento GX_EVENT_FOCUS_GAINED.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-10928">If the widget did no previously have focus, it will receive a GX_EVENT_FOCUS_GAINED event.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-10929">Parametri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-10929">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-10930">**widget**: puntatore al blocco di controllo widget per richiedere lo stato attivo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-10930">**widget**: Pointer to widget control block to claim focus</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-10931">Valori restituiti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-10931">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-10932">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) attestazione messa a fuoco riuscita</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-10932">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) Successful focus claim</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-10933">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) puntatore non valido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-10933">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-10934">**GX_NO_CHANGE**: il widget (0x08) possiede già lo stato attivo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-10934">**GX_NO_CHANGE**: (0x08) Widget already owns focus</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-10935">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**: (0x11) il chiamante di questa funzione non è valido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-10935">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**: (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-10936">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET**: (il widget 0x12 non è valido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-10936">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET**: (0x12 Widget not valid</span></span>

```C
/* Claim focus for widget “my_widget”. */

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the focus has been claimed for
   “my_widget”. */
```

## <a name="gx_system_initialize"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-10964">gx_system_initialize</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-10964">gx_system_initialize</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-10965">Inizializzare GUIX</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-10965">Initialize GUIX</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-10966">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-10966">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_system_initialize(VOID);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-10967">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-10967">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-10968">Questo servizio Inizializza GUIX.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-10968">This service initializes GUIX.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-10969">Questo servizio deve essere richiamato prima di qualsiasi altro servizio API GUIX e deve essere richiamato solo una volta all'avvio del sistema.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-10969">This service must be invoked before any other GUIX API service, and should only be invoked once at system startup.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-10970">Parametri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-10970">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-10971">**Nessuno**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-10971">**None**</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-10972">Valori restituiti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-10972">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-10973">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) inizializzazione di sistema riuscita</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-10973">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) Successful system initialize</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-10974">**GX_SYSTEM_ERROR**: (0xFE) non valido GX_EVENT dimensioni del blocco di controllo o coda eventi/mutex/Creazione thread non riuscita.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-10974">**GX_SYSTEM_ERROR**: (0xFE) Invalid GX_EVENT control block size or event queue/mutex/thread create failed.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-10975">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**: (0x11) il chiamante di questa funzione non è valido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-10975">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**: (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-10976">Consentito da</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-10976">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-10977">Inizializzazione e thread</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-10977">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-10978">Esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-10978">Example</span></span>

```C

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS, GUIX has been initialized. */
```

## <a name="gx_system_language_table_get"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-11003">gx_system_language_table_get</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-11003">gx_system_language_table_get</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-11004">Recupera tabella in lingua attiva</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-11004">Retrieve active language table</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-11005">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-11005">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_system_language_table_get( 
    GX_CHAR ****language_table,
    GX_UBYTE *languages_count, 
    UINT *string_count);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-11006">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-11006">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-11007">Questo servizio recupera la tabella del linguaggio attiva.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-11007">This service retrieves the active language table.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-11008">Questa funzione è deprecata a favore di gx_display_language_table_get.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-11008">This function is deprecated in favor of gx_display_language_table_get.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-11009">Tutte le nuove applicazioni devono usare gx_display_language_table_get.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-11009">All new applications should use gx_display_language_table_get.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-11010">Parametri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-11010">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-11011">**language_table**: indirizzo del puntatore alla tabella della lingua restituita.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-11011">**language_table**: Address of pointer to return language table.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-11012">**languages_count**: Indirizzo della variabile per restituire le colonne della tabella.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-11012">**languages_count**: Address of variable to return table columns.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-11013">**string_count**: indirizzo del puntatore per restituire le righe della tabella.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-11013">**string_count**: Address of pointer to return table rows.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-11014">Valori restituiti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-11014">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-11015">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) ha recuperato correttamente la tabella in lingua attiva</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-11015">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) Successfully retrieved active language table</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-11016">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**: (0x11) il chiamante di questa funzione non è valido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-11016">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**: (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-11017">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) puntatore non valido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-11017">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-11018">Consentito da</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-11018">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-11019">Inizializzazione e thread</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-11019">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-11020">Esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-11020">Example</span></span>

```C
GX_CHAR ***language_table;

GX_UBYTE language_count;

UINT string_count;

/* Retrieve the language table */

status = gx_system_language_table_get(&language_table,
    &language_count, &string_count);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-11027">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-11027">Description</span></span>

## <a name="gx_system_memory_allocator_set"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-11046">gx_system_memory_allocator_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-11046">gx_system_memory_allocator_set</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-11047">Assegnare funzioni per l'allocazione di memoria, deallocazione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-11047">Assign functions for memory allocation, de-allocation</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-11048">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-11048">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_system_memory_allocator_set(VOID *(allocate)(ULONG size),
    VOID(*release)(VOID *));
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-11049">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-11049">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-11050">Questo servizio assegna la funzione di callback fornita dall'applicazione per l'allocazione e la deallocazione della memoria dinamica.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-11050">This service assigns the application supplied callback function for dynamic memory allocation and de-allocation.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-11051">Se l'applicazione non richiede un servizio GUIX che usa l'allocazione di memoria dinamica, non è necessario chiamare questo servizio.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-11051">If no GUIX service that uses dynamic memory allocation is needed by the application, this service does not need to be called.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-11052">Se usato, questo servizio deve essere chiamato dopo gx_system_initialize () che cancella i puntatori al servizio GUIX e prima di qualsiasi servizio GUIX che richiede l'uso dell'allocazione di memoria dinamica.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-11052">If used, this service should be called after gx_system_initialize() which clears the GUIX service pointers, and before any GUIX service that requires use of dynamical memory allocation.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-11053">I servizi GUIX che richiedono un servizio di allocazione e deallocazione della memoria di Runtime includono:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-11053">GUIX services which require a runtime memory allocation and de-allocation service include:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-11054">Caricamento di risorse binarie dall'archiviazione esterna all'ambiente di runtime GUIX.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-11054">Loading binary resources from external storage into the GUIX runtime environment.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-11055">Il decodificatore di immagini JPEG di runtime software.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-11055">The software runtime jpeg image decoder.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-11056">Il decodificatore di immagini PNG di runtime software.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-11056">The software runtime png image decoder.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-11057">Uso di widget di testo con GX_STYLE_TEXT_COPY.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-11057">Using text widgets with GX_STYLE_TEXT_COPY.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-11058">Funzioni di utilità di ridimensionamento e rotazione del runtime pixemap.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-11058">Runtime pixemap resize and rotation utility functions.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-11059">Schermata di runtime e l'allocazione di blocchi di controllo widget.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-11059">Runtime screen and widget control block allocation.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-11060">Parametri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-11060">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-11061">**allocator**: funzione allocatore di memoria</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-11061">**allocator**: Memory allocator function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-11062">**versione**: funzione di memoria libera</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-11062">**release**: Memory free function</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-11063">Valori restituiti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-11063">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-11064">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) assegnazione della funzione di allocazione della memoria completata</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-11064">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) Successfully assigned memory allocate function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-11065">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**: (0x11) il chiamante di questa funzione non è valido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-11065">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**: (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-11066">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) puntatore non valido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-11066">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-11067">Consentito da</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-11067">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-11068">Inizializzazione e thread</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-11068">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-11069">Esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-11069">Example</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-11070">Nell'esempio seguente viene utilizzato un pool di byte ThreadX per implementare un'allocazione di memoria dinamica threadsafe e un servizio di deallocazione della memoria.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-11070">The following example utilizes a ThreadX byte pool to implement a threadsafe dynamic memory allocation and memory de-allocation service.</span></span>

```C
TX_BYTE_POOL memory_pool;

#define SCRATCHPAD_SIZE (1024 * 4)

ULONG scratchpad[SCRATCHPAD_SIZE];

/* define memory allocation service */

VOID *memory_allocate(ULONG size)
{
    VOID *memptr;

    if (tx_byte_allocate(&memory_pool, &memptr, size, TX_NO_WAIT) == TX_SUCCESS)
    {
        return memptr;
    }
    return NULL;
}

/* define memory de-allocation service */
void memory_free(VOID *mem)
{
    tx_byte_release(mem);
}

/* create byte pool and install our dynamic memory services with GUIX
*/

VOID tx_application_define(void *first_unused_memory)
{
    /* create byte pool for GUIX to use */
    tx_byte_pool_create(&memory_pool, "scratchpad", scratchpad,
        SCRATCHPAD_SIZE * sizeof(ULONG));

    guix_setup();

    /* install our memory allocator and de-allocator */
    gx_system_memory_allocator_set(memory_allocate, memory_free);
}
```

## <a name="gx_system_pen_configure"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-11095">gx_system_pen_configure</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-11095">gx_system_pen_configure</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-11096">Imposta configurazione penna</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-11096">Set pen configuration</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-11097">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-11097">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_system_pen_configure(GX_PEN_CONFIGURATION *pen_configuration);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-11098">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-11098">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-11099">Questo servizio imposta la configurazione della penna per controllare i parametri della velocità e della distanza della penna usati per attivare la generazione di GX_EVENT_FLICK tipi di evento.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-11099">This service sets pen configuration to control the pen speed and distance parameters used to trigger the generation of GX_EVENT_FLICK event types.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-11100">Il membro gx_pen_configuration_min_drag_dist di GX_PEN_CONFIGURATION è un tipo di dati a virgola fissa ed è necessario utilizzare GX_FIXED_VAL_MAKE (valore) per eseguire la conversione da INT a GX_FIXED_VAL.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-11100">The gx_pen_configuration_min_drag_dist member of GX_PEN_CONFIGURATION is a fixed point data type, and you should use GX_FIXED_VAL_MAKE(value) to convert from INT to GX_FIXED_VAL.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-11101">Se ad esempio si desidera impostare la distanza minima di trascinamento su 0,5 pixel per ogni segno di indicizzazione, è necessario impostare il gx_pen_configuration_min_drag_dist su `GX_FIXED_VAL_MAKE(1) / 2` .</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-11101">For example, if you want to set minimum drag distance to 0.5 pixel per tick, you have to set the gx_pen_configuration_min_drag_dist to `GX_FIXED_VAL_MAKE(1) / 2`.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-11102">In GUIX rilascia 5.4.0 e versioni precedenti, il gx_pen_configuration_min_drag_dist membro di GX_PEN_CONFIGURATION era di tipo (INT << 8) anziché GX_FIXED_VAL Type.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-11102">In GUIX releases 5.4.0 and older, the gx_pen_configuration_min_drag_dist member of GX_PEN_CONFIGURATION was of (INT << 8) type rather than GX_FIXED_VAL type.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-11103">Se il progetto con la libreria 5.4.0 versione GUIX usa questa API, sarà necessario modificare il parametro min_drag_dist o #define GUIX_5_4_0_COMPATIBILITY quando si compila la libreria GUIX.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-11103">If your project with 5.4.0 version GUIX library is using this API, you will need to modify the min_drag_dist parameter or #define GUIX_5_4_0_COMPATIBILITY when building the GUIX library.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-11104">Parametri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-11104">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-11105">**pen_configuration** Puntatore alla struttura di configurazione della penna.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-11105">**pen_configuration** Pointer to pen configuration structure.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-11106">**Appendice I** contiene la definizione per GX_PEN_CONFIGURATION struttura</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-11106">**Appendix I** contains definition to GX_PEN_CONFIGURATION structure</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-11107">Valori restituiti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-11107">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-11108">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) impostazione della configurazione della penna completata</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-11108">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) Successfully set pen configuration</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-11109">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**: (0x11) il chiamante di questa funzione non è valido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-11109">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**: (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-11110">Consentito da</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-11110">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-11111">Inizializzazione e thread</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-11111">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-11112">Esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-11112">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Define pen configuration, set minimum drag distance to 0.5 pixel
per tick, maximum pen speed to 10 ticks. That means GUIX will trigger
a vertical or horizontal flick event if the drag time is smaller than
10 ticks and the drag distance is bigger than 0.5 * drag_ticks. */

GX_PEN_CONFIGURATION pen_configuration;

#if defined(GUIX_5_4_0_COMPATIBILITY)
Pen_configuration.gx_pen_configuration_min_drag_dist = (1 << 8)/ 2;
#else
pen_configuration.gx_pen_configuration_min_drag_dist = GX_FIXED_VAL_MAKE(1) / 2;
#endif

pen_configuration.gx_pen_configuration_max_pen_speed_ticks = 10;

/* Set the pen configuration. */
status = gx_system_pen_configure(&pen_configuration);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the touch configure has been set. */
```
