
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-11116">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-11116">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-11117">Questo servizio definisce un pool di memoria da usare per lo stack dello schermo di sistema.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-11117">This service defines a memory pool to be used for the system screen stack.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-11118">Lo stack dello schermo di sistema è una funzionalità facoltativa che può essere usata dall'applicazione per gestire l'aspetto del flusso della schermata dell'applicazione.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-11118">The system screen stack is an optional feature that can be used by the application to manage application screen flow appearance.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-11119">Se l'applicazione intende usare i servizi dello stack dello schermo, la funzione gx_system_screen_stack_create deve prima essere chiamata per configurare l'area di memoria dello stack dello schermo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-11119">If the application intends to utilize the screen stack services, the gx_system_screen_stack_create function must first be called to setup the screen stack memory region.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-11120">Parametri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-11120">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-11121">**Memory**: puntatore al blocco di memoria riservata.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-11121">**memory**: Pointer to the reserved memory block.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-11122">**size**: dimensione, in byte, del blocco di memoria riservata.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-11122">**size**: Size, in bytes, of the reserved memory block.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-11123">Valori restituiti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-11123">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-11124">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) Creazione completata</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-11124">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) Successfully creation</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-11125">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**: (0x11) il chiamante di questa funzione non è valido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-11125">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**: (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-11126">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) puntatore non valido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-11126">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-11127">Consentito da</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-11127">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-11128">Inizializzazione e thread</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-11128">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-11129">Esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-11129">Example</span></span>

```C
#define SCREEN_STACK_DEPTH 8
GX_WIDGET *screen_stack[SCREEN_STACK_DEPTH * 2];

UINT status;

/* Get the scrollbar appearance. */

status = gx_system_screen_stack_create(screen_stack,
    sizeof(GX_WIDGET *) * SCREEN_STACK_DEPTH * 2);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the system screen stack is initialized
and ready for use. */
```

- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-11131">gx_system_screen_stack_get</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-11131">gx_system_screen_stack_get</span></span>

## <a name="gx_system_screen_stack_get"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-11135">gx_system_screen_stack_get</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-11135">gx_system_screen_stack_get</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-11136">Estrai i puntatori dello stack dello schermo in primo piano</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-11136">Pop the topmost screen stack pointers</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-11137">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-11137">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_system_screen_stack_get(
    GX_WIDGET **popped_parent,
    GX_WIDGET **popped_screen);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-11138">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-11138">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-11139">Questa funzione estrae i puntatori dello stack dello schermo in primo piano e li restituisce al chiamante.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-11139">This function pops the topmost screen stack pointers and returns those pointers to the caller.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-11140">Questa funzione è diversa da gx_system_screen_stack_pop () perché la schermata spuntata non viene ricollegata automaticamente all'elemento padre precedente.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-11140">This function differs from gx_system_screen_stack_pop() in that the popped screen is not automatically reattached to the previous parent.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-11141">Al contrario, i puntatori vengono estratti dallo stack e restituiti al chiamante, consentendo al chiamante di allineare o eliminare la schermata restituita in base alle esigenze.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-11141">Instead, the pointers are popped from the stack and returned to the caller, allowing the caller to attach the or discard the returned screen as desired.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-11142">Parametri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-11142">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-11143">**popped_parent**: percorso in cui archiviare il puntatore del widget padre.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-11143">**popped_parent**: Location to store the parent widget pointer.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-11144">**popped_screen**: posizione in cui archiviare il puntatore a schermo Estratto.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-11144">**popped_screen**: Location to store the popped screen pointer.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-11145">Valori restituiti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-11145">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-11146">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) recupero dei puntatori dello stack dello schermo completato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-11146">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) Successfully retrieval of screen stack pointers</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-11147">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**: (0x11) il chiamante di questa funzione non è valido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-11147">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**: (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-11148">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) puntatore non valido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-11148">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-11149">**GX_FAILURE**: (0x10) stack di schermate non valido o vuoto</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-11149">**GX_FAILURE**: (0x10) Invalid or empty screen stack</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-11150">Consentito da</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-11150">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-11151">Inizializzazione e thread</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-11151">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-11152">Esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-11152">Example</span></span>

```C
UINT status;

GX_WIDGET *parent_screen;

GX_WIDGET *popped_screen;

/* Pop a screen stack entry. */
status = gx_system_screen_stack_get(&parent_screen, &popped_screen);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS, parent_screen and
popped_screen hold the topmost screen stack pointers. */
```

### <a name="see-also"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-11153">Vedere anche</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-11153">See Also</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-11154">gx_system_screen_stack_create</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-11154">gx_system_screen_stack_create</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-11155">gx_system_screen_stack_pop</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-11155">gx_system_screen_stack_pop</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-11156">gx_system_screen_stack_push</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-11156">gx_system_screen_stack_push</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-11157">gx_system_screen_stack_reset</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-11157">gx_system_screen_stack_reset</span></span>

## <a name="gx_system_screen_stack_pop"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-11158">gx_system_screen_stack_pop</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-11158">gx_system_screen_stack_pop</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-11159">Estrai la voce più in alto dallo stack dello schermo di sistema</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-11159">Pop the topmost entry from the system screen stack</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-11160">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-11160">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_system_screen_stack_pop();
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-11161">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-11161">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-11162">Questa funzione estrae la voce in primo piano per lo stack dello schermo e la connette automaticamente al widget padre estratto.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-11162">This function pops the topmost entry fo the screen stack and automatically attaches the popped screen to the popped parent widget.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-11163">Parametri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-11163">Parameters</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-11164">**nessuna**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-11164">**none**</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-11165">Valori restituiti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-11165">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-11166">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) recupero riuscito dei puntatori dello stack dello schermo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-11166">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) Successfull retrieval of screen stack pointers</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-11167">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**: (0x11) il chiamante di questa funzione non è valido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-11167">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**: (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-11168">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) puntatore non valido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-11168">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-11169">**GX_FAILURE**: (0x10) stack di schermate non valido o vuoto</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-11169">**GX_FAILURE**: (0x10) Invalid or empty screen stack</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-11170">Consentito da</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-11170">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-11171">Inizializzazione e thread</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-11171">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-11172">Esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-11172">Example</span></span>

```C
UINT status;

/* Pop a screen stack entry. */
status = gx_system_screen_stack_pop();

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS, the topmost screen stack entry has been
popped from the stack and re-attached to the previous parent. */
```

### <a name="see-also"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-11173">Vedere anche</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-11173">See Also</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-11177">gx_system_screen_stack_reset</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-11177">gx_system_screen_stack_reset</span></span>

## <a name="gx_system_screen_stack_push"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-11178">gx_system_screen_stack_push</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-11178">gx_system_screen_stack_push</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-11179">Inserire un widget e un puntatore padre nello stack dello schermo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-11179">Push a widget and parent pointer to the screen stack</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-11180">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-11180">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_system_screen_stack_push(GX_WIDGET *screen)
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-11181">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-11181">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-11182">Questo servizio posiziona un puntatore sul widget indicato, che in genere è una schermata di primo livello sullo stack dello schermo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-11182">This service places a pointer to the indicated widget, which is usually a top-level screen, onto the screen stack.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-11183">Se il widget ha un elemento padre, viene scollegato dall'elemento padre.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-11183">If the widget has a parent it is detached from the parent.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-11184">Viene anche eseguito il push del puntatore del widget padre nello stack dello schermo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-11184">The parent widget pointer is also pushed to the screen stack.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-11185">Il widget padre può essere NULL, ovvero una schermata non visibile o collegata a un elemento padre può essere inserita nello stack dello schermo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-11185">The parent widget may be NULL, meaning a screen that is not visible or attached to any parent may be pushed onto the screen stack.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-11186">Se viene eseguito il push di un widget senza elemento padre nello stack dello schermo, è necessario usare l'API screen_stack_get () per recuperare il puntatore della schermata push, anziché usare l'API screen_stack_pop (), che tenta di ricollegare il widget schioccato al padre precedente.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-11186">If a widget with no parent is pushed to the screen stack, the screen_stack_get() API should be used to retrieve the pushed screen pointer, rather than using the screen_stack_pop() API, which attempts to reattached the popped widget to its previous parent.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-11187">Parametri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-11187">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-11188">**schermata**: puntatore al widget da inserire nello stack dello schermo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-11188">**screen**: Pointer to the widget to be pushed to the screen stack.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-11189">Valori restituiti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-11189">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-11190">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) ottenere l'aspetto della barra di scorrimento</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-11190">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) Successfully get scrollbar appearance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-11191">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**: (0x11) il chiamante di questa funzione non è valido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-11191">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**: (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-11192">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) puntatore non valido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-11192">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-11193">Consentito da</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-11193">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-11194">Inizializzazione e thread</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-11194">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-11195">Esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-11195">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Get the scrollbar appearance. */
status = gx_system_screen_stack_push(window);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS, the widget pointed to by “window” has
been pushed to the screen stack, along with the widget’s parent
ponter. */
```

### <a name="see-also"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-11196">Vedere anche</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-11196">See Also</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-11197">gx_system_screen_stack_get</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-11197">gx_system_screen_stack_get</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-11198">gx_system_screen_stack_pop</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-11198">gx_system_screen_stack_pop</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-11199">gx_system_screen_stack_create</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-11199">gx_system_screen_stack_create</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-11200">gx_system_screen_stack_reset</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-11200">gx_system_screen_stack_reset</span></span>

## <a name="gx_system_screen_stack_reset"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-11201">gx_system_screen_stack_reset</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-11201">gx_system_screen_stack_reset</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-11202">Reimposta lo stack dello schermo di sistema</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-11202">Reset the system screen stack</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-11203">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-11203">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_system_screen_stack_reset();
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-11204">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-11204">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-11205">Questa funzione rimuove tutte le voci dallo stack dello schermo di sistema.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-11205">This function removes all entries from the system screen stack.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-11206">Se le schermate estratta dallo stack hanno blocchi di controllo allocati dinamicamente da GUIX studio, viene liberata la memoria per tali blocchi di controllo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-11206">If the screens popped from the stack have dynamically allocated control blocks allocated by GUIX Studio, the memory for those control blocks is freed.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-11207">Parametri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-11207">Parameters</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-11208">**nessuna**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-11208">**none**</span></span>

## <a name="gx_system_scroll_appearance_get"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-11221">gx_system_scroll_appearance_get</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-11221">gx_system_scroll_appearance_get</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_system_scroll_appearance_get(
    ULONG style,
    GX_SCROLLBAR_APPEARANCE *return_appearance);
```

<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-11225">Questo servizio ottiene l'aspetto della barra di scorrimento.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-11225">This service gets the scrollbar appearance.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-11226">Parametri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-11226">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-11227">**stile**: stile della barra di scorrimento: `GX_SCROLLBAR_HORIZONTAL` o `GX_SCROLLBAR_VERTICAL`</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-11227">**style**: Scrollbar style: `GX_SCROLLBAR_HORIZONTAL` or `GX_SCROLLBAR_VERTICAL`</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-11228">**return_appearance**: puntatore alla destinazione per l'aspetto.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-11228">**return_appearance**: Pointer to destination for appearance.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-11229">**Appendice I** contiene la definizione per GX_SCROLLBAR_APPERANCE</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-11229">**Appendix I** contains definition to GX_SCROLLBAR_APPERANCE</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-11232">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**: (0x11) il chiamante di questa funzione non è valido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-11232">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**: (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-11233">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) puntatore non valido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-11233">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-11234">Consentito da</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-11234">Allowed From</span></span>

```C
GX_SCROLLBAR_APPEARANCE my_appearance;

```

## <a name="gx_system_scroll_appearance_set"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-11261">gx_system_scroll_appearance_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-11261">gx_system_scroll_appearance_set</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-11262">Imposta aspetto scorrimento</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-11262">Set scroll appearance</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-11263">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-11263">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_system_scroll_appearance_set(
    ULONG style,
    GX_SCROLLBAR_APPEARANCE *appearance);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-11264">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-11264">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-11265">Questo servizio imposta l'aspetto di scorrimento predefinito.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-11265">This service sets the default scroll appearance.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-11266">Quando viene creato uno scorrimento, questa struttura di aspetto viene utilizzata a meno che l'applicazione non fornisca una versione personalizzata.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-11266">When a scroll is created, this appearance structure is used unless the application provides a custom version.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-11267">Parametri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-11267">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-11268">**stile**: stile di scorrimento `GX_SCROLLBAR_HORIZONTAL` o `GX_SCROLLBAR_VERTICAL`</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-11268">**style**: Scroll style `GX_SCROLLBAR_HORIZONTAL` or `GX_SCROLLBAR_VERTICAL`</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-11269">**aspetto**: puntatore alla struttura dell'aspetto inizializzato con vari attributi di aspetto della barra di scorrimento.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-11269">**appearance**: Pointer to appearance structure initialized with various scrollbar appearance attributes.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-11270">Fare riferimento all' **appendice i** per la definizione della struttura GX_SCROLLBAR_APPEARANCE.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-11270">Refer to **Appendix I** for the definition of the GX_SCROLLBAR_APPEARANCE structure.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-11271">Valori restituiti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-11271">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-11272">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) impostazione del set di aspetto di scorrimento completato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-11272">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) Successfully set scroll appearance set</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-11273">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**: (0x11) il chiamante di questa funzione non è valido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-11273">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**: (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-11274">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) puntatore non valido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-11274">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-11275">Consentito da</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-11275">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-11276">Inizializzazione e thread</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-11276">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-11277">Esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-11277">Example</span></span>

```C
GX_SCROLLBAR_APPEARANCE my_appearance;

memset(&my_appearance, 0, sizeof(GX_SCROLLBAR_APPEARANCE));

my_appearance.gx_scroll_width = 20;
my_appearance.gx_scroll_thumb_width = 18;

my_appearance.gx_scroll_thumb_color = GX_COLOR_ID_SCROLL_BUTTON;
my_appearance.gx_scroll_thumb_border_color = GX_COLOR_ID_SCROLL_BUTTON;
my_appearance.gx_scroll_button_color = GX_COLOR_ID_SCROLL_BUTTON;
my_appearance.gx_scroll_thumb_travel_min = 20;
my_appearance.gx_scroll_thumb_travel_max = 20;
my_appearance.gx_scroll_thumb_border_style = GX_STYLE_BORDER_THIN;

/* Set the scroll appearance. */

status = gx_system_scroll_appearance_set(GX_SCROLLBAR_VERTICAL, &my_appearance);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the scroll appearance has been set. */
```


### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-11304">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-11304">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-11305">Questo servizio avvia l'elaborazione GUIX.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-11305">This service starts GUIX processing.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-11306">In circostanze normali questa funzione non restituisce mai, ma inizia a elaborare la coda degli eventi GUIX.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-11306">Under normal circumstances this function never returns, but instead begins processing the GUIX event queue.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-11307">Quando la coda degli eventi di GUIX è vuota, questo servizio sospende il thread chiamante finché non arrivano nuovi eventi nella coda degli eventi di GUIX.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-11307">When the GUIX event queue is empty, this service suspends the calling thread until new events arrive in the GUIX event queue.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-11309">**Nessuno**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-11309">**None**</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-11311">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) avvio del sistema riuscito</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-11311">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) Successful system start</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-11312">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**: (0x11) il chiamante di questa funzione non è valido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-11312">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**: (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-11313">Consentito da</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-11313">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-11314">Inizializzazione e thread</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-11314">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-11315">Esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-11315">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Start GUIX. */
status = gx_system_start();

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS . GUIX has been started. */
```

## <a name="gx_system_string_get"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-11340">gx_system_string_get</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-11340">gx_system_string_get</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-11341">Ottieni stringa</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-11341">Get string</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-11342">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-11342">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_system_string_get(
    GX_RESOURCE_ID string_id,
    GX_CHAR **return_string);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-11343">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-11343">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-11344">Questo servizio ottiene la stringa per l'ID di risorsa specificato, usando la prima visualizzazione definita e la lingua attualmente attiva.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-11344">This service gets the string for the specified resource ID, using the first defined display and the currently active language.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-11345">Questa funzione è stata deprecata a favore di gx_display_string_get.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-11345">This function has been deprecated in favor of gx_display_string_get.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-11346">Tutte le nuove applicazioni devono usare gx_display_string_get.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-11346">All new applications should use gx_display_string_get.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-11347">Parametri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-11347">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-11348">**string_id**: ID risorsa stringa</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-11348">**string_id**: String resource ID</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-11349">**return_string**: puntatore a puntatore di destinazione stringa</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-11349">**return_string**: Pointer to string destination pointer</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-11350">Valori restituiti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-11350">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-11351">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) Get stringa riuscita</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-11351">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) Successful string get</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-11352">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**: (0x11) il chiamante di questa funzione non è valido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-11352">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**: (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-11353">**GX_PTR_ERROR (0x07)**: puntatore non valido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-11353">**GX_PTR_ERROR (0x07)**: Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-11354">**GX_INVALID_RESOURCE_ID**: (0X33) ID risorsa non valido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-11354">**GX_INVALID_RESOURCE_ID**: (0x33) Invalid resource ID</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-11355">Consentito da</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-11355">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-11356">Inizializzazione e thread</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-11356">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-11357">Esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-11357">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Get the string associated with MY_STRING_ID. */

status = gx_system_string_get(MY_STRING_RESOURCE_ID, &my_string);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the string is contained in “my_string”.
*/
```

## <a name="gx_system_string_table_get"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-11362">gx_system_string_table_get</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-11362">gx_system_string_table_get</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-11363">Recupera la tabella delle stringhe</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-11363">Retrieves the string table</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-11364">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-11364">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_system_string_table_get(
    GX_UBYTE language,
    GX_CHAR ***string_table,
    UINT *get_size);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-11365">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-11365">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-11366">Questo servizio recupera dalla prima visualizzazione la tabella delle stringhe per la lingua richiesta.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-11366">This service retrieves the string table for the requested language from the first display.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-11367">Questa funzione è stata deprecata a favore di gx_display_string_table_get.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-11367">This function has been deprecated in favor of gx_display_string_table_get.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-11368">Tutte le nuove applicazioni devono usare gx_display_string_table_get.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-11368">All new applications should use gx_display_string_table_get.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-11369">Parametri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-11369">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-11370">**lingua**: Indice lingua</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-11370">**language**: Language index</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-11371">**string_table**: puntatore allo spazio di archiviazione del puntatore della tabella di stringhe oppure null se il chiamante non deve ottenere il puntatore alla tabella delle stringhe.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-11371">**string_table**: Pointer to storage space of the string table pointer, or NULL if the caller does not need to get the pointer to the string table.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-11372">**get_Size**: puntatore alla risorsa di archiviazione per il numero di stringhe nella tabella di stringhe oppure null se il chiamante non deve ottenere il numero di stringhe nella tabella di stringhe.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-11372">**get_size**: Pointer to the storage for the number of strings in string table, or NULL if the caller does not need to get the number of strings in the string table.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-11373">Valori restituiti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-11373">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-11374">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) tabella delle stringhe riuscita Get</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-11374">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) Successful string table get</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-11375">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**: (0x11) il chiamante di questa funzione non è valido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-11375">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**: (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-11376">Consentito da</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-11376">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-11377">Inizializzazione e thread</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-11377">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-11378">Esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-11378">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Get the string table. */

CHAR **my_string_table; UINT table_size;

status = gx_system_string_table_get(LANGUAGE_ID_ENGLISH,
    &my_string_table, &table_size);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS . the pointer to the string table has
been obtained. */
```

- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-11381">gx_display_string_get</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-11381">gx_display_string_get</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-11383">gx_display_language_table_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-11383">gx_display_language_table_set</span></span>

## <a name="gx_system_string_width_get"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-11384">gx_system_string_width_get</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-11384">gx_system_string_width_get</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-11385">Ottenere la larghezza della stringa (deprecato)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-11385">Get string width (deprecated)</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-11386">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-11386">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_system_string_width_get(
    GX_FONT *font, GX_CHAR *string,
    INT string_length,
    GX_VALUE *return_width);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-11387">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-11387">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-11388">Questo servizio è deprecato a favore di gx_system_string_width_get_ext ().</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-11388">This service is deprecated in favor of gx_system_string_width_get_ext().</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-11389">Questo servizio calcola la larghezza di visualizzazione della stringa fornita in pixel usando il tipo di carattere specificato.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-11389">This service computes the display width of the supplied string in pixels using the specified font.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-11390">Se il string_length parametro è >= 0, nel calcolo viene incluso solo il numero di richieste di caratteri.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-11390">If the string_length parameter is >= 0, only the request count of characters are included in the calculation.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-11391">Se il string_length parametro è-1, nel calcolo viene utilizzata l'intera stringa fino al carattere di terminazione NULL.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-11391">If the string_length parameter is -1, the entire string up to the NULL terminator is used in the calculation.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-11392">Parametri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-11392">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-11393">**font**: puntatore al tipo di carattere della stringa</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-11393">**font**: Pointer to string’s font</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-11394">**stringa**: puntatore a stringa</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-11394">**string**: Pointer to string</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-11395">**string_length**: lunghezza stringa</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-11395">**string_length**: Length of string</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-11396">**return_width**: destinazione per la larghezza della stringa</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-11396">**return_width**: Destination for width of string</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-11397">Valori restituiti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-11397">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-11398">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) lunghezza stringa riuscita Get</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-11398">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) Successful string width get</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-11399">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) puntatore non valido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-11399">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-11400">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**: (0x11) il chiamante di questa funzione non è valido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-11400">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**: (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-11401">**GX_INVALID_FONT**: (0x16) tipo di carattere non valido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-11401">**GX_INVALID_FONT**: (0x16) Invalid font</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-11402">**GX_INVALID_STRING_LENGTH**: (0x34) lunghezza stringa non valida</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-11402">**GX_INVALID_STRING_LENGTH**: (0x34) Invalid string length</span></span>

```C
    GX_VALUE *return_width);
```

- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-11419">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) puntatore non valido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-11419">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-11420">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**: 0x11) il chiamante di questa funzione non è valido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-11420">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**: 0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-11422">**GX_INVALID_STRING_LENGTH**: (0x34) lunghezza stringa non valida</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-11422">**GX_INVALID_STRING_LENGTH**: (0x34) Invalid string length</span></span>

## <a name="gx_system_timer_start"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-11443">gx_system_timer_start</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-11443">gx_system_timer_start</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-11444">Timer di avvio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-11444">Start timer</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-11445">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-11445">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_system_timer_start(
    GX_WIDGET *owner, 
    UINT timer_id,
    UINT initial_ticks,
    UINT reschedule_ticks);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-11446">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-11446">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-11447">Questo servizio avvia un timer per il widget specificato.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-11447">This service starts a timer for the specified widget.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-11448">La costante GX_MAX_ACTIVE_TIMERS definisce il numero massimo di timer attivi supportati.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-11448">The constant GX_MAX_ACTIVE_TIMERS defined the maximum active timers supported.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-11449">L'impostazione predefinita per questo valore è 32.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-11449">The default setting for this value is 32.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-11450">Parametri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-11450">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-11451">**proprietario**: puntatore al blocco di controllo widget</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-11451">**owner**: Pointer to widget control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-11452">**timer_id**: ID del timer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-11452">**timer_id**: ID of timer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-11453">**initial_ticks**: cicli di scadenza iniziali</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-11453">**initial_ticks**: initial expiration ticks</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-11454">**reschedule_ticks**: cicli di scadenza periodici</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-11454">**reschedule_ticks**: Periodic expiration ticks</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-11455">Valori restituiti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-11455">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-11456">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) Avvio timer riuscito</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-11456">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) Successful timer start</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-11457">**GX_OUT_OF_TIMERS**: (0x04) non più timer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-11457">**GX_OUT_OF_TIMERS**: (0x04) No more timers</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-11458">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) puntatore non valido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-11458">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-11459">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**: (0x11) il chiamante di questa funzione non è valido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-11459">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**: (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-11460">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET**: (0X12) widget non valido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-11460">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET**: (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-11461">**GX_INVALID_VALUE**: (0x22) i valori del timer non sono validi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-11461">**GX_INVALID_VALUE**: (0x22) Timer value(s) not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-11462">Consentito da</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-11462">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-11463">Inizializzazione e thread</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-11463">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-11464">Esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-11464">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Start a periodic timer for the widget “my_widget”. */
status = gx_system_timer_start(&my_widget, MY_TIMER_ID, 10, 20);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS . the timer for “my_widget” has been
started. */
```

## <a name="gx_system_timer_stop"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-11482">gx_system_timer_stop</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-11482">gx_system_timer_stop</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-11483">Arresta timer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-11483">Stop timer</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-11484">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-11484">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_system_timer_stop(
    GW_WIDGET *owner, 
    UINT timer_id);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-11485">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-11485">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-11486">Questo servizio arresta il timer con il timer_id specificato associato al widget chiamante.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-11486">This service stops the timer with the specified timer_id associated with the calling widget.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-11487">Per arrestare tutti i timer collegati a un particolare widget, l'applicazione può passare il valore timer_id 0.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-11487">To stop all timers linked to a particular widget, the application can pass the timer_id value of 0.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-11488">Parametri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-11488">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-11489">**proprietario**: puntatore al blocco di controllo widget</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-11489">**owner**: Pointer to widget control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-11490">**timer_id**: ID del timer oppure 0 per tutti i timer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-11490">**timer_id**: ID of timer, or 0 for all timers</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-11491">Valori restituiti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-11491">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-11492">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) arresto timer riuscito</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-11492">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) Successful timer stop</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-11493">**GX_NOT_FOUND**: (0x09) ID timer non trovato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-11493">**GX_NOT_FOUND**: (0x09) Timer ID not found</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-11494">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**: (0x11) il chiamante di questa funzione non è valido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-11494">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**: (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-11495">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) puntatore non valido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-11495">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-11496">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET**: (0X12) widget non valido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-11496">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET**: (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-11497">Consentito da</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-11497">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-11498">Inizializzazione e thread</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-11498">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-11499">Esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-11499">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Stop the periodic timer for the widget “my_widget”. */
status = gx_system_timer_stop(&my_widget, MY_TIMER_ID);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS . the timer for “my_widget” has been
stopped. */
```

## <a name="gx_system_widget_find"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-11571">gx_system_widget_find</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-11571">gx_system_widget_find</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-11572">Trova widget</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-11572">Find widget</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-11573">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-11573">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_system_widget_find(
    USHORT widget_id,
    INT search_level, 
    GX_WIDGET **return_search_result);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-11574">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-11574">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-11575">Questo servizio cerca l'ID widget specificato.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-11575">This service searches for the specified widget ID.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-11576">A differenza di gx_widget_find (), questa funzione Cerca gli elementi figlio di tutte le finestre radice definite nel sistema, vale a dire che si tratta di una ricerca completa di tutti i widget visibili.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-11576">Unlike gx_widget_find(), this function searches the children of all root windows defined in the system, meaning this is an exhaustive search of all visible widgets.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-11577">Se si conosce l'elemento padre del widget che si sta cercando, usare invece gx_widget_find ().</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-11577">If you know the parent of the widget you are searching for, use gx_widget_find() instead.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-11578">Parametri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-11578">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-11579">**widget_id**: ID widget da cercare</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-11579">**widget_id**: Widget ID to search for</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-11580">**search_level**: definisce il livello di annidamento ricorsivo in cui vengono cercati i widget figlio.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-11580">**search_level**: Defines the recursive nesting level into which child widgets are searched.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-11581">Se questo valore è 0, la ricerca viene eseguita solo per gli elementi figlio immediati di ogni finestra radice.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-11581">If this value is 0, only immediate children of each root window are searched.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-11582">Se questo valore è GX_SEARCH_DEPTH_INFINITE, la funzione nidifica in tutti gli elementi figlio che cercano l'ID del widget richiesto.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-11582">If this value is GX_SEARCH_DEPTH_INFINITE, the function nests down into all children searching for the requested widget ID.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-11583">Per qualsiasi altro valore > 0, il livello di ricerca definisce il livello di annidamento della funzione che verrà ricercato nell'ID widget richiesto.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-11583">For any other value > 0, the search level defines how deeply nested this function will go searching for the requested widget ID.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-11584">**return_search_result**: puntatore alla destinazione per il widget trovato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-11584">**return_search_result**: Pointer to destination for widget found</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-11585">Valori restituiti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-11585">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-11586">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) ricerca widget riuscita</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-11586">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) Successful widget search</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-11587">ID widget **GX_NOT_FOUND**: (0x09) non trovato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-11587">**GX_NOT_FOUND**: (0x09) Widget ID not found</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-11588">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) puntatore non valido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-11588">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-11589">Consentito da</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-11589">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-11590">Inizializzazione e thread</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-11590">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-11591">Esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-11591">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Search recursively from the top level widget for the widget with
ID of MY_WIDGET_ID. */

status = gx_system_widget_find(MY_WIDGET_ID,
    GX_SEARCH_DEPTH_INFINITE,
    &my_widget);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS . the search was successful and
“my_widget” contains the pointer to the widget. */
```

## <a name="gx_text_button_create"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-11616">gx_text_button_create</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-11616">gx_text_button_create</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-11617">Pulsante Crea testo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-11617">Create text button</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-11618">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-11618">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_text_button_create(
    GX_TEXT_BUTTON *text_button,
    GX_CONST GX_CHAR *name, 
    GX_WIDGET *parent,
    GX_RESOURCE_ID text_id, 
    ULONG style,
    USHORT text_button_id, 
    GX_CONST GX_RECTANGLE *size);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-11619">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-11619">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-11620">Questo servizio crea un widget del pulsante di testo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-11620">This service creates a text button widget.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-11621">GX_TEXT_BUTTON deriva da GX_BUTTON e supporta tutti i servizi API gx_button.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-11621">GX_TEXT_BUTTON is derived from GX_BUTTON and supports all gx_button API services.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-11622">Parametri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-11622">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-11623">**text_button**: blocco di controllo puntatore al pulsante di testo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-11623">**text_button**: Pointer to text button control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-11624">**Name**: nome logico del pulsante di testo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-11624">**name**: Logical name of text button</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-11625">**Parent**: puntatore al widget padre del pulsante</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-11625">**parent**: Pointer to parent widget of the button</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-11626">**TEXT_ID**: ID risorsa del testo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-11626">**text_id**: Resource ID of text</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-11627">**stile**: stile del pulsante di testo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-11627">**style**: Text button style.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-11628">L' **Appendice D** contiene stili generali predefiniti per tutti i widget e per gli stili specifici dei widget.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-11628">**Appendix D** contains pre-defined general styles for all widgets as well as widget-specific styles.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-11629">**text_button_id**: ID del pulsante testo definito dall'applicazione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-11629">**text_button_id**: Application-defined ID of the text button</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-11630">**dimensioni**: dimensioni del pulsante</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-11630">**size**: Size of the button</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-11631">Valori restituiti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-11631">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-11632">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) pulsante di testo riuscito crea</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-11632">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) Successful text button create</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-11633">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**: (0x11) il chiamante di questa funzione non è valido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-11633">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**: (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-11634">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) puntatore non valido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-11634">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-11635">**GX_ALREADY_CREATED**: il widget (0x13) è già stato creato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-11635">**GX_ALREADY_CREATED**: (0x13) Widget already created</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-11636">**GX_INVALID_SIZE**: (0x19) dimensioni del blocco di controllo widget non valide</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-11636">**GX_INVALID_SIZE**: (0x19) Invalid widget control block size</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-11637">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET**: (0x12) widget padre non valido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-11637">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET**: (0x12) Parent widget not valid</span></span>


### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-11638">Consentito da</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-11638">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-11639">Inizializzazione e thread</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-11639">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-11640">Esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-11640">Example</span></span>

```C
GX_TEXT_BUTTON my_text_button;

GX_RECTANGLE size;

/* Define widget size. */

gx_utility_rectangle_define(&size, 0, 0, 100, 100);

/* Create text button “my_text_button”. */

status = gx_text_button_create(&my_text_button, "my text button",
    &my_parent_window, MY_TEXT_RESOURCE_ID,
    GX_STYLE_BUTTON_TOGGLE, MY_TEXT_BUTTON_ID, &size);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS, the text button “my_text_button” was
created. */
```

## <a name="gx_text_button_draw"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-11658">gx_text_button_draw</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-11658">gx_text_button_draw</span></span>

```C
VOID gx_text_button_draw(GX_TEXT_BUTTON *button);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-11661">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-11661">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-11662">Questo servizio disegna il pulsante di testo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-11662">This service draws the text button.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-11663">Questo servizio viene in genere chiamato internamente durante l'aggiornamento dell'area di disegno, ma può essere chiamato anche dalle funzioni di disegno dei pulsanti di testo personalizzati.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-11663">This service is normally called internally during canvas refresh, but can also be called from custom text button drawing functions.</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-11670">Esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-11670">Example</span></span>

## <a name="gx_text_button_event_process"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-11688">gx_text_button_event_process</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-11688">gx_text_button_event_process</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-11689">Evento processo pulsante di testo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-11689">Process text button event</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-11690">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-11690">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_text_button_event_process(GX_TEXT_BUTTON *text_button, GX_EVENT *event_ptr);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-11691">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-11691">Description</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-11694">Parametri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-11694">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-11696">**event_ptr** Puntatore all'evento da elaborare</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-11696">**event_ptr** Pointer to the event to process</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-11697">Valori restituiti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-11697">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-11698">Processo di evento del pulsante di testo **GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) riuscito</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-11698">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful text button event process</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-11699">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) chiamante non valido di questa funzione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-11699">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-11700">Puntatore a **GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) non valido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-11700">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-11702">Consentito da</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-11702">Allowed From</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-11704">Esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-11704">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Call generic text button event processing as part of custom event processing function. */

UINT custom_text_button_event_process(GX_TEXT_BUTTON *text_button, GX_EVENT *event)
{
    UINT status = GX_SUCCESS;

    switch(event->gx_event_type)
    {
    case xyz:
        /* Insert custom event handling here */
        break;

    default:
        /* Pass all other events to the default text button event processing */
        status = gx_text_button_event_process(wheel, event);
        break;
    }
    return status;
}
```

## <a name="gx_text_button_text_color_set"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-11755">gx_text_button_text_color_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-11755">gx_text_button_text_color_set</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-11756">Imposta il colore del pulsante testo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-11756">Set text button color</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-11757">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-11757">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_text_button_text_color_set(
    GX_TEXT_BUTTON *text_button,
    GX_RESOURCE_ID normal_text_color_id,
    GX_RESOURCE_ID selected_text_color_id,
    GX_RESOURCE_ID disabled_text_color_id);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-11758">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-11758">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-11759">Questo servizio imposta il colore del pulsante di testo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-11759">This service sets the color of the text button.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-11760">Parametri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-11760">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-11761">**text_button**: blocco di controllo puntatore al pulsante di testo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-11761">**text_button**: Pointer to text button control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-11762">**normal_text_color_id**: ID risorsa del testo normale.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-11762">**normal_text_color_id**: Resource ID of normal text.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-11763">**L'Appendice A** contiene ID di risorsa colore predefiniti.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-11763">**Appendix A** contains pre-defined color Resource IDs.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-11764">Si noti che l'applicazione può aggiungere anche ID di risorse colore personalizzati.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-11764">Note that the application may add custom color Resource IDs as well.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-11765">**selected_text_color_id**: ID risorsa del testo selezionato.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-11765">**selected_text_color_id**: Resource ID of selected text.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-11766">**L'Appendice A** contiene ID di risorsa colore predefiniti.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-11766">**Appendix A** contains pre-defined color Resource IDs.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-11767">Si noti che l'applicazione può aggiungere anche ID di risorse colore personalizzati.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-11767">Note that the application may add custom color Resource IDs as well.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-11768">**disabled_text_color_id**: ID risorsa di colore per il testo disabilitato.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-11768">**disabled_text_color_id**: Resource ID of color for disabled text.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-11769">**L'Appendice A** contiene ID di risorsa colore predefiniti.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-11769">**Appendix A** contains pre-defined color Resource IDs.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-11770">Si noti che l'applicazione può aggiungere anche ID di risorse colore personalizzati.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-11770">Note that the application may add custom color Resource IDs as well.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-11771">Valori restituiti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-11771">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-11772">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) il set di colori del pulsante testo è riuscito</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-11772">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) Successful text button color set</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-11773">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**: (0x11) il chiamante di questa funzione non è valido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-11773">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**: (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-11774">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) puntatore non valido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-11774">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-11775">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET**: (0X12) widget non valido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-11775">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET**: (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-11776">Consentito da</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-11776">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-11777">Inizializzazione e thread</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-11777">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-11778">Esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-11778">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Set the color of the text button “my_text_button”. */
status = gx_text_button_text_color_set(&my_text_button,
    GX_COLOR_ID_NORMAL_TEXT,
    GX_COLOR_ID_SELECTED_TEXT,
    GX_COLOR_ID_DISABLED_TEXT);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS, the text color of “my_text_button” was
set. */
```

## <a name="gx_text_button_text_draw"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-11795">gx_text_button_text_draw</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-11795">gx_text_button_text_draw</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-11796">Funzione di supporto per creare il testo del pulsante</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-11796">Support function to draw button text</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-11797">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-11797">Prototype</span></span>

```C
VOID gx_text_button_text_draw(GX_TEXT_BUTTON *text_button);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-11798">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-11798">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-11799">Questa funzione di supporto disegna la parte di testo di un pulsante di testo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-11799">This support function draws the text portion of a text button.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-11800">Questa funzione viene chiamata internamente da gx_text_button_draw e viene fornita come API separata per praticità per le applicazioni che definiscono una funzione di disegno pulsante personalizzata.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-11800">This function is called internally by gx_text_button_draw, and is provided as a separate API as a convenience for applications that define a custom button drawing function.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-11801">Le applicazioni che desiderano personalizzare il disegno dello sfondo del pulsante possono fornire la funzione di disegno personalizzata e richiamare il servizio gx_text_button_text_draw come parte del disegno personalizzato per disegnare il testo del pulsante sullo sfondo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-11801">Applications that want to customize the button background drawing can provide their custom drawing function, and invoke the gx_text_button_text_draw service as part of their custom drawing to draw the button text over the background.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-11802">Parametri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-11802">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-11803">**text_button**: blocco di controllo puntatore al pulsante di testo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-11803">**text_button**: Pointer to text button control block</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-11804">Valori restituiti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-11804">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-11805">**Nessuno**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-11805">**None**</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-11806">Consentito da</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-11806">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-11807">Thread</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-11807">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-11808">Esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-11808">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Define a custom drawing function */

VOID my_button_draw(GX_TEXT_BUTTON *button)
{
    /* Insert code here to draw button background */

    /* Call support function to do text drawing */
    gx_text_button_text_draw(button);

    /* Draw child widgets */
    gx_widget_children_draw((GX_WIDGET *) button);
}
```
