## <a name="gx_text_button_text_set"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-11908">gx_text_button_text_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-11908">gx_text_button_text_set</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-11909">Assegnare testo al pulsante testo (deprecato)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-11909">Assign text to the text button (deprecated)</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-11910">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-11910">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_text_button_text_set(
    GX_TEXT_BUTTON *text_button,
    GX_CHAR *text);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-11911">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-11911">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-11912">Questo servizio è deprecato a favore di gx_text_button_text_set_ext ().</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-11912">This service is deprecated in favor of gx_text_button_text_set_ext().</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-11913">Questo servizio assegna la stringa specificata al pulsante di testo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-11913">This service assigns the specified string to the text button.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-11914">Se il widget text_button è stato creato con lo stile GX_STYLE_TEXT_COPY, il widget crea una copia privata della stringa di testo assegnata.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-11914">If the text_button widget was created with style  GX_STYLE_TEXT_COPY, the widget creates a private copy of the text string assigned.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-11915">Se GX_STYLE_TEXT_COPY non è attivo, il widget non crea una copia privata della stringa in ingresso e pertanto la stringa deve essere allocata in modo statico o globale, ovvero potrebbe non essere una variabile automatica o temporanea.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-11915">If GX_STYLE_TEXT_COPY is not active, the widget does not make a private copy of the incoming string, and therefore the string must be statically or globally allocated, i.e. it may not be an automatic or temporary variable.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-11916">Parametri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-11916">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-11917">**text_button**: blocco di controllo puntatore al pulsante di testo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-11917">**text_button**: Pointer to text button control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-11918">**Text**: puntatore alla stringa con TERMINAzione null</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-11918">**text**: pointer to the NULL-terminated string</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-11919">Valori restituiti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-11919">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-11920">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) impostazione corretta del testo sul pulsante</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-11920">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) Successfully set the text to the button</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-11921">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**: (0x11) il chiamante di questa funzione non è valido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-11921">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**: (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-11922">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) puntatore non valido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-11922">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-11923">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET**: (0X12) widget non valido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-11923">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET**: (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-11924">**GX_SYSTEM_MEMORY_ERROR**: (0x30) allocatore di memoria non definito o allocazione di memoria non riuscita</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-11924">**GX_SYSTEM_MEMORY_ERROR**: (0x30) Memory allocator not defined or memory allocation failed</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-11925">**GX_INVALID_STRING_LENGTH**: (0x34) lunghezza stringa non valida</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-11925">**GX_INVALID_STRING_LENGTH**: (0x34) Invalid string length</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-11926">Consentito da</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-11926">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-11927">Inizializzazione e thread</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-11927">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-11928">Esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-11928">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Set the string “my string” to the text button “my_text_button”.
*/

status = gx_text_button_text_set(&my_text_button, “my string”);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS, the string “my_text_button” was set.
*/
```

<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-11937">Questo servizio assegna la stringa specificata al pulsante di testo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-11937">This service assigns the specified string to the text button.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-11938">Se il widget text_button è stato creato con lo stile GX_STYLE_TEXT_COPY, il widget crea una copia privata della stringa di testo assegnata.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-11938">If the text_button widget was created with style GX_STYLE_TEXT_COPY, the widget creates a private copy of the text string assigned.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-11939">Se GX_STYLE_TEXT_COPY non è attivo, il widget non crea una copia privata della stringa in ingresso e pertanto la stringa deve essere allocata in modo statico o globale, ovvero potrebbe non essere una variabile automatica o temporanea.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-11939">If GX_STYLE_TEXT_COPY is not active, the widget does not make a private copy of the incoming string, and therefore the string must be statically or globally allocated, i.e. it may not be an automatic or temporary variable.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-11944">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) impostazione corretta del testo sul pulsante</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-11944">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) Successfully set the text to the button</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-11945">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**: (0x11) il chiamante di questa funzione non è valido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-11945">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**: (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-11946">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) puntatore non valido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-11946">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-11947">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET**: (0X12) widget non valido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-11947">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET**: (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-11948">**GX_SYSTEM_MEMORY_ERROR**: (0x30) allocatore di memoria non definito o allocazione di memoria non riuscita</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-11948">**GX_SYSTEM_MEMORY_ERROR**: (0x30) Memory allocator not defined or memory allocation failed</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-11949">**GX_INVALID_STRING_LENGTH**: (0x34) lunghezza stringa non valida</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-11949">**GX_INVALID_STRING_LENGTH**: (0x34) Invalid string length</span></span>

```C

new_string.gx_string_length = strlen(new_string.gx_string_ptr);

/* Assign the string “new_string” to the text button
“my_text_button”. */

status = gx_text_button_text_set_ext(&my_text_button, &new_string);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS, the string “my_text_button” was set.
*/
```

## <a name="gx_text_input_cursor_blink_interval_set"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-11969">gx_text_input_cursor_blink_interval_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-11969">gx_text_input_cursor_blink_interval_set</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-11970">Imposta intervallo di lampeggio cursore</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-11970">Set cursor blink interval</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-11971">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-11971">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_text_input_cursor_blink_interval_set(
    GX_TEXT_INPUT_CURSOR *cursor_input,
    GX_UBYTE blink_interval);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-11972">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-11972">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-11973">Questo servizio imposta il valore dell'intervallo di lampeggio del cursore.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-11973">This service sets blink interval value of the cursor.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-11974">Parametri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-11974">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-11975">**cursor_input** Blocco di controllo cursori</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-11975">**cursor_input** Cursor control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-11976">**blink_interval** Valore da impostare</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-11976">**blink_interval** Value to be set</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-11977">Valori restituiti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-11977">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-11978">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) impostazione dell'intervallo di lampeggio del cursore completata</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-11978">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) Successfully set the cursor blink interval</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-11979">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) puntatore non valido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-11979">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-11980">**GX_INVALID_VALUE**: (0x22) valore intervallo non valido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-11980">**GX_INVALID_VALUE**: (0x22) Blink interval value not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-11981">Consentito da</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-11981">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-11982">Inizializzazione e thread</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-11982">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-11983">Esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-11983">Example</span></span>

```C
GX_TEXT_INPUT_CURSOR *input_cursor;

/* Pointer the input cursor to the cursor instance of single/multi
line text input widget. */

input_cursor = &sl_input.gx_single_line_text_input_cursor_instance;

/* Set the blink interval value of “input_cursor” to 2. */
status = gx_text_input_cursor_blink_interval_set(input_cursor, 2);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS, the blink interval value of
“input_cursor” has been successfully set to 2. */
```

## <a name="gx_text_scroll_wheel_callback_set"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-12023">gx_text_scroll_wheel_callback_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-12023">gx_text_scroll_wheel_callback_set</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-12024">Assegnare la funzione di callback della rotellina di scorrimento del tipo di testo (deprecata)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-12024">Assign the callback function of text type scroll wheel (deprecated)</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-12025">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-12025">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_text_scroll_wheel_callback_set(
    GX_TEXT_SCROLL_WHEEL *wheel,
    GX_CONST GX_CHAR *(*callback)(GX_TEXT_SCROLL_WHEEL *, int));
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-12026">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-12026">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-12027">Questo servizio è deprecato a favore di gx_text_scroll_wheel_callback_set_ext ().</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-12027">This service is deprecated in favor of gx_text_scroll_wheel_callback_set_ext().</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-12028">Questo servizio assegna la funzione di callback che verrà richiamata da una rotellina di scorrimento del tipo di testo per determinare la stringa di testo da visualizzare in ogni riga della rotellina di scorrimento.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-12028">This service assigns the callback function which a text type scroll wheel will invoke to determine the text string to be displayed at each row of the scroll wheel.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-12029">Per GX_NUMERIC_SCROLL_WHEEL e GX_STRING_SCROLL_WHEEL, vengono fornite funzioni di callback predefinite e l'applicazione non deve apportare alcuna modifica per utilizzare queste implementazioni predefinite.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-12029">For GX_NUMERIC_SCROLL_WHEEL and GX_STRING_SCROLL_WHEEL, default callback functions are provided and the application does not need to make any changes to use these default implementations.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-12030">Questa API viene fornita per consentire all'applicazione di personalizzare la formattazione o altri parametri della stringa visualizzata in ogni riga del widget della rotellina di scorrimento.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-12030">This API is provided to allow the application to customize the formatting or other parameters of the string that is displayed on each row of the scroll wheel widget.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-12031">La funzione di callback riceverà come input un puntatore al blocco di controllo della rotellina di scorrimento e il numero di riga visualizzato.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-12031">The callback function will receive as input a pointer to the scroll wheel control block and the row number that is being displayed.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-12032">La funzione deve restituire un puntatore a una stringa di testo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-12032">The function should return a pointer to a text string.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-12033">Parametri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-12033">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-12034">**rotellina** Indirizzo blocco di controllo rotellina di scorrimento stringa</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-12034">**wheel** String scroll wheel control block address</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-12035">**callback** di Puntatore alla funzione di callback</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-12035">**callback** Pointer to callback function</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-12036">Valori restituiti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-12036">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-12037">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) impostazione callback completata</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-12037">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) Successfully set callback</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-12038">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) puntatore non valido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-12038">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-12039">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET**: (0X12) widget non valido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-12039">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET**: (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-12040">Consentito da</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-12040">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-12041">Inizializzazione e thread</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-12041">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-12042">Esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-12042">Example</span></span>

```C
GX_TEXT_SCROLL_WHEEL wheel;

GX_CHAR string_buffer[20];

GX_CHAR *my_wheel_callback(GX_TEXT_SCROLL_WHEEL *wheel, int row)
{
    /* Just for an example, return row number as string for rows
    >= 0, and return text “Invalid” otherwise */
    if (row >= 0)
    {
        gx_utility_ltoa(row, string_buffer, 20);
    }
    else
    {
        return(“Invalid”);
    }
}

gx_text_scroll_wheel_create(&wheel, “my wheel”, root, 10,
    GX_STYLE_ENABLED|GX_STYLE_TEXT_CENTER|GX_STYLE_TRANSPARENT|
    GX_STYLE_WRAP|ID_MY_WHEEL, &size);

status = gx_text_scroll_wheel_callback_set(&wheel,
    my_wheel_callback);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS, the scroll whell callback function has
been set. */
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-12062">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-12062">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-12063">Questo servizio assegna la funzione di callback che verrà richiamata da una rotellina di scorrimento del tipo di testo per determinare la stringa di testo da visualizzare in ogni riga della rotellina di scorrimento.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-12063">This service assigns the callback function which a text type scroll wheel will invoke to determine the text string to be displayed at each row of the scroll wheel.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-12064">Per GX_NUMERIC_SCROLL_WHEEL e GX_STRING_SCROLL_WHEEL, vengono fornite funzioni di callback predefinite e l'applicazione non deve apportare alcuna modifica per utilizzare queste implementazioni predefinite.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-12064">For GX_NUMERIC_SCROLL_WHEEL and GX_STRING_SCROLL_WHEEL, default callback functions are provided and the application does not need to make any changes to use these default implementations.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-12065">Questa API viene fornita per consentire all'applicazione di personalizzare la formattazione o altri parametri della stringa visualizzata in ogni riga del widget della rotellina di scorrimento.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-12065">This API is provided to allow the application to customize the formatting or other parameters of the string that is displayed on each row of the scroll wheel widget.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-12066">La funzione di callback riceverà come input un puntatore al blocco di controllo della rotellina di scorrimento e il numero di riga visualizzato.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-12066">The callback function will receive as input a pointer to the scroll wheel control block and the row number that is being displayed.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-12067">La funzione deve restituire un puntatore a una stringa di testo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-12067">The function should return a pointer to a text string.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-12068">Parametri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-12068">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-12069">**rotellina** Indirizzo blocco di controllo rotellina di scorrimento stringa</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-12069">**wheel** String scroll wheel control block address</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-12070">**callback** di Puntatore alla funzione di callback</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-12070">**callback** Pointer to callback function</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-12071">Valori restituiti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-12071">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-12072">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) impostazione callback completata</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-12072">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) Successfully set callback</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-12073">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) puntatore non valido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-12073">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-12074">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET**: (0X12) widget non valido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-12074">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET**: (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-12076">Inizializzazione e thread</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-12076">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-12077">Esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-12077">Example</span></span>

```C
GX_TEXT_SCROLL_WHEEL wheel;

GX_CHAR string_buffer[20];

UINT *my_wheel_callback(GX_TEXT_SCROLL_WHEEL *wheel, int row,
    GX_STRING *return_string)
{
    /* Just for an example, return row number as string for rows
    >= 0, and return text “Invalid” otherwise */
    if (row >= 0)
    {
        gx_utility_ltoa(row, string_buffer, 20);
        return_string->gx_string_ptr = string_buffer;
        return_string->gx_string_length = strlen(string_buffer);
    }
    else
    {
        return_string->gx_string_ptr = “Invalid”;
        return_string->gx_string_length = strlen(“Invalid”);
    }

    return GX_SUCCESS;
}

gx_text_scroll_wheel_create(&wheel, “my wheel”, root, 10,
    GX_STYLE_ENABLED|GX_STYLE_TEXT_CENTER|GX_STYLE_TRANSPARENT|
    GX_STYLE_WRAP|ID_MY_WHEEL, &size);

status = gx_text_scroll_wheel_callback_set_ext(&wheel,
    my_wheel_callback);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS, the scroll whell callback function has
been set. */
```

## <a name="gx_text_scroll_wheel_create"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-12094">gx_text_scroll_wheel_create</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-12094">gx_text_scroll_wheel_create</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-12095">Creare una rotellina di scorrimento del testo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-12095">Create a text scroll wheel</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-12096">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-12096">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_text_scroll_wheel_create(
    GX_TEXT_SCROLL_WHEEL *wheel,
    GX_CONST GX_CHAR *name, 
    GX_WIDGET *parent, 
    INT total_rows,
    ULONG style, 
    USHORT Id, 
    GX_CONST GX_RECTANGLE *size);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-12097">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-12097">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-12098">Questo servizio crea una rotellina di scorrimento del testo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-12098">This service creates a text scroll wheel.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-12099">La rotellina di scorrimento del testo è un widget di base per il GX_STRING_SCROLL_WHEEL e GX_NUMERIC_SCROLL_WHEEL i widget di tipo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-12099">The text scroll wheel is a base widget for the GX_STRING_SCROLL_WHEEL and GX_NUMERIC_SCROLL_WHEEL type widgets.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-12100">Questa funzione viene chiamata internamente da gx_string_scroll_wheel_create e gx_numeric_scroll_wheel_create e viene fornita come API separata per praticità per le applicazioni che definiscono un widget della rotellina di scorrimento personalizzata.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-12100">This function is called internally by gx_string_scroll_wheel_create and gx_numeric_scroll_wheel_create, and is provided as a separate API as a convenience for applications that define a custom scroll wheel widget.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-12101">Parametri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-12101">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-12102">**rotellina**: Indirizzo blocco di controllo rotellina di scorrimento testo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-12102">**wheel**: Text scroll wheel control block address</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-12103">**nome**: nome del widget definito dall'applicazione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-12103">**name**: Application defined widget name</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-12104">**padre**: elemento padre della rotellina o GX_NULL</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-12104">**parent**: Wheel parent or GX_NULL</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-12105">**total_rows**: numero totale di righe da presentare all'utente</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-12105">**total_rows**: Total rows to be presented to user</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-12106">**stile**: flag di stile desiderati</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-12106">**style**: Desired style flags</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-12107">**ID**: flag di stile della rotella definiti dall'applicazione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-12107">**Id**: Application defined wheel style flags</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-12108">**dimensioni**: dimensioni della rotellina di scorrimento iniziali</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-12108">**size**: Initial scroll wheel size</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-12109">Valori restituiti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-12109">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-12110">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) creazione della rotellina di scorrimento del testo completata</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-12110">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) Successfully created text scroll wheel</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-12111">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**: (0x11) il chiamante di questa funzione non è valido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-12111">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**: (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-12112">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) puntatore non valido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-12112">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-12113">**GX_ALREADY_CREATED**: il widget (0x13) è già stato creato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-12113">**GX_ALREADY_CREATED**: (0x13) Widget already created</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-12114">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET**: (0X12) widget non valido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-12114">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET**: (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>


### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-12115">Consentito da</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-12115">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-12116">Inizializzazione e thread</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-12116">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-12117">Esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-12117">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Define a custom scroll wheel widget. */
typedef MY_SCROLL_WHEEL_STRUCT
{
    GX_TEXT_SCROLL_WHEEL text_scroll_wheel;

    /* Add custom members here. */

} MY_SCROLL_WHEEL;

MY_SCROLL_WHEEL my_scroll_wheel;

UINT my_scroll_wheel_create(MY_SCROLL_WHEEL *wheel,
    GX_CONST GX_CHAR *name, GX_WIDGET *parent,
    INT total_rows, ULONG style, USHORT Id,
    GX_CONST GX_RECTANGLE *size)
{
    /* Call base creation. */
    status = gx_text_scroll_wheel_create(
        &wheel.text_scroll_wheel,
        ”my_text_scroll_wheel”, GX_NULL, 7,
        GX_STYLE_ENABLED, ID_MY_SCROLL_WHEEL, &size);

    if (status == GX_SUCCESS)
    {
        /* Add custom initialization here. */
        if(parent)
        {
            gx_widget_link(parent, (GX_WIDGET *)wheel);
        }
    }
}
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-12139">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-12139">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-12140">Si tratta della funzione di disegno predefinita per tutti i tipi di rotellina in base GX_TEXT_SCROLL_WHEEL.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-12140">This is the default drawing function for all wheel types based on GX_TEXT_SCROLL_WHEEL.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-12141">Questa funzione può essere sottoposta a override da applicazioni che richiedono la personalizzazione dell'aspetto del disegno della rotellina di scorrimento del testo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-12141">This function can be overridden by applications that require customization of the text scroll wheel drawing appearance.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-12142">GX_STRING_SCROLL_WHEEL e GX_NUMERIC_SCROLL_WHEEL sono entrambi basati su o derivati da GX_TEXT_SCROLL_WHEEL.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-12142">GX_STRING_SCROLL_WHEEL and GX_NUMERIC_SCROLL_WHEEL are both based on or derived from GX_TEXT_SCROLL_WHEEL.</span></span>

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-12169">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-12169">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-12170">Questo servizio elabora un evento per la rotellina di scorrimento del testo specificata.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-12170">This service processes an event for the specified text scroll wheel.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-12171">Questo servizio deve essere chiamato come gestore eventi predefinito da qualsiasi funzione di elaborazione di eventi della rotellina di scorrimento del testo personalizzata.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-12171">This service should be called as the default event handler by any custom text scroll wheel event processing functions.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-12172">Parametri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-12172">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-12174">**event_ptr** Puntatore all'evento da elaborare</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-12174">**event_ptr** Pointer to the event to process</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-12175">Valori restituiti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-12175">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-12176">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) processo di evento rotellina di scorrimento testo riuscito</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-12176">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful text scroll wheel event process</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-12177">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) chiamante non valido di questa funzione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-12177">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-12178">Puntatore a **GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) non valido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-12178">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-12179">Widget **GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) non valido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-12179">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-12180">Consentito da</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-12180">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-12181">Thread</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-12181">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-12182">Esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-12182">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Call generic text scroll wheel event processing as part of custom event processing function. */

UINT custom_text_scroll_wheel_event_process(GX_TEXT_SCROLL_WHEEL *wheel, GX_EVENT *event)
{
    UINT status = GX_SUCCESS;

    switch(event->gx_event_type)
    {
    case xyz:
        /* Insert custom event handling here */
        break;

    default:
        /* Pass all other events to the default text scroll wheel event processing */
        status = gx_text_scroll_wheel_event_process(wheel, event);
        break;
    }
    return status;
}
```

<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-12265">Creare una visualizzazione albero</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-12265">Create a tree view</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-12266">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-12266">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_tree_view_create(
    GX_TREE_VIEW *tree,
    GX_CONST GX_CHAR *name, 
    GX_WIDGET *parent,
    ULONG style, 
    USHORT tree_view_id,
    GX_CONST GX_RECTANGLE *size);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-12267">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-12267">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-12268">Questo servizio crea una visualizzazione albero come specificato e associa la visualizzazione ad albero al widget padre fornito.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-12268">This service creates a tree view as specified and associates the tree view with the supplied parent widget.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-12269">Accetta tutti i tipi di widget come voce di menu figlio.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-12269">It accepts all types of widget as child menu item.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-12270">È consigliabile usare GX_MENU widget tipo come voce di menu figlio.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-12270">It’s recommended to use GX_MENU type widget as its child menu item.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-12271">GX_TREE_VIEW deriva da GX_WINDOW e supporta tutti i servizi API gx_window.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-12271">GX_TREE_VIEW is derived from GX_WINDOW and supports all gx_window API services.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-12272">Parametri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-12272">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-12273">**albero**: puntatore al blocco di controllo visualizzazione albero</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-12273">**tree**: Pointer to tree view control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-12274">**nome**: nome della visualizzazione albero</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-12274">**name**: Name of the tree view</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-12275">**padre**: puntatore al widget padre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-12275">**parent**: Pointer to parent widget</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-12276">**Style**: stile del widget.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-12276">**style**: Style of the widget.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-12277">L' **Appendice D** contiene stili generali predefiniti per tutti i widget e per gli stili specifici dei widget.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-12277">**Appendix D** contains pre-defined general styles for all widgets as well as widget specific styles.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-12278">**menu_id**: ID definito dall'applicazione della visualizzazione albero</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-12278">**menu_id**: Application-defined ID of the tree view</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-12279">**dimensioni**: dimensioni della visualizzazione albero</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-12279">**size**: Size of the tree view</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-12280">Valori restituiti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-12280">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-12281">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) creazione della visualizzazione albero riuscita</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-12281">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) Successful tree view creation</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-12282">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**: (0x11) il chiamante di questa funzione non è valido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-12282">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**: (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-12283">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) puntatore non valido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-12283">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-12284">**GX_ALREADY_CREATED**: il widget (0x13) è già stato creato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-12284">**GX_ALREADY_CREATED**: (0x13) Widget already created</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-12285">**GX_INVALID_SIZE**: (0x19) dimensioni del blocco di controllo widget non valide</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-12285">**GX_INVALID_SIZE**: (0x19) Invalid widget control block size</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-12286">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET**: (0X12) widget non valido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-12286">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET**: (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-12287">Consentito da</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-12287">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-12288">Inizializzazione e thread</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-12288">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-12289">Esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-12289">Example</span></span>

```C
status = gx_tree_view_create(&my_tree_view,
    “my_tree_view”, parent,
    GX_STYLE_ENABLED, MY_TREE_VIEW_ID,
    &size);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the tree view was successfully created. */
```

## <a name="gx_tree_view_draw"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-12304">gx_tree_view_draw</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-12304">gx_tree_view_draw</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-12305">Visualizzazione albero di disegni</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-12305">Draw tree view</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-12306">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-12306">Prototype</span></span>

```C
VOID gx_tree_view_draw(GX_TREE_VIEW *tree);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-12307">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-12307">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-12308">Questo servizio disegna la visualizzazione albero specificata.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-12308">This service draws the specified tree view.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-12309">Questa funzione viene in genere chiamata internamente dal meccanismo di aggiornamento Canvas di GUIX, ma viene esposta all'applicazione per facilitare l'implementazione di funzioni di disegno personalizzate per i widget di visualizzazione ad albero personalizzati.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-12309">This function is normally called internally by the GUIX canvas refresh mechanism, but is exposed to the application to assist with implementing custom drawing functions for custom tree view widgets.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-12310">Parametri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-12310">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-12311">**struttura ad albero** Puntatore al blocco di controllo di visualizzazione albero</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-12311">**tree** Pointer to tree view control block</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-12312">Valori restituiti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-12312">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-12313">**Nessuno**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-12313">**None**</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-12314">Consentito da</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-12314">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-12315">Thread</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-12315">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-12316">Esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-12316">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Write a custom tree view draw function. */
UINT my_tree_view_draw(GX_TREE_VIEW *tree_view)
{
    /* Perform default drawing */
    gx_tree_view_draw(tree_view);

    /* Add custom drawing here */
}
```

## <a name="gx_tree_view_event_process"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-12331">gx_tree_view_event_process</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-12331">gx_tree_view_event_process</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-12332">Evento visualizzazione albero processo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-12332">Process tree view event</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-12333">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-12333">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_tree_view_event_process(
    GX_TREE_VIEW *tree, 
    GX_EVENT event_ptr);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-12334">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-12334">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-12335">Questo servizio elabora un evento per la visualizzazione albero specificata.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-12335">This service processes an event for the specified tree view.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-12336">Questo servizio deve essere chiamato come gestore eventi predefinito da qualsiasi funzione di elaborazione degli eventi di visualizzazione albero personalizzata.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-12336">This service should be called as the default event handler by any custom tree view event processing functions.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-12337">Parametri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-12337">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-12338">**albero**: puntatore al blocco di controllo visualizzazione albero</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-12338">**tree**: Pointer to tree view control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-12339">**event_ptr**: puntatore all'evento da elaborare</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-12339">**event_ptr**: Pointer to the event to process</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-12340">Valori restituiti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-12340">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-12341">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) evento di visualizzazione albero processo riuscito</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-12341">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) Successful process tree view event</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-12342">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**: (0x11) il chiamante di questa funzione non è valido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-12342">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**: (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-12343">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) puntatore non valido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-12343">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-12344">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET**: (0X12) widget non valido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-12344">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET**: (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-12345">Consentito da</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-12345">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-12346">Thread</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-12346">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-12347">Esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-12347">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Call generic tree view event processing as part of custom event
    processing function. */

UINT custom_tree_view_event_process(GX_TREE_VIEW *tree_view,
    GX_EVENT *event)
{
    UINT status = GX_SUCCESS;

    switch(event->gx_event_type)
    {
        case xyz:
            /* Insert custom event handling here */
            break;
        default:
            /* Pass all other events to the default tree view
                event processing */
            status = gx_tree_view_event_process(tree_view, event);
            break;
    }
}
return status;
```

## <a name="gx_tree_view_indentation_set"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-12362">gx_tree_view_indentation_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-12362">gx_tree_view_indentation_set</span></span>

## <a name="gx_utility_canvas_to_bmp"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-12540">gx_utility_canvas_to_bmp</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-12540">gx_utility_canvas_to_bmp</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-12541">Converti memort Canvas in bitmap</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-12541">Convert canvas memort to bitmap</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-12542">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-12542">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_utility_canvas_to_bmp(
    GX_CANVAS *canvas, 
    GX_RECTANGLE *rect,
    UINT (*write_data)(GX_UBYTE *byte_data, UINT data_count));
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-12543">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-12543">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-12544">Questo servizio converte la memoria Canvas in un file bitmap.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-12544">This service converts canvas memory to bitmap file.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-12545">Parametri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-12545">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-12546">**Canvas**: puntatore a blocchi di controllo Canvas</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-12546">**canvas**: Canvas control block pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-12547">**Rect**: rettangolo da convertire</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-12547">**rect**: Rectangle to convert</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-12548">**WRITE_DATA**: puntatore alla funzione di callback in cui scrivere i dati</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-12548">**write_data**: Callback function pointer to write data to</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-12549">Valori restituiti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-12549">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-12550">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) conversione di un valore integer in una stringa completata</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-12550">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) Successfully converted integer value to string</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-12551">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) puntatore al buffer restituito non valido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-12551">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) Invalid return buffer pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-12552">**GX_INVALID_SIZE**: (0x19) dimensioni del buffer restituito non valide</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-12552">**GX_INVALID_SIZE**: (0x19) Invalid return buffer size</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-12553">Consentito da</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-12553">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-12554">Inizializzazione e thread</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-12554">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-12555">Esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-12555">Example</span></span>

```C
FILE *fp = GX_NULL;

/* define call back function of how to write the data read from
canvas memory. */

UINT write_data_callback(GX_UBYTE *byte_data, UINT data_count)
{
    if (fp)
    {
        fwrite(byte_data, 1, data_count, fp);
    }
    return GX_SUCCESS;
}

VOID scroll_wheel_screen_draw(GX_WINDOW *window)
{
    UINT status;

    GX_RECTANGLE size = {31,31,610,450};
    gx_window_draw(window);
    if (screenshot)
    {
        fp = fopen("../screenshot.bmp", "wb");
        /* Convert canvas memory to bitmap format.
           Status GX_SUCCESS means operation succeed. */
        status = gx_utility_canvas_to_bmp(root->gx_window_root_canvas,
            &size, write_data_callback);

        fclose(fp);
    }
}
```

## <a name="gx_utility_circle_point_get"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-12571">gx_utility_circle_point_get</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-12571">gx_utility_circle_point_get</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-12572">Calcola punto in un cerchio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-12572">Calculate point on a circle</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-12573">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-12573">Prototype</span></span>

```C
INT gx_utility_circle_point_get(
    INT xCenter, 
    INT yCenter,
    UINT radius, 
    INT angle, 
    GX_POINT *point);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-12574">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-12574">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-12575">Questo servizio calcola il punto in un cerchio in base al centro del cerchio, al raggio e all'angolo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-12575">This service calculates point on a circle given the circle center, radius, and angle.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-12576">Parametri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-12576">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-12577">**xCenter**: coordinata x del cerchio centrale</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-12577">**xCenter**: x coordinate of circle center</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-12578">**yCenter**: coordinata y del cerchio centrale</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-12578">**yCenter**: y coordinate of circle center</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-12579">**RADIUS**: raggio cerchio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-12579">**radius**: Circle radius</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-12580">**angolo**: angolo in corrispondenza del quale calcolare il punto perimetrale del cerchio, in gradi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-12580">**angle**: Angle at which to calculate circle perimeter point, in degrees</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-12581">**Point**: Indirizzo della variabile GX_POINT in cui archiviare la coordinata x, y calcolata</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-12581">**point**: Address of GX_POINT variable at which to store calculated x,y coordinate</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-12582">**end_alpha**: valore alfa finale</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-12582">**end_alpha**: End alpha value</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-12583">Valori restituiti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-12583">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-12584">**GX_SUCCESS**: è stata creata la sfumatura (0x00)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-12584">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) Gradient was created</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-12585">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) indirizzo del punto di ritorno non valido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-12585">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) Invalid return point address</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-12586">**GX_INVALID_VALUE**: (0x22) parametro RADIUS non valido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-12586">**GX_INVALID_VALUE**: (0x22) Invalid radius parameter</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-12587">Consentito da</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-12587">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-12588">Inizializzazione e thread</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-12588">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-12589">Esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-12589">Example</span></span>

```C
GX_POINT point;
    UINT status;

        status = gx_utility_circle_point_get(100, 100,
20, 45,
&point);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the value of point is the x,y coordinate of a point on the circle perimeter at an angle of 45 degrees, where the circle is centered at (100, 100), has a radius of 20 pixels */

```

## <a name="gx_utility_gradient_create"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-12607">gx_utility_gradient_create</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-12607">gx_utility_gradient_create</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-12608">Creare una sfumatura pixelmap</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-12608">Create a gradient pixelmap</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-12609">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-12609">Prototype</span></span>

```C
INT gx_utility_gradient_create(
    GX_GRADIENT *gradient,
    GX_VALUE width, 
    GX_VALUE height,
    UCHAR type, 
    GX_UBYTE start_alpha, 
    GX_UBYTE end_alpha);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-12610">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-12610">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-12611">Questo servizio crea una sfumatura Pixelmap in fase di esecuzione.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-12611">This service creates a gradient pixelmap at runtime.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-12612">Un'immagine con sfumatura può essere usata per ottenere effetti dissolvenza e altre interessanti modifiche visive.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-12612">A gradient image can be used to accomplish fade effects and other interesting visual changes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-12613">La larghezza e l'altezza della sfumatura richiesta non possono essere inferiori a 2x2 pixel.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-12613">The width and height of the requested gradient can be no less than 2x2 pixels.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-12614">GUIX gestisce internamente un elenco di sfumature create. questa funzione eseguirà innanzitutto la ricerca nell'elenco di sfumature per trovare una sfumatura corrispondente Pixelmap prima di creare un nuovo Pixelmap.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-12614">GUIX internally maintains a list of created gradients, and this function will first search the gradient list to find a matching gradient pixelmap before creating a new pixelmap.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-12615">In altre parole, lo stesso Pixelmap di sfumatura è necessario più volte, viene effettivamente creato un solo Pixelmap e ogni sfumatura che richiede questo Pixelmap condivide il Pixelmap creato.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-12615">In other words,  the same gradient pixelmap is needed multiple times, only one pixelmap is actually created, and each gradient that requires this pixelmap shares the created pixelmap.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-12616">Questa API richiede la definizione della funzione gx_system_memory_allocator per consentire l'allocazione di memoria di Runtime.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-12616">This API requires the gx_system_memory_allocator function be defined to allow runtime memory allocation.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-12617">I flag di tipo sfumatura includono GX_GRADIENT_TYPE_ALPHA e GX_GRADIENT_TYPE_MIRROR.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-12617">The gradient type flags include GX_GRADIENT_TYPE_ALPHA and GX_GRADIENT_TYPE_MIRROR.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-12618">Attualmente sono supportate solo le sfumature di tipo GX_GRADIENT_TYPE_ALPHA, ovvero è necessario impostare questo flag di tipo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-12618">Only  GX_GRADIENT_TYPE_ALPHA type gradients are currently supported (i.e. this type flag must be set).</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-12619">Il flag GX_GRADIENT_TYPE_MORROR è facoltativo e, se impostato, indica alla logica di creazione della sfumatura di creare una sfumatura che cambia da start_alpha a end_alpha e viceversa start_alpha.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-12619">The  GX_GRADIENT_TYPE_MORROR flag is optional, and when set  instructs the gradient creation logic to create a gradient that changes from start_alpha to end_alpha and back to start_alpha.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-12620">In caso contrario, viene creata una sfumatura lineare.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-12620">Otherwise a linear gradient is created.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-12621">Parametri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-12621">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-12622">**Gradient**: puntatore alla struttura del blocco di controllo gradiente</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-12622">**gradient**: Pointer to gradient control block structure</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-12623">**Width**: larghezza Pixelmap richiesta</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-12623">**width**: Requested pixelmap width</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-12624">**Height**: altezza Pixelmap richiesta</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-12624">**height**: Requested pixelmap height</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-12625">**tipo**: tipo di sfumatura richiesto</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-12625">**type**: Requested gradient type</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-12626">**start_alpha**: valore alfa iniziale</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-12626">**start_alpha**: Starting alpha value</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-12627">**end_alpha**: valore alfa finale</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-12627">**end_alpha**: End alpha value</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-12628">Valori restituiti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-12628">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-12629">**GX_SUCCESS**: è stata creata la sfumatura (0x00)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-12629">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) Gradient was created</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-12630">**GX_INVALID_SIZE**: (0x19) la sfumatura non è almeno 2x2 pixel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-12630">**GX_INVALID_SIZE**: (0x19) Gradient is not at least 2x2 pixels</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-12631">**GX_NOT_SUPPORTED**: la sfumatura (0x28) non è di tipo GX_GRADIENT_TYPE_ALPHA</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-12631">**GX_NOT_SUPPORTED**: (0x28) Gradient is not type GX_GRADIENT_TYPE_ALPHA</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-12632">**GX_FAILURE**: (0x10) l'allocatore di memoria non è definito o l'allocazione della memoria non è riuscita</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-12632">**GX_FAILURE**: (0x10) Memory allocator is not defined or memory allocation is failed</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-12633">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**: (0x11) il chiamante di questa funzione non è valido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-12633">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**: (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-12634">Puntatore a sfumatura **GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) non valido<</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-12634">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) Gradient pointer not valid<</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-12635">**GX_INVALID_VALUE**: (0x22) valore di larghezza e altezza non valido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-12635">**GX_INVALID_VALUE**: (0x22) Width and height value not valid</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-12636">Tipo di sfumatura **GX_INVALID_TYPE**: (0x1B) non valido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-12636">**GX_INVALID_TYPE**: (0x1B) Gradient type not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-12637">Consentito da</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-12637">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-12638">Inizializzazione e thread</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-12638">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-12639">Esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-12639">Example</span></span>

```C
GX_GRADIENT gradient;

UINT status;

status = gx_utiity_gradient_create(&gradient, 3, 40,
    GX_GRADIENT_TYPE_ALPHA, 240, 0);

/* If status == GX_SUCCESS the gradient pixelmap has been created */
```

## <a name="gx_utility_gradient_delete"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-12657">gx_utility_gradient_delete</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-12657">gx_utility_gradient_delete</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-12658">Elimina una sfumatura creata in precedenza</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-12658">Delete a previously created gradient</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-12659">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-12659">Prototype</span></span>

```C
INT gx_utility_gradient_delete(GX_GRADIENT *gradient);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-12660">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-12660">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-12661">Questo servizio Elimina una sfumatura creata in precedenza.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-12661">This service deletes a previously created gradient.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-12662">Se il Pixelmap associato a questa sfumatura non viene utilizzato da altre sfumature, verranno eliminati anche i dati di Pixelmap.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-12662">If the pixelmap associated with this gradient is not in use by any other gradients, the pixelmap data will also be deleted.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-12663">Parametri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-12663">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-12664">**gradiente**: puntatore al blocco di controllo gradiente</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-12664">**gradient**: Pointer to gradient control block</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-12665">Valori restituiti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-12665">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-12666">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) la sfumatura è stata eliminata</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-12666">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) Gradient was deleted</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-12667">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**: (0x11) il chiamante di questa funzione non è valido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-12667">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**: (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-12668">Puntatore a sfumatura **GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) non valido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-12668">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) Gradient pointer is not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-12669">Consentito da</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-12669">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-12670">Inizializzazione e thread</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-12670">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-12671">Esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-12671">Example</span></span>

```C
GX_GRADIENT gradient;

UINT status;

/* Delete previously created gradient. */
status = gx_utility_gradient_delete(&gradient);

/* If status == GX_SUCCESS, the gradient has been deleted. */
```

## <a name="gx_utility_ltoa"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-12689">gx_utility_ltoa</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-12689">gx_utility_ltoa</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-12690">Converte un valore long integer in ASCII</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-12690">Convert long integer to ASCII</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-12691">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-12691">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_utility_itoa(
    LONG value, 
    GX_CHAR *return_buffer,
    UINT seturn_buffer_size);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-12692">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-12692">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-12693">Questo servizio converte un valore long integer in una stringa ASCII.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-12693">This service converts a long integer value into an ASCII string.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-12694">Parametri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-12694">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-12695">**valore**: valore long integer da convertire</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-12695">**value**: Long integer value to convert</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-12696">**return_buffer**: buffer di destinazione per stringa ASCII</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-12696">**return_buffer**: Destination buffer for ASCII string</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-12697">**return_buffer_size**: dimensioni del buffer di destinazione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-12697">**return_buffer_size**: Size of destination buffer</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-12698">Valori restituiti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-12698">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-12699">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) conversione di un valore integer in una stringa completata</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-12699">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) Successfully converted integer value to string</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-12700">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) puntatore al buffer restituito non valido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-12700">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) Invalid return buffer pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-12701">**GX_INVALID_SIZE**: (0x19) dimensioni del buffer restituito non valide</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-12701">**GX_INVALID_SIZE**: (0x19) Invalid return buffer size</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-12702">Consentito da</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-12702">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-12703">Tutti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-12703">All</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-12704">Esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-12704">Example</span></span>

```C
INT my_value = 200;

GX_CHAR string_buffer[10];

UINT status;

/* Convert “my_value” into an ASCII string. */
status = gx_utility_ltoa(my_value, string_buffer, 10);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS, “string_buffer” contains the ASCII
representation of “my_value”. */
```

## <a name="gx_utility_math_acos"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-12720">gx_utility_math_acos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-12720">gx_utility_math_acos</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-12721">Coseno dell'arco di calcolo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-12721">Compute arc cosine</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-12722">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-12722">Prototype</span></span>

```C
INT gx_utility_math_acos(GX_FIXED_VAL x);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-12723">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-12723">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-12724">Questo servizio calcola il valore dell'angolo del coseno di arco x.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-12724">This service computes the angle value of the arc cosine x.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-12725">Il valore di input è un tipo di dati a virgola fissa, chiamare GX_FIXED_VAL_MAKE per eseguire la conversione da INT a GX_FIXED_VAL tipo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-12725">The input value is a fixed point data type, call GX_FIXED_VAL_MAKE to convert from INT to GX_FIXED_VAL type.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-12726">Se ad esempio si desidera calcolare il coseno di arco di 0,5, rendere l'input come GX_FIXED_VAL_MAKE (1)/2.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-12726">For example, if you want to calculate the arc cosine of 0.5, make the input as GX_FIXED_VAL_MAKE(1) / 2.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-12727">In 5.4.0 o versioni minori GUIX, il tipo di valore di input di questa funzione è INT e il valore è limitato all'intervallo [-256, 256].</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-12727">In 5.4.0 or lesser version GUIX, the input value type of this function is INT, and the value is limited to the range [-256, 256].</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-12728">L'applicazione deve ridimensionare il valore dall'intervallo [-1, 1] all'intervallo [-256, 256] prima di richiamare questo servizio.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-12728">The application must scale the value from range [-1, 1] to range [-256, 256] before invoke this service.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-12729">Se il progetto con GUIX versione uguale o inferiore a 5.4.0 ha un riferimento a questa API e si vuole aggiornare il progetto con la libreria GUIX più recente.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-12729">If your project with GUIX version equal or lesser than 5.4.0 has reference to this API, and you want to upgrade your project with the latest guix library.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-12730">Sono disponibili due opzioni:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-12730">You have two options.</span></span>

1. <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-12731">Correggere il valore di input della chiamata API per usare GX_FIXED_VAL valore del tipo di dati.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-12731">Fix the input value of this API call to use GX_FIXED_VAL data type value.</span></span>
1. <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-12732">Definire GUIX_5_4_0_COMPATIBILITY.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-12732">Define GUIX_5_4_0_COMPATIBILITY.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-12733">Parametri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-12733">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-12734">**x**: valore il cui coseno di arco è calcolato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-12734">**x**: Value whose arc cosine is computed</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-12735">Valori restituiti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-12735">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-12736">**angolo**: valore dell'angolo del coseno di arco x</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-12736">**angle**: Angle value of arc cosine x</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-12737">Consentito da</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-12737">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-12738">Tutti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-12738">All</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-12739">Esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-12739">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Compute the angle value of arc cosine of “0.5”. */

#if defined(GUIX_5_4_0_COMPATIBILITY)
    x = 256 / 2;
#else
    x = GX_FIXED_VAL_MAKE(1) / 2;
#endif

angle = gx_utility_math_acos(x);

/* “angle” contains the angle value of arc cosine “x”. */
```

## <a name="gx_utility_math_asin"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-12757">gx_utility_math_asin</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-12757">gx_utility_math_asin</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-12758">Calcolo dell'arco seno</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-12758">Compute arc sine</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-12759">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-12759">Prototype</span></span>

```C
INT gx_utility_math_asin(GX_FIXED_VAL x);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-12760">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-12760">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-12761">Questo servizio calcola il valore dell'angolo del seno x dell'arco.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-12761">This service computes the angle value of the arc sine x.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-12762">Il valore di input è un tipo di dati a virgola fissa, chiamare GX_FIXED_VAL_MAKE per eseguire la conversione da INT a GX_FIXED_VAL tipo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-12762">The input value is a fixed point data type, call  GX_FIXED_VAL_MAKE to convert from INT to GX_FIXED_VAL  type.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-12763">Se, ad esempio, si desidera calcolare il peccato di arco di 0,5, rendere l'input come GX_FIXED_VAL_MAKE (1)/2.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-12763">For example, if you want to calculate the arc sin of 0.5, make the input as GX_FIXED_VAL_MAKE(1) / 2.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-12764">In 5.4.0 o versioni minori GUIX, il tipo di valore di input di questa funzione è INT e il valore è limitato all'intervallo [-256, 256].</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-12764">In 5.4.0 or lesser version GUIX, the input value type of this function is INT, and the value is limited to the range [-256, 256].</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-12765">L'applicazione deve ridimensionare il valore dall'intervallo [-1, 1] all'intervallo [-256, 256] prima di richiamare questo servizio.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-12765">The application must scale the value from range [-1, 1] to range [-256, 256] before invoke this service.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-12766">Se il progetto con GUIX versione uguale o inferiore a 5.4.0 e si vuole aggiornare il progetto con la libreria GUIX più recente.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-12766">If your project with GUIX version equal or lesser than 5.4.0, and you want to upgrade your project with the latest guix library.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-12767">Sono disponibili due opzioni:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-12767">You have two options.</span></span>

1. <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-12768">Correggere il valore di input della chiamata API per usare GX_FIXED_VAL valore del tipo di dati.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-12768">Fix the input value of this API call to use GX_FIXED_VAL data type value.</span></span>
1. <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-12769">Definire GUIX_5_4_0_COMPATIBILITY.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-12769">Define GUIX_5_4_0_COMPATIBILITY.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-12770">Parametri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-12770">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-12771">**x**: valore il cui seno di arco è calcolato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-12771">**x**: Value whose arc sine is computed</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-12772">Valori restituiti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-12772">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-12773">**angolo**: valore dell'angolo di Arc seno x</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-12773">**angle**: Angle value of arc sine x</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-12774">Consentito da</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-12774">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-12775">Tutti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-12775">All</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-12776">Esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-12776">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Compute the angle value of arc sine of “x”. */

#if defined GUIX_5_4_0_COMPATIBILITY
    x = 256 / 2;
#else
    X = GX_FIXED_VAL_MAKE(1) / 2;
#endif

angle = gx_utility_math_asin(x);

/* “angle” contains the angle value of arc sine “x”. */
```
