## <a name="gx_utility_math_cos"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-12794">gx_utility_math_cos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-12794">gx_utility_math_cos</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-12795">Coseno di calcolo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-12795">Compute cosine</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-12796">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-12796">Prototype</span></span>

```C
GX_FIXED_VAL gx_utility_math_cos(GX_FIXED_VAL angle);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-12797">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-12797">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-12798">Questo servizio calcola il coseno dell'angolo fornito.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-12798">This service computes the cosine of the supplied angle.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-12799">Il valore di input è un tipo di dati a virgola fissa, chiamare GX_FIXED_VAL_MAKE per eseguire la conversione da INT a GX_FIXED_VAL.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-12799">The input value is a fixed point data type, call  GX_FIXED_VAL_MAKE to convert from INT to GX_FIXED_VAL.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-12800">Se ad esempio si desidera calcolare il coseno di 90 Degree, immettere input come GX_FIXED_VAL_MAKE (90).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-12800">For example, if you want to calculate the cosine of 90 degree, make input as GX_FIXED_VAL_MAKE(90).</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-12801">Il valore restituito è un tipo di dati a virgola fissa, chiamare GX_FIXED_VAL_TO_INT per eseguire la conversione da GX_FIXED_VAL a INT.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-12801">The return value is a fixed point data type, call  GX_FIXED_VAL_TO_INT to convert from GX_FIXED_VAL to INT.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-12802">In 5.4.0 o versioni minori versione GUIX, il valore di input e il tipo di valore restituito di questo servizio sono INT, il valore di input e il valore restituito sono ingranditi di 256.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-12802">In 5.4.0 or lesser version GUIX version, the input value and return value type of this service is INT, the input value and return value are enlarged by 256.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-12803">Pertanto, l'applicazione deve ridimensionare il valore dell'angolo di 256 prima di richiamare il servizio.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-12803">And therefore, the application must scale the angle value by 256 before invoke this service.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-12804">Se il progetto con GUIX versione uguale o inferiore a 5.4.0 e si vuole aggiornare il progetto con la libreria GUIX più recente, sono disponibili due opzioni.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-12804">If your project with GUIX version equal or lesser than 5.4.0, and you want to upgrade your project with the latest guix library, you have two options.</span></span>

1. <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-12805">Correggere il valore di input e la gestione del valore restituito di questa chiamata API per usare GX_FIXED_VAL valore del tipo di data.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-12805">Fix the input value and the handling to the return value of this API call to use GX_FIXED_VAL date type value.</span></span>
1. <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-12806">Definire GUIX_5_4_0_COMPATIBILITY.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-12806">Define GUIX_5_4_0_COMPATIBILITY.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-12807">Parametri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-12807">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-12808">**angolo**: angolo per calcolare il coseno di</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-12808">**angle**: Angle to compute cosine of</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-12809">Valori restituiti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-12809">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-12810">**coseno**: coseno dell'angolo fornito</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-12810">**cosine**: Cosine of supplied angle</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-12811">Consentito da</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-12811">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-12812">Tutti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-12812">All</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-12813">Esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-12813">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Compute cosine of 90 degree. */

INT angle = 90;

#if defined (GUIX_5_4_0_COMPATIBILITY)
    INT scaled_angle = angle << 8;
#else
    GX_FIXED_VAL scaled_angle = GX_FIXED_VAL_MAKE(angle);
#endif

my_angle_cosine = gx_utility_math_cos(scaled_angle);

/* “my_angle_cosine” contains the cosine of “my_angle”. */
```

## <a name="gx_utility_math_sin"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-12831">gx_utility_math_sin</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-12831">gx_utility_math_sin</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-12832">Calcolo seno</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-12832">Compute sine</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-12833">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-12833">Prototype</span></span>

```C
GX_FIXED_VAL gx_utility_math_sin(GX_FIXED_VAL angle);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-12834">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-12834">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-12835">Questo servizio calcola il seno dell'angolo specificato.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-12835">This service computes the sine of the supplied angle.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-12836">Il valore di input è un tipo di dati a virgola fissa, chiamare GX_FIXED_VAL_MAKE per eseguire la conversione da INT a GX_FIXED_VAL.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-12836">The input value is a fixed point data type, call GX_FIXED_VAL_MAKE to convert from INT to GX_FIXED_VAL.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-12837">Se ad esempio si desidera calcolare il seno di 90 Degree, immettere input come GX_FIXED_VAL_MAKE (90).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-12837">For example, if you want to calculate the sine of 90 degree, make input as GX_FIXED_VAL_MAKE(90).</span></span> 

<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-12838">Il valore restituito è un tipo di dati a virgola fissa, chiamare GX_FIXED_VAL_TO_INT per eseguire la conversione da GX_FIXED_VAL a INT.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-12838">The return value is a fixed point data type, call GX_FIXED_VAL_TO_INT to convert from GX_FIXED_VAL to INT.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-12839">In 5.4.0 o versioni minori GUIX, il valore di input e il tipo di valore restituito sono INT, il valore di input e il valore restituito vengono ingranditi di 256.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-12839">In 5.4.0 or lesser version GUIX, the input value and return value type is INT, the input value and return value are enlarged by 256.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-12840">Pertanto, l'applicazione deve ridimensionare il valore dell'angolo di 256 prima di richiamare il servizio.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-12840">And therefore, the application must scale the angle value by 256 before invoke this service.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-12841">Se il progetto con GUIX versione uguale o inferiore a 5.4.0 e si vuole aggiornare il progetto con la libreria GUIX più recente, sono disponibili due opzioni.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-12841">If your project with GUIX version equal or lesser than 5.4.0, and you want to upgrade your project with the latest guix library, you have two options.</span></span>

1. <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-12842">Correggere il valore di input e la mano al valore restituito di questa chiamata API per usare GX_FIXED_VAL valore del tipo di dati.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-12842">Fix the input value and the handing to the return value of this API call to use GX_FIXED_VAL data type value.</span></span>
1. <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-12843">Definire GUIX_5_4_0_COMPATIBILITY.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-12843">Define GUIX_5_4_0_COMPATIBILITY.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-12844">Parametri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-12844">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-12845">**angolo**: angolo del seno di calcolo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-12845">**angle**: Angle to compute sine of</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-12846">Valori restituiti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-12846">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-12847">**seno**: seno dell'angolo fornito</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-12847">**sine**: Sine of supplied angle</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-12848">Consentito da</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-12848">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-12849">Tutti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-12849">All</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-12850">Esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-12850">Example</span></span>

```C
INT my_angle = 80;

/* Compute sine of “my_angle”. */

#if defined(GUIX_5_4_0_COMPATIBILITY)
    INT scaled_angle = my_angle << 8;
#else
    GX_FIXED_VAL = GX_FIXED_VAL_MAKE(my_angle);
#endif

my_angle_sine = gx_utility_math_sin(scaled_angle);

/* “my_angle_sine” contains the sine of “my_angle”. */
```

## <a name="gx_utility_bidi_paragraph_reorder"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-12895">gx_utility_bidi_paragraph_reorder</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-12895">gx_utility_bidi_paragraph_reorder</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-12896">Riordina il testo BiDi nell'ordine di visualizzazione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-12896">Reorder BiDi text into its display order</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-12897">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-12897">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_utility_bidi_paragraph_reorder(GX_BIDI_TEXT_INFO *input_info, 
                                       GX_BIDI_RESOLVED_TEXT_INFO **resolved_info_head)
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-12898">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-12898">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-12899">Questo servizio riordina il testo BiDi nell'ordine di visualizzazione.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-12899">This service reorders BiDi text into its display order.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-12900">Se vengono specificati il tipo di carattere e la larghezza di visualizzazione del testo, viene applicata prima l'interruzioni di riga. il processo di riordinamento verrà applicato in base a ogni riga.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-12900">If text draw font and display width are provided, line breaking will be applied first, reordering process will be applied based on each line.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-12901">Se il testo specificato contiene più di un paragrafo, il servizio suddividerà il testo in paragrafi, il risultato di interruzioni di riga e riordino di ogni paragrafo verrà collegato come elenco.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-12901">If the provided text contains more than one paragraph, the service will break the text into paragraphs, the line breaking and reordering result of each paragraph will be linked as a list.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-12902">Parametri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-12902">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-12903">**input_info**: puntatore alle informazioni per le interruzioni di riga e il riordino del testo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-12903">**input_info**: Pointer to the information for line breaking and text reordering</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-12904">**resolved_info_head**: puntatore all'elenco collegato che contiene i risultati di interruzioni di riga e riordino di ogni paragrafo del testo fornito</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-12904">**resolved_info_head**: Pointer to the linked list that contains line breaking and reordering results of each paragraph of the the provided text</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-12905">Valori restituiti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-12905">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-12906">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) riordino del testo bidi completato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-12906">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) Successful bidi text reorder</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-12907">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) puntatori di input non validi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-12907">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) Invalid input pointers</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-12908">**GX_SYSTEM_MEMORY_ERROR**: (0x30) l'allocatore di memoria non è definito o l'allocazione della memoria non è riuscita</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-12908">**GX_SYSTEM_MEMORY_ERROR**: (0x30) Memory allocator is not defined or memory allocation is failed</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-12909">Consentito da</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-12909">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-12910">Tutti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-12910">All</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-12911">Esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-12911">Example</span></span>
#### <a name="draw-single-line-bidi-text-to-canvas"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-12912">Disegna il testo bidi a riga singola nell'area di disegno</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-12912">Draw single line bidi text to canvas</span></span>
```C
VOID custom_widget_draw(GX_WIDGET *widget)
{
    GX_BIDI_TEXT_INFO input_info;
    GX_BIDI_RESOLVED_TEXT_INFO *resolved_info;
    GX_CHAR bidi_text[] = "Single Line String";
    
    input_info.gx_bidi_text_info_text.gx_string_ptr = bidi_text;
    input_info.gx_bidi_text_info_text.gx_string_length = sizeof(bidi_text) - 1;
    input_info.gx_bidi_text_info_font = GX_NULL;
    input_info.gx_bidi_text_info_display_width = -1;
    
    /* Reordering BiDi text. */
    status = gx_utility_bidi_paragraph_reorder(&input_info, &resolved_info);
    
    if(status == GX_SUCCESS)
    {
        /* Draw reordered bidi text to canvas. */
        gx_canvas_text_draw_ext(widget->gx_widget_size.gx_rectangle_left,
                                widget->gx_widget_size.gx_rectangle_top,
                                resolved_info.gx_bidi_resolved_text_info_text);

        /* Delete resolved information list. */
        gx_utility_bidi_resolved_text_info_delete(&resolved_info);
    }
}
```
#### <a name="draw-multi-line-bidi-text-to-canvas"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-12913">Disegna il testo bidi a più righe nell'area di disegno</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-12913">Draw multi line bidi text to canvas</span></span>
```C
VOID custom_widget_draw(GX_WIDGET *widget)
{
    GX_BIDI_TEXT_INFO input_info;
    GX_BIDI_RESOLVED_TEXT_INFO *resolved_info;
    GX_CHAR bidi_text[] = "Multi Line BiDi Text Display Example";
    GX_FONT *font;
    GX_RECTANGLE client;
    GX_VALUE display_width;
    INT index;
    GX_VALUE xpos;
    GX_VALUE ypos;
    
    /* Pickup the font. */
    gx_context_font_get(font_id, &font);
    gx_widget_client_get(widget, 2, &client);
    
    display_width = (GX_VALUE)(client.gx_rectangle_right - client.gx_rectangle_left + 1);
    
    input_info.gx_bidi_text_info_text.gx_string_ptr = bidi_text;
    input_info.gx_bidi_text_info_text.gx_string_length = sizeof(bidi_text) - 1;
    input_info.gx_bidi_text_info_font = font;
    input_info.gx_bidi_text_info_display_width = display_width;
    
    /* Reordering BiDi text. */
    status = gx_utility_bidi_paragraph_reorder(&input_info, &resolved_info);
    
    if(status == GX_SUCCESS)
    {
        xpos = client.gx_rectangle_left;
        ypos = client.gx_rectangle_top;
        
        /* Draw reordered bidi text to canvas. */
        for(index = 0; index < resolved_info.gx_bidi_resolved_text_info_total_lines; index++)
        {
            gx_canvas_text_draw_ext(xpos, ypos, &resolved_info.gx_bidi_resolved_text_info_text[index]);
        
            ypos += font->gx_font_line_height;
        }
        
        /* Delete resolved information list. */
        gx_utility_bidi_resolved_text_info_delete(&resolved_info);
    }
}
```

#### <a name="draw-multi-paragraph-bidi-text-to-canvas"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-12914">Disegna il testo bidi con più paragrafi nell'area di disegno</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-12914">Draw multi paragraph bidi text to canvas</span></span>
```C
VOID custom_widget_draw(GX_WIDGET *widget)
{
    GX_BIDI_TEXT_INFO input_info;
    GX_BIDI_RESOLVED_TEXT_INFO *resolved_info;
    GX_BIDI_RESOLVED_TEXT_INFO *next;
    GX_CHAR bidi_text[] = "Multi Paragraph\r BiDi Text Display Example";
    GX_FONT *font;
    GX_RECTANGLE client;
    GX_VALUE display_width;
    INT index;
    GX_VALUE xpos;
    GX_VALUE ypos;
    
    /* Pickup the font. */
    gx_context_font_get(font_id, &font);
    gx_widget_client_get(widget, 2, &client);
    
    display_width = (GX_VALUE)(client.gx_rectangle_right - client.gx_rectangle_left + 1);
    
    
    input_info.gx_bidi_text_info_text.gx_string_ptr = bidi_text;
    input_info.gx_bidi_text_info_text.gx_string_length = sizeof(bidi_text) - 1;
    input_info.gx_bidi_text_info_font = font;
    input_info.gx_bidi_text_info_display_width = display_width;
    
    /* Reordering BiDi text. */
    status = gx_utility_bidi_paragraph_reorder(&input_info, &resolved_info);
    
    if(status == GX_SUCCESS)
    {
        xpos = client.gx_rectangle_left;
        ypos = client.gx_rectangle_top;
        
        next = resolved_info;
        
        /* Draw reordered bidi text to canvas. */
        while(next)
        {
            for(index = 0; index < next.gx_bidi_resolved_text_info_total_lines; index++)
            {
                gx_canvas_text_draw_ext(xpos, ypos, &next.gx_bidi_resolved_text_info_text[index]);
            
                ypos += font->gx_font_line_height;
            }
            
            next = next->gx_bidi_resolved_text_info_next;
        }
        
        /* Delete resolved information list. */
        gx_utility_bidi_resolved_text_info_delete(&resolved_info);
    }
}
```

## <a name="gx_utility_bidi_resolved_text_info_delete"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-12917">gx_utility_bidi_resolved_text_info_delete</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-12917">gx_utility_bidi_resolved_text_info_delete</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-12918">Elimina elenco informazioni testo BiDi risolto</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-12918">Delete resolved BiDi text info list</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-12919">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-12919">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_utility_bidi_resolved_text_info_delete(GX_BIDI_RESOLVED_TEXT_INFO **resolved_info_head)
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-12920">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-12920">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-12921">Questo servizio Elimina l'elenco di informazioni risolte restituito da gx_utility_bidi_paragraph_reorder.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-12921">This service deletes resolved information list that returned by gx_utility_bidi_paragraph_reorder.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-12922">Parametri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-12922">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-12923">**resolved_info_head**: puntatore all'elenco di informazioni del testo bidi risolto</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-12923">**resolved_info_head**: Pointer to the resolved BiDi text information list</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-12924">Valori restituiti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-12924">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-12925">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) eliminazione del testo risolto riuscita</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-12925">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) Successful resolved text delete</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-12926">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) puntatori di input non validi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-12926">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) Invalid input pointers</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-12927">**GX_SYSTEM_MEMORY_ERROR**: (0x30) l'allocatore di memoria non è definito o l'allocazione della memoria non è riuscita</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-12927">**GX_SYSTEM_MEMORY_ERROR**: (0x30) Memory allocator is not defined or memory allocation is failed</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-12928">Consentito da</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-12928">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-12929">Tutti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-12929">All</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-12930">Esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-12930">Example</span></span>
```C
VOID custom_widget_draw(GX_WIDGET *widget)
{
    GX_BIDI_TEXT_INFO input_info;
    GX_BIDI_RESOLVED_TEXT_INFO *resolved_info;
    GX_CHAR bidi_text[] = "Single Line String";
    
    input_info.gx_bidi_text_info_text.gx_string_ptr = bidi_text;
    input_info.gx_bidi_text_info_text.gx_string_length = sizeof(bidi_text) - 1;
    input_info.gx_bidi_text_info_font = GX_NULL;
    input_info.gx_bidi_text_info_display_width = -1;
    
    /* Reordering BiDi text. */
    status = gx_utility_bidi_paragraph_reorder(&input_info, &resolved_info);
    
    if(status == GX_SUCCESS)
    {
        /* Draw reordered bidi text to canvas. */
        gx_canvas_text_draw_ext(widget->gx_widget_size.gx_rectangle_left,
                                widget->gx_widget_size.gx_rectangle_top,
                                resolved_info.gx_bidi_resolved_text_info_text);

        /* Delete resolved information list. */
        gx_utility_bidi_resolved_text_info_delete(&resolved_info);
    }
}
```

## <a name="gx_utility_pixelmap_resize"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-12933">gx_utility_pixelmap_resize</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-12933">gx_utility_pixelmap_resize</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-12934">Ridimensionare pixelmap</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-12934">Resize pixelmap</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-12935">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-12935">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_utility_pixelmap_resize(
    GX_PIXELMAP *src,
    GX_PIXELMAP *destination, 
    INT width, 
    INT height);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-12936">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-12936">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-12937">Questo servizio ridimensiona un Pixelmap e restituisce un puntatore a un nuovo Pixelmap, che è il risultato del ridimensionamento del Pixelmap.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-12937">This service resizes a pixelmap and returns a pointer to a new pixelmap, which is the result of the pixelmap resize.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-12938">Questo servizio richiede l'uso precedente di gx_system_memory_allocator_set, per consentire l'allocazione della memoria per conservare i dati Pixelmap ridimensionati.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-12938">This service requires the prior use of gx_system_memory_allocator_set, to allow allocation of memory to hold the resized pixelmap data.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-12939">Parametri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-12939">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-12940">**src**: puntatore a Pixelmap da ridimensionare</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-12940">**src**: Pointer to the pixelmap to resize</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-12941">**destinazione**: buffer di destinazione per il Pixelmap risultante</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-12941">**destination**: Destination buffer for the resulting pixelmap</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-12942">**Width**: larghezza del Pixelmap risultante, in pixel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-12942">**width**: Width of the resulting pixelmap, in pixels</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-12943">**Height**: altezza del Pixelmap risultante, in pixel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-12943">**height**: Hieght of the resulting pixelmap, in pixels</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-12944">Valori restituiti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-12944">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-12945">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) ridimensionamento Pixelmap riuscito</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-12945">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) Successful pixelmap resize</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-12946">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) puntatore Pixelmap di origine o di destinazione non valido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-12946">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) Invalid source or destination pixelmap pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-12947">**GX_INVALID_VALUE**: (0x22) valore di larghezza o altezza non valido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-12947">**GX_INVALID_VALUE**: (0x22) Width or height value not valid</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-12948">**GX_NOT_SUPPORTED**: (0X28) source Pixelmap è formato compresso</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-12948">**GX_NOT_SUPPORTED**: (0x28) Source pixelmap is compressed format</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-12949">**GX_SYSTEM_MEMORY_ERROR**: (0x30) l'allocatore di memoria non è definito o l'allocazione della memoria non è riuscita</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-12949">**GX_SYSTEM_MEMORY_ERROR**: (0x30) Memory allocator is not defined or memory allocation is failed</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-12950">Consentito da</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-12950">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-12951">Tutti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-12951">All</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-12952">Esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-12952">Example</span></span>

```C
GX_PIXLEMAP *des_pixelmap;

/* Resize “src_pixelmap” with specifiy width and height. */
status = gx_utility_pixelmap_resize(src_pixelmap,
    &des_pixelmap, 100, 200);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS. “des_pixelmap” successfully load the
resulting pixelmap of resize. */
```

## <a name="gx_utility_pixelmap_rotate"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-12969">gx_utility_pixelmap_rotate</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-12969">gx_utility_pixelmap_rotate</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-12970">Ruotare pixelmap</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-12970">Rotate pixelmap</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-12971">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-12971">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_utility_pixelmap_rotate(
    GX_PIXELMAP *src, INT angle,
    GX_PIXELMAP *destination,
    UINT *rot_cx, 
    UINT *rot_cy);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-12972">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-12972">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-12973">Questo servizio ruota un Pixelmap e restituisce un puntatore a un nuovo Pixelmap, che è il risultato della rotazione Pixelmap.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-12973">This service rotates a pixelmap and returns a pointer to a new pixelmap, which is the result of the pixelmap rotation.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-12974">Per ruotare un Pixelmap direttamente nell'area di disegno, usare gx_canvas_pixelmap_rotate ().</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-12974">To rotate a pixelmap directly to the canvas, use gx_canvas_pixelmap_rotate().</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-12975">Questo servizio richiede l'uso precedente di gx_system_memory_allocator_set, per consentire l'allocazione della memoria in modo da conservare i dati Pixelmap ruotati.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-12975">This service requires the prior use of gx_system_memory_allocator_set, to allow allocation of memory to hold the rotated pixelmap data.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-12976">Parametri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-12976">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-12977">**src**: Pixelmap da ruotare</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-12977">**src**: The pixelmap to rotate</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-12978">**angolo**: angolo di rotazione in gradi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-12978">**angle**: Angle of rotation in degrees</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-12979">**destinazione**: buffer di destinazione per il Pixelmap risultante</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-12979">**destination**: Destination buffer for the resulting pixelmap</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-12980">**rot_cx**: è stata recuperata la coordinata x del centro di rotazione rispetto alla Pixelmap di destinazione.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-12980">**rot_cx**: Retrieved x coordinate of rotation center with respect to destination pixelmap.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-12981">Deve essere avviato con la coordinata x del centro di rotazione rispetto all'origine Pixelmap.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-12981">Should be initiated with the x coordinate of rotation center with respect to source pixelmap.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-12982">Se rot_cx è GX_NULL, il valore non verrà recuperato.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-12982">If rot_cx is GX_NULL, value will not be retrieved.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-12983">**rot_cy**: la coordinata y del centro di rotazione è stata recuperata rispetto alla Pixelmap di destinazione.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-12983">**rot_cy**: Retrieved y coordinate of rotation center with respect to destination pixelmap.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-12984">Deve essere avviato con la coordinata y del centro di rotazione rispetto all'origine Pixelmap.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-12984">Should be initiated with the y coordinate of rotation center with respect to source pixelmap.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-12985">Se rot_cy è GX_NULL, il valore non verrà recuperato.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-12985">If rot_cy is GX_NULL, value will not be retrieved.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-12986">Valori restituiti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-12986">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-12987">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) rotazione Pixelmap riuscita</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-12987">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) Successful pixelmap rotate</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-12988">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) puntatore Pixelmap di origine o di destinazione non valido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-12988">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) Invalid source or destination pixelmap pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-12989">**GX_INVALID_VALUE**: il valore dell'angolo (0x22) è 0</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-12989">**GX_INVALID_VALUE**: (0x22) Angle value is 0</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-12990">**GX_INVALID_FORMAT**: (0X28) source Pixelmap è formato compresso, che non è supportato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-12990">**GX_INVALID_FORMAT**: (0x28) Source pixelmap is compressed format, which is not supported</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-12991">**GX_SYSTEM_MEMORY_ERROR**: (0x30) l'allocatore di memoria non è definito o l'allocazione della memoria non è riuscita</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-12991">**GX_SYSTEM_MEMORY_ERROR**: (0x30) Memory allocator is not defined or memory allocation is failed</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-12992">Consentito da</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-12992">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-12993">Tutti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-12993">All</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-12994">Esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-12994">Example</span></span>

```C
rot_cx = source_rotate_center_x;
rot_cy = source_rotate_center_y;

/* rotate “src_pixelmap” by 30 degree in clockwise direction. */
status = gx_utility_pixelmap_rotate(src_pixelmap, 30,
    &des_pixelmap, &rot_cx, &rot_cy);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS. “des_pixelmap” successfully load the
resulting pixelmap of rotation. */
```

## <a name="gx_utility_pixelmap_simple_rotate"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-13011">gx_utility_pixelmap_simple_rotate</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-13011">gx_utility_pixelmap_simple_rotate</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-13012">Ruotare pixelmap</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-13012">Rotate pixelmap</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-13013">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-13013">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_utility_pixelmap_simple_rotate(
    GX_PIXELMAP *src,
    INT angle,
    GX_PIXELMAP *destination,
    UINT *rot_cx,
    UINT *rot_cy);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-13014">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-13014">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-13015">Questo servizio ruota un Pixelmap di 90 gradi, 180 Degree o 270 degree.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-13015">This service rotates a pixelmap by 90 degree, 180 degree or 270 degree.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-13016">Parametri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-13016">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-13017">**src**: Pixelmap da ruotare</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-13017">**src**: The pixelmap to rotate</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-13018">**angolo**: angolo di rotazione in gradi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-13018">**angle**: Angle of rotation in degrees</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-13019">**destinazione**: buffer di destinazione per il Pixelmap risultante</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-13019">**destination**: Destination buffer for the resulting pixelmap</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-13020">**rot_cx**: è stata recuperata la coordinata x del centro di rotazione rispetto alla Pixelmap di destinazione.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-13020">**rot_cx**: Retrieved x coordinate of rotation center with respect to destination pixelmap.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-13021">Deve essere avviato con la coordinata x del centro di rotazione rispetto all'origine Pixelmap.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-13021">Should be initiated with the x coordinate of rotation center with respect to source pixelmap.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-13022">Se rot_cx è GX_NULL, il valore non verrà recuperato.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-13022">If rot_cx is GX_NULL, value will not be retrieved.</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-13023">**rot_cy**: la coordinata y del centro di rotazione è stata recuperata rispetto alla Pixelmap di destinazione.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-13023">**rot_cy**: Retrieved y coordinate of rotation center with respect to destination pixelmap.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-13024">Deve essere avviato con la coordinata y del centro di rotazione rispetto all'origine Pixelmap.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-13024">Should be initiated with the y coordinate of rotation center with respect to source pixelmap.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-13025">Se rot_cy è GX_NULL, il valore non verrà recuperato.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-13025">If rot_cy is GX_NULL, value will not be retrieved.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-13026">Valori restituiti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-13026">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-13027">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) rotazione Pixelmap riuscita</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-13027">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) Successful pixelmap rotate</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-13028">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) puntatore Pixelmap di origine o di destinazione non valido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-13028">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) Invalid source or destination pixelmap pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-13029">**GX_INVALID_VALUE**: il valore dell'angolo (0x22) è 0 o non è un angolo semplice, ad esempio 90, 180, 270</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-13029">**GX_INVALID_VALUE**: (0x22) Angle value is 0 or not a simple angle like 90, 180, 270</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-13030">**GX_INVALID_FORMAT**: (0X28) source Pixelmap è formato compresso, che non è supportato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-13030">**GX_INVALID_FORMAT**: (0x28) Source pixelmap is compressed format, which is not supported</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-13031">**GX_SYSTEM_MEMORY_ERROR**: (0x30) l'allocatore di memoria non è definito o l'allocazione della memoria non è riuscita</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-13031">**GX_SYSTEM_MEMORY_ERROR**:  (0x30) Memory allocator is not defined or memory allocation is failed</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-13032">Consentito da</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-13032">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-13033">Tutti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-13033">All</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-13034">Esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-13034">Example</span></span>

```C
rot_cx = source_rotate_center_x;
rot_cy = source_rotate_center_y;

/* rotate “src_pixelmap” by 90 degree in clockwise direction. */
status = gx_utility_pixelmap_simple_rotate(src_pixelmap, 90,
    &des_pixelmap,
    &rot_cx, &rot_cy);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS. “des_pixelmap” successfully load the
resulting pixelmap of rotation. */
```

## <a name="gx_utility_rectangle_center"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-13050">gx_utility_rectangle_center</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-13050">gx_utility_rectangle_center</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-13051">Centra rettangolo all'interno di un altro rettangolo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-13051">Center rectangle within another rectangle</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-13052">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-13052">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_utility_rectangle_center(
    GX_RECTANGLE *rectangle,
    GX_RECTANGLE *within_rectangle);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-13053">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-13053">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-13054">Questo servizio centra il rettangolo all'interno di un altro rettangolo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-13054">This service centers the rectangle within another rectangle.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-13055">Parametri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-13055">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-13056">**rettangolo**: rettangolo al centro</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-13056">**rectangle**: Rectangle to center</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-13057">**within_rectangle**: rettangolo al centro all'interno</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-13057">**within_rectangle**: Rectangle to center within</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-13058">Valori restituiti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-13058">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-13059">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) centrato correttamente il rettangolo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-13059">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) Successfully centered the rectangle</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-13060">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) puntatore al rettangolo di input non valido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-13060">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) Invalid input rectangle pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-13061">**GX_INVALID_SIZE**: (0x19) dimensioni del rettangolo non valide</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-13061">**GX_INVALID_SIZE**: (0x19) Invalid rectangle size</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-13062">Consentito da</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-13062">Allowed From</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-13064">Esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-13064">Example</span></span>

```C
UINT status;

/* Center “my_inner_rectangle” inside of “my_outer_rectangle”.*/
status = gx_utility_rectangle_center(&my_inner_rectangle,
    &my_outer_rectangle);

/* Is status is GX_SUCCESS, “my_inner_rectangle” is centered
within “my_other_rectangle”. */
```

## <a name="gx_utility_rectangle_center_find"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-13080">gx_utility_rectangle_center_find</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-13080">gx_utility_rectangle_center_find</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-13081">Trova il centro del rettangolo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-13081">Find center of rectangle</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-13082">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-13082">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_utility_rectangle_center_find(
    GX_RECTANGLE *rectangle,
    GX_POINT *return_center);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-13083">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-13083">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-13084">Questo servizio trova il centro del rettangolo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-13084">This service finds the center of the rectangle.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-13085">Parametri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-13085">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-13086">**rettangolo**: rettangolo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-13086">**rectangle**: Rectangle</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-13087">**return_center**: puntatore al punto centrale</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-13087">**return_center**: Pointer to center point</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-13088">Valori restituiti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-13088">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-13089">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) ha individuato correttamente il centro del rettangolo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-13089">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) Successfully found the center of the rectangle</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-13090">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) puntatore di input non valido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-13090">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) Invalid input pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-13091">**GX_INVALID_SIZE**: (0x19) dimensioni del rettangolo non valide</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-13091">**GX_INVALID_SIZE**: (0x19) Invalid rectangle size</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-13092">Consentito da</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-13092">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-13093">Inizializzazione e thread</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-13093">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-13094">Esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-13094">Example</span></span>

```C
UINT status;

GX_RECTANGLE my_rectangle;

GX_POINT my_center_point;

gx_utility_define(&my_rectangle, 0, 0, 100, 100);

/* Find center of “my_rectangle””. */

status = gx_utility_rectangle_center_find(&my_rectangle,
    &my_center_point);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS, “my_center_point” is the center point
of “my_rectangle” (50, 50). */
```

## <a name="gx_utility_rectangle_combine"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-13110">gx_utility_rectangle_combine</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-13110">gx_utility_rectangle_combine</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-13111">Combinare due rettangoli nella prima</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-13111">Combine two rectangles into first</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-13112">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-13112">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_utility_rectangle_combine(
    GX_RECTANGLE *first_rectangle,
    GX_RECTANGLE *second_rectangle);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-13113">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-13113">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-13114">Questo servizio combina il primo e il secondo rettangolo nel primo rettangolo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-13114">This service combines the first and second rectangle into the first rectangle.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-13115">Il primo rettangolo viene espanso per includere il secondo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-13115">The first rectangle is expanded to include the second.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-13116">Parametri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-13116">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-13117">**first_rectangle**: primo rettangolo e rettangolo combinato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-13117">**first_rectangle**: First rectangle and combined rectangle</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-13118">**second_rectangle**: secondo rettangolo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-13118">**second_rectangle**: Second rectangle</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-13119">Valori restituiti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-13119">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-13120">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) la combinazione di due rettangoli è stata completata</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-13120">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) Successfully combined two rectangles</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-13121">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) puntatore di input non valido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-13121">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) Invalid input pointer</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-13122">Consentito da</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-13122">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-13123">Inizializzazione e thread</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-13123">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-13124">Esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-13124">Example</span></span>

```C
UINT status;

GX_RECTANGLE rect_a;

GX_RECTANGLE rect_b;

gx_utility_rectangle_define(&rect_a, 0, 0, 100, 100);
gx_utility_rectangle_define(&rect_b, 50, 50, 200, 200);

/* Combine “my_rectangle_a” to “my_rectangle_b”. */
status = gx_utility_rectangle_combine(&rect_a, &rect_b);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS, “rect_a” is (0, 0, 200, 200) the merger
of the original “rect_a” and “rect_b”. */
```

## <a name="gx_utility_rectangle_compare"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-13140">gx_utility_rectangle_compare</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-13140">gx_utility_rectangle_compare</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-13141">Confrontare due rettangoli</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-13141">Compare two rectangles</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-13142">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-13142">Prototype</span></span>

```C
GX_BOOL gx_utility_rectangle_compare( 
    GX_RECTANGLE *first_rectangle,
    GX_RECTANGLE *second_rectangle);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-13143">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-13143">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-13144">Questo servizio confronta il primo e il secondo rettangolo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-13144">This service compares the first and second rectangle.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-13145">Se sono uguali, viene restituito un valore GX_TRUE.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-13145">If they are equal, a value of GX_TRUE is returned.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-13146">Parametri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-13146">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-13147">**first_rectangle**: primo rettangolo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-13147">**first_rectangle**: First rectangle</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-13148">**second_rectangle**: secondo rettangolo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-13148">**second_rectangle**: Second rectangle</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-13149">Valori restituiti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-13149">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-13150">**risultato**: GX_TRUE se i rettangoli sono uguali; in caso contrario, viene restituito GX_FALSE.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-13150">**result**: GX_TRUE if rectangles are equal, otherwise GX_FALSE is returned.</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-13151">Consentito da</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-13151">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-13152">Inizializzazione e thread</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-13152">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-13153">Esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-13153">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Compare “my_rectangle_a” to “my_rectangle_b”. */
result = gx_utility_rectangle_compare(&my_rectangle_a,
    &my_rectangle_b);

/* If result is GX_TRUE, the two rectangles are equal. */
```

## <a name="gx_utility_rectangle_define"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-13169">gx_utility_rectangle_define</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-13169">gx_utility_rectangle_define</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-13170">Definire un rettangolo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-13170">Define a rectangle</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-13171">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-13171">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_utility_rectangle_define(
    GX_RECTANGLE *rectangle,
    GX_VALUE left,
    GX_VALUE top, 
    GX_VALUE right, 
    GX_VALUE bottom);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-13172">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-13172">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-13173">Questo servizio definisce un rettangolo come specificato.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-13173">This service defines a rectangle as specified.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-13174">Parametri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-13174">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-13175">**rettangolo**: blocco di controllo Rectangle</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-13175">**rectangle**: Rectangle control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-13176">**Left**: più coordinata sinistra</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-13176">**left**: Left most coordinate</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-13177">**Top**: coordinata superiore</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-13177">**top**: Top most coordinate</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-13178">**right**: destra più coordinata</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-13178">**right**: Right most coordinate</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-13179">in **basso**: coordinata inferiore</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-13179">**bottom**: Bottom most coordinate</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-13180">Valori restituiti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-13180">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-13181">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) ha definito correttamente un rettangolo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-13181">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) Successfully defined a rectangle</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-13182">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) puntatore al rettangolo non valido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-13182">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) Invalid rectangle pointer</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-13183">Consentito da</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-13183">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-13184">Tutti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-13184">All</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-13185">Esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-13185">Example</span></span>

```C
UINT status;

GX_RECTANGLE my_rect;

/* Define “my_rect”. */

status = gx_utility_rectangle_define(&my_rect, 10, 5, 200, 100);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS, “my_rect” is defined. */
```

## <a name="gx_utility_rectangle_overlap_detect"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-13201">gx_utility_rectangle_overlap_detect</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-13201">gx_utility_rectangle_overlap_detect</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-13202">Rileva sovrapposizione di rettangoli</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-13202">Detect overlap of rectangles</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-13203">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-13203">Prototype</span></span>

```C
GX_BOOL gx_utility_rectangle_overlap_detect(
    GX_RECTANGLE *first_rectangle,
    GX_RECTANGLE *second_rectangle,
    GX_RECTANGLE *return_overlap_area);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-13204">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-13204">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-13205">Questo servizio rileva eventuali sovrapposizioni dei rettangoli forniti.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-13205">This service detects any overlap of the supplied rectangles.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-13206">Se viene trovata una sovrapposizione, il servizio restituisce GX_TRUE e il rettangolo sovrapposto.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-13206">If overlap is found, the service returns GX_TRUE and the overlapping rectangle.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-13207">Parametri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-13207">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-13208">**first_rectangle**: primo rettangolo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-13208">**first_rectangle**: First rectangle</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-13209">**second_rectangle**: secondo rettangolo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-13209">**second_rectangle**: Second rectangle</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-13210">**return_overlap_area**: area rettangolare sovrapposta</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-13210">**return_overlap_area**: Overlapping rectangle area</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-13211">Valori restituiti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-13211">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-13212">**risultato**: GX_TRUE se i rettangoli si sovrappongono. in caso contrario, GX_FALSE.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-13212">**result**: GX_TRUE if rectangles overlap, otherwise GX_FALSE.</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-13213">Consentito da</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-13213">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-13214">Tutti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-13214">All</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-13215">Esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-13215">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Detect overlap of “my_rectangle_a” and “my_rectangle_b”. */
result = gx_utility_rectangle_overlap_detect(&my_rectangle_a,
    &my_rectangle_b,
    &my_overlap_area);

/* If result is GX_TRUE, “my_overlap_area” specifies the area the
rectangles overlap. */
```

## <a name="gx_utility_rectangle_point_detect"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-13231">gx_utility_rectangle_point_detect</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-13231">gx_utility_rectangle_point_detect</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-13232">Rileva se il punto si trova nel rettangolo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-13232">Detect if point resides in rectangle</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-13233">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-13233">Prototype</span></span>

```C
GX_BOOL gx_utility_rectangle_point_detect(
    GX_RECTANGLE *rectangle,
    GX_POINT point);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-13234">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-13234">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-13235">Questo servizio rileva se il punto specificato risiede nel rettangolo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-13235">This service detects if the specified point resides in the rectangle.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-13236">Se il punto si trova nel rettangolo, il servizio restituisce GX_TRUE.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-13236">If the point does reside in the rectangle, the service returns  GX_TRUE.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-13237">Parametri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-13237">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-13238">**rettangolo**: rettangolo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-13238">**rectangle**: Rectangle</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-13239">**punto**: punto</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-13239">**point**: Point</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-13240">Valori restituiti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-13240">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-13241">**risultato**: GX_TRUE se il punto si trova nel rettangolo, in caso contrario GX_FALSE</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-13241">**result**: GX_TRUE if point resides in rectangle, otherwise GX_FALSE</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-13242">Consentito da</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-13242">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-13243">Tutti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-13243">All</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-13244">Esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-13244">Example</span></span>

```c
GX_RECTANGLE my_rectangle;

GX_POINT my_point;

gx_utility_rectangle_define(&my_rectangle, 0, 0, 100, 100);

my_point.gx_point_x = 20; my_point.gx_point_y = 20;

/* Detect if point “my_point” is within “my_rectangle””. */
result = gx_utility_rectangle_point_detect(&my_rectangle,
    &my_point);

/* If result is GX_TRUE, “my_point” resides in the rectangle. */
```

## <a name="gx_utility_rectangle_resize"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-13260">gx_utility_rectangle_resize</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-13260">gx_utility_rectangle_resize</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-13261">Espandi rettangolo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-13261">Grow rectangle</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-13262">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-13262">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_utility_rectangle_resize(
    GX_RECTANGLE *rectangle,
    GX_VALUE adjust);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-13263">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-13263">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-13264">Questo servizio aumenta le dimensioni del rettangolo come specificato.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-13264">This service increases the size of the rectangle as specified.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-13265">Parametri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-13265">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-13266">**rettangolo**: puntatore al rettangolo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-13266">**rectangle**: Pointer to rectangle</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-13267">**Adjust**: Amount per modificare il rettangolo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-13267">**adjust**: Amount to adjust the rectangle</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-13268">Valori restituiti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-13268">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-13269">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) ridimensionato correttamente il rettangolo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-13269">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) Successfully resized the rectangle</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-13270">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) puntatore al rettangolo di input non valido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-13270">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) Invalid input rectangle pointer</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-13271">Consentito da</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-13271">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-13272">Tutti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-13272">All</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-13273">Esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-13273">Example</span></span>

```C
UINT status;

/* Adjust “my_rectangle” by increasing 20 pixels on four sides */
status = gx_utility_rectangle_resize(&my_rectangle, 20);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS, “my_rectangle” is 20 pixels larger. */
```

## <a name="gx_utility_rectangle_shift"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-13289">gx_utility_rectangle_shift</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-13289">gx_utility_rectangle_shift</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-13290">Rettangolo di spostamento</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-13290">Shift rectangle</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-13291">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-13291">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_utility_rectangle_shift(
    GX_RECTANGLE *rectangle,
    GX_VALUE x_shift,
    GX_VALUE y_shift);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-13292">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-13292">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-13293">Questo servizio sposta il rettangolo in base ai valori specificati.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-13293">This service shifts the rectangle by the specified values.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-13294">Parametri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-13294">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-13295">**rettangolo**: rettangolo da spostare</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-13295">**rectangle**: Rectangle to shift</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-13296">**x_shif**: numero di pixel da spostare sull'asse x</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-13296">**x_shif**: Number of pixels to shift on the x-axis</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-13297">**y_shift**: numero di pixel da spostare sull'asse y</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-13297">**y_shift**: Number of pixels to shift on the y-axis</span></span>

## <a name="gx_utility_string_to_alphamap"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-13319">gx_utility_string_to_alphamap</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-13319">gx_utility_string_to_alphamap</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-13320">Eseguire il rendering della stringa in un tipo 8bpp AlphaMap pixelmap (deprecato)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-13320">Render string to an 8bpp alphamap type pixelmap (deprecated)</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-13321">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-13321">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_utility_string_to_alphamap(
    const GX_CHAR *text, const
    GX_FONT *font, 
    GX_PIXELMAP *return_map);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-13322">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-13322">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-13323">Questo servizio è stato deprecato a favore di gx_utility_string_to_alphamap_ext ().</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-13323">This service has been deprecated in favor of gx_utility_string_to_alphamap_ext().</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-13324">Questo servizio esegue il rendering di una stringa di testo in un AlphaMap, che è una forma speciale di 8bpp Pixelmap che contiene solo valori alfa.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-13324">This service renders a text string to an alphamap, which is a special form of 8bpp pixelmap containing only alpha values.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-13325">Questo servizio viene in genere usato insieme a gx_utility_pixelmap_rotate e gx_canvas_pixelmap_draw per creare il testo ruotato nell'area di disegno.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-13325">This service is typically used along with gx_utility_pixelmap_rotate and gx_canvas_pixelmap_draw to draw rotated text to the canvas.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-13326">Questo servizio calcola la dimensione della memoria necessaria per il AlphaMap risultante e richiama la funzione gx_system_memory_allocator () definita dall'applicazione per allocare in modo dinamico la memoria.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-13326">This service calculates the memory size needed for the resulting alphamap, and invokes the gx_system_memory_allocator() function defined by the application to dynamically allocate memory.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-13327">Prima di usare questo servizio, l'applicazione deve chiamare gx_system_memory_allocator_set () in un determinato momento, in genere durante l'avvio del programma.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-13327">The application must call gx_system_memory_allocator_set() at some point, usually during program startup, prior to using this service.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-13328">Se una stringa di testo deve essere ruotata e disegnata nell'area di disegno solo una volta, il servizio gx_canvas_rotated_text_draw () viene fornito come alternativa.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-13328">If a text string is to be rotated and drawn to the canvas just once, the service gx_canvas_rotated_text_draw() is provided as an alternate.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-13329">gx_canvas_rotated_text_draw () chiamerà gx_utility_string_to_alphamap (), gx_utility_pixelmap_rotate () e gx_canvas_pixelmap_draw () per eseguire il rendering del testo ruotato in un'unica operazione.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-13329">gx_canvas_rotated_text_draw() will call gx_utility_string_to_alphamap(), gx_utility_pixelmap_rotate(), and gx_canvas_pixelmap_draw() to render the rotated text in one operation.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-13330">Tuttavia, se lo stesso testo verrà disegnato più volte ruotato a diversi angoli, è più efficiente creare AlphaMap una volta usando l'API gx_utility_string_to_alphmap, quindi ruotare il AlphaMap risultante più volte in base alle esigenze.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-13330">However if the same text will be drawn multiple times rotated at various angles, it is more efficient to create the alphamap once using the gx_utility_string_to_alphmap API, then rotate the resulting alphamap multiple times as needed.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-13331">Parametri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-13331">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-13332">**Text**: stringa di testo di cui eseguire il rendering in AlphaMap</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-13332">**text**: Text string to render to alphamap</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-13333">**font**: tipo di carattere da visualizzare per il rendering del testo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-13333">**font**: The font to be to render the text</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-13334">**return_map**: puntatore al GX_PIXELMAP da restituire al chiamante.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-13334">**return_map**: Pointer to the GX_PIXELMAP to be returned to the caller.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-13335">Valori restituiti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-13335">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-13336">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) il rendering di una stringa di testo in un AlphaMap è riuscito</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-13336">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) Successfully rendered a text string to an alphamap</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-13337">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) puntatore di input non valido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-13337">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) Invalid input pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-13338">**GX_SYSTEM_MEMORY_ERROR**: (0x30) la funzione di allocazione/libera memoria non è definita</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-13338">**GX_SYSTEM_MEMORY_ERROR**: (0x30) Memory allocation/free function is not defined</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-13339">**GX_INVALID_STRING_LENGTH**: (0x34) lunghezza stringa non valida</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-13339">**GX_INVALID_STRING_LENGTH**: (0x34) Invalid string length</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-13340">Consentito da</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-13340">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-13341">Inizializzazione e thread</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-13341">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-13342">Esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-13342">Example</span></span>

```C
GX_PIXELMAP alphamap;

GX_PIXELMAP rotated_text;

INT xpos;

INT ypos;

gx_widget_font_get(widget, GX_FONT_ID_SCREEN_LABEL, &font);

/* render string to alphamap once */

gx_utility_string_to_alphamap("Hello World", font, &alphamap);

/* rotate and render the alphmap at multiple angles */

gx_utility_pixelmap_rotate(&alphamap, 45, &rotated_text,
    &xpos, &ypos);

gx_canvas_pixelmap_draw(10, 10, &rotated_text);

gx_utility_pixelmap_rotate(&alphamap, 135, &rotated_text,
    &xpos, &ypos);

gx_canvas_pixelmap_draw(100, 100, &rotated_text);

gx_utility_pixelmap_rotate(&alphamap, 300, &rotated_text,
    &xpos, &ypos);

gx_canvas_pixelmap_draw(200, 200, &rotated_text);
```

<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-13349">Questo servizio esegue il rendering di una stringa di testo in un AlphaMap, che è una forma speciale di 8bpp Pixelmap che contiene solo valori alfa.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-13349">This service renders a text string to an alphamap, which is a special form of 8bpp pixelmap containing only alpha values.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-13350">Questo servizio viene in genere usato insieme a gx_utility_pixelmap_rotate e gx_canvas_pixelmap_draw per creare il testo ruotato nell'area di disegno.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-13350">This service is typically used along with gx_utility_pixelmap_rotate and gx_canvas_pixelmap_draw to draw rotated text to the canvas.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-13351">Questo servizio calcola la dimensione della memoria necessaria per il AlphaMap risultante e richiama la funzione gx_system_memory_allocator () definita dall'applicazione per allocare in modo dinamico la memoria.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-13351">This service calculates the memory size needed for the resulting alphamap, and invokes the gx_system_memory_allocator() function defined by the application to dynamically allocate memory.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-13352">Prima di usare questo servizio, l'applicazione deve chiamare gx_system_memory_allocator_set () in un determinato momento, in genere durante l'avvio del programma.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-13352">The application must call gx_system_memory_allocator_set() at some point, usually during program startup, prior to using this service.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-13353">Se una stringa di testo deve essere ruotata e disegnata nell'area di disegno solo una volta, il servizio gx_canvas_rotated_text_draw () viene fornito come alternativa.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-13353">If a text string is to be rotated and drawn to the canvas just once, the service gx_canvas_rotated_text_draw() is provided as an alternate.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-13354">gx_canvas_rotated_text_draw () chiamerà gx_utility_string_to_alphamap (), gx_utility_pixelmap_rotate () e gx_canvas_pixelmap_draw () per eseguire il rendering del testo ruotato in un'unica operazione.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-13354">gx_canvas_rotated_text_draw() will call gx_utility_string_to_alphamap(), gx_utility_pixelmap_rotate(), and gx_canvas_pixelmap_draw() to render the rotated text in one operation.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-13355">Tuttavia, se lo stesso testo verrà disegnato più volte ruotato a diversi angoli, è più efficiente creare AlphaMap una volta usando l'API gx_utility_string_to_alphmap, quindi ruotare il AlphaMap risultante più volte in base alle esigenze.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-13355">However if the same text will be drawn multiple times rotated at various angles, it is more efficient to create the alphamap once using the gx_utility_string_to_alphmap API, then rotate the resulting alphamap multiple times as needed.</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-13367">Esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-13367">Example</span></span>

```C
GX_STRING string;

GX_PIXELMAP alphamap;

GX_PIXELMAP rotated_text;

INT xpos;

INT ypos;

gx_widget_font_get(widget, GX_FONT_ID_SCREEN_LABEL, &font);

string.gx_string_ptr = “Hello World”;

string.gx_string_length = strlen(string.gx_string_ptr);

/* render string to alphamap once */
gx_utility_string_to_alphamap_ext(&string, font, &alphamap);

/* rotate and render the alphmap at multiple angles */
gx_utility_pixelmap_rotate(&alphamap, 45, &rotated_text,
    &xpos, &ypos);

gx_canvas_pixelmap_draw(10, 10, &rotated_text);

gx_utility_pixelmap_rotate(&alphamap, 135, &rotated_text,
    &xpos, &ypos);

gx_canvas_pixelmap_draw(100, 100, &rotated_text);

gx_utility_pixelmap_rotate(&alphamap, 300, &rotated_text,
    &xpos, &ypos);

gx_canvas_pixelmap_draw(200, 200, &rotated_text);
```
