## <a name="gx_vertical_list_create"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-13407">gx_vertical_list_create</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-13407">gx_vertical_list_create</span></span>
### <a name="create-vertical-list"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-13408">Crea elenco verticale</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-13408">Create vertical list</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-13409">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-13409">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_vertical_list_create(
    GX_VERTICAL_LIST *vertical_list,
    GX_CONST GX_CHAR *name, 
    GX_WIDGET *parent, 
    INT total_rows,
    VOID (*callback)(GX_VERTICAL_LIST *, GX_WIDGET *, INT),
    ULONG style, USHORT vertical_list_id,
    GX_CONST GX_RECTANGLE *size);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-13410">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-13410">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-13411">Questo servizio crea un elenco verticale.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-13411">This service creates a vertical list.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-13412">GX_VERTICAL_LIST deriva da GX_WINDOW e supporta tutti i servizi API gx_window.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-13412">GX_VERTICAL_LIST is derived from GX_WINDOW and supports all gx_window API services.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-13413">Parametri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-13413">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-13414">**vertical_list** Blocco di controllo widget elenco verticale</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-13414">**vertical_list** Vertical list widget control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-13415">**nome** Nome dell'elenco verticale</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-13415">**name** Name of vertical list</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-13416">**elemento padre** Puntatore al widget padre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-13416">**parent** Pointer to parent widget</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-13417">**total_rows** Numero totale di righe nell'elenco verticale</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-13417">**total_rows** Total number of rows in vertical list</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-13418">**callback** di Funzione che verrà chiamata dall'elenco verticale quando viene eseguito lo scorrimento dell'elenco.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-13418">**callback** A function that will be called by the vertical list when the list is scrolled.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-13419">Il chiamante deve creare inizialmente un numero sufficiente di elementi figlio basati su GX_WIDGET per riempire le righe dell'elenco visibile.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-13419">The caller should initially create enough GX_WIDGET based children to fill the visible list rows.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-13420">Quando si scorre l'elenco, questa funzione viene chiamata per ricreare l'elenco di elementi figlio corrispondenti all'indice dell'elenco fornito</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-13420">As the list is scrolled, this function is called to re-create the list children corresponding to the supplied list index</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-13421">**stile** Stile del widget ScrollBar.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-13421">**style** Style of scrollbar widget.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-13422">L' **Appendice D** contiene stili generali predefiniti per tutti i widget e per gli stili specifici dei widget.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-13422">**Appendix D** contains pre-defined general styles for all widgets as well as widget-specific styles.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-13423">**vertical_list_id** ID dell'elenco verticale definito dall'applicazione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-13423">**vertical_list_id** Application-defined ID of vertical list</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-13424">**dimensioni** Dimensioni dell'elenco verticale</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-13424">**size** Dimensions of vertical list</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-13425">Valori restituiti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-13425">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-13426">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) ha creato correttamente l'elenco verticale</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-13426">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successfully created the vertical list</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-13427">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) chiamante non valido di questa funzione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-13427">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-13428">Puntatore a **GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) non valido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-13428">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-13429">Widget **GX_ALREADY_CREATED** (0x13) già creato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-13429">**GX_ALREADY_CREATED** (0x13) Widget already created</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-13430">**GX_INVALID_SIZE** (0x19) dimensioni del blocco di controllo widget non valide</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-13430">**GX_INVALID_SIZE** (0x19) Invalid widget control block size</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-13431">Numero di righe **GX_INVALID_VALUE** (0x22) non valide</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-13431">**GX_INVALID_VALUE** (0x22) Number of rows not valid</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-13432">Widget **GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) non valido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-13432">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-13433">Consentito da</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-13433">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-13434">Inizializzazione e thread</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-13434">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-13435">Esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-13435">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Create vertical list “my_list” with 20 rows. */
status = gx_vertical_list_create(&my_list, “my_list”, &my_parent,
                    20, callback, GX_STYLE_WRAP, MY_LIST_ID,
                    &size);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the vertical list “my_list” has been created. */
```

```C
UINT gx_vertical_list_selected_index_get(
    GX_VERTICAL_LIST *vertical_list,
    INT *return_index);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-13496">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-13496">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-13497">Questo servizio restituisce l'indice selezionato dell'elenco verticale</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-13497">This service returns the selected index of the vertical list</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-13504">Widget **GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) non valido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-13504">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>

### <a name="assign-the-selected-entry-in-a-vertical-list"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-13517">Assegna la voce selezionata in un elenco verticale</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-13517">Assign the selected entry in a vertical list</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-13518">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-13518">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_vertical_list_selected_set(
    GX_VERTICAL_LIST *vertical_list,
    INT index);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-13519">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-13519">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-13520">Questo servizio assegna la voce selezionata in un elenco verticale.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-13520">This service assigns the selected entry in a vertical list.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-13521">Se necessario, l'elenco verticale scorrerà in modo da rendere visibile la voce selezionata.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-13521">If necessary, the vertical list will scroll to make the selected entry visible.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-13522">Parametri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-13522">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-13523">**vertical_list** Blocco di controllo widget elenco verticale</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-13523">**vertical_list** Vertical list widget control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-13524">**Indice** di Posizione basata sull'indice della nuova voce dell'elenco</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-13524">**index** Index based position of new list entry</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-13525">Valori restituiti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-13525">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-13526">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) ha impostato correttamente la voce dell'elenco verticale</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-13526">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successfully set the vertical list entry</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-13527">Indice di input **GX_FAILURE** (0x10) non trovato nell'elenco</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-13527">**GX_FAILURE** (0x10) Input index not found in list</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-13528">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) chiamante non valido di questa funzione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-13528">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-13529">Puntatore a **GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) non valido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-13529">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-13530">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) o un widget voce elenco non valido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-13530">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Vertical list or list entry widget not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-13531">Consentito da</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-13531">Allowed From</span></span>

```C
/* Set the list entry of “my_list” to the child in line 12. */
status = gx_vertical_list_selected_set(&my_list, 12);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS, the list entry of “my_list” has been successfully set to 12. */
```

## <a name="gx_vertical_list_selected_widget_get"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-13542">gx_vertical_list_selected_widget_get</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-13542">gx_vertical_list_selected_widget_get</span></span>
### <a name="get-selected-widget-from-vertical-list"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-13543">Ottiene il widget selezionato dall'elenco verticale</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-13543">Get selected widget from vertical list</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-13544">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-13544">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_vertical_list_selected_widget_get(
    GX_VERTICAL_LIST *vertical_list,
    GX_WIDGET **return_list_entry);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-13545">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-13545">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-13546">Questo servizio restituisce il widget selezionato dell'elenco verticale.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-13546">This service returns the selected widget of the vertical list.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-13547">Si noti che se l'elenco contiene più righe dei widget figlio e il widget figlio selezionato è stato spostato dalla visualizzazione, questa funzione restituirà GX_NULL come puntatore GX_WIDGET, poiché il widget è stato riutilizzato per visualizzare una nuova voce di elenco.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-13547">Note that if the list contains more rows than child widgets, and the selected child widget has been scrolled from view, this function will return GX_NULL as the GX_WIDGET pointer, since the widget has been reused to display a new list entry.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-13548">Parametri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-13548">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-13549">**vertical_list** Blocco di controllo widget elenco verticale</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-13549">**vertical_list** Vertical list widget control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-13550">**return_list_entry** Destinazione per il widget voce elenco restituito</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-13550">**return_list_entry** Destination for return list entry widget</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-13551">Valori restituiti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-13551">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-13552">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) ottiene correttamente la voce dell'elenco verticale</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-13552">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successfully get the vertical list entry</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-13553">**GX_FAILURE** (0x10) il widget selezionato è stato spostato dalla visualizzazione.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-13553">**GX_FAILURE** (0x10) The selected widget has been scrolled from view.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-13554">Puntatore a **GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) non valido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-13554">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-13555">Widget **GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) non valido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-13555">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-13556">Consentito da</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-13556">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-13557">Inizializzazione e thread</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-13557">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-13558">Esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-13558">Example</span></span>

```C
GX_WIDGET *current_selected_widget;

/* Get the list entry at the current index of vertical list “my_list”. */
status = gx_vertical_list_selected_widget_get(&my_list, &current_selected_widget);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS, “current_list_entry” contains a pointer to the currently selected widget. */
```

## <a name="gx_vertical_list_total_rows_set"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-13567">gx_vertical_list_total_rows_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-13567">gx_vertical_list_total_rows_set</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-13569">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-13569">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_vertical_list_total_rows_set(
    GX_VERTICAL_LIST *vertical_list,
    INT count);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-13570">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-13570">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-13571">Questo servizio assegna o modifica il numero totale di righe dell'elenco.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-13571">This service assigns or changes the total number of list rows.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-13572">Parametri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-13572">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-13573">**vertical_list** Blocco di controllo widget elenco verticale</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-13573">**vertical_list** Vertical list widget control block</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-13576">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) ha impostato correttamente il numero di righe dell'elenco verticale</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-13576">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successfully set the vertical list row count</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-13577">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) chiamante non valido di questa funzione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-13577">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-13578">Puntatore a **GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) non valido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-13578">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-13579">Widget **GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) non valido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-13579">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-13580">Valore del conteggio delle righe **GX_INVALID_VALUE** (0x22) non valido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-13580">**GX_INVALID_VALUE** (0x22) Row count value not valid</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_vertical_scrollbar_create(
    GX_SCROLLBAR *scrollbar,
    GX_CONST GX_CHAR *name, 
    GX_WINDOW *parent,
    GX_SCROLLBAR_APPEARANCE *appearance,
    ULONG style);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-13595">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-13595">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-13596">Questo servizio crea una barra di scorrimento verticale.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-13596">This service creates a vertical scrollbar.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-13597">Parametri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-13597">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-13598">**barra di scorrimento** Blocco di controllo widget ScrollBar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-13598">**scrollbar** Scrollbar widget control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-13599">**nome** Nome della barra di scorrimento</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-13599">**name** Name of scrollbar</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-13600">**elemento padre** Puntatore al widget padre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-13600">**parent** Pointer to parent widget</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-13601">**aspetto** Aspetto del widget barra di scorrimento verticale.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-13601">**appearance** Appearance of vertical scrollbar widget.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-13602">**stile** Stile della barra di scorrimento.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-13602">**style** Style of the scrollbar.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-13603">Valori restituiti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-13603">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-13604">Creazione barra di scorrimento verticale riuscita **GX_SUCCESS** (0x00)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-13604">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful vertical scrollbar create</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-13605">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) chiamante non valido di questa funzione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-13605">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-13606">Puntatore a **GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) non valido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-13606">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-13607">Widget **GX_ALREADY_CREATED** (0x13) già creato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-13607">**GX_ALREADY_CREATED** (0x13) Widget already created</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-13608">**GX_INVALID_SIZE** (0x19) dimensioni del blocco di controllo widget non valide</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-13608">**GX_INVALID_SIZE** (0x19) Invalid widget control block size</span></span>


## <a name="gx_widget_allocate"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-13619">gx_widget_allocate</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-13619">gx_widget_allocate</span></span>
### <a name="allocate-a-widget-control-block"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-13620">Allocare un blocco di controllo widget</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-13620">Allocate a widget control block</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-13621">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-13621">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_widget_allocate(
    GX_WIDGET **control_block,
    ULONG memsize);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-13622">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-13622">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-13623">Questo servizio alloca in modo dinamico un blocco di controllo widget chiamando la funzione di allocazione della memoria definita dall'applicazione.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-13623">This service dynamically allocates a widget control block, by calling the application defined memory allocation function.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-13624">Questo servizio viene usato principalmente dalle funzioni generate da GUIX Studio per allocare in modo dinamico il blocco di controllo quando la proprietà "allocazione dinamica" è selezionata nella vista delle proprietà di GUIX Studio.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-13624">This service is primarily used by the functions generated by GUIX Studio to dynamically allocate control block when the “Dynamic Allocation” property is selected in the GUIX Studio properties view.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-13625">Parametri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-13625">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-13626">**control_block** Puntatore al puntatore del blocco di controllo restituito</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-13626">**control_block** Pointer to returned control block pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-13627">**memsize** Dimensioni del blocco di controllo, in byte</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-13627">**memsize** Control block size, in bytes</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-13628">Valori restituiti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-13628">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-13629">Allocazione widget di **GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) riuscita</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-13629">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful widget allocate</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-13630">L'allocatore di memoria **GX_SYSTEM_MEMORY_ERROR** (0x30) non è definito o l'allocazione della memoria non è riuscita</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-13630">**GX_SYSTEM_MEMORY_ERROR** (0x30) Memory allocator is not defined or memory allocation failed</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-13631">Puntatore a **GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) non valido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-13631">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-13632">Dimensioni della memoria **GX_INVALID_MEMORY_SIZE** (0x29) non valide</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-13632">**GX_INVALID_MEMORY_SIZE** (0x29) Memory size not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-13633">Consentito da</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-13633">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-13634">Inizializzazione e thread</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-13634">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-13635">Esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-13635">Example</span></span>

```C
GX_TEXT_BUTTON *button;

/* Attach “my_widget” to “my_parent”. */
status = gx_widget_allocate(&button, sizeof(GX_TEXT_BUTTON));

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the button widget control block is allocated. */
```

## <a name="gx_widget_attach"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-13673">gx_widget_attach</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-13673">gx_widget_attach</span></span>
### <a name="attach-widget-to-its-parent"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-13674">Connetti il widget al relativo elemento padre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-13674">Attach widget to its parent</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-13675">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-13675">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_widget_attach(
    GX_WIDGET *parent, 
    GX_WIDGET *widget);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-13676">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-13676">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-13677">Questo servizio connette il widget all'elemento padre specificato.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-13677">This service attaches the widget to the specified parent.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-13678">Se il widget è già collegato a un altro elemento padre, viene prima scollegato.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-13678">If the widget is already attached to another parent, it is first detached.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-13679">Se il widget è già associato allo stesso elemento padre, la funzione non esegue alcuna operazione.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-13679">If the widget is already attached to the same parent, the function does nothing.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-13680">Il widget diventa l'elemento figlio di primo livello dell'elemento padre in termini di ordinamento z.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-13680">The widget becomes the front-most child of its parent in terms of z ordering.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-13681">Se i widget di pari livello si sovrappongono, questo widget viene disegnato sopra gli elementi di pari livello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-13681">If sibling widgets overlap, this widget is drawn on top of siblings.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-13682">Per inserire il nuovo widget nella parte posteriore dell'ordine z, usare gx_widget_back_attach o gx_widget_back_move.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-13682">To put the new widget in the back of the z-order, use gx_widget_back_attach or gx_widget_back_move.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-13683">Parametri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-13683">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-13684">**elemento padre** Puntatore al widget padre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-13684">**parent** Pointer to parent widget</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-13685">**widget** di Puntatore al widget figlio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-13685">**widget** Pointer to child widget</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-13686">Valori restituiti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-13686">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-13687">Connessione widget di **GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) riuscita</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-13687">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful widget attach</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-13688">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) chiamante non valido di questa funzione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-13688">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-13689">Puntatore a **GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) non valido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-13689">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-13690">Elemento padre o widget **GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) non valido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-13690">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Parent or widget not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-13691">Consentito da</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-13691">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-13692">Inizializzazione e thread</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-13692">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-13693">Esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-13693">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Attach “my_widget” to “my_parent”. */
status = gx_widget_attach(&my_parent, &my_widget);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the widget “my_widget” is attached to “my_parent”. */
```

## <a name="gx_widget_background_draw"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-13731">gx_widget_background_draw</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-13731">gx_widget_background_draw</span></span>
### <a name="draw-a-widget-background"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-13732">Creare uno sfondo del widget</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-13732">Draw a widget background</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-13733">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-13733">Prototype</span></span>

```C
VOID gx_widget_background_draw(GX_WIDGET *widget);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-13734">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-13734">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-13735">Questo servizio esegue un riempimento a tinta unita dello sfondo di un widget.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-13735">This service performs a solid color fill of a widget background.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-13736">Questo servizio viene chiamato automaticamente dalla funzione gx_widget_draw, ma può anche essere richiamato dall'applicazione come parte di una funzione di disegno widget personalizzata.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-13736">This service is automatically called by the gx_widget_draw function, but may also be invoked by the application as part of a customized widget drawing function.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-13737">Parametri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-13737">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-13738">**widget** di Puntatore al widget da disegnare</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-13738">**widget** Pointer to widget to be drawn</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-13739">Valori restituiti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-13739">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-13740">**Nessuno**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-13740">**None**</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-13741">Consentito da</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-13741">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-13742">Thread</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-13742">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-13743">Esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-13743">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Write a custom widget draw function. */

VOID my_widget_draw(GX_WIDGET * widget)
{
    /* Call default widget background draw. */
    gx_widget_background_draw(widget);

    /* Add your own drawing here. */

    /* Draw child widgets. */
    gx_widget_children_draw(widget);
}
```

## <a name="gx_widget_back_attach"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-13781">gx_widget_back_attach</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-13781">gx_widget_back_attach</span></span>
### <a name="attach-widget-to-its-parent"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-13782">Connetti il widget al relativo elemento padre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-13782">Attach widget to its parent</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-13783">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-13783">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_widget_back_attach(
    GX_WIDGET *parent, 
    GX_WIDGET *widget);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-13784">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-13784">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-13785">Questo servizio connette il widget all'elemento padre specificato.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-13785">This service attaches the widget to the specified parent.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-13786">Se il widget è già collegato a un altro elemento padre, viene prima scollegato.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-13786">If the widget is already attached to another parent, it is first detached.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-13787">Se il widget è già associato allo stesso elemento padre, la funzione non esegue alcuna operazione.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-13787">If the widget is already attached to the same parent, the function does nothing.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-13788">Il widget diventa l'elemento figlio più indietro del padre in termini di ordinamento z.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-13788">The widget becomes the back-most child of its parent in terms of z ordering.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-13789">Se i widget di pari livello si sovrappongono, questo widget viene disegnato dietro gli elementi di pari livello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-13789">If sibling widgets overlap, this widget is drawn behind those siblings.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-13790">Per inserire il nuovo widget nella parte anteriore dell'ordine z, usare gx_widget_attach o gx_widget_front_move.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-13790">To put the new widget in the front of the z-order, use gx_widget_attach or gx_widget_front_move.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-13791">Parametri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-13791">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-13792">**elemento padre** Puntatore al widget padre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-13792">**parent** Pointer to parent widget</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-13793">**widget** di Puntatore al widget figlio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-13793">**widget** Pointer to child widget</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-13794">Valori restituiti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-13794">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-13795">Connessione widget di **GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) riuscita</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-13795">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful widget attach</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-13796">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) chiamante non valido di questa funzione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-13796">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-13797">Puntatore a **GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) non valido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-13797">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-13798">Elemento padre o widget **GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) non valido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-13798">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Parent or widget not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-13799">Consentito da</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-13799">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-13800">Inizializzazione e thread</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-13800">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-13801">Esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-13801">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Attach “my_widget” to “my_parent”. */
status = gx_widget_back_attach(&my_parent, &my_widget);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the widget “my_widget” is attached to “my_parent”. */
```

## <a name="gx_widget_back_move"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-13839">gx_widget_back_move</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-13839">gx_widget_back_move</span></span>
### <a name="move-widget-to-back"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-13840">Sposta il widget sul retro</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-13840">Move widget to back</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-13841">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-13841">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_widget_back_move(
    GX_WIDGET *widget,
    GX_BOOL *return_widget_moved);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-13842">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-13842">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-13843">Questo servizio sposta il widget sul retro nell'ordine Z dell'elemento padre dei widget figlio.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-13843">This service moves the widget to the back in the parent's Z-order of child widgets.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-13844">Parametri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-13844">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-13845">**elemento padre** Puntatore al widget padre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-13845">**parent** Pointer to parent widget</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-13846">**return_widget_moved** Puntatore alla destinazione per il flag che indica che il widget è stato spostato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-13846">**return_widget_moved** Pointer to destination for flag indicating the widget was moved</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-13847">Valori restituiti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-13847">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-13848">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) il widget è riuscito a spostarsi indietro</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-13848">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful widget move to the back</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-13849">Puntatore a **GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) non valido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-13849">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-13850">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) chiamante non valido di questa funzione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-13850">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-13851">**GX_NO_CHANGE** (0x08) non vengono applicate modifiche</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-13851">**GX_NO_CHANGE** (0x08) No changes are applied</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-13852">Widget **GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) non valido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-13852">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-13853">Consentito da</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-13853">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-13854">Inizializzazione e thread</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-13854">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-13855">Esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-13855">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Move “my_widget” to the back. */
status = gx_widget_back_move(&my_widget, &moved_flag);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS and “moved_flag” is GX_TRUE, the widget “my_widget” was moved to the back. */
```

## <a name="gx_widget_block_move"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-13892">gx_widget_block_move</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-13892">gx_widget_block_move</span></span>
### <a name="move-a-rectangular-block-of-pixels"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-13893">Spostare un blocco rettangolare di pixel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-13893">Move a rectangular block of pixels</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-13894">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-13894">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_widget_block_move(
    GX_WIDGET *widget,
    GX_RECTANGLE *block,
    INT xshift, INT yshift);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-13895">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-13895">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-13896">Questo servizio sposta un blocco rettangolare di pixel.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-13896">This service moves a rectangular block of pixels.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-13897">Questo servizio viene usato più spesso per implementare lo scorrimento rapido.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-13897">This service is most often used to implement fast scrolling.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-13898">Parametri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-13898">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-13899">**widget** di Puntatore al widget che richiede lo spostamento del blocco</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-13899">**widget** Pointer to widget requesting block move</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-13900">**blocca** Blocco di delimitazione del rettangolo da spostare</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-13900">**block** Rectangle bounding block to move</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-13901">**xshift** Importo dello spostamento x in pixel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-13901">**xshift** The x shift amount in pixels</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-13902">**yshift** Importo dello spostamento y in pixel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-13902">**yshift** The y shift amount in pixels</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-13903">Valori restituiti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-13903">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-13904">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) il widget è riuscito a spostarsi indietro</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-13904">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful widget move to the back</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-13905">L'area di disegno del widget **GX_INVALID_CANVAS** (0x20) non è stata trovata</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-13905">**GX_INVALID_CANVAS** (0x20) Widget canvas not found</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-13906">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) chiamante non valido di questa funzione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-13906">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-13907">Puntatore a **GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) non valido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-13907">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-13908">Widget **GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) non valido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-13908">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-13909">Consentito da</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-13909">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-13910">Inizializzazione e thread</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-13910">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-13911">Esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-13911">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Move a block of pixels 20 pixels to the right. */
status = gx_widget_block_move(&my_widget, &size, 20, 0);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the block of pixels was moved. */
```

## <a name="gx_widget_border_draw"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-13948">gx_widget_border_draw</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-13948">gx_widget_border_draw</span></span>
### <a name="draw-widget-border"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-13949">Bordo del widget di estrazione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-13949">Draw widget border</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-13950">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-13950">Prototype</span></span>

```C
VOID gx_widget_border_draw(
    GX_WIDGET *widget,
    GX_COLOR border_color,
    GX_COLOR upper_fill, 
    GX_COLOR lower_fill, 
    GX_BOOL fill);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-13951">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-13951">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-13952">Questo servizio disegna il bordo del widget.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-13952">This service draws the widget border.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-13953">Questo servizio viene in genere richiamato come parte di una funzione di disegno widget.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-13953">This service is normally invoked as part of a widget drawing function.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-13954">Questo servizio interpreta i flag di stile del bordo del widget per non creare bordi, un bordo sottile, un bordo sollevato, un bordo incassato o un bordo spesso.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-13954">This service interprets the widget border style flags to draw no border, a thin border, a raised border, a recessed border, or a thick border.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-13955">Parametri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-13955">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-13956">**widget** di Puntatore al widget</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-13956">**widget** Pointer to widget</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-13957">**BORDER_COLOR** Colore del bordo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-13957">**border_color** Color of border.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-13958">**L'Appendice A** contiene colori predefiniti.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-13958">**Appendix A** contains pre-defined colors.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-13959">Si noti che l'applicazione può anche aggiungere colori personalizzati.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-13959">Note that the application may add custom colors as well.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-13960">**upper_fill** Colore del riempimento superiore.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-13960">**upper_fill** Color of upper fill.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-13961">**L'Appendice A** contiene colori predefiniti.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-13961">**Appendix A** contains pre-defined colors.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-13962">Si noti che l'applicazione può anche aggiungere colori personalizzati.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-13962">Note that the application may add custom colors as well.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-13963">**lower_fill** Colore del riempimento inferiore.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-13963">**lower_fill** Color of lower fill.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-13964">**L'Appendice A** contiene colori predefiniti.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-13964">**Appendix A** contains pre-defined colors.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-13965">Si noti che l'applicazione può anche aggiungere colori personalizzati.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-13965">Note that the application may add custom colors as well.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-13966">**riempimento** Questo flag booleano indica se l'area del widget deve essere riempita con i colori di riempimento forniti.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-13966">**fill** This boolean flag indicates whether or not the widget area should be filled with the supplied fill colors.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-13967">Se questo valore è GX_FALSE, viene disegnato solo il bordo del widget.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-13967">If this value is GX_FALSE, only the widget border is drawn.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-13968">Valori restituiti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-13968">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-13969">**Nessuno**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-13969">**None**</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-13970">Consentito da</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-13970">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-13971">Thread</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-13971">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-13972">Esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-13972">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Write a custom widget draw function. */

VOID my_widget_draw(GX_WIDGET * widget)
{
      /* Call widget border draw. */
      gx_widget_border_draw(widget, GX_COLOR_BLACK,
                            GX_COLOR_GREEN, GX_COLOR_BLUE,
                            GX_TRUE);

      /* Add your own drawing here. */

      /* Draw child widgets. */
      Gx_widget_children_draw(widget);
}
```

## <a name="gx_widget_border_style_set"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-14009">gx_widget_border_style_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-14009">gx_widget_border_style_set</span></span>
### <a name="set-widget-border-style"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-14010">Imposta stile bordo widget</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-14010">Set widget border style</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-14011">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-14011">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_widget_border_style_set(
    GX_WIDGET *widget, 
    ULONG style);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-14012">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-14012">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-14013">Questo servizio imposta lo stile del bordo del widget.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-14013">This service sets the widget border style.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-14014">Parametri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-14014">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-14015">**widget** di Puntatore al widget</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-14015">**widget** Pointer to widget</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-14016">**stile** Stile del bordo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-14016">**style** Style of border.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-14017">L' **Appendice D** contiene stili generali predefiniti per tutti i widget e per gli stili specifici dei widget.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-14017">**Appendix D** contains pre-defined general styles for all widgets as well as widget-specific styles.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-14018">Valori restituiti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-14018">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-14019">Set di stili del bordo del widget **GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) riuscito</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-14019">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful widget border style set</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-14020">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) chiamante non valido di questa funzione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-14020">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-14021">Puntatore a **GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) non valido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-14021">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-14022">Widget **GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) non valido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-14022">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-14023">Consentito da</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-14023">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-14024">Inizializzazione e thread</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-14024">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-14025">Esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-14025">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Set border style of “my_widget”. */
status = gx_widget_border_style_set(&my_widget,
                                    GX_STYLE_BORDER_RAISED);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the widget “my_widget” border style has been set. */
```

## <a name="gx_widget_border_width_get"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-14062">gx_widget_border_width_get</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-14062">gx_widget_border_width_get</span></span>
### <a name="get-widget-border-width"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-14063">Ottenere lo spessore del bordo del widget</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-14063">Get widget border width</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-14064">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-14064">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_widget_border_width_get(
    GX_WIDGET *widget,
    GX_VALUE *return_width);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-14065">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-14065">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-14066">Questo servizio ottiene la larghezza del bordo del widget.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-14066">This service gets the widget border width.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-14067">Parametri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-14067">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-14068">**widget** di Puntatore al widget</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-14068">**widget** Pointer to widget</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-14069">**return_width** Puntatore alla destinazione per lo spessore del bordo del widget</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-14069">**return_width** Pointer to destination for widget border width</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-14070">Valori restituiti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-14070">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-14071">Lo spessore del bordo è stato recuperato **GX_SUCCESS** (0x00)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-14071">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successfully retrieved border width</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-14072">Puntatore a **GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) non valido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-14072">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-14073">Widget **GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) non valido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-14073">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-14074">Consentito da</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-14074">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-14075">Inizializzazione e thread</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-14075">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-14076">Esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-14076">Example</span></span>

```C
GX_VALUE my_width;

/* Get border width of “my_widget”. */
status = gx_widget_border_width_get(&my_widget, &my_width);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS, “my_width” contains the border width of the widget “my_widget”. */
```

## <a name="gx_widget_canvas_get"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-14113">gx_widget_canvas_get</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-14113">gx_widget_canvas_get</span></span>
### <a name="get-widget-canvas"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-14114">Ottenere l'area di disegno widget</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-14114">Get widget canvas</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-14115">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-14115">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_widget_canvas_get(
    GX_WIDGET *widget,
    GX_CANVAS **return_canvas)
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-14116">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-14116">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-14117">Questo servizio restituisce un puntatore all'area di disegno sulla quale viene eseguito il rendering del widget.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-14117">This service returns a pointer to the canvas onto which this widget is rendered.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-14118">Parametri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-14118">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-14119">**widget** di Puntatore al widget</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-14119">**widget** Pointer to widget</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-14120">**return_canvas** Puntatore alla destinazione per l'area di disegno del widget</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-14120">**return_canvas** Pointer to destination for widget’s canvas</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-14121">Valori restituiti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-14121">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-14122">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Canvas widget riuscito Get</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-14122">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful widget canvas get</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-14123">L'area di disegno del widget **GX_FAILURE** (0x10) non è stata trovata</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-14123">**GX_FAILURE** (0x10) Widget canvas not found</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-14124">Puntatore a **GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) non valido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-14124">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-14125">Widget **GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) non valido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-14125">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-14126">Consentito da</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-14126">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-14127">Inizializzazione e thread</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-14127">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-14128">Esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-14128">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Get canvas associated with “my_widget”. */
status = gx_widget_canvas_get(&my_widget, &my_canvas);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS, “my_canvas” contains the canvas of the widget “my_widget”. */
```

## <a name="gx_widget_child_detect"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-14166">gx_widget_child_detect</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-14166">gx_widget_child_detect</span></span>
### <a name="detect-widget-child"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-14167">Rileva il widget figlio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-14167">Detect widget child</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-14168">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-14168">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_widget_child_detect(
    GX_WIDGET *parent, 
    GX_WIDGET *child,
    GX_BOOL *return_detect);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-14169">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-14169">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-14170">Questo servizio rileva se il widget è figlio del widget padre.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-14170">This service detects if the widget is a child of the parent widget.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-14171">Questo servizio nidifica in Cerca elementi figlio di elementi figlio e restituisce TRUE se il widget padre è a qualsiasi livello un predecessore del widget figlio.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-14171">This service nests to search children of children, and returns TRUE if the parent widget is at any level an ancestor of the child widget.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-14172">Parametri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-14172">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-14173">**elemento padre** Puntatore al widget padre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-14173">**parent** Pointer to parent widget</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-14174">**figlio** Puntatore al widget figlio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-14174">**child** Pointer to child widget</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-14175">**return_detect** Puntatore alla destinazione per il rilevamento</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-14175">**return_detect** Pointer to destination for detection</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-14176">Valori restituiti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-14176">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-14177">Rilevamento figlio widget riuscito **GX_SUCCESS** (0x00)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-14177">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful widget child detection</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-14178">Puntatore a **GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) non valido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-14178">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-14179">Il widget padre o figlio **GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) non è valido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-14179">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Parent or child widget not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-14180">Consentito da</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-14180">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-14181">Inizializzazione e thread</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-14181">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-14182">Esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-14182">Example</span></span>

```C
GX_BOOL detected;

/* Determine if “my_child” is a child of “my_widget”. */
status = gx_widget_child_detect(&my_widget, &my_child, &detected);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS and “detected” is GX_TRUE, “my_child” is a child of widget “my_widget”. */
```

## <a name="gx_widget_children_draw"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-14219">gx_widget_children_draw</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-14219">gx_widget_children_draw</span></span>
### <a name="draw-widget-children"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-14220">Creare widget figlio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-14220">Draw widget children</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-14221">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-14221">Prototype</span></span>

```C
VOID gx_widget_children_draw(GX_WIDGET *widget);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-14222">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-14222">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-14223">Questo servizio disegna tutti gli elementi figlio del widget padre.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-14223">This service draws all children of the parent widget.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-14224">Questo servizio viene in genere richiamato da tutte le funzioni di disegno di widget standard per disegnare tutti i widget figlio esistenti e deve essere richiamato da qualsiasi funzione di disegno personalizzata per consentire il fissaggio dei widget figlio al tipo di widget padre personalizzato.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-14224">This service is normally invoked by all standard widget drawing functions to draw any existing child widgets, and should be invoked by any custom drawing functions to allow child widgets to be attached to your custom parent widget type.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-14225">Parametri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-14225">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-14226">**widget** di Puntatore al widget</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-14226">**widget** Pointer to widget</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-14227">Valori restituiti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-14227">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-14228">**Nessuno**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-14228">**None**</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-14229">Consentito da</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-14229">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-14230">Thread</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-14230">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-14231">Esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-14231">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Write a custom widget draw function. */

VOID my_widget_draw(GX_WIDGET * widget)
{
        /* Call default widget background draw. */
        gx_widget_background_draw(widget);

        /* Add your own drawing here. */

        /* Draw child widgets. */
        gx_widget_children_draw(widget);
}
```

## <a name="gx_widget_client_get"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-14268">gx_widget_client_get</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-14268">gx_widget_client_get</span></span>
### <a name="get-widget-client-area"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-14269">Ottieni area client widget</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-14269">Get widget client area</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-14270">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-14270">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_widget_client_get(
    GX_WIDGET *widget,
    GX_VALUE border_width,
    GX_RECTANGLE *return_client_area);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-14271">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-14271">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-14272">Questo servizio calcola l'area client del widget sottraendo lo spessore del bordo del widget dalla dimensione complessiva del widget.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-14272">This service computes the client area of widget by subtracting the widget border width from the overall widget size.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-14273">Parametri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-14273">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-14274">**widget** di Puntatore al widget</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-14274">**widget** Pointer to widget</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-14275">**border_width** Larghezza del bordo del widget</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-14275">**border_width** Width of widget border</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-14276">**return_client_area** Destinazione per la restituzione dell'area client</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-14276">**return_client_area** Destination for returning client area</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-14277">Valori restituiti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-14277">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-14278">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) riuscita area client widget Get</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-14278">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful widget client area get</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-14279">Puntatore a **GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) non valido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-14279">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-14280">Widget **GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) non valido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-14280">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-14281">Il bordo del widget **GX_INVALID_VALUE** (0x22) non è valido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-14281">**GX_INVALID_VALUE** (0x22) Widget border not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-14282">Consentito da</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-14282">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-14283">Inizializzazione e thread</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-14283">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-14284">Esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-14284">Example</span></span>

```C
GX_RECTANGLE client_area
/* Get client area of widget “my_widget”. */
status = gx_widget_client_get(&my_widget, my_widget_width,
                              &client_area);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS, the “client_area” is the client area of “my_widget”. */
```

## <a name="gx_widget_color_get"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-14321">gx_widget_color_get</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-14321">gx_widget_color_get</span></span>
### <a name="get-color"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-14322">Ottieni colore</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-14322">Get color</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-14323">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-14323">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_widget_color_get(
    GX_WIDGET *widget,
    GX_RESOURCE_ID resource_id,
    GX_COLOR *return_color);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-14324">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-14324">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-14325">Questo servizio ottiene il colore associato all'ID di risorsa specificato.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-14325">This service gets the color associated with the supplied resource ID.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-14326">Questo servizio deve essere chiamato solo da widget visibili.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-14326">This service should only be called by visible widgets.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-14327">Parametri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-14327">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-14328">**widget** di Puntatore al blocco di controllo widget</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-14328">**widget** Pointer to widget control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-14329">**resource_id** ID risorsa di colore.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-14329">**resource_id** Resource ID of color.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-14330">L' **Appendice B** contiene ID di risorsa colore predefiniti.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-14330">**Appendix B** contains pre-defined color Resource IDs.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-14331">Si noti che l'applicazione può aggiungere anche ID di risorse colore personalizzati.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-14331">Note that the application may add custom color Resource IDs as well.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-14332">**return_color** Puntatore alla destinazione per il colore.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-14332">**return_color** Pointer to destination for color.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-14333">**L'Appendice A** contiene colori predefiniti.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-14333">**Appendix A** contains pre-defined colors.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-14334">Si noti che l'applicazione può anche aggiungere colori personalizzati.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-14334">Note that the application may add custom colors as well.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-14335">Valori restituiti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-14335">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-14336">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) il colore ottenuto è riuscito</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-14336">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful color get</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-14337">ID risorsa non valido **GX_INVALID_RESOURCE_ID** (0x33)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-14337">**GX_INVALID_RESOURCE_ID** (0x33) Invalid resource ID</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-14338">L'area di disegno del widget **GX_INVALID_CANVAS** (0x20) non è valida o il widget è invisibile</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-14338">**GX_INVALID_CANVAS** (0x20) Widget canvas not valid or widget is invisible</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-14339">Puntatore a **GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) non valido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-14339">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-14340">Widget **GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) non valido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-14340">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-14341">Consentito da</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-14341">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-14342">Inizializzazione e thread</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-14342">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-14343">Esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-14343">Example</span></span>

```C
GX_COLOR actual_color;

/* Get color for resource ID MY_FIRST_COLOR_ID. */
status = gx_widget_color_get(my_widget, MY_FIRST_COLOR_RESOURCE_ID,
                            &actual_color);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the actual color is contained in “actual_color”. */
```
