## <a name="gx_widget_create"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-14347">gx_widget_create</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-14347">gx_widget_create</span></span>
### <a name="create-widget"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-14348">Crea widget</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-14348">Create widget</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-14349">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-14349">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_widget_create(
    GX_WIDGET *widget, 
    GX_CONST GX_CHAR *name,
    GX_WIDGET *parent,
    ULONG style, 
    USHORT widget_id,
    GX_CONST GX_RECTANGLE *size);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-14350">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-14350">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-14351">Questo servizio crea un widget.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-14351">This service creates a widget.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-14352">Parametri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-14352">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-14353">**widget** di Puntatore al widget</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-14353">**widget** Pointer to widget</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-14354">**nome** Nome logico del widget</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-14354">**name** Logical name of widget</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-14355">**elemento padre** Puntatore al widget padre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-14355">**parent** Pointer to parent widget</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-14356">**stile** Stile.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-14356">**style** Style.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-14357">L' **Appendice D** contiene stili generali predefiniti per tutti i widget e per gli stili specifici dei widget.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-14357">**Appendix D** contains pre-defined general styles for all widgets as well as widget-specific styles.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-14358">**widget_id** ID del widget definito dall'applicazione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-14358">**widget_id** Application-defined ID of the widget</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-14359">**dimensioni** Dimensioni del widget</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-14359">**size** Size of the widget</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-14360">Valori restituiti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-14360">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-14361">Creazione widget **GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) riuscita</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-14361">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful widget create</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-14362">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) chiamante non valido di questa funzione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-14362">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-14363">Puntatore a **GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) non valido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-14363">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-14364">Widget **GX_ALREADY_CREATED** (0x13) già creato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-14364">**GX_ALREADY_CREATED** (0x13) Widget already created</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-14365">**GX_INVALID_SIZE** (0x19) dimensioni del blocco di controllo widget non valide</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-14365">**GX_INVALID_SIZE** (0x19) Invalid widget control block size</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-14366">Il widget padre **GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) non è valido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-14366">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Parent widget not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-14367">Consentito da</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-14367">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-14368">Inizializzazione e thread</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-14368">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-14369">Esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-14369">Example</span></span>

```C
GX_WIDGET my_widget;
GX_RECTANGLE size;

gx_utility_rectangle_define(&size, 0, 0, 100, 100);

/* Get client area of widget “my_widget”. */
status = gx_widget_create(&my_widget, "my widget",
                          &my_parent_window, GX_STYLE_BORDER_RAISED, MY_WIDGET_ID, &size);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS, the widget “my_widget” has been created. */
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-14409">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-14409">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-14410">Questo servizio esegue un test per determinare se il widget è stato creato in precedenza.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-14410">This service tests to determine if the widget has previously been created.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-14411">Se non vengono rilevati errori, questa funzione restituisce GX_SUCCESS, indipendentemente dal fatto che il widget sia già stato creato o meno.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-14411">If no errors are encountered, this function return GX_SUCCESS, regardless if the widget is created yet or not.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-14412">Il risultato del test si trova nel puntatore return_test.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-14412">The result of the test is in the return_test pointer.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-14415">**return_test** Destinazione per il risultato del test</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-14415">**return_test** Destination for test result</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-14421">Esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-14421">Example</span></span>

```C
GX_BOOL was_created;

/* Test to see if widget “my_widget” is created. */

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS, no error occurred. If “was_created” is
GX_TRUE, the widget “my_widget” has been created. */
```

## <a name="gx_widget_delete"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-14458">gx_widget_delete</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-14458">gx_widget_delete</span></span>
### <a name="delete-widget"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-14459">Elimina widget</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-14459">Delete widget</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-14460">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-14460">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_widget_delete(GX_WIDGET *widget);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-14461">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-14461">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-14462">Questo servizio Elimina il widget.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-14462">This service deletes the widget.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-14463">Se il blocco di controllo widget viene allocato in modo dinamico, il servizio gx_system_memory_free viene richiamato per liberare spazio di archiviazione allocato in modo dinamico.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-14463">If the widget control block is dynamically allocated, the gx_system_memory_free service is invoked to free dynamically allocated storage.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-14464">Parametri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-14464">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-14467">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) esito positivo Delete GX_CALLER_ERROR (0x11) del chiamante non valido di questa funzione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-14467">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful widget delete GX_CALLER_ERROR (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-14468">Puntatore a **GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) non valido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-14468">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-14469">Widget **GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) non valido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-14469">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-14470">La funzione di memoria libera **GX_SYSTEM_MEMORY_ERROR** (0x30) non è definita</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-14470">**GX_SYSTEM_MEMORY_ERROR** (0x30) Memory free function is not defined</span></span>

## <a name="gx_widget_draw"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-14560">gx_widget_draw</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-14560">gx_widget_draw</span></span>
### <a name="draw-widget"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-14561">Widget di estrazione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-14561">Draw widget</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-14562">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-14562">Prototype</span></span>

```C
VOID gx_widget_draw(GX_WIDGET *widget);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-14563">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-14563">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-14564">Questo servizio disegna il widget.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-14564">This service draws the widget.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-14565">Questa funzione viene in genere chiamata internamente dal meccanismo di aggiornamento Canvas di GUIX, ma viene esposta all'applicazione per facilitare l'implementazione di funzioni di disegno personalizzate.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-14565">This function is normally called internally by the GUIX canvas refresh mechanism, but is exposed to the application to assist with implementing custom drawing functions.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-14566">Parametri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-14566">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-14567">**widget** di Puntatore al widget</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-14567">**widget** Pointer to widget</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-14568">Valori restituiti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-14568">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-14569">**Nessuno**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-14569">**None**</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-14570">Consentito da</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-14570">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-14571">Thread</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-14571">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-14572">Esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-14572">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Write a custom widget draw function. */

VOID my_custom_widget_draw(GX_WIDGET *widget)
{
      /* Call default widget draw. */
      gx_widget_draw(widget);

      /* Add your own drawing here. */
}
```

## <a name="gx_widget_draw_set"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-14609">gx_widget_draw_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-14609">gx_widget_draw_set</span></span>
### <a name="assign-the-widget-drawing-function"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-14610">Assegnare la funzione di disegno widget</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-14610">Assign the widget drawing function</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-14611">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-14611">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_widget_draw_set(
    GX_WIDGET *widget,
    VOID (*drawing_function) (GX_WIDGET *));
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-14612">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-14612">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-14613">Questo servizio esegue l'override della funzione di disegno predefinita del widget.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-14613">This service overrides the default drawing function of the widget.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-14614">Parametri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-14614">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-14615">**widget** di Puntatore al widget</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-14615">**widget** Pointer to widget</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-14616">**drawing_function** Puntatore alla funzione di disegno</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-14616">**drawing_function** Pointer to drawing function</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-14617">Valori restituiti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-14617">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-14618">Override della funzione di disegno widget di **GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) riuscita</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-14618">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful widget drawing function override</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-14619">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) chiamante non valido di questa funzione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-14619">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-14620">Puntatore a **GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) non valido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-14620">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-14621">Widget **GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) non valido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-14621">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-14622">Consentito da</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-14622">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-14623">Inizializzazione e thread</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-14623">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-14624">Esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-14624">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Define a custom drawing function. */
VOID my_drawing_function(GX_WIDGET *widget)
{
      /* Add your own drawing here. */
}

/* Set the drawing function of widget “my_widget” to “my_drawing_function”. */
status = gx_widget_draw_set(&my_widget, my_drawing_function);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the widget “my_widget” has the drawning function “my_drawing_function”. */
```

## <a name="gx_widget_event_generate"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-14661">gx_widget_event_generate</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-14661">gx_widget_event_generate</span></span>
### <a name="generate-widget-event"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-14662">Genera evento widget</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-14662">Generate widget event</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-14663">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-14663">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_widget_event_generate(
    GX_WIDGET *widget, 
    USHORT event_type, LONG value);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-14664">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-14664">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-14665">Questo servizio genera un tipo di evento GX_SIGNAL, ovvero un tipo o una classe di GX_EVENT particolare.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-14665">This service generates a GX_SIGNAL type of event, which is a particular type or class of GX_EVENT.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-14666">gx_widget_event_generate () codifica l'ID widget a 16 bit, insieme al event_type passato, in un singolo valore GX_EVENT. gx_event_type a 32 bit.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-14666">gx_widget_event_generate() encodes the 16 bit widget ID, along with the passed in event_type, into a single 32 bit GX_EVENT.gx_event_type value.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-14667">Il parametro value è codificato nel gx_event generato.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-14667">The value parameter is encoded into the generated gx_event.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-14668">gx_event_payload gx_event_payload.gx_event_longdata campo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-14668">gx_event_payload.gx_event_longdata field.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-14669">Il campo event.gx_event_target generato viene sempre caricato con l'elemento padre del widget chiamante, ovvero l'evento generato viene sempre inviato prima all'elemento padre del widget di generazione.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-14669">The generated event.gx_event_target field is always loaded with the calling widget’s parent, meaning the generated event is always sent first to the parent of the generating widget.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-14670">Si noti che gx_widget_event_generate deve essere usato solo per inviare GX_SIGNAL tipi di evento intervallo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-14670">Note that gx_widget_event_generate should only be used to send GX_SIGNAL range event types.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-14671">Per tutti gli altri tipi di evento, inclusi i tipi di evento definiti dall'utente, usare l'API gx_system_event_send (), che concede il controllo completo su ogni campo dell'evento inserito nella coda degli eventi di GUIX.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-14671">For all  other event types, including user defined event types, use the gx_system_event_send() API, which grants full control over every field of the event pushed in the GUIX event queue.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-14672">Parametri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-14672">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-14673">**widget** di Puntatore al widget</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-14673">**widget** Pointer to widget</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-14674">**event_type** Tipo di evento.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-14674">**event_type** Type of event.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-14675">L' **Appendice E** contiene eventi GUIX predefiniti.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-14675">**Appendix E** contains pre-defined GUIX events.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-14676">L'applicazione può aggiungere ulteriori eventi.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-14676">Additional events may be added by the application.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-14677">**valore** di Informazioni aggiuntive sull'evento</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-14677">**value** Additional event information</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-14678">Valori restituiti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-14678">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-14679">Generazione di eventi del widget **GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) riuscita</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-14679">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful widget event generation</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-14680">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) chiamante non valido di questa funzione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-14680">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-14681">Puntatore a **GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) non valido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-14681">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-14682">Widget **GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) non valido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-14682">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-14683">Consentito da</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-14683">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-14684">Thread</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-14684">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-14685">Esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-14685">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Generate a redraw event for widget “my_widget”. */
status = gx_widget_event_generate(&my_widget, GX_EVENT_REDRAW, 0);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the redraw event for widget “my_widget” has been generated. */
```

## <a name="gx_widget_event_process"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-14723">gx_widget_event_process</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-14723">gx_widget_event_process</span></span>
### <a name="process-widget-event"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-14724">Evento widget processo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-14724">Process widget event</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-14725">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-14725">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_widget_event_process(
    GX_WIDGET *widget, 
    GX_EVENT *event);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-14726">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-14726">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-14727">Si tratta della funzione di elaborazione degli eventi predefinita per tutti i widget.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-14727">This is the default event processing function for all widgets.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-14728">Quando viene scritta una funzione di elaborazione di eventi personalizzata, l'azione predefinita per qualsiasi tipo di evento deve essere sempre per passare l'evento al tipo di widget su cui si basa un widget.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-14728">When a custom event processing function is written, the default action for any event type should always be to pass the event to the widget type upon which a widget is based.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-14729">I widget basati sul passaggio di tipo GX_WIDGET più elementare utilizzano gx_widget_event_process come funzione predefinita di elaborazione degli eventi.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-14729">Widgets that are based on the most basic GX_WIDGET type pass use gx_widget_event_process as their default event processing function.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-14732">**evento** Puntatore a evento da elaborare</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-14732">**event** Pointer to event to process</span></span>


## <a name="gx_widget_event_process_set"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-14777">gx_widget_event_process_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-14777">gx_widget_event_process_set</span></span>
### <a name="set-event-processing-function-of-widget"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-14778">Imposta la funzione di elaborazione degli eventi del widget</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-14778">Set event processing function of widget</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-14779">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-14779">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_widget_event_process_set(
    GX_WIDGET *widget,
    UINT (*event_processing) (GX_WIDGET *, GX_EVENT *));
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-14780">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-14780">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-14781">Questo servizio esegue l'override della funzione di elaborazione degli eventi del widget.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-14781">This service overrides the event processing function of the widget.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-14782">Parametri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-14782">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-14783">**widget** di Puntatore al widget</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-14783">**widget** Pointer to widget</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-14784">**event_processing** Puntatore alla nuova funzione di elaborazione di eventi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-14784">**event_processing** Pointer to new event processing function</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-14785">Valori restituiti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-14785">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-14786">Override elaborazione evento widget **GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) riuscita</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-14786">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful widget event processing override</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-14787">Puntatore a **GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) non valido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-14787">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-14788">Widget **GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) non valido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-14788">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-14789">Consentito da</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-14789">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-14790">Inizializzazione e thread</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-14790">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-14791">Esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-14791">Example</span></span>

```C
UINT my_event_process(GX_TREE_VIEW *tree_view,
                      GX_EVENT *event)
{
      UINT status = GX_SUCCESS;

      switch(event->gx_event_type)
      {
      case xyz:
            /* Insert custom event handling here */
            break;

      default:
            /* Pass all other events to the default tree view
               event processing */
            status = gx_tree_view_event_process(tree_view, event);
            break;
      }
      return status;
}

/* Use “my_event_process” to process events for widget “my_tree_view”. */
status = gx_widget_event_process_set((GX_WIDGET *)&my_tree_view,
                    (VOID (*)(GX_WIDGET *))my_event_process);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS all event processing for widget “my_tree_view” is handled by “my_event_process”. */
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-14831">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-14831">Description</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-14833">Parametri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-14833">Parameters</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-14842">Esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-14842">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Send my_event to the widget’s parent */

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the event has been delivered to the parent of my_widget. */
```

## <a name="gx_widget_fill_color_set"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-14879">gx_widget_fill_color_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-14879">gx_widget_fill_color_set</span></span>
### <a name="set-widget-background-color"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-14880">Imposta il colore di sfondo del widget</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-14880">Set widget background color</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-14881">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-14881">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_widget_fill_color_set(
    GX_WIDGET *widget,
    GX_RESOURCE_ID normal_color_id,
    GX_RESOURCE_ID selected_color_id,
    GX_RESOURCE_ID disabled_color_id);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-14882">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-14882">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-14883">Questo servizio imposta i colori di sfondo del widget.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-14883">This service sets the widget background colors.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-14884">Parametri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-14884">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-14885">**widget** di Puntatore al widget</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-14885">**widget** Pointer to widget</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-14886">**normal_color_id** ID risorsa del colore di riempimento nello stato normale.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-14886">**normal_color_id** Resource ID of the fill color in normal state.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-14887">**L'Appendice A** contiene ID di risorsa colore predefiniti.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-14887">**Appendix A** contains pre-defined color Resource IDs.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-14888">Si noti che l'applicazione può aggiungere anche ID di risorse colore personalizzati.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-14888">Note that the application may add custom color Resource IDs as well.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-14889">**selected_color_id** ID risorsa del colore di riempimento quando il widget ottiene lo stato attivo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-14889">**selected_color_id** Resource ID of the fill color when the widget gain focus.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-14890">**L'Appendice A** contiene ID di risorsa colore predefiniti.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-14890">**Appendix A** contains pre-defined color Resource IDs.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-14891">Si noti che l'applicazione può aggiungere anche ID di risorse colore personalizzati.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-14891">Note that the application may add custom color Resource IDs as well.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-14892">**disabled_color_id** ID risorsa del colore di riempimento quando lo stile GX_STYLE_ENABLED non è impostato.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-14892">**disabled_color_id** Resource ID of the fill color when the style GX_STYLE_ENABLED is not set.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-14893">**L'Appendice A** contiene ID di risorsa colore predefiniti.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-14893">**Appendix A** contains pre-defined color Resource IDs.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-14894">Si noti che l'applicazione può aggiungere anche ID di risorse colore personalizzati.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-14894">Note that the application may add custom color Resource IDs as well.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-14895">Valori restituiti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-14895">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-14896">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) ha impostato correttamente il colore di riempimento del widget</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-14896">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successfully set widget fill color</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-14897">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) chiamante non valido di questa funzione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-14897">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-14898">Puntatore a **GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) non valido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-14898">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-14899">Widget **GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) non valido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-14899">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-14900">Consentito da</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-14900">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-14901">Inizializzazione e thread</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-14901">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-14902">Esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-14902">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Set background of “my_widget”. */
status = gx_widget_fill_color_set(&my_widget,
                    GX_COLOR_ID_NORMAL_FILL,
                    GX_COLOR_ID_SELECTED_FILL,
                    GX_COLOR_ID_DISABLED_FILL);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the widget “my_widget” background has been set. */
```

## <a name="gx_widget_find"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-14939">gx_widget_find</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-14939">gx_widget_find</span></span>
### <a name="find-child-widget-of-parent-widget"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-14940">Trova il widget figlio del widget padre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-14940">Find child widget of parent widget</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-14941">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-14941">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_widget_find(
    GX_WIDGET *parent, 
    USHORT widget_id,
    INT search_depth, 
    GX_WIDGET **return_widget);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-14942">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-14942">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-14943">Questo servizio Cerca negli elementi figlio dell'elemento padre specificato la ricerca di un widget con il valore ID richiesto.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-14943">This service searches through the children of the specified parent looking for a widget with the  requested ID value.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-14944">Parametri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-14944">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-14945">**elemento padre** Puntatore al widget padre da cui viene avviata la ricerca</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-14945">**parent** Pointer to parent widget from which search is started</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-14946">**widget_id** ID widget da cercare</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-14946">**widget_id** Widget ID to search for</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-14947">**search_depth** Definisce il livello di annidamento ricorsivo in cui la funzione eseguirà la ricerca dei widget figlio.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-14947">**search_depth** Defines the recursive nesting level into which the function will search child widgets.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-14948">Se questo valore è <= 0, la ricerca viene eseguita solo per gli elementi figlio immediati del widget padre.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-14948">If this value is <= 0, only immediate children of the parent widget are searched.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-14949">Se questo valore è GX_SEARCH_DEPTH_INFINITE, la ricerca completa viene effettuata in tutti i nodi figlio di tutti i widget figlio.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-14949">If this value is GX_SEARCH_DEPTH_INFINITE, all children of all child widgets are exhaustively searched.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-14950">Per qualsiasi altro valore > 0, questo valore limita il modo in cui questa funzione effettuerà la ricerca nei widget figlio, cercando l'ID del widget richiesto.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-14950">For any other value > 0, this value limits how deeply nested this function will search through child widgets looked for the requested widget ID.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-14951">**return_widget** Puntatore alla destinazione per il widget trovato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-14951">**return_widget** Pointer to destination for found widget</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-14952">Valori restituiti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-14952">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-14953">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) ricerca widget riuscita</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-14953">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful widget find</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-14954">Widget **GX_NOT_FOUND** (0x09) non fount</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-14954">**GX_NOT_FOUND** (0x09) Widget not fount</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-14955">Puntatore a **GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) non valido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-14955">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-14956">Widget **GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) non valido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-14956">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-14957">Consentito da</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-14957">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-14958">Inizializzazione e thread</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-14958">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-14959">Esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-14959">Example</span></span>

```C
GX_WIDGET *widget_found;

/* Find widget “my_widget”. */
status = gx_widget_find(&my_widget, GX_SEARCH_DEPTH_INFINITE
                        MY_WIDGET_ID, &widget_found);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS, the pointer “widget_found” contains the pointer to the widget found. */
```

## <a name="gx_widget_first_child_get"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-14996">gx_widget_first_child_get</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-14996">gx_widget_first_child_get</span></span>
### <a name="return-pointer-to-first-child-widget"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-14997">Restituisce il puntatore al primo widget figlio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-14997">Return pointer to first child widget</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-14998">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-14998">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_widget_first_child_get(
    GX_WIDGET *parent,
    GX_WIDGET **widget_return);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-14999">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-14999">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-15000">GUIX gestisce un elenco strutturato a albero di widget padre e figlio.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-15000">GUIX maintains a tree structured list of parent and child widgets.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-15001">Questo servizio restituisce un puntatore al primo widget figlio dell'elemento padre.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-15001">This service returns a pointer to the first child widget of the parent.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-15002">Parametri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-15002">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-15003">**elemento padre** Puntatore al widget padre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-15003">**parent** Pointer to parent widget</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-15004">**widget_return** Puntatore per restituire il puntatore del widget</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-15004">**widget_return** Pointer to return widget pointer</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-15005">Valori restituiti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-15005">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-15006">Puntatore **GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) restituito</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-15006">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) pointer returned</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-15007">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) puntatore del widget non valido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-15007">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid widget pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-15008">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) widget non valido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-15008">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Invalid widget</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-15009">Consentito da</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-15009">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-15010">Thread</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-15010">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-15011">Esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-15011">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Retrieve child widget pointer. */

GX_WIDGET *get_child_widget(GX_WIDGET *parent)
{
      GX_WIDGET *child;
      UINT status;

      status = gx_widget_first_child_get(parent, &child);
      if (status == GX_SUCCESS)
      {
            return child;
      }
      return GX_NULL;
}
```

## <a name="gx_widget_focus_next"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-15018">gx_widget_focus_next</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-15018">gx_widget_focus_next</span></span>
### <a name="move-focus-to-next-widget-in-navigation-order"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-15019">Sposta lo stato attivo al widget successivo nell'ordine di navigazione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-15019">Move focus to next widget in navigation order</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-15020">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-15020">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_widget_focus_next(GX_WIDGET *widget);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-15021">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-15021">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-15022">Questo servizio sposta lo stato attivo al successivo widget di pari livello nell'elenco collegato di widget che accettano lo stato attivo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-15022">This service moves focus to the next sibling widget in the linked list of widgets that accept focus.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-15023">Parametri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-15023">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-15024">**widget** di Puntatore al blocco di controllo widget</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-15024">**widget** Pointer to widget control block</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-15025">Valori restituiti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-15025">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-15026">Lo stato attivo **GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) è stato spostato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-15026">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) focus was moved</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-15027">Lo stato attivo **GX_FAILURE** (0x00) non è stato spostato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-15027">**GX_FAILURE** (0x00) focus was not moved</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-15028">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) puntatore del widget non valido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-15028">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid widget pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-15029">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) chiamante non valido di questa funzione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-15029">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-15030">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) widget non valido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-15030">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Invalid widget</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-15031">Consentito da</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-15031">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-15032">Inizializzazione e thread</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-15032">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-15033">Esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-15033">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Move focus to next widget in navigation order. */ status =
gx_widget_focus_next(&my_widget);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the focus has been moved to the next
widget in the navigation order */
```
### <a name="see-also"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-15034">Vedere anche</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-15034">See Also</span></span>

## <a name="gx_widget_focus_previous"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-15036">gx_widget_focus_previous</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-15036">gx_widget_focus_previous</span></span>
### <a name="move-focus-to-previous-widget-in-navigation-order"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-15037">Sposta lo stato attivo al widget precedente nell'ordine di navigazione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-15037">Move focus to previous widget in navigation order</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-15038">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-15038">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_widget_focus_previous(GX_WIDGET *widget);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-15039">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-15039">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-15040">Questo servizio sposta lo stato attivo sul widget precedente nell'ordine di navigazione.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-15040">This service moves focus to the previous widget in the navigation order.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-15041">Parametri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-15041">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-15042">**widget** di Puntatore al widget che ha lo stato attivo per l'input corrente.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-15042">**widget** Pointer to widget that current has input focus.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-15043">Valori restituiti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-15043">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-15044">Lo stato attivo **GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) è stato spostato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-15044">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) focus was moved</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-15045">Lo stato attivo **GX_FAILURE** (0x00) non è stato spostato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-15045">**GX_FAILURE** (0x00) focus was not moved</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-15046">Consentito da</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-15046">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-15047">Inizializzazione e thread</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-15047">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-15048">Esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-15048">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Move focus to previuos widget in navigation order. */ status =
gx_widget_focus_previous(&my_widget);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the input focus has been moved to the
previous widget. */
```
### <a name="see-also"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-15049">Vedere anche</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-15049">See Also</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-15050">gx_widget_focus_next</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-15050">gx_widget_focus_next</span></span>

## <a name="gx_widget_font_get"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-15051">gx_widget_font_get</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-15051">gx_widget_font_get</span></span>
### <a name="get-font-for-specified-resource-id"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-15052">Ottenere il tipo di carattere per l'ID risorsa specificato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-15052">Get font for specified resource ID</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-15053">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-15053">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_widget_font_get(
    GX_WIDGETG *widget,
    GX_RESOURCE_ID resource_id,
    GX_FONT **return_font);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-15054">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-15054">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-15055">Questo servizio recupera il tipo di carattere associato all'ID di risorsa specificato dalla tabella dei tipi di carattere della visualizzazione in cui questo widget è visibile.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-15055">This service retrieves the font associated with the specified resource ID from the font table of the display on which this widget is visible.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-15056">Questa funzione deve essere chiamata solo da un widget visibile.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-15056">This function should only be called by a visible widget.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-15057">Parametri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-15057">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-15058">**widget** di Puntatore al blocco di controllo widget</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-15058">**widget** Pointer to widget control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-15059">**resource_id** ID risorsa del tipo di carattere</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-15059">**resource_id** Resource ID of font</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-15060">**return_font** Puntatore alla destinazione per il puntatore del tipo di carattere</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-15060">**return_font** Pointer to destination for font pointer</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-15061">Valori restituiti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-15061">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-15062">Il tipo di carattere è stato recuperato **GX_SUCCESS** (0x00)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-15062">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successfully retrieved font</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-15063">ID risorsa non valido **GX_INVALID_RESOURCE_ID** (0x33)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-15063">**GX_INVALID_RESOURCE_ID** (0x33) Invalid resource ID</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-15064">L'area di disegno del widget **GX_INVALID_CANVAS** (0x20) non è valida o il widget è invisibile</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-15064">**GX_INVALID_CANVAS** (0x20) Widget canvas not valid or widget is invisible</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-15065">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) puntatore del widget non valido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-15065">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid widget pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-15066">Widget **GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) non valido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-15066">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-15067">Consentito da</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-15067">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-15068">Inizializzazione e thread</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-15068">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-15069">Esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-15069">Example</span></span>

```C
GX_FONT *my_font;
/* Get font for MY_FONT_ID. */
status = gx_widget_font_get(widget, MY_FONT_RESOURCE_ID, &my_font);
/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the font pointer has been retrieved in “my_font”. */
```
### <a name="see-also"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-15070">Vedere anche</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-15070">See Also</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-15071">gx_widget_color_get</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-15071">gx_widget_color_get</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-15072">gx_widget_pixelmap_get</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-15072">gx_widget_pixelmap_get</span></span>

## <a name="gx_widget_free"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-15073">gx_widget_free</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-15073">gx_widget_free</span></span>
### <a name="release-memory-associated-with-a-widget"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-15074">Memoria di versione associata a un widget</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-15074">Release memory associated with a widget</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-15075">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-15075">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_widget_free(GX_WIDGETG *widget);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-15076">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-15076">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-15077">Questo servizio rilascia la memoria associata a un blocco di controllo widget.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-15077">This service releases the memory associated with a widget control block.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-15078">Parametri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-15078">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-15079">**widget** di Puntatore al blocco di controllo widget</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-15079">**widget** Pointer to widget control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-15080">**resource_id** ID risorsa del tipo di carattere</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-15080">**resource_id** Resource ID of font</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-15081">**return_font** Puntatore alla destinazione per il puntatore del tipo di carattere</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-15081">**return_font** Pointer to destination for font pointer</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-15082">Valori restituiti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-15082">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-15083">Il widget è stato liberato **GX_SUCCESS** (0x00)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-15083">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successfully freed widget</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-15084">La funzione di memoria libera **GX_SYSTEM_MEMPRY_ERROR** (0x30) non è definita</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-15084">**GX_SYSTEM_MEMPRY_ERROR** (0x30) Memory free function is not defined</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-15085">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) puntatore del widget non valido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-15085">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid widget pointer</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-15086">Consentito da</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-15086">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-15087">Inizializzazione e thread</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-15087">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-15088">Esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-15088">Example</span></span>

```C
GX_WIDGET widget;
UINT status;

status = gx_widget_allocate(&widget, sizeof(GX_WIDGET))

/* Free a runtime allocated widget. */
if (status == GX_SUCCESS)
{
      status = gx_widget_free(widget);
}

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the memory that allocated to the widget has been released. */
```

## <a name="gx_widget_front_move"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-15125">gx_widget_front_move</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-15125">gx_widget_front_move</span></span>
### <a name="move-widget-to-front"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-15126">Sposta il widget in primo piano</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-15126">Move widget to front</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-15127">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-15127">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_widget_front_move(
    GX_WIDGET *widget, 
    GX_BOOL *return_moved);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-15128">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-15128">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-15129">Questo servizio sposta il widget in primo piano nell'elenco dell'ordine Z padre dei widget figlio.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-15129">This service moves the widget to the front in the parent Z-order list of child widgets.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-15130">Parametri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-15130">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-15131">**widget** di Puntatore al widget da spostare</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-15131">**widget** Pointer to widget to move</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-15132">**return_moved** Il puntatore alla destinazione per il widget di indicazione è stato spostato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-15132">**return_moved** Pointer to destination for indication widget was moved</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-15133">Valori restituiti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-15133">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-15134">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Widget riuscito sposta in primo piano</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-15134">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful widget move to front</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-15135">Puntatore a **GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) non valido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-15135">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-15136">Widget **GX_NO_CHANGE** (0x08) già in primo piano</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-15136">**GX_NO_CHANGE** (0x08) Widget already in front</span></span>

## <a name="gx_widget_hide"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-15230">gx_widget_hide</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-15230">gx_widget_hide</span></span>
### <a name="hide-widget"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-15231">Nascondi widget</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-15231">Hide widget</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_widget_hide(GX_WIDGET *widget);
```

<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-15234">Questo servizio nasconde il widget.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-15234">This service hides the widget.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-15235">Questo widget è ancora collegato all'elemento padre, ma non è consentito disegnarlo sull'area di disegno.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-15235">This widget is still attached to it's parent, but it is not allowed to draw on the canvas.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-15241">Puntatore a **GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) non valido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-15241">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>

## <a name="gx_widget_last_child_get"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-15282">gx_widget_last_child_get</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-15282">gx_widget_last_child_get</span></span>
### <a name="return-pointer-to-last-child-widget"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-15283">Restituisce un puntatore all'ultimo widget figlio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-15283">Return pointer to last child widget</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-15284">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-15284">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_widget_last_child_get(
    GX_WIDGET *parent,
    GX_WIDGET **widget_return);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-15285">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-15285">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-15286">GUIX gestisce un elenco strutturato a albero di widget padre e figlio.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-15286">GUIX maintains a tree structured list of parent and child widgets.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-15287">Questo servizio restituisce un puntatore all'ultimo widget figlio dell'elemento padre.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-15287">This service returns a pointer to the last child widget of the parent.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-15288">Parametri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-15288">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-15289">**elemento padre** Puntatore al widget padre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-15289">**parent** Pointer to parent widget</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-15290">**widget_return** Puntatore per restituire il puntatore del widget</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-15290">**widget_return** Pointer to return widget pointer</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-15291">Valori restituiti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-15291">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-15292">Puntatore **GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) restituito</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-15292">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) pointer returned</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-15293">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) puntatore del widget non valido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-15293">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid widget pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-15294">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) widget non valido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-15294">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Invalid widget</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-15295">Consentito da</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-15295">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-15296">Thread</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-15296">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-15297">Esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-15297">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Retrieve child widget pointer. */

GX_WIDGET *get_last_child_widget(GX_WIDGET *parent)
{

      GX_WIDGET *child;
      UINT status;

      status = gx_widget_last_child_get(parent, &child);
      if (status == GX_SUCCESS)
      {
              return child;
      }
      return GX_NULL;
}
```

## <a name="gx_widget_pixelmap_get"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-15348">gx_widget_pixelmap_get</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-15348">gx_widget_pixelmap_get</span></span>
### <a name="get-pixelmap"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-15349">Ottenere pixelmap</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-15349">Get pixelmap</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-15350">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-15350">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_widget_pixelmap_get(
    GX_WIDGET *widget,
    GX_RESOURCE_ID resource_id,
    GX_PIXELMAP **return_pixelmap);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-15351">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-15351">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-15352">Questo servizio ottiene il Pixelmap associato all'ID di risorsa specificato.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-15352">This service gets the pixelmap associated with the supplied resource ID.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-15353">Questo servizio deve essere chiamato solo per i widget visibili.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-15353">This service should only be called for visible widgets.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-15354">Parametri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-15354">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-15355">**widget** di Puntatore al blocco di controllo widget</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-15355">**widget** Pointer to widget control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-15356">**pixelmap_id** ID risorsa pixelmap</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-15356">**pixelmap_id** Pixelmap resource ID</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-15357">**return_pixelmap** Puntatore al puntatore di destinazione pixelmap</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-15357">**return_pixelmap** Pointer to pixelmap destination pointer</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-15358">Valori restituiti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-15358">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-15359">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Pixelmap Get riuscita</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-15359">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful pixelmap get</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-15360">ID risorsa non valido **GX_INVALID_RESOURCE_ID** (0x33)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-15360">**GX_INVALID_RESOURCE_ID** (0x33) Invalid resource ID</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-15361">L'area di disegno del widget **GX_INVALID_CANVAS** (0x20) non è valida o il widget è invisibile</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-15361">**GX_INVALID_CANVAS** (0x20) Widget canvas not valid or widget is invisible</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-15362">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) chiamante non valido di questa funzione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-15362">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-15363">Puntatore a **GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) non valido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-15363">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-15364">Consentito da</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-15364">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-15365">Inizializzazione e thread</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-15365">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-15366">Esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-15366">Example</span></span>

```c
GX_PIXELMAP *my_pixelmap;

/* Get the pixelmap associated with MY_PIXELMAP_ID. */
status = gx_widget_pixelmap_get(widget, MY_PIXELMAP_RESOURCE_ID,
                                &my_pixelmap);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS, “my_pixelmap” contains the pixemap pointer. */
```

## <a name="gx_widget_previous_sibling_get"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-15370">gx_widget_previous_sibling_get</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-15370">gx_widget_previous_sibling_get</span></span>
### <a name="return-pointer-to-previous-sibling-of-the-current-widget"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-15371">Restituisce un puntatore a un elemento di pari livello precedente del widget corrente</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-15371">Return pointer to previous sibling of the current widget</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-15372">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-15372">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_widget_previous_sibling_get(
    GX_WIDGET *current,
    GX_WIDGET **widget_return);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-15373">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-15373">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-15374">GUIX gestisce un elenco strutturato a albero di widget padre e figlio.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-15374">GUIX maintains a tree structured list of parent and child widgets.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-15375">Questo servizio restituisce un puntatore all'elemento di pari livello precedente del widget corrente.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-15375">This service returns a pointer to the previous sibling of the current widget.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-15376">Parametri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-15376">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-15377">**corrente** Puntatore al widget corrente</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-15377">**current** Pointer to current widget</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-15378">**widget_return** Puntatore per restituire il puntatore del widget</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-15378">**widget_return** Pointer to return widget pointer</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-15379">Valori restituiti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-15379">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-15380">Puntatore **GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) restituito</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-15380">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) pointer returned</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-15381">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) puntatore del widget non valido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-15381">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid widget pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-15382">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) widget non valido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-15382">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Invalid widget</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-15383">Consentito da</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-15383">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-15384">Thread</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-15384">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-15385">Esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-15385">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Retrieve previous sibling widget */

GX_WIDGET *get_previous(GX_WIDGET *current)
{
      GX_WIDGET *sibling;
      UINT status;

      status = gx_widget_previous_sibling_get(current, &sibling);
      if (status == GX_SUCCESS)
      {
          return sibling;
      }
      return GX_NULL;
}
```

### <a name="resize-widget"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-15393">Ridimensiona widget</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-15393">Resize widget</span></span>

```C

    GX_WIDGET *widget, 
    GX_RECTANGLE *new_size);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-15395">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-15395">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-15396">Questo servizio ridimensiona il widget.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-15396">This service resizes the widget.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-15397">Se il widget è visibile, viene automaticamente invalidato e accodato per il ridisegno.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-15397">If the widget is visible, it is automatically invalidated and queued for redrawing.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-15398">Parametri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-15398">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-15400">**new_size** Nuove dimensioni widget</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-15400">**new_size** New widget size</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-15401">Valori restituiti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-15401">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-15402">Ridimensionamento widget **GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) riuscito</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-15402">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful widget resize</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-15403">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) chiamante non valido di questa funzione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-15403">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-15404">Puntatore a **GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) non valido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-15404">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-15405">Widget **GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) non valido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-15405">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-15406">Consentito da</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-15406">Allowed From</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-15408">Esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-15408">Example</span></span>

```C
GX_RECTANGLE new_size;

gx_utility_rectangle_define(&new_size, 0, 0, 100, 100);

/* Resize widget “my_widget”. */
status = gx_widget_resize(&my_widget, &new_size);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the widget “my_widget” has been resized. */
```


### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-15448">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-15448">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-15449">Questo servizio sposta il widget e, facoltativamente, lo contrassegna come dirty.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-15449">This service shifts the widget and optionally marks it as dirty.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-15450">Parametri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-15450">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-15451">**widget** di Puntatore al widget</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-15451">**widget** Pointer to widget</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-15452">**x_shift** Numero di pixel da spostare sull'asse x</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-15452">**x_shift** Number of pixels to shift on x-axis</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-15453">**y_shift** Numero di pixel da spostare sull'asse y</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-15453">**y_shift** Number of pixels to shift on y-axis</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-15454">**mark_dirty** GX_TRUE per indicare Dirty, in caso contrario GX_FALSE</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-15454">**mark_dirty** GX_TRUE to indicate dirty, otherwise GX_FALSE</span></span>

```C

```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-15501">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-15501">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-15502">Questo servizio Mostra il widget.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-15502">This service shows the widget.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-15503">Il widget diventerà visibile solo se è collegato a un elemento padre e anche il widget padre è visibile.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-15503">The widget will become visible only if it is attached to a parent and the parent widget is also visible.</span></span>

## <a name="gx_widget_status_add"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-15550">gx_widget_status_add</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-15550">gx_widget_status_add</span></span>
### <a name="add-widget-status"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-15551">Aggiungi stato widget</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-15551">Add widget status</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-15552">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-15552">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_widget_status_add(
    GX_WIDGET *widget, 
    ULONG status)
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-15553">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-15553">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-15554">Questo servizio aggiunge qualsiasi combinazione di flag di stato al widget specificato.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-15554">This service adds any combination of status flags to the specified widget.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-15555">Parametri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-15555">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-15556">**widget** di Puntatore al widget</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-15556">**widget** Pointer to widget</span></span>
