### <a name="get-widget-status"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-15602">Ottenere lo stato del widget</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-15602">Get widget status</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-15603">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-15603">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_widget_status_get(
    GX_WIDGET *widget,
    ULONG *return_status)
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-15604">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-15604">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-15605">Questo servizio recupera i flag di stato dal widget.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-15605">This service retrieves status flags from the widget.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-15606">Parametri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-15606">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-15607">**widget** di Puntatore al widget</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-15607">**widget** Pointer to widget</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-15608">**return_status** Puntatore allo stato restituito</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-15608">**return_status** Pointer to the status being returned</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-15610">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) stato widget riuscito Get</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-15610">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful widget status get</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-15611">Puntatore a **GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) non valido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-15611">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-15612">Widget **GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) non valido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-15612">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-15613">Consentito da</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-15613">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-15614">Inizializzazione e thread</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-15614">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-15615">Esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-15615">Example</span></span>

```C
ULONT get_status;

/* Retrieve status flag from widget “my_widget”. */ status =
gx_widget_status_get(&my_widget, &get_status);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the status from widget “my_widget” is
saved to “get_status”. */
```

## <a name="gx_widget_status_remove"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-15651">gx_widget_status_remove</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-15651">gx_widget_status_remove</span></span>
### <a name="remove-widget-status"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-15652">Rimuovere lo stato del widget</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-15652">Remove widget status</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-15653">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-15653">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_widget_status_remove(
    GX_WIDGET *widget, 
    ULONG status)
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-15654">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-15654">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-15655">Questo servizio rimuove i flag di stato specificati dalla variabile di stato interna widgets.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-15655">This service removes the specified status flags from the widgets internal status variable.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-15656">Parametri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-15656">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-15657">**widget** di Puntatore al widget</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-15657">**widget** Pointer to widget</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-15658">**stato** di Stato da rimuovere</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-15658">**status** Status to remove</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-15659">Valori restituiti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-15659">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-15660">Rimozione stato widget **GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) riuscita</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-15660">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful widget status removal</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-15661">Puntatore a **GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) non valido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-15661">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-15662">Widget **GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) non valido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-15662">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-15663">Consentito da</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-15663">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-15664">Inizializzazione e thread</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-15664">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-15665">Esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-15665">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Remove status of widget “my_widget”. */
status = gx_widget_status_remove(&my_widget, status_to_remove);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS, the status flags are removed from the
widget “my_widget”. */
```

## <a name="gx_widget_status_test"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-15702">gx_widget_status_test</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-15702">gx_widget_status_test</span></span>
### <a name="test-widget-status"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-15703">Stato del widget di test</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-15703">Test widget status</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-15704">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-15704">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_widget_status_test(
    GX_WIDGET *widget, 
    ULONG status,
    GX_BOOL *return_test);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-15705">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-15705">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-15706">Questo servizio verifica i flag di stato del widget specificato e archivia il risultato nella memoria a cui punta "return_test".</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-15706">This service tests the status flags of the specified widget and stores the result in the memory pointed by “return_test”.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-15707">Parametri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-15707">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-15708">**widget** di Puntatore al widget</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-15708">**widget** Pointer to widget</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-15709">**stato** di Stato da testare</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-15709">**status** Status to test</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-15710">**return_status** Puntatore alla destinazione per il risultato del test</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-15710">**return_status** Pointer to destination for result of test</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-15711">Valori restituiti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-15711">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-15712">Test stato widget **GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) riuscito</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-15712">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful widget status test</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-15713">Puntatore a **GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) non valido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-15713">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-15714">Widget **GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) non valido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-15714">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-15715">Consentito da</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-15715">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-15716">Inizializzazione e thread</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-15716">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-15717">Esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-15717">Example</span></span>

```C
GX_BOOL test_result;

/* Test status of widget “my_widget”. */
status = gx_widget_status_test(&my_widget, status_to_test,
                              &test_result);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the widget “my_widget” status was tested
and the result in “test_result”. */
```

## <a name="gx_widget_string_get"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-15726">gx_widget_string_get</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-15726">gx_widget_string_get</span></span>
### <a name="retrieve-string-associated-with-a-visible-widget-and-string-id-deprecated"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-15727">Recupera la stringa associata a un widget visibile e a un ID stringa (deprecato)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-15727">Retrieve string associated with a visible widget and string ID (deprecated)</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-15728">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-15728">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_widget_string_get(
    GX_WIDGET *widget,
    GX_RESOURCE_ID string_id,
    GX_CONST GX_CHAR **string);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-15729">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-15729">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-15730">Questo servizio è deprecato a favore di gx_widget_string_get_ext ().</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-15730">This service is deprecated in favor of gx_widget_string_get_ext().</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-15731">Questo servizio restituisce la voce della tabella di stringhe per il valore ID stringa specificato.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-15731">This service returns the string table entry for the given string ID value.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-15732">Questo servizio è simile a gx_display_string_get, ad eccezione del fatto che la visualizzazione attiva viene determinata automaticamente anziché essere passata dal chiamante.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-15732">This service is similar to gx_display_string_get, except the active display is determined automatically rather than being passed in by the caller.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-15733">Questo servizio può essere usato solo per i widget visibili, ovvero la visualizzazione associata a questo widget è nota.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-15733">This service can only be used for widgets which are visible, i.e. the display associated with this widget is known.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-15734">Parametri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-15734">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-15735">**widget** di Puntatore al widget</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-15735">**widget** Pointer to widget</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-15736">**string_id** Valore ID stringa dall'intestazione risorse</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-15736">**string_id** String ID value from resources header</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-15737">**stringa** di Indirizzo della variabile da restituire stringa</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-15737">**string** Address of variable to return string</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-15738">Valori restituiti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-15738">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-15739">Test stato widget **GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) riuscito</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-15739">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful widget status test</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-15740">Puntatore a **GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) non valido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-15740">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-15741">Widget **GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) non valido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-15741">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-15742">Consentito da</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-15742">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-15743">Inizializzazione e thread</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-15743">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-15744">Esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-15744">Example</span></span>

```C
GX_CONST GX_CHAR *string;

/* Test status of widget “my_widget”. */
status = gx_widget_string_get(&my_widget, GX_STRING_ID_SHUTDOWN,
      &string);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the string has been retrieved */
```

## <a name="gx_widget_style_add"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-15769">gx_widget_style_add</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-15769">gx_widget_style_add</span></span>
### <a name="add-widget-style"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-15770">Aggiungi stile widget</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-15770">Add widget style</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-15771">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-15771">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_widget_style_add(
    GX_WIDGET *widget, 
    ULONG style)
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-15772">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-15772">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-15773">Questo servizio aggiunge uno stile al widget.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-15773">This service adds a style to the widget.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-15774">Vengono inoltre eseguite le azioni seguenti.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-15774">In addition, the following actions are taken.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-15775">Se lo stile aggiunto è GX_STYLE_TRANSPARENT, verrà aggiunto lo stato GX_STATUS_TRANSPARENT.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-15775">If the added style is GX_STYLE_TRANSPARENT, status GX_STATUS_TRANSPARENT will be added.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-15776">Se lo stile aggiunto è GX_STYLE_ENABLED, verrà aggiunto lo stato GX_STATUS_SELECTABLE.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-15776">If the added style is GX_STYLE_ENABLED, status GX_STATUS_SELECTABLE will be added.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-15777">Se il widget è visibile, viene automaticamente invalidato e accodato per il ridisegno.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-15777">If the widget is visible, it is automatically invalidated and queued for redrawing.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-15778">Parametri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-15778">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-15779">**widget** di Puntatore al widget</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-15779">**widget** Pointer to widget</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-15780">**stile** Nuovo stile da aggiungere.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-15780">**style** New style to add.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-15781">L' **Appendice D** contiene stili generali predefiniti per tutti i widget e per gli stili specifici dei widget.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-15781">**Appendix D** contains pre-defined general styles for all widgets as well as widget-specific styles.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-15782">Valori restituiti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-15782">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-15783">Aggiunta stile widget **GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) riuscita</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-15783">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful widget style add</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-15784">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) chiamante non valido di questa funzione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-15784">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-15785">Puntatore a **GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) non valido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-15785">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-15786">Widget **GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) non valido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-15786">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-15787">Consentito da</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-15787">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-15788">Inizializzazione e thread</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-15788">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-15789">Esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-15789">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Add style to widget “my_widget”. */
status = gx_widget_style_add(&my_widget, GX_STYLE_BORDER_RAISED);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS, the style was successfully applied to the widget “my_widget”. */
```

## <a name="gx_widget_style_get"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-15826">gx_widget_style_get</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-15826">gx_widget_style_get</span></span>
### <a name="get-widget-style"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-15827">Ottenere lo stile del widget</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-15827">Get widget style</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-15828">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-15828">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_widget_style_get(
    GX_WIDGET *widget, 
    ULONG *return_style)
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-15829">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-15829">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-15830">Questo servizio recupera il flag di stile dal widget.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-15830">This service retrieves style flag from the widget.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-15831">Parametri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-15831">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-15832">**widget** di Puntatore al widget</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-15832">**widget** Pointer to widget</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-15833">**return_style** Puntatore allo stile restituito.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-15833">**return_style** Pointer to the style being returned.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-15834">Valori restituiti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-15834">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-15835">Lo stile del widget è stato recuperato **GX_SUCCESS** (0x00)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-15835">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successfully retrieved widget style</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-15836">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) chiamante non valido di questa funzione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-15836">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-15837">Puntatore a **GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) non valido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-15837">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-15838">Widget **GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) non valido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-15838">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-15839">Consentito da</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-15839">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-15840">Inizializzazione e thread</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-15840">Initialization and threads</span></span>


### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-15841">Esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-15841">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Retrieve style from widget into “style”. */
status = gx_widget_style_get(&my_widget, &style);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the style flag from widget is saved in “style”. */
```

## <a name="gx_widget_style_remove"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-15878">gx_widget_style_remove</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-15878">gx_widget_style_remove</span></span>
### <a name="remove-widget-style"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-15879">Rimuovi stile widget</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-15879">Remove widget style</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-15880">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-15880">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_widget_style_remove(
    GX_WIDGET *widget, 
    ULONG style)
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-15881">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-15881">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-15882">Questo servizio rimuove uno stile dal widget.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-15882">This service removes a style from the widget.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-15883">Vengono inoltre eseguite le azioni seguenti.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-15883">In addition, the following actions are taken.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-15884">Se lo stile rimosso è GX_STYLE_TRANSPARENT, lo stato GX_STATUS_TRANSPARENT verrà rimosso.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-15884">If the removed style is GX_STYLE_TRANSPARENT, status GX_STATUS_TRANSPARENT will be removed.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-15885">Se lo stile rimosso è GX_STYLE_ENABLED, lo stato GX_STATUS_SELECTABLE verrà rimosso.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-15885">If the removed style is GX_STYLE_ENABLED, status GX_STATUS_SELECTABLE will be removed.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-15886">Se il widget è visibile, viene automaticamente invalidato e accodato per il ridisegno.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-15886">If the widget is visible, it is automatically invalidated and queued for redrawing.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-15887">Parametri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-15887">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-15888">**widget** di Puntatore al widget</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-15888">**widget** Pointer to widget</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-15889">**stile** Stile da rimuovere.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-15889">**style** Style to remove.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-15890">L' **Appendice D** contiene stili generali predefiniti per tutti i widget e per gli stili specifici dei widget.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-15890">**Appendix D** contains pre-defined general styles for all widgets as well as widget-specific styles.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-15891">Valori restituiti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-15891">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-15892">Rimozione stile widget **GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) riuscita</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-15892">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful widget style remove</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-15893">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) chiamante non valido di questa funzione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-15893">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-15894">Puntatore a **GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) non valido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-15894">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-15895">Widget **GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) non valido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-15895">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-15896">Consentito da</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-15896">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-15897">Inizializzazione e thread</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-15897">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-15898">Esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-15898">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Remove style from widget “my_widget”. */
status = gx_widget_style_remove(&my_widget,
                                GX_STYLE_BORDER_RAISED);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the GX_STYLE_BORDER_RAISED style was removed from the widget “my_widget”.*/
```

## <a name="gx_widget_style_set"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-15935">gx_widget_style_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-15935">gx_widget_style_set</span></span>
### <a name="set-widget-style"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-15936">Imposta stile widget</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-15936">Set widget style</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-15937">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-15937">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_widget_style_set(
    GX_WIDGET *widget, 
    ULONG style)
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-15938">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-15938">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-15939">Questo servizio imposta uno stile per il widget.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-15939">This service sets a style to the widget.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-15940">Se lo stile del set include GX_STYLE_TRANSPARENT, verrà aggiunto lo stato GX_STATUS_TRANSPARENT. in caso contrario, lo stato verrà rimosso.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-15940">If the set style includes GX_STYLE_TRANSPARENT, status GX_STATUS_TRANSPARENT will be added, otherwise the status will be removed.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-15941">Se lo stile del set include GX_STYLE_ENABLED, verrà aggiunto lo stato GX_STATUS_SELECTABLE. in caso contrario, lo stato verrà rimosso.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-15941">If the set style includes GX_STYLE_ENABLED, status GX_STATUS_SELECTABLE will be added, otherwise the status will be removed.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-15942">Se il widget è visibile, viene automaticamente invalidato e accodato per il ridisegno.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-15942">If the widget is visible, it is automatically invalidated and queued for redrawing.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-15943">Parametri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-15943">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-15944">**widget** di Puntatore al widget</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-15944">**widget** Pointer to widget</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-15945">**stile** Stile da impostare.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-15945">**style** Style to set.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-15946">L' **Appendice D** contiene stili generali predefiniti per tutti i widget e per gli stili specifici dei widget.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-15946">**Appendix D** contains pre-defined general styles for all widgets as well as widget-specific styles.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-15947">Valori restituiti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-15947">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-15948">Set di stili del widget **GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) riuscito</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-15948">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful widget style set</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-15949">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) chiamante non valido di questa funzione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-15949">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-15950">Puntatore a **GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) non valido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-15950">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-15951">Widget **GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) non valido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-15951">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-15952">Consentito da</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-15952">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-15953">Inizializzazione e thread</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-15953">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-15954">Esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-15954">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Set style GX_STYLE_TRANSPARENT to the widget “my_widget”. */
status = gx_widget_style_set(&my_widget, GX_STYLE_TRANSPARENT);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the widget “my_widget” style is set to GX_STYLE_TRANSPARENT. */
```

## <a name="gx_widget_top_visible_child_find"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-16102">gx_widget_top_visible_child_find</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-16102">gx_widget_top_visible_child_find</span></span>
### <a name="return-pointer-to-visible-child-that-is-top-of-z-order"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-16103">Restituisce un puntatore a un elemento figlio visibile che è superiore a z order</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-16103">Return pointer to visible child that is top of Z order</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-16104">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-16104">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_widget_top_visible_child_find(
    GX_WIDGET *current,
    GX_WIDGET **widget_return);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-16105">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-16105">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-16106">GUIX gestisce un elenco strutturato a albero di widget padre e figlio.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-16106">GUIX maintains a tree structured list of parent and child widgets.</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-16107">Questo servizio restituisce un puntatore al figlio visibile superiore del widget corrente.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-16107">This service returns a pointer to the topmost visible child of the current widget.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-16108">Parametri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-16108">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-16109">**corrente** Puntatore al widget corrente</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-16109">**current** Pointer to current widget</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-16110">**widget_return** Puntatore per restituire il puntatore del widget</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-16110">**widget_return** Pointer to return widget pointer</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-16111">Valori restituiti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-16111">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-16112">Puntatore **GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) restituito</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-16112">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) pointer returned</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-16113">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) puntatore del widget non valido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-16113">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid widget pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-16114">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) widget non valido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-16114">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Invalid widget</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-16115">Consentito da</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-16115">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-16116">Thread</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-16116">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-16117">Esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-16117">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Retrieve topmost visible widget on the display */

GX_WIDGET *get_top_window(GX_WINDOW_ROOT *root)
{
    GX_WIDGET *top_window;
    UINT status;

    status = gx_widget_top_visible_child_find(root, &top_window);
    if (status == GX_SUCCESS)
    {
        return top_window;
    }
    return GX_NULL;
}
```

## <a name="gx_window_client_scroll"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-16257">gx_window_client_scroll</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-16257">gx_window_client_scroll</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_window_client_scroll(
    GX_WINDOW *window, 
    GX_VALUE x_scroll,
    GX_VALUE y_scroll);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-16260">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-16260">Description</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-16262">Parametri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-16262">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-16263">**finestra** di Puntatore a finestra</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-16263">**window** Pointer to window</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-16265">**y_scroll** Quantità da scorrere sull'asse y</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-16265">**y_scroll** Amount to scroll on the y-axis</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-16268">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) chiamante non valido di questa funzione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-16268">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-16269">Puntatore a **GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) non valido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-16269">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-16271">Valore/i di scorrimento **GX_INVALID_VALUE** (0x22) non valido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-16271">**GX_INVALID_VALUE** (0x22) Scroll value(s) not valid</span></span>

## <a name="gx_window_client_width_get"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-16289">gx_window_client_width_get</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-16289">gx_window_client_width_get</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_window_client_width_get(
    GX_WINDOW *window,
    GX_VALUE *return_width);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-16292">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-16292">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-16293">Questo servizio ottiene la larghezza client della finestra specificata.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-16293">This service gets the client width of the specified window.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-16294">Parametri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-16294">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-16296">**return_height** Puntatore alla destinazione per la larghezza del client</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-16296">**return_height** Pointer to destination for client width</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-16297">Valori restituiti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-16297">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-16298">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) finestra riuscita larghezza client finestra Get</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-16298">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful window client width get</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-16299">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) chiamante non valido di questa funzione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-16299">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-16301">Widget **GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) non valido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-16301">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-16302">Consentito da</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-16302">Allowed From</span></span>

```C
GX_VALUE my_client_widthl

/* Get client width of “my_window”. */

```

## <a name="gx_window_close"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-16319">gx_window_close</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-16319">gx_window_close</span></span>
### <a name="close-modal-window"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-16320">Chiudi finestra modale</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-16320">Close modal window</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-16321">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-16321">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_window_close(GX_WINDOW *window);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-16322">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-16322">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-16323">Questo servizio impone la disconnessione di una finestra modale dal relativo elemento padre e la restituzione dal ciclo di esecuzione modale.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-16323">This service forces a modal window to detach from its parent and return from the modal execution loop.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-16324">Parametri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-16324">Parameters</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-16326">Valori restituiti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-16326">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-16328">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) chiamante non valido di questa funzione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-16328">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-16329">Puntatore a **GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) non valido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-16329">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-16330">Widget **GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) non valido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-16330">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-16331">Consentito da</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-16331">Allowed From</span></span>

```C
/* Close window “my_window”. */

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS window “my_window” has been closed. */
```

## <a name="gx_window_create"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-16349">gx_window_create</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-16349">gx_window_create</span></span>
### <a name="create-window"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-16350">Crea finestra</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-16350">Create window</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-16351">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-16351">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_window_create(
    GX_WINDOW *window, 
    GX_CONST GX_CHAR *name,
    GX_WIDGET *parent, 
    ULONG style,
    USHORT window_id, 
    GX_CONST GX_RECTANGLE *size);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-16352">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-16352">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-16353">Questo servizio crea una finestra.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-16353">This service creates a window.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-16354">GX_WINDOW deriva da GX_WIDGET e supporta tutti i servizi API gx_widget.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-16354">GX_WINDOW is derived from GX_WIDGET and supports all gx_widget API services.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-16355">Parametri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-16355">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-16356">**finestra** di Puntatore al blocco di controllo finestra</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-16356">**window** Pointer to window control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-16357">**nome** Nome logico della finestra</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-16357">**name** Logical name of window</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-16358">**elemento padre** Puntatore al widget padre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-16358">**parent** Pointer to parent widget</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-16359">**stile** Stile della finestra.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-16359">**style** Window style.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-16360">L' **Appendice D** contiene stili generali predefiniti per tutti i widget e per gli stili specifici dei widget.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-16360">**Appendix D** contains pre-defined general styles for all widgets as well as widget-specific styles.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-16361">**window_id** ID definito dall'applicazione della finestra</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-16361">**window_id** Application-defined ID of the window</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-16362">**dimensioni** Dimensioni della finestra</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-16362">**size** Size of the window</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-16363">Valori restituiti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-16363">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-16364">Creazione finestra riuscita **GX_SUCCESS** (0x00)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-16364">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful window create</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-16365">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) chiamante non valido di questa funzione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-16365">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-16366">Puntatore a **GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) non valido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-16366">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-16367">Widget **GX_ALREADY_CREATED** (0x13) già creato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-16367">**GX_ALREADY_CREATED** (0x13) Widget already created</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-16368">**GX_INVALID_SIZE** (0x19) dimensioni del blocco di controllo widget non valide</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-16368">**GX_INVALID_SIZE** (0x19) Invalid widget control block size</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-16369">Widget **GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) non valido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-16369">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-16370">Consentito da</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-16370">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-16371">Inizializzazione e thread</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-16371">Initialization and threads</span></span>

```C
GX_WINDOW my_window;

/* Create window “my_window”. */
status = gx_window_create(&my_window, "my window",
                          &my_parent_window, GX_STYLE_BORDER_RAISED,
                          MY_WINDOW_ID, &size);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS window “my_window” has been created. */
```

## <a name="gx_window_draw"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-16388">gx_window_draw</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-16388">gx_window_draw</span></span>
### <a name="draw-window"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-16389">Finestra di disegni</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-16389">Draw window</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-16390">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-16390">Prototype</span></span>

```C
VOID gx_window_draw(GX_WINDOW *window);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-16391">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-16391">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-16392">Questo servizio disegna una finestra.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-16392">This service draws a window.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-16393">Questo servizio viene in genere chiamato internamente durante l'aggiornamento dell'area di disegno, ma può essere chiamato anche dalle funzioni di disegno di finestre personalizzate.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-16393">This service is normally called internally during canvas refresh, but can also be called from custom window drawing functions.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-16394">Parametri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-16394">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-16395">**finestra** di Puntatore al blocco di controllo finestra</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-16395">**window** Pointer to window control block</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-16396">Valori restituiti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-16396">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-16397">**Nessuno**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-16397">**None**</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-16398">Consentito da</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-16398">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-16399">Thread</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-16399">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-16400">Esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-16400">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Write a custom window draw function. */

VOID my_custom_window_draw(GX_WINDOW *window)
{
    /* Call default window draw. */
    gx_window_draw(window);

    /* Add your own drawing here. */
}
```

## <a name="gx_window_event_process"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-16416">gx_window_event_process</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-16416">gx_window_event_process</span></span>
### <a name="process-window-event"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-16417">Evento finestra processo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-16417">Process window event</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-16418">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-16418">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_window_event_process(
    GX_WINDOW *window, 
    GX_EVENT *event);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-16419">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-16419">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-16420">Questo servizio elabora un evento per questa finestra.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-16420">This service processes an event for this window.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-16421">Parametri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-16421">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-16422">**finestra** di Puntatore al blocco di controllo finestra</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-16422">**window** Pointer to window control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-16423">**evento** Puntatore a evento da elaborare</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-16423">**event** Pointer to event to process</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-16424">Valori restituiti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-16424">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-16425">Elaborazione evento finestra riuscita **GX_SUCCESS** (0x00)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-16425">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful window event processing</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-16426">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) chiamante non valido di questa funzione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-16426">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-16427">Puntatore a **GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) non valido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-16427">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-16428">Widget **GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) non valido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-16428">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-16429">Consentito da</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-16429">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-16430">Thread</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-16430">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-16431">Esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-16431">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Call generic window event processing as part of custom event processing function. */

UINT custom_window_event_process(GX_WINDOW *window,
                                 GX_EVENT *event)
{
    UINT status = GX_SUCCESS;

    switch(event->gx_event_type)
    {
        case xyz:
            /* Insert custom event handling here */
            break;
        default:
            /* Pass all other events to the default window
            event processing */
            status = gx_window_event_process(window, event);
            break;
        }
        return status;
}
```

## <a name="gx_window_execute"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-16447">gx_window_execute</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-16447">gx_window_execute</span></span>
### <a name="modally-execute-a-window"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-16448">Eseguire una finestra modale</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-16448">Modally execute a window</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-16449">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-16449">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_window_execute(
    GX_WINDOW *window,
    ULONG *return_ptr)
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-16450">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-16450">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-16451">Questo servizio esegue la modalità modale di una finestra.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-16451">This service modally executes a window.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-16452">Qualsiasi input utente (eventi penna e così via) all'esterno dell'area client finestra verrà ignorato.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-16452">Any user input (pen events, etc.) outside of the window client area will be ignored.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-16453">Si noti che questa funzione entra in un ciclo di esecuzione del blocco continuo e non torna al chiamante finché l'esecuzione del modello non viene terminata.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-16453">Note that this function enters a continuous blocking execution loop, and does not return to the caller until the model execution is terminated.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-16454">L'esecuzione modale termina quando l'elaborazione degli eventi per qualsiasi evento ricevuto restituisce un valore di stato diverso da zero oppure quando viene richiamata la funzione API gx_window_close.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-16454">Modal execution terminates when the event processing for any received event returns a non-zero status value, or when the gx_window_close API function is invoked.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-16455">Il codice restituito per l'elaborazione di eventi diversi da zero viene restituito al chiamante tramite il return_ptr passato all'API</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-16455">The non-zero event processing return code is returned to the caller through the return_ptr passed into this API</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-16456">Parametri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-16456">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-16457">**finestra** di Puntatore al blocco di controllo finestra</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-16457">**window** Pointer to window control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-16458">**return_ptr** Percorso in cui salvare lo stato di uscita dell'esecuzione modale.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-16458">**return_ptr** Location to save modal execution exit status.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-16459">Può essere GX_NULL.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-16459">May be GX_NULL.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-16460">Valori restituiti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-16460">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-16461">Esecuzione **GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) riuscita</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-16461">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful execution</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-16462">**GX_SYSTEM_EVENT_RECEIVE_ERROR (0x05)** Evento pickup dalla coda eventi non riuscito</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-16462">**GX_SYSTEM_EVENT_RECEIVE_ERROR(0x05)** Pickup event from event queue failed</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-16463">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) chiamante non valido di questa funzione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-16463">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-16464">Puntatore a **GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) non valido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-16464">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-16465">Widget **GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) non valido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-16465">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-16466">Consentito da</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-16466">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-16467">Inizializzazione e thread</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-16467">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-16468">Esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-16468">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Execute a modal window. */
status = gx_window_execute(&my_window, &return_code);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the window was executed, and return_code holds the execution return code. */
```

### <a name="process-event-for-the-root-window"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-16536">Elabora evento per la finestra radice</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-16536">Process event for the root window</span></span>

```C
    GX_WINDOW_ROOT *root_window,

```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-16538">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-16538">Description</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-16540">Parametri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-16540">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-16541">**root_window** Puntatore al blocco di controllo della finestra radice</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-16541">**root_window** Pointer to root window control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-16542">**evento** Puntatore all'evento da elaborare</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-16542">**event** Pointer to the event to be processed</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-16543">Valori restituiti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-16543">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-16544">Evento della finestra radice elaborato dall' **GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) completato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-16544">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successfully processed root window event</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-16545">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) chiamante non valido di questa funzione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-16545">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-16546">Puntatore a **GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) non valido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-16546">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-16547">Consentito da</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-16547">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-16548">Thread</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-16548">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-16549">Esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-16549">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Call generic root window event processing as part of custom event processing function. */

UINT custom_root_window_event_process(GX_ROOT_WINDOW *root,
                                      GX_EVENT *event)
{
    UINT status = GX_SUCCESS;

    switch(event->gx_event_type)
    {
    case xyz:
        /* Insert custom event handling here */
        break;
    default:
        /* Pass all other events to the default root window
            event processing */
        status = gx_window_root_event_process(root, event);
        break;
    }
    return status;
}
```

## <a name="gx_window_scroll_info_get"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-16596">gx_window_scroll_info_get</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-16596">gx_window_scroll_info_get</span></span>
### <a name="get-window-scroll-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-16597">Ottenere le informazioni di scorrimento della finestra</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-16597">Get window scroll info</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-16598">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-16598">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_window_scroll_info_get(
    GX_WINDOW *window, 
    ULONG style,
    GX_SCROLL_INFO *return_scroll_info);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-16599">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-16599">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-16600">Questo servizio ottiene le informazioni di scorrimento della finestra.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-16600">This service gets the window scroll information.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-16601">Parametri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-16601">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-16602">**finestra** di Puntatore a finestra</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-16602">**window** Pointer to window</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-16603">**stile** GX_SCROLLBAR_HORIZONTAL o GX_SCROLLBAR_VERTICAL</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-16603">**style** GX_SCROLLBAR_HORIZONTAL or GX_SCROLLBAR_VERTICAL</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-16604">**return_scroll_info** Puntatore alla destinazione per le informazioni di scorrimento.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-16604">**return_scroll_info** Pointer to destination for scroll info.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-16605">La finestra padre Inizializza questa struttura per informare la barra di scorrimento delle dimensioni totali della finestra padre, l'area visualizzabile e l'incremento e i limiti di scorrimento.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-16605">The parent window initializes this structure to inform the scrollbar of the parent window total size, viewable area, and scrolling increment and limits.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-16606">L'implementazione predefinita usa l'area client di Windows come area visualizzabile e scorre per pixel, ma l'implementazione della finestra personalizzata può usare i parametri di scorrimento.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-16606">The default implementation uses the windows client area as the viewable area and scrolls by pixels, but customized window implementation can utilize the scroll parameters.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-16607">**Appendice i** contiene la definizione della struttura di GX_SCROLL_INFO</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-16607">**Appendix I** contains the definition of the GX_SCROLL_INFO structure</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-16608">Valori restituiti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-16608">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-16609">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) informazioni di scorrimento finestra riuscite</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-16609">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful window scroll info get</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-16610">Puntatore a **GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) non valido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-16610">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-16611">Widget **GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) non valido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-16611">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-16612">Tipo di **GX_INVALID_TYPE** (0X1B) non valido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-16612">**GX_INVALID_TYPE** (0x1B) Invalid type</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-16613">Consentito da</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-16613">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-16614">Inizializzazione e thread</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-16614">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-16615">Esempio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-16615">Example</span></span>

```C
GX_SCROLL_INFO scroll_info;

/* Get scroll information for window “my_window”. */
status = gx_window_scroll_info_get(&my_window,
                    GX_SCROLLBAR_HORIZONTAL, &scroll_info);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the “scroll_info” contains the scroll information for window “my_window”. */
```

```C
UINT gx_window_scrollbar_find(
    GX_WINDOW *window, 
    USHORT type,
    GX_SCROLLBAR **return_scrollbar);
```

- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-16642">Barra di scorrimento **GX_NOT_FOUND** (0x09) non trovata</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-16642">**GX_NOT_FOUND** (0x09) Scrollbar not found</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_window_wallpaper_get(
    GX_WINDOW *window,
    GX_RESOURCE_ID *return_wallpaper_id);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-16667">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-16667">Description</span></span>

```C
GX_RESOURCE_ID my_window_wallpaper;

/* Get wallpaper for window “my_window”. */
status = gx_window_wallpaper_get(&my_window, &my_window_wallpaper);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the “my_window_wallpaper” contains the wallpaper resource ID for window “my_window”. */
```

## <a name="gx_window_wallpaper_set"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-16694">gx_window_wallpaper_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-16694">gx_window_wallpaper_set</span></span>
### <a name="set-window-wallpaper"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-16695">Imposta sfondo finestra</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-16695">Set window wallpaper</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-16696">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-16696">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_window_wallpaper_set(
    GX_WINDOW *window,
    GX_RESOURCE_ID wallpaper_id,
    GX_BOOL tile);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-16697">Descrizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-16697">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-16698">Questo servizio imposta lo sfondo per la finestra specificata.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-16698">This service sets the wallpaper for the specified window.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-16699">Parametri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-16699">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-16700">**finestra** di Puntatore a finestra</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-16700">**window** Pointer to window</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-16701">**wallpaper_id** ID risorsa dello sfondo da usare</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-16701">**wallpaper_id** Resource ID of wallpaper to use</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-16702">**riquadro** Lo sfondo viene affiancato se GX_TRUE. in caso contrario, lo sfondo non viene affiancato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-16702">**tile** Wallpaper is tiled if GX_TRUE, otherwise wallpaper is not tiled</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-16703">Valori restituiti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-16703">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-16704">Set di sfondo finestra **GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) riuscito</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-16704">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful window wallpaper set</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-16705">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) chiamante non valido di questa funzione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-16705">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-16706">Puntatore a **GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) non valido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-16706">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c4c2e-16707">Widget **GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) non valido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4c2e-16707">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>

```C
/* Set wallpaper for window “my_window”. */
status = gx_window_wallpaper_set(&my_window,
                                 MY_WALLPAPER_RESOURCE_ID,
                                 GX_TRUE);

```
